name: Soy Hydrating Gentle Face Cleanser
about: What it is: A universal, gentle-yet-effective face cleanser that instantly soothes, hydrates & removes everyday makeup for a healthy look over time...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture..Formulation: Lightweight Gel..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Soy Proteins: to help improve skin elasticity..- Cucumber Extract: to help cool and calm skin..- Aloe Vera: to immediately soothe and hydrate skin...What Else You Need to Know: Our best-selling face wash supports skin’s moisture barrier & clears impurities for a soft, healthy look. It’s formulated with amino acid-rich soy proteins & naturally derived ingredients to instantly hydrate & visibly calm redness while visibly improving imperfections & pores long term..-Supports skin’s moisture barrier.-Instantly calms visible redness & hydrates.-Removes everyday makeup.-Delivers a clear, healthy look over time...Clinical Results:.91% agreed it calmed visible redness*.87% said it improved the look of imperfections*.92% agreed it visibly refined pores*.*self-assessment, 122 subjects, 4 weekCLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: -Soy Proteins (Upcycled from the Food Industry): Help tighten the look of skin..-Cucumber Extract: Helps calm skin..-Aloe Vera: Soothes and hydrates skin...Aqua (Water), Coco-Glucoside, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Propanediol, Xanthan Gum, 1,2-Hexanediol, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Centaurea Cyanus Flower Water, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Rosa Damascena Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Malva Sylvestris (Mallow) Flower Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Tocopherol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Caprylyl Glycol, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Silica, Citric Acid, Pentylene Glycol, Caramel, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Wet the skin and massage over face and eyes to clear skin of dirt and makeup, then rinse. .Use daily, morning and night. .Special note: It’s ophthalmologist-tested to be suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers and helps to remove stubborn eye makeup—including mascara!

reviews.review_title: Excellent Gentle Cleanser & Make Up Remover
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product, love this brand.  I've used it as a gentle cleanser when my skin needs a break, and as a standalone make up remover.  So gentle and so effective with no strange smell.  I introduced it to my mother and it's now the only face wash she will use, so whenever it's on sale I scoop it up for her!

reviews.review_title: The gold standard in facial cleansers!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this cleanser off and on for over 5 years. I like how it doesn't sting my eyes and thoroughly cleans my face of makeup and impurities, without making my skin feel tight or irritated. I use a scrub afterwards to clear my pores. I switch products occasionally because it's expensive! I buy the value size when it's available. I prefer the value-size tube because it's easier to use in the shower, but it's not available on a regular basis.  A reminder to those of us with sensitive skin and/or allergies: always do a patch test. The correct way for cleansers, according to the American Academy of Dermatology: apply the cleanser to a quarter-size spot, twice a day for 7-10 days. I tested it on the underside of my arm, near my elbow. Apply a normal amount and rinse as you would usually do, according to the directions on the product. If you don't have any reaction, go ahead and use it.

reviews.review_title: Soy cleanser is the best! Keep coming back....
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best... BEST cleanser I have ever used! If you want just a good, basic cleanser, this is your gal! Literally the only cleanser that has never burned or irritated my eyes. I have used soy cleanser for years, left and tried others, but always go back to it so I think I'll stay for a while. I just purchased her again and had to come share my love for it. Just so obsessed! Highly recommend!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

For my husband with dry skin this is great, and has really reduced the need to use excessive moisturizer. Great size for travel, especially when just doing carry-on luggage. For me, normal skin, it was not my favorite. I like being able to buy a mini to test out before buying.  Bought the mini for myself and decided not to repurchase, however, worked great for my partner.
I love how this makes my skin feel. It's so easy to use and to rinse off, no stinging eyes or too tight skin after

reviews.review_text: Price increased $30 from last time I purchased it less than a year ago. I have been using it for YEARS!!! For as long as I can remember. This product, while incredible, does not justify the expense. The amount you actually need to remove the makeup as advertised does not make this product a value size, especially at the new price point, and absolutely does not justify spending a $100 per purchase. The regular size is more like a mini/trial size and won’t last you long. The mini is basically a one and done. I will be visiting other cosmetic stores to find my new cleanser. This is not good business, coming from almost two decades of customer loyalty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m gutted. I love this cleanser and have had it in my rotation for decades. Either Fresh changed the formula or I got a bad batch. It’s not absolutely awful, but it’s not nearly as hydrating, light, and cleansing after the gym or hot weather hikes. It’s never been drying at all, ever. This cleanser and the Black Tea line (especially eye cream) have been in my constant regular rotation. I appreciate the desire to create clean products but I’m never buying these products at this increased point when the results aren’t even remotely as consistently amazing as they’ve been for decades. I used yo buy all the Fresh face masks, this soy cleanser and several of the Black Tea products. First they started creating smaller quantities for higher prices. I still bought them. Then they started filling them only partially full. Now this new, inferior formula? It’s not horrible and I didn’t have an adverse reaction, but, it’s just not giving me any fresh, clean, dewy skin and brightened up eyes. Such a shame! I loved this brand. If you’re looking for this original soy cleanser please be forewarned that the new clean products aren’t worthy of your precious coins. Sad.

I have eczema and oily prone skin so I was skeptical about this having enough cleansing power without triggering a flare up.  It has a slippery texture that cleanses well, even as a second step after a cleansing oil. My skin is left soft and not stripped away. It has a light cucumber scent and floral extracts, which is fine for me in a wash off product, but keep this in mind if you are even more sensitive.  Minus 1 star because I feel that I have to use more than I typically use of a cleanser when washing my face. I can see myself purchasing this, but not as my main cleanser because of the cost per wash.
After using this my skin became so soft! It got rid of some of my acne and makes me feel so refreshed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. I hadn't tried until I got a sample a few months ago and since then I have been obsessed, it works so well for me. I have oily skin that is pretty sensitive and haven't had any irritation, redness or breakouts. Maybe it's because this isn't a traditional soapy or foamy cleanser, it's a nice cool gel that is very gentle. I like to massage it onto my face for a minute or two before rising off. I use a separate eye makeup remover to get my mascara off but I like that I can use this to gently clean the eye area again to get any last traces off. I use this twice a day, since I have such oily skin, I have to wash my face in the morning and this works perfectly to clean and prep my skin for the day. My skin is soft and the oil reduced without being tight and dried out. Overall this is worth the price for me, it is more expensive than I'm used to but worth it to me. Give it a try!

On normal days, it does a fine job, but I would not recommend if you are just starting retinoids (might be too harsh/stripping). It does have a weird natural smell that took some time to get used to.

reviews.review_text: Been using this face wash for several years now and I will continue too. I'm 49 with combination oily skin so I need a formula that removes oil and dirt, doesn't make me break out or strip my skin. I exfoliate in the shower using a clear acne face wash then I use this and then once more by itself in the morning and it has kept the pores on my nose and forehead from getting clogged. If you're unsure of how your skin will react with this face wash, I recommend getting the travel size which should last a couple weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i tried this once back in 2020 and ever since then i’ve repurchased this so many times ! i’ve even bought the jumbo size, it’s so hydrating and smells so good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was the one that made my entire skincare routine fall in line. I've struggled with cystic hormonal acne for 12 years, seeing various dermatologists and trying so SO many products. I was finally at a point where my acne was mostly better thanks to my routine, but I would still get a buildup of whiteheads under my skin and during my cycle they would erupt into painful cysts without fail.  I tried this cleanser as a sample about a month ago and since starting with it, my whiteheads have greatly reduced. While I did still have a few spots during my cycle, they were little surface level pimples that cleared up in a day or two instead of painful lumps that take weeks to heal. I will say that I experienced a bit of redness at first that cleared up in a day or two and that I have to work a bit harder to keep my skin hydrated, but it is also winter. Also, I could definitely see how the smell might not be for everyone. It has a VERY strong cucumber extract smell. But all in all, the reduction in my acne makes those minor complaints well worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't find this exactly hydrating, yet it's also not 'drying'. My facial skin type is oily/combination-dehydrated and I prefer a touch of hydration when washing it - which this doesn't deliver, though I still think it's a fantastic cleanser. The texture is like a transparent jelly which foams up whilst working into my skin and rinses off quite easily. Despite the claims, it isn't the best at removing makeup, and I usually need to use my DHC (or other) oil-based cleanser first, before using this if I'm wearing anything more than foundation and concealer. Mascara has no chance! The ingredients are for the most part, very natural and beneficial. This is one of those cleansers that feels like it's contributing to the health of your skin, rather than taking anything away. I do find it pricey for what it is, but considering the ingredients, the glow I get when using this, and the 'simple yet elegant' tube packaging that I love having next to my bathroom sink, I definitely plan on re-purchasing this one once it finishes.   ~ My Sephora Top 7 must-have list ~  (My top 7 must-have beauty products of all time, focusing mainly on my purchases at Sephora)  1. Hair Loss Treatment: ‘Divine Herbal’ - Hair Oil  2. Shampoo: 'Sephora Collection' - Deep Cleaning Shampoo 3. Face Mask: ‘Peter Thomas Roth’ – Pumpkin Enzyme Mask  4. Pigmentation + Anti-Aging Serum: ‘Divine Herbal’ - Facial Treatment Serum 5. Face Scrub: ‘Sisley' - Botanical Gentle Buffing Cream 6. Lip Balm: ‘Nuxe’ – Reve De Miel Lip Balm 7. Lip Liner: ‘Sephora Collection' - Rouge Gel Lip Liner

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Prior to using this face wash I was getting a lot of acne in my cheek area. Using this regularly (and simplifying my routine) really helped clear out my acne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Worse cleanser, I don’t use too much makeup just mascar and concealer and didn’t take any of my concealer off, this cleanser make my face feel dirty after the first use, if you want something good, youth to the people has the best cleanse

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser, it has a lovely smell (very subtle) and my face feels very clean afterwards. It's also great at removing mascara and you just need a small amount. I purchased it many times!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this years ago and didn't love the smell. I came back to it recently and I feel like they improved the formula. It smells lighter and more like just cucumbers now, whereas before it smelled stronger and like a combination of cucumbers and chemicals. I love this now. It's everything a want in a cleanser. Gentle gel formula, doesn't irritate my skin, not drying but still cleanses well, foams just the right amount. One of the things I love most is that it removes all of my makeup including eye makeup without stinging. This is huge because I am way too lazy to use a separate product to remove my eye makeup. My skin has been so calm and clear since using this. I left the house without makeup this morning after about a week and a half of using this, which I never do. I am a product junkie and I'm always switching things up, but I've tried so many cleansers and I think I'll stick with this one. I'm not sure if they changed the formula or not but I also love that it is clean now as well, not just according to Sephora but also EWG.

reviews.review_title: Made my skin red after use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't like this product, but I know a lot of people like this product so it might just not have agreed with my skin. I have acne-prone skin, which is currently dehydrated (oily T-zone but otherwise normal). After using this, my skin was RED, which I find unusual because most cleansers don't do that to me. I thought this was a gentle cleanser too, which is why I tried it. I prefer the Inkey List's fulvic acid cleanser (doesn't irritate my skin).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser!  I use a small amount, like the size of a pea and I rub in it in hands before applying it to my face.  It cleans really well without striping moisture from my skin like how some cleansers do.  Would highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Follow the detection is the key!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hate it the first time using it. But I always like to give thing a second chance. I followed the detection, then I was  in love with it! Now It’s my all time #1 favorite face cleanser and I always get the jumbo size ❤️❤️❤️ Fowler the

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used many cleansers and by far this is the lowest one on my list. I’m a combination of oily and dry skin but more on dry side but this cleanser made my skin super dry and was not able to take the basic makeup off. I still have tatcha and khiels on the top of my list.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing product. I have oily and acne probe skin and this has been a great addition to my skin care routine. I used to think that using harsh cleansers were the best, but that's a lie. A gentle cleaner like this is amazing for my skin. It doesn't leave my skin dry and it cleans very well. I love it and I will keep buying. The smell is great as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love! My all time favourite cleanser. Very gentle and no harsh fragrances. Does not leave your skin feeling tight.

reviews.review_title: Smells like pickles but works well
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for the past couple of weeks, and I believe its really helped my skin look super healthy and glowy and I love how it makes my skin look and feel- however, the only downside is as soon as I started using it I noticed it smelled like pickles which was super weird- it doesn't leave my skin smelling like pickles, and it works really well on my skin (I have combination skin and get the occasional breakout fiesta), so I'm definitely going to keep using it- however if you are sensitive to smell I wouldn't recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: College can be stressful, and it causes random acne breakouts here and there! But ever since I have been using this face wash, I’ve experienced minimal break outs and have had soft and glowing skin! This is literally a life saver!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm 50/50 on this one. I think it works ok and it's gentle on my face which is nice. I don't like the smell at all though. I was expecting a subtle/natural smell, but it has a weird strong plastic smell? And although it does feel gentle, I don't feel like it's really working to get everything off my face. It just feels like it glides around my skin like a gel. Might finish the bottle but probably won't buy again...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely worth it in my opinion. Everything irritates my skin or causes breakouts except this and the CeraVe hydrating facial cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Didn’t like the smell or texture didn’t notice any hydration

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s good cleanser,doesn’t trigger acne and doesn’t dry skin also after use.but due to price I would not give it 5 star!

reviews.review_title: Has been the best during pregnancy!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin has been horrible during my pregnancy (full-blown acne) and I have been using this face wash for the past week. My skin looks better than it has looked in months and I have barely had any new breakouts. I also love that it takes off eye makeup as well. I will definitely repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Helped my dry skin stay hydrated and did wonders clearing up stubborn acne. This is my go to face wash from now on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ive been using this product for a while now and i keep repurchasing, it is the best face wash i have ever used, i have really sensitive skin and everything else breaks me out. I LOVE THIS

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best face wash ever for a go to face wash! It’s non stripping and DOESN’T BREAK YOU OUT! It also smells so fresh! I love it. NEVER stop making it please!

reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my fave cleansers that is gentle and does not dry out and irritate my combo skin. It's great for no makeup days, while on makeup-on days I start with the cleansing oil and follow up with this cleanser. It doesn't have a strong smell either. Will repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is true that it has a very funky smell. For me it doesn't stay on my face after wash but honestly this cleanser is amazing for when your skin is irritated or when you cleanse in the morning because its very very gentle. I had the mini size but i will totally buy the full one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For years I avoided this because it didn't give that sting I am so used to from harsher cleansers. Recently though I've given this a second chance and I found this to be incredibly gentle and hydrating for my skin. My skin used to be extremely oily and acne-prone, whereas now, since I mostly work from home, I basically no longer wear makeup, and as my skin ages it's becoming drier and more sensitive. I think this is really where this cleanser shines. It calms and moisturizes as it cleans. I'm somewhat addicted!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore Fresh, and was sure that I would love this Soy Face Cleanser, but I can’t get past the stinky, sour milk smell. It’s nauseating and worse - the odor lingers. Had to go back and wash my face again with a different cleanser just to get rid of the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the travel sized bottle to try out and I absolutely love it. Great ingredients, lightly foaming, doesn’t make my skin red, irritated or tight & has a very light cucumber scent which is from actual cucumber water in the ingredients which is lovely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used this specific face cleanser before. It lathered. It cleansed. I have no idea what happened to it, because if it had been like it is now, I wouldn’t have repurchased it. (NOT a fan of tissue removal cleansers, and it behaves like one.) Which means—little to NO lather. Zilch. And I have soft water, which means things lather more. Additionally, it didn’t even make my waterproof mascara budge, and I’m a one-coat mascara girl. (I don’t wear much makeup at all.) I’m hoping I can return it—I should have stayed with with another brand Sephora carries, which I can’t mention here. :) I don’t know where this large list of fans comes from.

reviews.review_title: Must have to my skincare routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. I have very acne prone skin and it helps remove my makeup at the end of the day with out my skin feeling stripped or dry. It’s extremely gentle and cleanses very well. I highly recommend this cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the trial size a few months ago and really loved it. I have extremely dry skin and need cleansers that don’t feel like they’re stripping my skin and this one does the job perfectly. My skin feels hydrated and refreshed and I feel like I have had less breakouts. Really excellent product. Also the smell doesn’t bother me, I actually kind of enjoy it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this Face Wash for almost 2 years now and my skin has never looked so clear and felt so clean. Best Face Wash

reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: made my hormonal acne 100% worse. i really wanted to love this product, ive been using it for 3 months. when i first started i only had a tiny bit of acne, i thought this would help. well i was way wrong now my hole check is covered in acne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite cleanser. Gentle, takes makeup off well, smells great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i LOVEEE this face wash. it makes my skin feel super soft and gets my makeup off really well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this as a sample and really enjoyed it.  A single use makes it difficult to tell if my skin will react negatively, but so there has been no issues.  I liked how gentle it was and didn’t cause major discomfort when I accidentally got some in my eyes.  It didn’t leave my face feeling stripped and uncomfortably dry or tight like some other cleansers that I’ve tried before.  I’d definitely be willing to try this product again in a full size and will be adding it to my Wishlist for my next purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This changed my skin completely. Such a great gentle cleanser, my skin is so clear and smooth after using this. Also takes off eye makeup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this face wash for years and I have never had a issue. I have dry skin that results in a lot of oil production to make up for the moisture lost but this face wash moisturizes my face and never leaves it feeling tight!

reviews.review_title: I love this one the most
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been looking for the right cleanser for a while now and I love this one the most. I always clean my makeup off first with micellar water and then wash with this cleanser and my skin is fresh and soft

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is really a game changer, it really helped pump up my skin. I suffer from acne scars and very uneven skin tone and texture and it just little as one week this product was able to help transfer my face and give me a new bright look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the scent of this gentle cleanser! I will definitely buy again. It leaves my skin feeling soft and hydrated. I prefer this over the gentle foaming cleanser by La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one product that I've probably performed multiple reviews on. This is the only product at Sephora that I've tend to re-purchased multiple times. Yes, I am not a huge fan of fragrance but the fragrance in this wash is light like a spa. It does not linger once you rinse it off. love the fact that I can wash my eyes lids in the morning time and experience zero stinging/irritation. I've went through multiple bottles of this product. I am so glad after all these years that fresh has not changed the formula or any of their ingredients. Although I've ventured out to other face washes but nothing has tends to provide me the same satisfaction as the fresh soy cleanser. I've tried fresh milk cleanser once which is okay as well. Maybe I will try there milk cleanser again come the winter but however I can use this gel cleanser all year round without any issues. I personally do not like spending a lot of money for a wash off product but it is something about this product that I really enjoy. I do not wear heavy make up so I can not speak upon the effectiveness for removing make up. Honestly you just can not go wrong.   *I've purchase this product with my own funds. My skin type is combo with dryness on the cheeks, and oily in the t-zone. Somewhat acne prone (blackheads and pimples).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you have allergic reactions and hate the tight feeling from other face washes then this product is a blessing from the gods! This gets rid of pimples and also makes your skin feel supple even after washing. Its great for combination skin, doesn’t sting the eyes, smells like cucumbers, and also reduces the look of pores. If you had to get one facial product, this is all you’ll need and it’s well worth the investment if nothing else works.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have acne prone skin and was very happy to see this product does not contain ingredients that clog the pores. I used it for a few weeks and I am happy to share I have not developed any of my usual acne (only little whiteheads once a while) but … definitely much better than before.  I ended up purchasing a larger bottle the second time.   I used a few sites to check for pore clogging ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is combination and during weather changes it gets very dry and irritated. For example spring to summer and fall and then when we transition to winter. So for years This is my go to because it calms and soothes my skin, does not leave it dry, removes makeup, and smells refreshing/ feels refreshing too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It’s gentle, yet effective. It will clean your skin without over drying it. I’ve been using this for years and the scent also is delicate. Great for everyday use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this product yesterday and it created an allergic reaction around my eyes. Now there are two huge red circles around my eyes. I had extremely high hopes for this products because everyone around me said it was amazing so I went ahead and bought the mini size to try it out. It cleanses some impurities from your skin but it immediately dried out my forehead and caused a breakout when I was about to apply toner. I have oily skin but my skin isn’t sensitive at all and I’ve never had this sort of reaction to any product I’ve used until I tried this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle yet effective, would recommend to a friend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this wash! Nice and gentle but makes my skin feel clean and not irritated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very good gentle cleanser I recommend to anyone who is trying to find a good gentle cleanser for the skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Soft but tough enough to remove make-up. I'm loving it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The only cleanser that doesn’t give my boyfriend pimples and can remove my makeup. We’re getting our money’s worth out of this giant bottle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Do not buy if you want something to remove makeup. It could not even remove my foundation. Really disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love using this cleanser after a scrub; it helps soothe my skin and keeps it feeling moisturized. Typically after cleansing, my skin would feel tight and dry but this face wash is so gentle. I highly recommend for combination skin (:

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's hydrating and very mild on skin and has a watery texture with zero fragrance but doesn‘t justify its name!! A CLEANSER!! Could even clean or wash off a BB Cream out of my face.. that’s a bit disappointing!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff. I use The Ordinary squalene cleanser in the mornings and evenings, and then double cleanse with this afterwards in the evening. It really removes all of my makeup well. Another one of Fresh's that is great, but maybe a little pricey for what it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have recommended this moisturizer and have repurchased this cleanser several times and it really is a great addition to my skincare routine. In the morning, it cleanses very gently removing any residue from night creams. At night, I use a cleaning oil before this cleanser. It does remove makeup, even mascara, but I like to use another step to remove all the makeup efficiently. Skin never feels tight after this cleanser, just balanced and clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First off, I have very dry skin, so when a cleanser says hydrating, it should be really hydrating. I did not feel that to be the case with this one. The Ordinary Squalane cleanser is far better imo. However, it has a nice gel like consistency and does a good job of cleansing. But I believe that's not enough to trump the bad smell for me. it doesn't smell herbal either- it's a bad smell that's off putting.  So I wouldn't buy this. Honest review :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My all time favourite cleanser! Perfect for getting makeup off.

reviews.review_title: Great gentle cleanser for sensitive skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Had a feeling that I damaged my skin's moisture barrier so I needed a gentle cleanser that would properly cleanse my skin without further irritating it. I received a sample of this product a few years back and remember having a good experience with it. I have very sensitive skin so I was very satisfied with how clean my skin felt after using such a gentle cleanser. My skin feels clean, not stripped, after using this and I even though it was definitely a splurge, I think it was worth it to help restore my skin.

reviews.review_title: 10 years of use and going strong!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought it was finally time to write a review of this product.  I’ve been using this face wash for over a decade for my sensitive skin.  It’s a soothing and gentle cleanser.  I recently developed rosacea and it still works great for my skin.  My dermatologist was okay with me continuing to use this cleanser despite the changes we made with some of my other products.  I also always leave a bottle of this cleanser in our guest bath because it feels luxurious and special and it is gentle enough for all skin concerns.  I am never without this cleanser and I even stock smaller bottles of this product for travel.  By the way, the larger size lasts me for months so it doesn’t even feel splurge-y at $38.  This is a wonderful product and I cannot recommend it enough, especially if you have sensitive skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i have extremely sensitive skin and recently i’ve been dealing with closed comedones and breakouts due to using harsh exfoliants to try to get rid of said breakouts. after looking for a cleanser that doesn’t irritate my sensitive skin, i tried this one and i was truly amazed. literally after the first time using, half of my breakouts were visibly smaller and my skin felt smoothed and didn’t feel stripped at all like previous cleansers. 100% worth the money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was dealing with dermatitis for more than a year and having to use light steroids to combat the little patches of dry bumps on my face that showed up when this issue developed in my mid twenties. I tried different gentle and soothing washes and this was was life changing. My skin healed and turned back to my pre-dermatitis normal, and I have never had another outbreak in ten years. I’ll never use anything else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Takes everything away. This is a great beginners and even lighter makeup usage product. Two pumps tops gets everything off your face. Sometimes need to do three or four if you wear a lot of makeup. But this is super gentle and is very easy on skin. LOVE I also but the travel size to utilize on the go. Favorite fresh product ever!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this so bad but I do not like the smell at all! Only used a few times and it feels ok but doesn’t lather much and couldn’t stand the scent.

reviews.review_title: A cult classic for a reason
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser. Have used many times when received in sample packs and Sephora play boxes (rip). It smells like a dill pickle, no lie. If you don’t mind more “natural” or herbal scents, it won’t bother you. It is smooth, light, but effective. No tight skin after and gets the job done. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best! I have very dry skin year round and husband has oily. Both love. Never will change after many years. No breakouts for either of us. Removes eye makeup gently. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such a nice facial cleanser! Got a sample size of it and loved it so much I bought the biggest size available. It leaves my dry skin feeling clean and moisturized and not stripped and irritated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best face cleaners. It leaves my skin hydrated and non irritated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best cleansers I’ve used. I have combination skin and get dry patches around my mouth, but also get breakouts (sometimes cystic) and super oily skin especially before my period. I was previously using the tatcha exfoliating face wash, which was helping the oily spots but drying the areas around my mouth and nose. This cleanser has been a game changer. My skin is hydrated, but not oily and I haven’t had any cystic zits or even small ones since I started using this cleanser. Highly recommend this cleanser. It is also gentle and I have sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No matter what I have had on, just taken off, etc, this is always soothing to my skin and really gets the last bits off (though I use it after an oil cleanse bc I am an SPF queen). It doesn’t irritate my eyes at all, even though I am a contacts-wearer. The fragrance is very, very subtle, but it’s just a perfect, fresh cucumber scent. I’ve tried a thousand cleaners and just decided to stop trying and go with the one true thing from here on out. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great face wash, I use it every day in the morning and at night. It takes off all of my makeup at night and all of my overnight products in the morning and doesn't leave any residue. I have dry, sensitive skin and have never had any issues with this face wash. Great staple in my skincare routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried it as a sample but not looking for a new cleanser. Wow I loved it. The most hydrating cleanser I’ve tried. Love the light cucumber scent too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell and how the skin feels afterwards

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Have been using this product for a year. Nice texture. Nice scent. Easily removes light makeup. Feel refreshed after cleansing. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got a sample of this product in 2016 and have been rebuying it ever since. It's a classic, simple cleanser that works super well, minimal scent, and is really gently on the eyes and skin. I love it for washing my face if I'm wearing minimal make up, and use it as a second cleanse for big makeup days. Have tried other products and always go back to this as my second/primary cleanse :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: fav face wash ever i tried so many different kinds just to convert back to this lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Made my skin breakout badly. My skin is already bumpy after one use. Hope I can return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This smells terrible! It smells like something rotting… I’m not terribly sensitive to odors and you obviously wash your face cleanser off quickly, but, I could not tolerate the odor of this thing for 10 seconds.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the most amazing face wash. It is gentle, but removes makeup and impurities.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Simple cleanser, feels nice & gentle. Washes off my makeup. Strong scent, but it’s very clean so doesn’t result in a headache. Would repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using many face washes I have settled on this one. It’s the best for my sensitive skin. And love the fact that it can be used for eyes too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way, great for sensitive skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely love this product ! The beauty advisor in Sephora recommended me this product as I was looking for a cleanser around the store, and im ever so thankful she did show me this! it is not harsh on the skin whatsoever, it’s hydrating, and effortlessly takes my makeup off. although, it does have the strong soy smell, which I don’t very much like but I can work with! definitely going to repurchase :-)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this cleanser forever. It has a similar consistency to Cetaphil Gentle Cleanser but leaves no residue - my super sensitive skin loves it. It doesn’t strip my skin, it doesn’t irritate or strip my skin, yet it rinses clean and leaves my skin feeling soft. Not strong enough to remove heavy makeup on its own, I recommend double cleansing with something like Ordinary’s Squalane Cleanser or Farmacy’s Green Clean balm. Simple, gentle, effective, and the value size lasts FOREVER. I like that it doesn’t have a strong fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My go to cleanser for years. Leaves you feeling clean but not stripped and tight. A little goes a long way too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face wash. My skin is very sensitive to harsh chemicals, fragrances, and even textures. With this face wash, I can feel safe that I won't have an allergic reaction and that my skin will not dry out after using this face wash. It is gentle and effective.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had this cleanser for so long before actually falling in love with it I was having major breaks out on my face and switched back over to it, I love this face cleanser well worth the money !!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is perhaps the worst cleanser I have ever used. Doesn't remove makeup at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and all the products that I used before this made my skin feel completely VERY dry.  This face wash changed my life. It removes make up. I do not use make up wipes or removers, I remove all my make up with this and then use a toner.  My skin feels moisturized and it does not get too oily after a few hours either. I have been using this for six months and I can 100% say it is hands down one of the best face products I have used. Give it a try!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t really like this face wash. It’s really watery and not soapy enough. It felt like a waste of money.

reviews.review_title: Loved By My Super Dry Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cleanser for about 7 years and it's the only thing I have ever found that doesn't feel like it's sucking the moisture out of my skin. I have quite dry skin on my face, and had tried many other gentle cleansers before finding this, and have also tried others since when I've tried to find less expensive cleansers or gotten free samples, including the Drunk Elephant, First Aid Beauty, Cerave, and Cetaphil ones, which I know work well for others but for me just almost instantly made my face feel tight before I could even get my face moisturized post-cleanse (and then like thirty minutes post-moisturizing it would start to feel tight and dry again). Not saying that those don't work for a lot of people but just that if you've experienced issues with other gentle skin cleansers this could work for you!  I especially love that I can use it over my eyes. I do a couple times a week use it after an exfoliator (Lush's Let the Good Times Roll, sorry Sephora).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a forever product for me. I love how great it is for my sensitive and very dry skin. It doesn’t strip away moisture at all and it dissolves my makeup really nicely! And I love the smell ! Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this cleanser and have put some friends onto it as well. I don't use makeup remover and found that this removes all my makeup (I usually do two washes if wearing makeup, one to get the makeup off and then a second wash to make sure it's all gone)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute favorite cleanser. I’ve honestly tried to stop using it and try other ones but I keep coming back to it every single time. Everything about it I absolutely love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m obsessed with this cleanser. I have purchased it 4 times already and will continue to do so as long as they keep the same formula.   It smells amazing, removes ALL my makeup (even mascara), and is very gentle and softening. I haven’t had any breakouts since using this. Love it so much! I also love how there’s no added fragrance, so the lovely smell must be from the natural ingredients. My only complaint is the price, but I still stock up when it’s on sale.   Give it a try!
I got a sample of this and tried it. Smells really gross. It is gentle but there’s so much added scent it’s not good for your skin

reviews.review_title: my go to face cleanser for over a year
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: love love love this face wash - super gentle but cleansing and smells so nice. I love it as my morning cleanser because it’s gentle and leaves my skin bright for the day / under makeup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this cleanser. It takes off my makeup easily and isn’t abrasive. Will continue to purchase. I wish it smelt better but that’s my only complaint. Maybe it wouldn’t be as clean if fragrance was added.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this is a different formulation than the previous one (the one without the design). I was wondering why I was getting breakouts way more than previously and I narrowed it down to when I started using this! Not only does it not remove makeup well, it also causes breakouts. Reading the other reviews confirmed this for me. Sad!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser, great for hydration but strong enough to give a good cleanse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is so well balanced. I've returned to this after years of trying other cleansers. Only now I use it after my HANSKIN Pore Cleansing Oil [PHA] and its the perfect pairing.

reviews.review_title: Not the worst, but not great
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this but it didn’t really do much for me. I’m not a fan of the scent and it left my skin a bit stripped after using it in the shower.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is a nice face wash. I want to love it so bad because it is the right balance of moisture, but it makes me break out badly! My face has never been this bumpy before in my life…. Like worse than the Rudolph zit I got in the 6th grade. My father asked me if there was something wrong with my face. I love their facial moisturizers, but I’m going to have to pass on this face wash. Also, I do not wear make up, so I don’t know how bad it is at removing makeup, but my guess is it’s not good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Didn’t wash makeup off for me. It didn’t do much for me, wasn’t a fan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Do not remove makeup at all ! a big nono!  Careful please !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Worst product I’ve ever used Heavy breakouts Do not recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very gentle cleanser.  I have combination skin and it leaves it feeling soft and clean.  Would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Things I like- The scent is nice and fresh, not too strong. Pleasant texture. Does not strip skin, or leave it feeling tight and dry.  Things I don't like - Does not fully remove my make up. This works well for me as a second cleanse, if I remove my makeup first. If I am using just this cleanser I need to wash twice. I now use it for my morning wash, when I have no make up on. I will for sure finish, but will not be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love this cleanser so much! the light cucumber/rose scent is super refreshing & for being a gel cleanser it foams up very lightly & doesn’t leave my skin feeling tight afterwards. i wish fresh would keep the limited 200ml packaging bc it’s so pleasing to look at but sadly they seem to be phasing that out :(   overall though10s across the board for the soy face cleanser! i will definitely be repurchasing for a long time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Facial cleanser works really nice at removing makeup, etc. unfortunately I just cannot get behind the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin feels so soft, smooth and moisturized when I use it! I love the texture and ingredients. It does not do a great job taking off eye makeup in my opinion, so I use it in the morning. The smell reminds me of a light, fresh cucumber smell. It’s divine. My skin loves it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good for sensitive skin, does not dry out skin as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this after buying into the hype from all of the great reviews, but it needs to be said: this is not it. Right after washing my face with this cleanser, my face got super hot and red all over. I looked flushed for a few hours, and my skin isn't even sensitive. Will not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this cleanser occasionally (not consistently) over a few years and I like it, with one significant cavaet: I absolutely *cannot* use a face moisturizer after washing with this one. Regardless of what kind of moisturizer I've used, the result is the same - my face gets warm and flushed like a vinegar-induced Rosaceae. I do still like this stuff but generally won't use it in winter if I'd normally be using moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser to death. It removes my makeup better than makeup remover wipes and it smells great… very gentle on my acne prone skin too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product.. I tried this multiple times and every time I use it I break out out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to receive this for Christmas, as I'm a huge fan of Fresh moisturizers. This face wash seems to dry out by normal skin, and there is very little lather, even when I use a considerable amount of product. I would not purchase again, especially at that price point. I prefer my $14 bottle of Sephora Collection gel cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser, use it every day. Very gentle on dry skin. Doesn’t take off my makeup super well so I use it as the second part of a double cleanse if I wear makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: never had a face wash that actually did something for my face. i try to find the most simple, less chemical made cleanser and this hits the jackpot. great for sensitive and acne prone skin.

reviews.review_title: gentle enough for my very sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very very very sensitive skin. I suffer from rosacea and even a whiff of something my skin doesn’t like will turn into a full on perioral dermatitis meltdown. This cleanser is so gentle and so lovely. I purchased the largest size because I love it so much and I never want to be without it. Before this I was using a really gentle flaming face wash from my derm but I like this even more. My face is clean without feeling tight after I use this and the scent is lovely without being harsh or irritating. I don’t buy very much skincare at all outside of my dermatologist’s office because so much of it has heavy fragrance or irritating sulfates and I just don’t trust most brands anymore but this is 10000% worth it. Highly recommend!!

reviews.review_title: smells and feels nice, but not a make up remover
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Like all fresh products this smells great, feels lovely. However, it doesn’t remove foundation. Interestingly I don’t think the bottle says make up remover, but the description in the title on the website does…. I bought the large bottle on sale cause it was a great deal but now it’s a bit of a waste.  After using, I still need to use micellear water to remove foundation.  I’d return, But bought it online and store is never very nice when I return an online purchase so it will probably just sit on my vanity

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was recommended this cleanser by a Spehora employee for sensitive skin and I'm so glad it didn't disappoint! While the strong scent takes some getting used to, it does its job wonderfully. I've used it at night the last 2 weeks to get makeup off and follow it up with a foam cleanser before applying my regular products, all without any allergic reactions or weird interactions between them (both of which I'm prone to!). I've struggled a lot over the years trying to find a good cleanser/makeup remover that agrees with me so I'm definitely making this one a permanent part of my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: HOLY GRAIL!!!!  I have used all kinds of cleansers drug store and almost every kind butttt GIRLLLL this is just so good. Very gentle, cleans skin really well. I will repurchase this every time. Not wasting any money on any other cleanser from nw on!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for 6 years and it is so gentle and great for sensitive skin. It's not drying and it works great for my oily/combination skin. It removes my makeup although if I've done full face of makeup I normally wash my face twice just to make sure. as someone with super irritable skin I would recommend this to anyone with acne prone/ redness prone/ reaction prone skin. I also love that its a clean product and doesn't contain sulphates or parabens which usually make me breakout.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great cleanser that doesn't leave the skin akin to a squeaky clean dish. gentle and removes makeup well. 1 star off as the price is a little up there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start by saying I just received the cleanser and have only used it once. My face feels clean, but not tight or dry. HOWEVER, I HATE the scent of this product. Maybe it's the cucumber extract, but to me it smells like something sour. I don't know if I'm going to be able to continue using it - that's how much I hate the scent. My rating of the product (at this point) is strictly about the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to face wash! I’ve tried countless brands and fresh is my new favorite for skin care. It smells delicious and is super gentle on your skin. My complexion is clearer than ever with this and I even use it on other parts of my body because of the gentleness ;)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Holy grail! Gentle, great cleanser that removes any face of makeup and doesn’t leave your skin feeling tight and dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite everyday cleanser. gentle but effective.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used this product for so many years and still loving it!  Every couple of years I try another brand or formula but always end up disappointed and turn back to Fresh. It effectively cleanses and removes all makeup while still feeling nourishing and just like you’re doing something good for your skin. Not stripping or drying at all, you’re just left with a nice healthy glow. Very light scent that just smells clean and fresh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have acne prone skin - so this for me did not cause me to break out(personally) or if did - its not a huge break out. I been using using this for over a year now. I like that it has a light scent to it to get me going in the morning. Its nice that it also removes my eye makeup at the same time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cleaner for years. It’s one of my absolute favorites. It cleanses well without stripping my skin or making it feel tight. It has a nice pleasant scent with a jelly-like texture. I like to lather it up well in my hands first before I go in to cleanse. In the years I’ve used it it has never broken me out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favourite cleansers. It smells really lovely but has a subtle fragrance. It doesn't irritate my eyes like other makeup-removing cleansers. I find it does remove complexion makeup well, but doesn't remove mascara fully. This face wash is not foaming, so I find it's more gentle on the skin and less drying. I definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had bought the 150 mL tube (limited edition) for $24.50, so got it at a pretty good deal. Not super impressed with it though. I like the texture, just like a gel face wash that lathers up nicely. It's got the franchise lotus youth preserve moisturizer scent that lingers on even after washing. However, I find this is very drying on my skin, and that is what matters to me most, so will be returning. I have better options from Sephora (Purity cleanser, Fulvic acid cleanser) that seem to work better on my skin, so I'll stick to those.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this face wash off and on throughout the years and my skin always reacts very well to it! I love the fresh scent and the texture is very nice. It scrubs without being too harsh. I always purchase this and its a great purchase every time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face wash so much that I bought the $69 value size in the pump bottle. The gel texture is soothing and it gets all my makeup off. Leaves my face feeling clean and fresh but not tight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It doesn’t clean my face, not work well to wash makeup remover on my face. it is good for very dry skin because it won’t let your skin dry. For me, I don’t feel clean after using it. Won’t but it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a staple and I will always repurchase this. It melts makeup and cleanses my skin without drying it. I also notice my acne is a lot more under control since using this. The soy scent is refreshing. It never stung my eyes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Soft and nice. Smells almost neutral. Does not dry out my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample, which I used on a trip over the holidays. The packaging is nice/simple. The texture of the cleanser feels nice, but that’s it. It’s too gentle even for my sensitive/combo skin. It didn’t lift or cleanse anything. Felt like I needed a scrubbing mask afterwards to get all the dead skin and dirt out. I wouldn’t purchase or recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many cleansers and this is my tried and true. The scent is amazing and it makes my skin feel clean without feeling super drying or soapy.

reviews.review_title: great to use if you have sensitive skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great for removing makeup and sunscreen without being harsh to skin. Love this for my sensitive ski !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this is a cleanser, not a soap. The texture is very unique and gentle. It does remove makeup, but you maybe have to double cleanse. The scent is very neutral and natural.
I am in love with this face wash. I have rosacea/acne and this is so soothing and lovely. The smell is amazing. The entire Fresh Rose line is incredible and very much worth it

reviews.review_title: I finally have the perfect cleanser in Soy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is quite dry especially in winter with spells of rosea, and in the past I have never been able to use anything other than miceller water or the occasional glycolic acid scrub from Loreal so it came as a wonderful surprise when I tried a sample of this face wash and it did not irritate my skin! I had purchased a gift set of about five fresh items including the face wash and a toner so I dove in expecting tight skin from the wash. But I got soft skin! What a shock! This could not be true not on my skin that has always been like a prune. I carried on with the toner and moisturizer and felt divine. I tried again that night thinking it had been a fluke and same thing. Soft skin! This little tube lasted for a full month and I finally replaced it with a full size. I expect it will last at least six months so do not let the price of the Fresh poroducts sway you. You only need a tiny amount. As an added recommendation, when using the toner with the roses I would suggest pouring it directly into your hand and then patting it onto your face and that way you will waste far less product than if you pour it into cotton. I intend to purchase that next but hoping it comes on sale as I intend to get the large bottle and I will need more cream by then as well argh it never ends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle on the skin, refreshing and soothing. It does not have a foam but gets the job done. My best purchase from Sephora till date!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite skin care product ever.  I’ve been a repeat customer for years!  Great for all skin types.  Gentle and the rose smells very calming.

reviews.review_title: Cleanest my face has ever been.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute favorite facial cleanser. Its smells fresh & it doesn’t foam up. My skin always feels amazing afterwards.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. Non-foaming, so gentle and good for all skin types! This mini size is my go-to gift for friends! It also lasts for a while. 1 of the better buys if you like the brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve bought this product 3 times already and i’m never going back to anything else. It helped clear my skin and it took me so long to find something that truly helped me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this Fresh Cleanser it removes all my makeup. It keeps my skin looking and feeling normal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am someone who is pretty ‘lazy’ when it comes to cleansing my skin. I say ‘lazy’ because I always double cleanse at least once everyday (mainly at night) but I am really busy and when i come home from classes and work i just want to knock out and i sometimes don’t even wash my face:/ but this is perfect for those ppl who sometimes are just to lazy, my skin is clear and no longer looks a dry. It really has become a life savior.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried a lot of face wash, but I always go back this one, especially in the winter time. Super light and gentle for my dry skin in the winter, and it’s great at removing makeup at the same time. Love it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This face wash is amazing, very gentle for my sensitive skin but works well enough to where makeup just melts right off! Doesn’t cause breakouts and my skin feels very clean after using without feeling dry
best cleanser ever, my skin looks good and feels soft after washing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely love it. been using it for years since it came out a birthday gift years ago

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice product, but I can’t give it 5 stars because it’s extremely overpriced for a face wash. It doesn’t remove makeup as well as melts that I have used previously so I wouldn’t purchase this to remove your makeup. It’s definitely a very nice face wash to use after you precleanse but there are definitely cheaper ones on the market that work just as well if not better. I bought the 150mL bottle and I’m happy with it but honestly I won’t be buying it again unless the price comes down. Would only recommend if you have money to blow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely LOVE this makeup remover!! I find it really does get everything and I don't even have to scrub my face like I did with other removers. It also doesn't irritate my eyes when I use it for mascara/eye makeup with is a huge plus. I'm on my 4th refill and plan to keep going with it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am completely obsessed with this makeup remover it does not burn your eyes or irritate your face it is sensitive and one of my favorite products. I definitely recommend!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this face wash. Doesn’t dry your skin & no more blemishes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for 6 months and I love it. It’s gentle and relaxing, as I’m currently on accutane this doesn’t dry my skin out and it’s extremely gentle. I 100% recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I Love this face cleanser. It takes of all the waterproof make up and is gentle on the skin. It has not dried my skin and I love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Quite drying. Would not recommend for older skin. There's no advantage other than cleaning well.  It strips your skin and makes it very dry. Counter-productive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have super sensitive skin and this cleanser is really gentle on it. I love the smell not sure why the bad reviews but to me it smells like cucumber or some herb. I love it as my second cleanser. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best cleanser I have ever used! I used to have combination acne prone skin and it worked great on my skin. Since I’m now on accutane, my skin is dry and very sensitive and this cleanser still works great. Cleans well while still keeping my skin hydrated.

reviews.review_title: A longtime staple in my skincare routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this cleanser for a couple years now and I can’t go without!   It’s touted as a makeup remover but when wearing a full face of makeup including a couple waterproof products I still remove it all first with a micellar water and then use this face wash. It will remove light makeup on its own however.   I have combo skin and am prone to a bit of rosacea in the colder months and have a sensitivity to heavier scents and some essential oils. I’ve had no reactive issues with this wash and my skin feels clean, fresh and soft afterwards with no dryness. A couple times a week I follow up with the Fresh sugar scrub and I’m good to go. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily/dehydrated skin with occasional breakouts, and have been using this for 3 years! Would I say it removes makeup like longwearing foundation? No, but even though it advertises makeup removing, I never expected it to do that. What made me fall in love with this cleanser was the gentle, yet nourishing formula that is great as a morning cleanser, or just any night you don’t want to exfoliate. It helps my redness, calms my skin, and gives it a nice glowy, supple, hydrated look. The gel formula feels nice and it has some sort of cool feeling and a fresh smell to it, although some people say it smells bad, I like it. I give it 4 starts only because of the price…but I’m always willing to bite the bullet and buy it haha.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Everyone needs an effective cleanser with clean, quality ingredients, and this is my favorite. I have dry, acne-prone, and sensitive skin, and this is so gentle and hydrating. It has soy proteins, which promote elasticity, and cucumber and rosewater, which are calming. I usually use this as the second step in my double cleansing routine, but it removes makeup so well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this as a first cleanse. Love it for makeup remover and a gentle first cleanse.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for gentle, yet thorough cleansing.

reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser!  I have been using it exclusively for the last two years and it is the mildest yet most effective cleanser I have every used.  I am lucky to have very nice skin but this cleanser is perfect for my normal to dry skin and it gently removes eye makeup without scrubbing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: it does what it promises to do

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_text: This is my favorite cleanser. It actually does remove makeup well. I feel like my face is extremely even and with less texture when i consistently use it! not drying at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite facial cleanser. Full disclosure I do not wear heavy make up so it might not be enough if you do. I use it daily. Does not strip my skin. I like the scent. Very light and pleasant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my all-time favorite cleanser. I've tried replacing it with cheaper products, but haven't been able to find a substitute. This cleanser is very gentle, for makeup removal, i use a cleansing balm/oil before, and then use this cleanser as my final step. It's great in this way, because I'm able to remove any traces of eye makeup as this doesn't sting my eyes at all. It also works great on its own if I'm not wearing makeup or something light. I tried the Glossier Milky Jelly cleanser as a possible replacement, but that one did not do as good of a job at removal, had a terrible scent, and stung my eyes.

reviews.review_title: Ooo not for the dry skin types
