reviews.review_text: I have dry/combination skin and this is pretty stripping for me. I’m sure more oily/normal types might like this. It sure didn’t break me out or anything like that but just not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome face wash -- feels great after use. I've been using every day and it's definitely my favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Timeless product that I always come back to, lasts forever and does not irritate my sensitive skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is very sensitive and I love this cleanser. It is so gentle yet effective. It has become part of my everyday routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My FAVORITE face wash after testing out so many! It makes my skin feel so fresh and does not dry out the skin at all. I have combination skin and this face wash works perfectly for me unlike others that use to leave dry patches. Just a tiny amount goes a long way. The scent is amazing as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this cleanser. Absolutely my favorite cleanser from Fresh! It’s gentle but gets all the dirt off and residual makeup. I like to use this after my oil cleanser. I have dry-combo skin and this isn’t stripping at all. Love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great gentle cleanser if you have combination/oily skin.   I struggle with finding good cleansers because even though I get oily and am prone to breakouts, cleansers advertised for acne and oily prone skin, will dry my skin out and and cause me to flake.   If you have this issue as well, try a gentle cleanser (like this one) and treat the acne, pores, oiliness, etc…,with separate masks, spot treatments, or exfoliators.   This cleanser is great because it washes all the grime and muck off my face, makes you feel fresh and hydrated after rinsing, and for me, personally, has reduced my oil production significantly.   If you don’t want to commit to trying the value-size bottle first, buy the trial size so you can give it a test run. If you end up liking it, definitely consider buying the value size, because a little goes a long way. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was having a major issue since a professional facial and a store attendant recommended this to me. It cleared up my face in less then a week of use. Love it!!! It also is moisturizing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Glad it comes in a mini so I could try it out. (Will repurchase)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! Is the best for my face! I believe this must be suitable for everyone!

reviews.review_text: I have been using this product on my face for 10 years. I even have my tween daughter and teen son use it 2x a day, daily. It is mild and cleans our skin so well. A fantastic product for all skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will forever sing this Fresh face wash’s praises! I have been exclusively using this cleanser for years and have consistently been thrilled with it. This is seriously the BEST!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I first found this product in a Sephora favorites box about 4 years back. I over the years I have found myself, continuously repurchasing this product no matter how many others I have tried. I have super oily, acne prone, sensitive skin, this face wash does not dry me out, doesn't break me out in a rash, etc. My face always feels nice and refreshed, I don't think this is a make up remover or a acne solving wash, but this does at least make me feel clean and calm down small red spots. I just bought the huge bottle with the pump, and this will be the only face wash I will continue to by. If you like gentle cleansers, with a very slight smell give this a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used this cleanser for a couple of years, and it is super nice. It is very gentle and has a light cucumber smell which is enjoyable. Skin feels clean & calm but not dry after using. Does a decent job with taking off makeup but would still be best with a double cleanse. Removed a star because of the price point - which is why I haven't repurchased lately. Trying Selfless by Hyram's Centella Cleanser and I find it quite similar to this at a lower cost.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This broke me out, but everyone's skin is different. I liked the smell, consistency and overall experience, but it just wasn't a good match for my skin.

reviews.review_title: good gentle cleanser, just not for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely a nice gentle cleanser, it has a little bit of a liquid-y gel texture with a slight cucumber scent to it and is nice for somebody who wears light makeup. As me who often wears heavy black eyeliner and a full face of makeup, even using my cleansing oil beforehand, I personally don’t think it’s strong enough to clean my skin. I have to go in with a second cleanser to get everything off. But I think this would be a good cleanser for either somebody who doesn’t wear too much makeup or if you’re just looking for a gentle morning cleanser that doesn’t have to take too much off. If you wear heavier makeup like I do, I don’t know if you’d like it that much.

reviews.review_title: Best cleanser even takes eye makeup off!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: BEST CLEANSER EVER!!!! Takes off eye makeup in the shower or while you wash your face!!!! Love this product!!! I have sensitive skin & usually react to new products but not with this one!!! My first review too thought this product would be the best to review with too!! Definitely buying a bigger bottle my next purchase!! If you’re looking for a cleanser to take off makeup this is the one you should buy!!!

reviews.review_title: Not for skin with enlarged pores
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would highly NOT recommend this product for someone with oily skin and enlarged pores. I tried to love this product twice and the last time I got it from the Sephora Clean set. However, every time I switch to this cleanser my pores look larger the same day and the next day. I guess it is a good catch for someone with dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First time I bought it and lasted me about 3 months 1/2. I’m allergic to a lot of floral fragrances and this face is so gentle and hydrating. I felt it kept my skin clear and it took my makeup. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_text: I've tested out a bunch of cleansers for my skin and so far this is the best one. The scent is subtle and not too overpowering. I still use an oil-based eye makeup remover first and then cleanse with this after. It works well for all of my waterproof makeup. I don't find it overly drying afterwards which I found with many other cleansers (drunk elephant, clinique, sephora samples). I like that it's simple without any weird physical exfoliant ingredients. Recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff this has been 3rd purchased! I’m a believer now this stuff is amazing

reviews.review_text: I can’t believe I’m writing a negative review about this super popular cleanser but it just didn’t work for me. The consistency of the cleanser was fine and the smell wasn’t too strong, but it didn’t help my skin at all. I bought the mini as a way to “test” the cleanser on my skin for the past two weeks and I have seen 0 changes. I used this twice a day and I swear my skin looked as oily as before I washed it. If you have oily skin like me and want to test this out I recommend buying the mini size, maybe you’ll have better luck then I did.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t love the scent of this cleanser but it is gentle and does it’s job as a second cleanse to remove my makeup/sunscreen. it doesn’t leave my skin feeling right or stripped which is a good sign as well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is probably the first product that I have returned to Sephora. I got it because they were doing a Fresh sale and I kept hearing good things about this face wash. Maybe it’s just not suitable for my skin type but I found the jelly consistency hard to manage (it would spurt out of the tube and slip off my hand) and it doesn’t foam at all. It also didn’t feel like it was cleaning any thing at all. If anything, it just felt like I was spreading slime on my face and having to use a looooot of water trying to rinse it off. When I first used it in the evening, I tested how much dirt/makeup it was removing by wiping my face with micellear water afterwards and it was like I hadn’t even washed my face. Plus it made me break out (probably because it wasn’t cleaning properly). Anyways, if you like to actually clean your face, not sure this would be the best product for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: I have sold my soul to this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice gentle facial cleanser. Only thing I did not like about it is that it pours a lot out when u squeeze into hand.

reviews.review_title: I wish I could give it 10 stars.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The holy grail of all skincare. If I could only pick one skincare product to keep using for all time it would have to be this. It’s the best of all time. It’s perfect. My husband and I both use it and honestly the thought of using any thing else hurts my face and my heart. I’ve been using it for a few years now and will never ever stop.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will never purchase another cleanser ever! This cleanser literally checks all the boxes! It doesn't dry out my skin when I use it, it removes makeup perfectly and doesn't irritate my eyes, and it smells amazing! If you're struggling to find a cleanser that works for you, I would definitely recommend trying this one. Totally worth the price and you only need to use a tiny amount!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this every time it’s a heavy makeup kinda day. This stuff takes allll the dirt and makeup off my face effortlessly. Gone are the days where I have to rub my eyes out just to remove my waterproof mascara - this thing does the job perfectly and smells amazing. Was initially hesitant about the price, but now, I definitely understand the hype.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is sensitive and this cleanser doesn't make my face feel stripped of its natural oils. I think this works best for dry to combo skin. I remember trying this as a teenager and it didn't work with my skin that was constantly breaking out. Now that my skin has finally settled and is less acne prone, this is perfect. I've tried numerous cleansers and this is the one for me. I started off by trying a smaller sized bottle, but I love it so much that I bought the jumbo size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my go to cleanser for a few years now. I have dry, sensitive skin and this is a nice cleanser for everyday with a konjac sponge. If I need to do more heavy duty washing, I would use it as a second step in a double cleanse after a balm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When i first tried this i wasn't sure about the runny consistency and the smell was a bit odd to me. I have combo skin and find this makes my skin feel good when i use it. It cleans deeply but my skin is soft.  I don't really use as a makeup remover but it does a great job getting the last bits of eye makeup off my remover doesn't get off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser to gently remove my eye makeup without irritating. I also have sensitive skin and just love this product.

reviews.review_title: Solution to clear skin and supple, youthful skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cleared my fungal acne and no forehead texture or blemishes! I have supple skin, no redness, less oiliness, more hydration, and my skin is clear with smaller pores. This cleanser is the answer to all of my skin concerns (as well as removing sunscreen, waterproof makeup, and anti aging benefits) I hope they never stop making this product. I 100% recommend this cleanser to absolutely everyone. Try it and you won’t regret it, it will change your whole life. No more foundation for me!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. I actually just used up my last drop of it. My skin feels smooth, clean, refreshed and ready for my toner and serums every time I use it. Will be a repeat buyer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this over two years ago and it was mr first cleanser ever (beyond dove bar soap). Loved it! Since then, I’ve tried Langiege, YTTP Superfood and a CeraVe one for combo/oily skin. Recently I started using this one again as a sample and notice my skin was BALANCED for the first time. I wasn’t oily in my tzone and my face didn’t feel dirty throughout the day. It was rose water which is balances our natural PH. Essentially it’s like a cleanser and toner in one. Bought the limited edition yesterday and I’m so glad I did! It’s super gelly and will skip thru your fingers if you aren’t careful. Cucumber helps with calming the skin and the soy is a subtle brightener. Scent is light but non irritating as it gets washed away. My fellow combo girls, try this!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did not enjoy this product at all. First, I found the smell off-putting: somewhat fermented, not exactly fresh. Second, I didn't find that it cleaned my face well. I have a normal/combo skin and needed something that would remove sweat and sunscreen after a steamy Texas summer day. And this product didn't leave me feeling fresh and clean at the end of the day. If you have really dry/sensitive skin and live in a drier climate, you might find it working for you. But honestly, there are tons of non-stripping face washes that are cheaper and more effective.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser it removes makeup and balance your skin. Fresh is easy to use and you miss it when you forget to pack in your bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is such a great product to add to my routine at night! It is soothing, removes dirt and makeup, and feels gentle to the skin. Great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this face wash for awhile. It gets all my make up off my face. It’s so gentle and smells nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like this is a decent cleanser — moisturizing and gentle with a soft fragrance. However, I feel like I can find comparable or better ones at a cheaper price (namely, Cerave or Vanicream)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried a handful of cleanser. I have dry, sensitive skin, so finding something that doesn't dry me out and/or irritate my skin has been a big struggle, but this stuff? I'm obsessed. It's the first cleanser where I've actually re-bought it once I ran out. It's gentle enough so it doesn't irritate my sensitive skin, but it also feels like it does a thorough job cleansing.  While I've been fortunate to never have bad acne, I used to semi-regularly get an occasional pimple or to, but I haven't gotten any acne since I started using this. Not a single pimple. My skin is clean, soft and feels great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite skincare product. Face feels cleaned but not stripped dry after use. Works beautifully on my oily/dry combo skin. Love, love, love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This face wash is gentle but effective at cleansing my face. I like the slight cucumber scent. I like it a lot but am not sure I would have purchased it if it wasn’t on sale, as it is quite pricy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: By far the best cleanser that I have ever tried. Gentle, yet effective at removing makeup and impurities. My face always feels so smooth after using this cleanser, I double cleanse at night with only this product and it works well for my oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a gel cleanser. My face looks and feels pretty clean after using. It smells terrible.  I hold my breath while applying it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite cleaners of all time. It’s so light yet so effective. I use this at night or after I wear makeup all day. If I do use makeup, I like to use a cleansing oil, melt, or something equivalent first. Then I use the Soy Face Wash to help remove any makeup left behind. It leaves your skin feeling clean and ‘fresh’.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is really good for my acne prone skin, is very gentle to use as your second cleanser in your lineup

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite cleanser ever! It cleans really well without making your skin dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was recommended to me by a Sephora employee when I asked for a gentle and effective cleanser. I’ve seen improvements in my skin texture and pores since using it. It’s been about a month of daily use. It doesn’t work for hormonal breakouts, but…it’s not supposed to. It gets my skin nice and clean and removes sunblock and mascara and light foundation/tinted moisturizer (I have not tested full coverage foundation). It doesn’t strip my skin or irritate and dry out the dry spots in my combination complexion. It has a great slippery texture that allows you to put it strait to work in your face without having to wet your face or lather the product. I just wet my hands a little. It is pricey! I initially purchased it with a gift card which is why I splurged but now I’m addicted. I use it 5-6 times a week as my main (morning/night) cleanser and I use about a nickel sized (sometimes quarter) glob. If you have drastically combination or dry skin I recommend you try it. My dry spots are very dry and my oily spots are very oily. It seems to prevent blackheads and whiteheads really well. It’s worth it especially at the sale price.

reviews.review_title: Expensive but gentle and very effective
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how gentle and effective this face wash is at removing makeup! 4 stars because I dislike the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m very particular about my face washes as my face is both very dry and very sensitive to certain ingredients (like fragrances, essential oils). I also hate it when I use a face wash and it doesn’t get my waterproof mascara off. I can officially report that this face wash is AMAZING, makes my face feels so soft and clean, and really does a great job at cleaning without stripping your face. 10/10 would recommend. The smell is a bit odd but you get over it really quickly because the product is so great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has changed my skin!!! I’ve had acne for years until I started using this!!! 10/10 recommend!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product makes me feel clean. face is clear and soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super gentle formula. I got this limited edition size at an excellent sale price! Clean and smells amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very lovely cleanser that removes all my makeup and even mascara vey gently.  The cucumber scent is heavenly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great that they got a bigger size.  It will last me a long time.  Love it .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve consistently used this cleanser for the last few years and it’s my go-to for sure. I like to try new ones every once and a while but ultimately go right back to this one so I will continue to use and repurchase. I finally broke down and bought the pump size and leave it in my shower for myself/husband.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is great for sensitive skin as it's a gentle cleanser. It does a pretty good job of removing makeup, however, I find that I need to use an oil based cleanser as well to remove my waterproof eyeliner. Otherwise, it's a nice cleanser made from natural ingredeients that does a pretty good job of cleansing off your makeup :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very clean feeling. Remove the make up well and not oily however, i have combinations skin and some areas feel very dry after a few minutes using the soy wash. Recommend more for oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Skin feels sooooo smooth and soft. I noticed my skin started to look more toned as well. I wear heavy eye makeup and I only wear a BB cream and concealer on my face. This stuff takes it all off and even my eye makeup!!! Doesn’t sting my eyes which is something I give major points for since I have sensitive eyes. The smell is really refreshing to me. I would recommend this even for those with sensitive skin like myself.

reviews.review_title: you’ll come back to this face wash anyways.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My very first use of this product was stealing a squeeze from my aunt’s bottle when I was a kid. To this day, I have tried out so many cleansers and yet I come back to this one afterwards. Incredibly mild, refreshing, and moisturizing, you will not be disappointed.  Some of these negative reviews mention that the soy face wash doesn’t perform well on makeup removal. I also noticed the frequent comparison between the soy face wash with some makeup-removal-only products. Whichever face wash you use, double cleansing is the foundation of skincare. Soy face wash is pretty much a face wash that can effectively remove a small amount of remaining makeup, just like any other face wash. You will not see this product perform well solely as a makeup remover; Get a makeup remover with this product. This is one of the best face washes you can find from the market regardless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this face wash! I have super sensitive skin and this does not irritate it at all! Will continue to repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cleansing is my favorite part of my nightly skincare routine so I like to try a lot of different cleansers. This is probably the only cleanser I’ve purchased more than once. It feels so luxurious and never ever leaves my skin feeling dry and stripped. This is my favorite water-based cleanser after I go in with a makeup removing oil or balm cleanser first. For the negative reviews saying this doesn’t take off makeup or that it doesn’t leave your face squeaky clean…first of all who doesn’t double cleanse in this day and age?? And secondly, cleansers aren’t supposed to strip your face. This one does exactly what it’s supposed to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My FAVORITE CLEANSER! Here’s why:  The scent is barely there, it won’t irritate you if you hate fragrance. It smells like the name, soy, but it’s not bad at all. It is so incredibly gentle get effective for makeup removal. However, don’t just use this cleanser to remove layers of makeup!! Always make sure to double cleanse!! I use an oil based balm to remove my makeup, then follow up with this to ensure everything (oil, sweat, dirt & makeup) is removed. The cleanser does not burn my eyes, which is huge considering my eyes are extremely sensitive and I have bad reactions to a lot of fragrances in skincare.  The cleanser will leave you feeling supple and hydrated. It does not strip, if a cleanser strips your face, get rid of it. The price is hefty but you definitely don’t need a lot to use. It foams easily and goes a long way.   Fresh has 25% right now and I think that anyone wanting to try this cleanser just needs to do it because it’s amazing and is great for anyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: it doesn't lather well at all. i dont feel like my face is getting clean. i dont like it and wont buy again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Been going through acne for years!!! Used curology which worked for me but stopped working and then started using other brands that still didn’t help. Then tried this out and idk how but it helps with my acne!! I think since it has clean ingredients my face doesn’t react to it or idk what magic it has but my face has been glowing! I still get hormonal pimples but when I’m not on my cycle, lemme tell you!!!

reviews.review_title: Maybe not for my skin type
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this cleanser for a while now and it's only okay. Very gentle to the point where I don't feel it does much. My skin definitely feels fresh and clean after using it but it doesn't do much for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser smells good, it feels smooth BUT it doesn’t remove much makeup. I use Bare Minerals makeup and after washing my face with this, my white towel that I use to dry my face still gets stained with lots of makeup which means this cleaner didn’t do its job right. There are plenty of other cleansers that do a better job at removing makeup and dirt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Male members in my family loves it. It does works so no complaints.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Noticed no difference. Started using skinceuticals which is way better. Also, the consistency is super weird.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t understand all the hype around this. It smells awful and doesn’t feel nice while using or after. There are much better cleaners out there. Milk’s vegan milk cleanser is way better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my most repurchase item. If I try a new cleanser I always seem to come back to this one. I have combination, sensitive and acne prone skin, and this stuff does wonders! It’s super gentle and I never have to worry about residue makeup/sunscreen on my face after washing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this sample as my 500 point reward and honestly it’s just eh. I have combo/dry skin and it didn’t make my skin feel dry or stripped but I wasn’t impressed with the product since it’s quite expensive. I’m not a fan of fragrance in skincare however this didn’t bother me as it’s just a cleanser. It’s got the typical scent that all fresh products seem to have, a bit too plastic smelling for me.   It does a good job at removing face makeup but it took a few minutes for me to remove my mascara. That being said it didn’t irritate my eye however the rubbing may become irritating.   This was a great simple cleanser for days I was wearing sunscreen or light makeup. I would recommend if you don’t mind paying extra $$ for quite a basic cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Personally not a fan of the cucumber like smell. Has a creamy texture which gave me high hopes. Used this for 3 weeks. Unfortunately my skin began to feel oily and breakouts were consistent. HOWEVER it seems to remove makeup without hesitation, waterproof mascara/eyeliner included. While I don't use it as my sole cleanser I am keeping it around as a makeup remover/precleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried switching to other cleansers but this one is just perfect for my sensitive skin. No harsh smell, subtle and does the job.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a hard time finding face wash that doesn't leave my skin too oily or too dry. This face wash is one of those! My skin feels so soft and clean, it actually makes me want to wash my face more. It works nicely as a light makeup remover too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Super weird consistency, doesn’t feel like it’s even cleaning my face. I don’t understand the hype around this cleanser, just doesn’t really do anything for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obviously had to pick up a trial size given the reviews. Let’s just say I have one of these in every bathroom in my house because that’s how much I love washing my face with this cleanser! It melts my makeup in just 1 single wash and doesn’t strip the moisture from my skin. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased this to use with PMD clean for both my sister. Once I am out of my current product I will switch to this. Originally received as a sample. Love the light cucumber smell, and it foams nicely with the brush. Very gentle on your face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has changed my life. I'm obsessed, this leaves my skin so soft. Smells like cucumbers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It wasn’t for me. I gave it 4 months, hoping it would help my sensitive skin and breakouts, but it only made things worse. At first I thought it was just my skin purging, but it continued to get worse as the days went on and the acne is painful! Surprisingly, it wasn’t drying, and I do like how gentle it is, but it just wasn’t effective for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A nice gentle cleanser, but pretty average. Makes my skin feel nice but does not give that deep clean feel that I like. I find it doesn’t really do anything for my skin, but it doesn’t break me out either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this gel cleanser, I use an oil based cleanser first so when it’s time to use the fresh soy face cleanser, it’s an easy job. I wear a lot of makeup, almost everyday . I use this every time, no breakouts and no sensitivity. I love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser. So gentle and a great make remover for sure!! It’s so my go for everything

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face wash. My skin felt so smooth afterwards and the face wash smells amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It does not remove make-up. After every wash, I still have black residue around my eyes, lashes and lips. None of it is waterproof make-up either. Don’t waste your money. There are plenty of other clean and vegan face washes that actually, you know, WASH.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Removes makeup effortlessly! Doesn’t smell great but it’s so so convenient, makes life better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It’s average, doesn’t lather up well. It was doing good for my skin but I felt that it wasn’t taking off my sunscreen and the pollution. I didn’t feel so clean afterwards.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Weird consistency, not a winner. Doesn't remove all of the eye makeup, ever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to order this after seeing so many influencers promote it. I went with the mini size because I have sensitive skin, and don’t think its enough product for the price. I didn’t react negatively to it, but I didn’t find that it made my skin feel as clean as other face washes do. I’m not likely to buy this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the absolute best daily face wash for my combination skin. Very balancing and removes makeup well with one wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face wash. It's gentle but it doesn't suck the moisture out of my face either! I've had acne since I was 11 years old and I'm now 25 so I've been through buckets of treatments that never worked. My face is so smooth with one wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the travel size and loved it so much I bought the standard size. I have sensitive skin and this cleanser leaves my skin soft, smooth and feels so clean

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is the one for me. I love the scent, abs my face loves it. I really, really wish they would switch to glass or something other than plastic for their packaging!!

reviews.review_title: Favourite cleanser and won’t dry out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Becoming my friends and me’s favourite cleanser, won’t dry out after washes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser. It’s great for sensitive skin and takes off all my makeup including mascara. I follow it with their rose toner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this face wash. It’s very good for sensitive skin and my face always feels clean and refreshed after I use it. Simple face wash and very light scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted something that wasn't too intense on my sensitive skin and one marvellous employee at Sephora suggested this. It's so smooth, does all it needs to do and smells so good. I loved it so much that I got my mom and sister to get one as well!

reviews.review_title: Love but whoo boy, the full size is pricey
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this mini free with a promotion. I don't usually write reviews, but I love this stuff. Totally takes of my makeup and doesn't dry me out. Doesn't sting your eyes. Light scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A great deal as it can be cleansing cream and a makeup remover. Clean the makeup well and leave my face soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This successfully and gently removes a full face of makeup, leaving the skin feeling hydrated, fresh and clean. The scent is mild and calming, and does not irritate my sensitive skin. I’ve been using this for years, and will continue to until I find something better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used this on/off (mostly on) for three years now and it’s my favourite face wash! It removes all makeup, doesn’t irritate my eyes, and it does not dry out my skin! Also it has a very mild scent (cucumber?!) which I like. The only reason I’ve ever stopped is because of the price but haven’t found something as gentle yet effective at removing makeup. Now I just wait for the Sales and buy larger bottles as it’s cheaper. Would recommend to anyone even those with dry/acne prone skin like myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s an ok product,  just not worth the price. Doesn’t dry the skin nor improve it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this Fresh Soy Face Cleanser. It leaves my face smooth and clean. It has a nice fresh scent without it being too fragrant. I have used this product for many years and was delighted to see that it comes in this large shower size. I highly recommend this Fresh Soy Face Cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very good basic cleanser. Gives the clean feeling, easy to rinse off, foams enough, and has a fresh smell. It really does a great job at softening my skin and not drying it out. I’m not sure if it helps or hurts acne prone skin because I don’t notice acne particularly clearing up when using. But it’s still enjoyable to use and serves a purpose. It’s the perfect 2nd cleanser in a double cleanse. I haven’t found a gel cleanser I enjoy using as much as this. Wish I noticed more long term skin benefits though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. It’s the only one that works on my sensitive skin without really stripping it. It’s also great at removing makeup (I usually cleanse with oil first but this gets rid of the rest). Would def recommend to anyone with dry/sensitive skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this cleanser. I took out a star because there are other good gentle cleansers out there. But if you are on the lookout for one, this is a solid one and the light cucumber scent is very pleasing! A+

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fresh Soy makeup removing products are the best. I have been using for about 8 months now and my sensitive acne prone combination skin loves it. it is not harsh yet removes the makeup effectively

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Decent. I don’t think it’s worth the price. Wasn’t great for my dry skin. I won’t be buying again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells trash, feels great on the skin and washes off clean, leaving the face feeling refreshed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product for 6 months now and I love it! My skin is usually oily but became very sensitive and dry during the winter months so I switched over to Fresh products. This cleanser removes makeup so effortlessly and keeps my skin clean and hydrated. I no longer notice any dry patches on my face and my makeup goes on flawlessly. My new go-to!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I gave this a 4 stars only because it left my skin feeling slightly tight after washing and did not completely remove my mascara (it was not waterproof lol). Very light cucumber soy smell. P.s. My skin is sensitive to cucumber melon scents and I did not react with this cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Feels very nice and fresh when using. Hopefully it clears up some of my back break outs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Removes make up and leaves skin soft. Non drying and mildly scented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like grass but it cured my dry skin! After using this for a week my skin was soft & supple!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face wash. I’ve been using it for years as a gentle face wash for night time and it never fails to remove makeup in one wash. It also makes my skin feel sooo soft afterwards. I love that it’s gentle and doesn’t strip my skin, and it also smells like cucumbers so you smell refreshed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Good but not worth price point in my opinion. If you aren’t too fussed about the specific ingredients in this, the Neutrogena Ultra Gentle Daily Cleanser in the creamy formula is great for dry sensitive skin. Almost an identical scent and consistency and great for makeup removal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this cleanser since 2018. I have super sensitive skin and reacted to a lot of other branded cleanser. This one cleans well and does not dry out your skin. My family loves it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle on sensitive skin, non-drying.  Removes light makeup with regular cleansing.  Worthwhile spurge

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. It effectively removes make up and it’s gentle enough for general, everyday use. I typically have dry skin and, unlike other cleansers, this one does not leave my skin feeling stripped.

reviews.review_title: My sensitive skin love this stuff
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the few cleansers that I can use without causing worse issues on my face.  I have skin problems and sensitivities, and a lot of cleansers cause rashes or dry out my skin to the point of a reaction.  Not this cleanser.  Definitely is a bonus that I can use it to clean off like makeup or sunscreen as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is pretty much my favorite cleanser and I have used many. It smells amazing and takes away all my makeup.

reviews.review_title: Great product for very sensitive skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive skin (as a pre-teen I had severe eczema on my face) and this is great. Even when I have minor flare ups around my mouth sometimes, this doesn't irritate my skin and leave my skin in pain. When I wear makeup, I like wipe it off with unscented baby wipes first then go in with this face wash. I've bought this 3 times already and even gifted it. My brother also uses this and he has acne-prone, oily skin. his skin has cleared up some and he says his skin feels better. He's been using for a few months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nothing about this product stood out to me. I have normal to dry skin and I use CeraVe hydrating creme face cleanser, and this face wash is so much cheaper than the fresh cleanser. This fresh cleanser wasn’t really drying it had a cucumber smell to it so if you don’t like that you won’t like this, but for it to not really do anything fantastic I will stick to my cheaper CeraVe cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My dry skin adores this product!!! I’ve been using this product for a few years now; every time I switch up my cleanser just to give my skin a taste of something new, I always end up coming back to this one! After using this, my complexion looks 100 times better! My skin tone evens out (I normally struggle with redness) and appears brighter every time!! The product also lasts me a long time too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample size of this with my last order. I've only used it once and I think it's unlikely I'll use it again. I will say it did a nice job as a cleanser which is why I'm giving it three stars. But the scent is TERRIBLE enough that I could not enjoy using it at all. Bummer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great for taking off physical sunscreen without having to double cleanse. I have sensitive skin and it didn't irritate it or leave it dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product and you can’t go wrong with it. Takes off makeup and sunscreen no problem. Often use this with my foreo and creates a lux experience and the smell is divine. It is a cult classic for a reason and will often re purchase, one thing the price for me.

reviews.review_title: Wish I didn’t buy the big bottle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this cleanser at first but now after two months my skin has started to get bumpy and have a reaction to the product. It’s great for cleansing makeup off as it doesn’t burn your eyes and is super gentle but I think the fragrance or an ingredient isn’t cooperating with my skin. I unfortunately cannot return this big bottle because it’s past the return policy and now stuck with so much product :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in a Sephora kit and it’s AMAZING! I need to purchase the larger size. This leaves my skin clean, but not stripped in any way. My skin is left soft and bouncy. The smell is not my favourite (smells like celery to me) but I can over look that because of the effect. I have very sensitive skin and it didn’t irritate my skin in the slightest.

reviews.review_title: Not great for extremely dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try another clean face wash marketed for dry skin, but I guess my skin is too dry for this product.   For reference, my skin is so dry it usually feels very tight after washing my face with any cleanser, before I can put moisturizer on. And it occasionally flakes around T zone if I don't moisturize enough.  This product was still stripping enough to feel extremely tight and dry before putting moisturizer on.  If you have extremely dry skin too, I would recommend the Farmacy Green Clean instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle cleanser, I use it as my 1st cleanse to remove makeup. Doesn’t dry my skin out, leaves it feeling clean and soft. Mini size lasts me about 4-6 months, worth buying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser so much. Doesn’t not leave your face feeling stripped. My only problem with it was that it’s a super small packaging and quite pricey. Definitely will but again.

reviews.review_title: Bad ingredients and harsh on skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was using this for a while and started to notice my skin was dry and peeling. I looked at the ingredients and this has Sodium Benzoate in it, which is used a pickling agent for foods. Definitely not something I want to put in my skin. I’m switching to a more moisturizing cleanser which has a fewer ingredients. Wanted to like it but it was way too harsh on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this cleanser! It also works really well to remove makeup

reviews.review_title: This stripped every drop of moisture from my skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this for the first time tonight. And first I didn’t like the smell, but it had a good consistency and it foamed a little. When I went to rinse it off, my skin literally squeaked. It had stripped all the oil and moisture from my face. I have combo skin. Oily T zone. Normal to dry depending on the season everywhere else. Luckily I only used a sample and didn’t waste any money on this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: red hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite face wash so far. I’ve tried all kinds of different cleansers for over a year and this is by far my favorite. It goes on smooth and isn’t harsh on my skin as most cleansers are since i have sensitive skin around my nose and cheeks area. plus it smells fresh like cucumbers Lol, definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have problem skin. Either cleansers do not work well, or they strip my skin. Philosophy worked great but leaves my skin dry and chafing. This one takes off EVERYTHING!!! Even waterproof mascara. And skin feels great. Little dry but nothing like most others i have tried. I immediately went to Sephora and bought the large bottle with the pump.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It is quite effective for removing sunscreen and light make up. Also has a very nice scent, and kind of gel-like texture. Main downside is the price. I got it as part of a value pack to try but other than that I don't think I would repurchase as an everyday cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite cleanser! Skin always feels great after using it, and I love that I can use it around my eyes without irritation. I have a bunch of other cleanser samples I need to go through, but always find myself reaching for this one instead just because it's so quick and easy to use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really think this is worth every penny. I have been double cleansing for a while now and using a balm and then a cleanser. This lets me cut this to one product as it removes all of my makeup and makes my face feel clean. Will definitely be purchasing again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried MANY different cleansers and this is the only one my face loves. It may not show an instant difference, but my skin does not break out when I use this cleanser even though it breaks out when I use any other one. Yes it’s definitely pricey but I found it to be worth it. Its gentle, doesn’t strip the skin, and cleanses! It’s so hard to find a cleanser that my skin likes so I’m very grateful for this one. The trick I find is to wet my hands(clean of course) and face, then lather the product in my hands first and then apply it to my face. Helps remove makeup and makes the product even more gentle than it already is!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not a fan of this cleanser and I love fresh products. 1st off I have combination skin which is extremely sensitive. This cleanser made my face feels super dry and irritated my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I doesn’t remove all of my makeup. I will use this and another cleanser but still have makeup on a cotton pad. It will also leave black smudges around my eye from my mascara (that is not waterproof). Might work for some but not me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love fresh products but this one not so much. I have used it twice and both times my face felt super dry after. I have combination skin and very sensitive. This cleanser was very irritating I would not recommend it for someone with very sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Terrible face wash. I almost never write a review let alone a bad one but this product made my skin break out terribly. I’m 38 years old. I look like I’m 15 again but in a bad way. I honestly have never had a reaction like this to a product. My skin is not sensitive. The fragrance is overwhelming as well. Not good. I bought three other products from this brand and I’m praying I don’t have the same reaction to all of them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My face feels super clean but you have to use so much to get makeup off. Doesn’t even take off mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my holy grail cleanser! 1) this cleanser is safe to remove eye makeup, a must 2) it smells like cucumber in the best way 3) it cleans efficiently but never leaves my face feeling tight or stripped. Simple and effective. Absolutely love it!

reviews.review_title: this cleans the makeup off barely
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After two washes I still have makeup around my eyes   I have oily skin and it just made my pores clogged   If you want a good remover try Lancôme

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve never had a face wash cause my skin to breakout after less than a week of use until I tried this. I don’t get the hype.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Only face wash I will splurge on. Feels so soft and milky putting it on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: works as expected, not over drying and works as expected

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this gentle facial wash. I really wanted to use something that I could use in my eye area. This leaves my face feeling cleansed and bright without drying it. I also like the smell since I love the cucumber scent and it's very refreshing for me. I have used two bottles of this already.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: love this product so much!! really good at removing makeup and it’s a very gentle cleanser

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cleanser for years and it remains a holy grail in my skincare routine. I have sensitive, combination skin and this cleanser is lightweight and gentle but leaves my skin feeling nice and clean. The scent is refreshing and I love the gel-like texture of the cleanser. A little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is liquid gold! I have acne and eczema and this face wash does wonders for me. It has a great lather and smell while leaving my fave fresh and clean without feeling stripped

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This clean formula comes out of the tube with a jelly-like consistency, but lathers well into a smooth non-sudsy cleanser.  I use this in the shower to remove makeup and/or just to clean my face after a long day along with my silicone face scrubber.  This takes off my Tarte Lights, Camera, Lashes mascara after just a gentle scrubbing, whereas a regular makeup wipe would take longer and require more rubbing.  I will say though that if I have a full face of makeup on (foundation, concealer, eyeliner, mascara, lipstick, etc.), I will do a double cleanse or use a makeup removing wipe prior to make sure it is all off.  It also has not caused me any issues with skin sensitivity nor does it make my eyes burn.  This also has not left my skin feeling stripped or dry, it leaves my face feeling smooth and clean and has not caused me to break out.  The cucumber scent can be a little overpowering when you first start to use it, it literally smells like you're rubbing a fresh cut cucumber on your face, but I don't notice it much anymore.  I purchased the 5.1oz tube in October 2020 and still have around half of it left after around six months of daily pea-sized usage, so I would say its worth the cost.  I was previously using The Ordinary's Squalane Cleanser, but I feel like this one does a better job overall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So far I really like it. It’s very good on my sensitive skin, no burning or itching after use. It seems like it’s good for my skin type as well, Just after a few days I see a slight difference in how my skin looks texture wise. It’s worth a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is very calming and feels clean. I definitely don't feel like my skin is too tight after using it. However I do feel like it doesn't always get all the dirt off my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I consider myself lucky to receive a sample of this product. This product has a cucumber scent that made me hate the experience of washing my face. I truly don't know if the product does its job. But I won't buy this only because of the smell. If you are looking for a cleanser and willing to pay 49 CAD for 150ml, I truly recommend you buying tatcha. It is the same price and the smell is amazing!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very pleasant on the skin, gentle and non stripping, has a nice texture but quite a lot of product is needed to get a good cleanse. Way too expensive in my opinion! After 4 tubes of this i started using cerave’s foaming cleanser and i havent looked back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely obsessed with this cleanser. Check out the gorgeous new packaging too!!! Not only will your face get a deep cleanse, it will not feel dry, stretched out instead its left baby soft and nourished. Absolutely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The value size (6.7 oz) is not ACTUALLY a value. This product is only good for 6 months, and after use this product for six months, I still have a lot of product left and I was my face 1-2x a day. Stick to the normal size if you want to get your money’s worth!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It’s been my go-to for years. It’s lightweight, has a gentle fragrance & removes makeup. I tell everyone about this face wash!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's ok - not mind blowing. Don't feel like it removes heavy make up that well. I probably won't buy this again. It's sufficient but nothing amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Glad that I only have the trial size. This just doesn’t work for me. After using it day and night a few days, I do feel that my skin is clean but it also causes my skin to break out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my one and only face cleanser and I am obsessed. Have used it for years and it’s perfect for my sensitive, primarily dry combo skin. For years I thought my skin was acne prone because I was using harsh, drying cleansers when my skin was actually just sensitive. Once I started using this face wash my skin changed completely. I don’t know about “makeup removing”, I still use a makeup wipe or cleansing balm. But otherwise this face cleanser is perfect.

reviews.review_title: if only it weren’t so expensive!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser- I love the jelly/gel texture, the light cucumber scent, and the gentle way this cleanses. Like many cleansers, this doesn’t remove all makeup in one wash, so it’s best to use a makeup remover first. I took one star off because I wish it were more affordable per ounce! I splurge on it every once in a while, but I tend to spend less on cleansers so I can put my money towards treatments.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a super gentle cleanser that removes makeup really well. Doesn't irritate my eyes, and most things do. My boyfriend has sensitive acne prone skin that he is on medicated creams for, and this is the only facewash that helps calm his skin that we have tried. We buy the value size 400 mL bottle now because it is worth the money for us.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: literally does nothing. does not remove makeup at all. don’t waste your money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this facewash for acne but I've  been using it for over a month and don't really see a difference. It's  super gentle so it doesn't  feel like it's doing anything but that's part of the appeal. For me, it's like I just put on a gel serum to wipe it off again with no real results. Also, it doesn't  remove eyeliner well at all. My $3 cleansing water does a much better job.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Phenomenal face wash. Super gentle and great for sensitive skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product.  Its not drying at all and has a pleasant smell.  I've only been using for 2 weeks, but, so far, I like it !

reviews.review_title: Gentlest and most effective cleanser for dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For years I've been trying different products to put together the perfect skincare routine for my very dry, sensitive skin. Now that I am seeing some fine lines and wrinkles it became especially important to not overdry the skin on my face. This is the only cleanser that works for me- non-drying, yet takes off my makeup like a charm!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this without trying it first. I went off of the great reviews, and wish I would have tried it first. The consistency is very viscous- especially when you put it on your skin. I can really smell cucumber, but has an odd smell otherwise. I was excited to try this, but unfortunately it didn’t work for me. I used it a good handful of times to give it a chance, but after every time I used it, I ended up with pretty red irritation bumps on my chin and around my nose. It took a couple days and a heavy duty moisturizer to get my skin back to normal. I don’t have super sensitive skin (but obviously some things can still do it) which is why I was surprised, especially with this “soy, gentle cleanser”. Pretty bummed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Defiantly makes your face feel clean, but I found that it dried my skin out and made me break out pretty bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product on and off for the past five years and I always come back to this one! I find that it’s so gentle on my skin and it doesn’t cause any irritation. I have combination skin that’s acne prone and pretty sensitive and this doesn’t cause me to break out or anything like that! I find that this product helps get rid of those tiny textured bumps that I’ve been having on my forehead and cheeks. I like to go in with the First Aid beauty serum after washing my face with the Soy facial cleanser and then the Fresh rose hyaluronic Acid moisturizer after! As well as the Lotus Youth Preserve night cream. These products worked wonders for me and my skin is thanking me!!

reviews.review_title: love it, don’t love the smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this face wash for a week and a half now and I’m in love! It leaves my skin feeling soft and clean. It doesn’t zap all the moisture or oil from my skin. I know some people love the cucumber smell but I’m not a huge fan and I often find myself holding my breath because it smells like day old cucumber water? Not a huge deal to me and I’m quite sensitive to smell so don’t let that be a deterrent.   I previously used Tatcha and found that my skin didn’t feel good after a few hours. This is a perf replacement.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Only giving this 4 stars because I've found that it doesn't remove mascara super well, as it promises to. Otherwise, I really like it! It's got a really gelatinous texture, which is an interesting departure from typical cleansers, and it produces a thick lather, which feels really nice on your skin. It does have a fairly strong scent--cucumber and rose--but I personally love it because those scents are so delicate that they're not overwhelming.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: No scent, nice texture, VERY gentle. I knew this wasn't an exfoliating face wash, but this face wash doesn't make your skin feeling clean and refreshed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great face wash! I’ve tried everything over the past 5 years to get rid of my acne , cannot believe this product was the secret all along.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle, smells great and leaves my skin feeling fresh and clean. I have hyper-sensitive and very dry skin, this cleanser is my go to when my absolute favourite (YttP Superfood cleanser) is out of stock. I would recommend this product to anyone with dry or sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This dehydrated my skin and left it very irritated and sensitized. Also broke me out a little.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This face wash is amazing - its gentle, non-stripping, and non-irritating and leaves your skin soft, toned, and completely cleansed of dirt/makeup. I used to try and find cheaper alternatives but nothing compared.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ran out of my glossier milky jelly so i gave this a try since reviews claimed it was amazing. NOPE. the texture is nice but the cucumber perfumey smell is too strong. my face broke put in pimples ugh please don’t do this to your skin.

reviews.review_title: Love this for my sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for my sensitive, combination, acne prone skin. A little goes a long way. Bought the smaller bottle to test out and will be purchasing the larger size when I run out. Previously used the Squalene Cleanser by The Ordinary- but I prefer this as I find the application easier. Skin feels soft and supple after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Super gentle and cleansing for those with sensitive skin! Amazing for everyday use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It burned my skin every time I used it! I’ve posted 2 reviews before and they keep getting deleted! DONT USE THIS PRODUCT. I saw all the great reviews and decided to try it, but jeez this burned my skin so badly and gave me terrible acne. It’s not worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The SCENT in this thing. I’m not someone who’s sensitive to smells, but this literally smells like washing your face with cucumber perfume. Hard pass

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best face wash I’ve used! I also have the rose face wash foam which is very similar it just has the rose scent and doesn’t lather as much as this one which I use every night! Very gentle and good at taking make up off! I got jumbo size and my husband both use it lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for a few months ( I received enough as gifts over the holidays) and will be adding this to my list of skin care products to splurge on.   I live in the desert so dryness is not new to me. What is new to me is how my face feels after using this. The texture of my face doesn’t feel as parched. I also currently am using 3 different moisturizer and this pairs pretty good with all of them.   The smell is that classic fresh cosmetics boutique fragrance. Fresh cosmetics boutiques has their own scent and this reminds of them.

reviews.review_title: Stop looking, this is the best!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I will never change cleansers. Best one I have ever tried. So gentle, I used it while on a prescription retinoid and it kept my skin in great condition.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a new staple for me! It has a light, fresh scent and does not overly dry my skin. The added benefit of it being safe to remove eye makeup is a huge plus because mascara is about the only eye makeup I've been using lately and it's such a pain to remove.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cannot say enough good things about this face wash. Throughout my years of suffering due to acne, this is the only product that cleared my skin and kept it clear. Nothing works better than this. I’d give it infinite stars if I could.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very gentle face wash. I use this every time I shower. It doesn't dry out my skin and it leaves it clean and soft and smells nice. its a great gentle every day face wash

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried several cleansers, but I keep coming back to this one! It leaves my face soft, clean, but not overly stripped and I can use it on my eyes to help remove makeup. It is so gentle and I have nothing negative to say about it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is my go-to. I always end up coming back to it after trying other ‘cheaper’ cleanser...(and I try other options only because I always trying to save a buck here and there)... but I’ve come to realize that its price is justified. I love the smell. I love how fresh it feels (no pun intended), I love how soft it is. I love love love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ever since turning 30, my skin has been acting up especially on my jawline/cheeks  and you bet that mask wearing did not help. It must be a hormonal change that my body is literally showing by freaking out on my face. I have always had clear skin and did not have a routine until now. I now use a prescription tretinoin with hydroquinone at night, for mornings I use Paula’s Choice BA lotion. I love this cleanser because it simply cleans well without irritating my skin. It’s important to use a gentle cleanser and moisturize with a “no non sense” lotion like Vanicream Lite when using retinol. Definitely a no frill cleanser but also a definite repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I first received a sample and liked it so I love this stuff! I first got a sample and liked it so much I bought the regular size. A little goes a long way. It smells really good, does not dry out my skin, and leaves my face sooo soft. Definitely worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a good product but my 5 yr old describes the smell as “dirty pickles” - she’s kinda right.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great ! It’s super gentle but really effective. Doesn’t dry out the skin at all in my opinion and leaves the skin feeling fresh. The price is also great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This one is gentle, but effective. Your skin feels so clean and it's not drying at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face wash, and use it daily. I love how gentle it is while still leaving my face feeling fresh and clean. It doesn’t leave my skin feeling dry like some products while still leaving my face feeling fresh and clean.

reviews.review_title: Leaves skin feeling soo soft and smooth
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
