reviews.review_text: I love this product. I have used it for two weeks so far and within 2 days I my skin seemed brighter and smoother.  * Smell is great * My skin feels very clean afterwards but not harsh clean * Leaves skin feeling very smooth * Removes makeup very well * Husband with sensitive skin is now using it and loves it  I don't find it removes my eye makeup well - I have to use another product for this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s just ok, NOT for dry skin tho. Will not buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great product but for what it is, this price is absolutely criminal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty sure I’ve used this same product for almost 6 years now and I haven’t found anything better than this. I tried using cleaning balms but it was so harsh on my eyes with waterproof mascara that it would take out some of my lashes. This is SO gentle and I can massage it on my eyes gently to remove makeup without taking out my lashes. It’s also so gentle that it doesn’t sting my eyes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely cannot say enough good things about this face wash. I started using this several years ago and it's been my go-to cleanser ever since. It completely obliterates whatever makeup you have on with just a tiny bit of product, leaves you with such a clean, fresh feeling, and the cucumber scent is great. Give it a shot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This face cleanser is AMAZING. Very moisturizing and my skin is glowing and so smooth after I use it. I was given two samples of this inside sephora and I went online and purchased it after the first use. Two tiny sample packets lasted me several uses -at least 3 each so this product goes a LONG way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this cleanser for everyday use. It’s got good cleansing power and leaves my skin feeling refreshed but not dry. The only thing I don’t like is it has a very liquid consistency, so I always end up squeezing out more than I need and therefore go through it fast.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super gentle cleanser with no harsh smells. I wouldn’t use this as my nightly cleanse though.. I feel like it’s not strong enough to get off my makeup, spf, and just daily grime. It’s nice as a second cleanser or to use in the morning. Leaves my skin feeling hydrated and nourished afterwards.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally a face wash that is gentle and doesn’t dry out the skin. I have tried countless face washes and this one is the best one yet. It also removes makeup leaving your skin feel fresh and clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wish this wasn’t so fragranced as it made my sensitive skin burn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall great cleanser!  One of my favourite! Leaves skin feeling super clean!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: didn't work well on me. It made my skin uncomfortable when apply. The worst thing is that the product could not remove mascara as it claimed.

reviews.review_title: Cleans well without stripping away skin barrier
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very good facial cleanser if you have dry, sensitive skin and need something that will really clean your skin without stripping away the natural skin barrier. I have repurchased multiple times and I am happy with it.
The only bad thing about this is you don’t know how to take your makeup off without it! Is there another way??!! 10/10.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love Love Love this face wash. Nothing bad can be said about it. A gentle yet very effective face wash. Gets all the make up off and really feels like it cleans the skin without drying it out or leaving a film type of layer over top.  Again, it’s amazing face wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gave me deep, painful cystic acne. My face is normally completely clear of acne unless it’s that time of the month, but it’s all month long since I’ve started using this stuff. I regret buying it.

reviews.review_title: Good mild cleanser, but has caused breakouts
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this product when double-cleansing and don't want to use a harsh cleanser twice. This face wash has also been good when I don't necessitate a strong cleanser in the morning. I don't think it's extremely effective in fully removing any makeup and it has caused a few breakouts for me when used daily; Unsure if that's because it is mild or if it has anything to do with product being soy-based. My skin is normal + congested with occasional dryness.  My sister used this when she stayed over and asked for a bottle for Christmas. It works for her and she has dry + sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this package for Christmas and I love it! I was already a huge Fresh skincare fan but it was nice stocking up on some favourites. The soy cleanser is beautiful, cleaning my skin of impurities and not causing a reaction. It’s helped with my pores & maskny

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this face wash!! It really removes your makeup and it doesn’t dry out your skin!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my everyday cleanser, it doesn't overstrip your skin it's really really gentle, I feel clean and fresh after using it, it is pricey but it does it's Job and lasts forever, it lasted me for 5 months (almost 6) using it at morning and night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This absolutely smells like pickles. I like it overall but can’t get over the smell!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been a devotee of this cleanser for years! I don’t wear makeup, but I have super oily skin. It’s gentle enough to use during winter, but thoroughly cleanses enough for summer use too. It’s magic! Admittedly it’s a little pricey, but a little goes a long way and the largest bottle lasts forever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The cucumber smell is to die for!! I love how this wash makes my face feel, fresh and clean. Definitely look forward to watching my face with this.

reviews.review_title: Great product, nice light scent and effective
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product it leaves your face feeling clean but hydrated and so smooth. I would definitely repurchase this item it is simple and effective. It works for my sensitive skin. It has a very very light smell that can be described as soy or rice water. A little goes a long way and even if I am removing a full face it removes it quite easily without too much work. Great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been looking to try this cleanser for some time now and finally caved to get one of the holiday kits. Unfortunately I was very disappointed. Left my skin feeling tight and irritated. For those with sensitive skin, skip it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: OBSESSED. I have very sensitive skin and react to so many skin products but this one is a dream. bought this originally I’m a gift set with a bunch of other fresh products, then repurchased all of it in full sizes because it was unreal. Makes skin nice and soft, smells like cucumbers, and you don’t have to use a lot so it lasts a long time! 10/10 recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This really changes the game! Melts all makeup off and leaves your skin feeling fresh and clean! Not to mention the scent is so relaxing, makes you feel like you’re at the spa.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my god this smells so nice! It also leaves my face so soft and clean without making it feel tight or dry. I love this so much I honestly look forward to washing my face everyday! I have pretty dry/sensitive skin and this doesn’t bother me at ALL. Going to be purchasing the jumbo size next :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It’s honestly just okay. I hated the smell, which is a big factor for me. I didn’t notice it being any more effective or cleansing than the face wash I normally use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in a set when they did the Sephora sale on sale deal. I stopped using my Cera Ve cleanser and switched to this.. let me just tell you this cleanser works. IT WORKS. It keeps my acne at bay and I haven’t seen a lot of pimples form. Only downside to this cleanser is that it’s sometimes stripping to the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried MANY cleansers and I always come back to this one. It is pricey but it’s worth it in my opinion. Love it for my dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smell not bad. Kinda expensive. But I feeling they’re not really clean. I always need to do triple clean

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: best in the business.  ive been using this for years.  it's very easy on the skin, cleans very well and honestly ever since using fresh products my skin has been the best its ever been. I've bought every size throughout the years.  the jumbo is the best.  oh and it cleans off makeup very well.  no harsh ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't think I've ever gone wrong with a Fresh product, but this cleanser is one of their best! I love that it is gentle enough to remove make-up, but still actually gives a really good cleanse. I have acne prone skin and never break out when using this cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s okay. No hype but no deception either. I have combo skin (oily in T zone) with little bit acne and it does its job. But I don’t know I can’t tell that I love it...the smell of rose and cucumber maybe? It doesn’t foam and has more like a milk cleanser texture. I really prefer the YTTP green tea superfood cleanser in comparison!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to never understand why so many influencers recommended this cleanser until I actually tried it. I'm completely blown away by this cleanser. It cleans my skin so well but not to the point where it's too squeaky clean causing my skin to dry out.  I have combination skin that is prone to breakouts, but this cleanser improved my skin and keeps my acne minimal. I have never seen my skin this acne free in a very long time. This gives me a nice glow especially in combination with my vitamin C serum.  If you buy this cleanser, I promise you that you will not regret it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for almost a month now, and it has saved my skin! I had a really bad run of cystic acne due to hormone changes and I struggled to find something to help, until this! It’s completely worth the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this face wash/make up remover, being used for these two purposes is really encourages good practice and commitment to cleaning my face twice a day every day (morning and before bed) it has a mild fresh smell kind of cucumbery. It leaves your skin smooth a hydrated afterwards, I’ve been using it for a week and my skin looks fresh clean and bright.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great scent, not harsh! Cleans good. Gentle super gentle!!! Day and night routine for me!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have super sensitive textured skin, this is one of the only cleansers that does not break me out. I will say it’s very gentle on the skin so on the double cleansing days you might need one that’s going to really take the makeup off. But for my oily dehydrated combo skin it helps leave it soft and nice. I have the 5oz bottle that I bought last year in December it is now Jan 2021 and I still haven’t finished the bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great for sensitive, acne-prone skin. It doesn’t have much of a scent but it leaves my skin feeling smooth and refreshed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I avoided buying this because I thought it would be one of those overhyped products and I already had a “holy grail” cleanser.  Anyways, I ran out of my prior cleanser and on a whim bought the deluxe sample size of this and I am completely shocked by how impressed I am with this product!  I have extremely dry/dehydrated skin and at the time that I purchased this I had a head cold and my nose was completely raw and dry with flakes from it.  Gross,  I know, sorry.  But what impressed me so much is that whenever I used this product, almost immediately,  the tip of my poor nose was now soft and all the flaky skin vanished.  MIND BLOWN.  My skin is often dry and flaky and this cleanser makes my face so smooth and I never get that tight feeling, however, it does a pretty efficient job of cleansing away any makeup etc. Or at least breaking down hard to budge mascara/eyeliner.  I also like that this doesn’t foam up a ton.  It’s a nice jelly consistency with a light froth but nothing over the top.  My skin has transformed and this is only after using it for less than one week!  Best cleanser ever hands down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had this product in a package, since I love the kombucha essence so much from fresh, I decided to buy a package. I’m a bit desapointed on the smell and I don’t think it’s beneficial for my face. Face wash is so personal, I think I was looking for a fresh scent ans refreshing feeling which I did not have that’s why I would rate a low score on this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has always been my favourite face wash because of the things it can do for my sensitive skin. It can remove my waterproof mascara, it doesn’t have much of a scent, it feels nice, and it is so gentle.  My only problem with this face wash is that the price has gone up (but the size thankfully hasn’t decreased) over the years I’ve been using it. I think I would still continue to buy it, though, until I find a new, less expensive face wash that I like better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cleanser for years, it smells great and is just overall wonderful. It washes off all of my makeup easily, mascara included, and doesn’t dry me out. I pair it with the rose toner and the vitamin nectar face cream for a simple routine when I’m on the go and don’t want to fuss with a thousand products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is incredibly gentle and doesn’t burn your eyes! Perfect for removing all amounts of makeup and dirt and leaves your face feeling smooth, clean and fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really did not like this cleanser. I have combination skin that leans oily and this cleanser was waaaay to drying. I returned it.

reviews.review_title: best for oily skin in cold months
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great cleanser for oily skin. But only in the winter months. I live in the desert so I normally use stronger cleansers. But those leave me too dry in the winter months even tho I have oily skin. This works great but I would not use in the summer months

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry, sensitive skin and really like this cleanser- I’ve repurchased it because other cleansers give me redness and irritation. It’s a bit expensive for a cleanser but lasted me 6 months. I wouldn’t use just this cleanser to remove makeup- I always using a cleansing balm beforehand and double cleanse with this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this over the last 3 years, have tried a few other face washes between my use with this face wash but I keep coming back to this. Never dries out my skin but still makes my face feel clean, super gentle, and never breaks me out unlike other face washes. Only reason I try to find other face washes even though I love this is cause I try to find cheaper alternatives and have yet to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this is such a great face wash!! doesn’t dry out my face but still makes me feel super clean and refreshed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this after reading the overwhelming positive reviews. After a month of regular use, here are my thoughts: It removes makeup, doesn’t make me break out and has a very strong rose scent (which I personally dislike). Honestly, I can’t really say this product does anything more than the $6 micellar cleansing water I was using beforehand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Okay I know I am a guy and this isn't targeted to me, but I was turned onto this a few years ago by my ex gf. She swore by this face wash. Since that day I have been using this since. My skin is softer, looks better, feels clean. I seriously will never stop using it. It's gentle enough for everyday use but does a great job cleaning your skin and doesn't leave my skin dried out. Great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite cleanser and it probably will always be. It smells so good. It’s gentle enough but gets the job done. And I love that now it comes in a bigger bottle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is overwhelmingly like spoiled cucumbers. As a cleanser it does make my dry face feel fresh and removes all my eye makeup easily, but I really can’t get past the smell. There’s a lot of product in this, so I do think it’s a good value for the price but I just want it to be done because the scent is intolerable for me! I prefer IT cosmetics confidence in a cleanser, that smell I love and it does the same job removing makeup and cleansing I feel I use less product with IT cosmetics, so better value for your money as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really tried to like this product as it has so many good reviews and good ingredients. I just couldn’t though. It really didn’t work as a first step cleanser for me because I felt it didn’t clean anything off (makeup, sweat, sunscreen) so I couldn’t even imagine using it as a cleanser on its own? It felt like I was rubbing pure aloe on my face ? No feeling of cleaning ? Maybe if you have super sensitive/dry skin this would work for you. I even gave my bottle to my mom thinking it would work for mature skin. And I noticed it’s been sitting in her washroom untouched for a year now. So she must have not liked it either ? Your better off saving yourself money and buying the dry skin Spectro cleanser. It’s got the same gentle feeling but you actually get a clean face from it and for a fraction of the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just started building my skin care routine this year. I did a lot of research and after trying this cleanser and a few others, this one was by far my favourite! It's so refreshing and gentle! I love the subtle cucumber scent and the texture. I bought the mini size at first because I didn't want to spend $49+ when I was first testing it out. Even though it still seems a bit pricey for a cleanser, I'm in love and won't be trying any others. Even my fiancé uses it sometimes & says he likes it!

reviews.review_title: best facewash...even better if on sale
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: great for dry skin. gentle on skin and the scent is minimal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i’ve been using this cleanser for 5 years it is absolutely amazing. I have very dry skin and it is the only cleanser that doesn’t dry my face or leave me with breakouts. you will absolutely love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product.  I got a sample of it and I quickly became obsessed and bought the biggest size available.  The smell is sooo good from the cucumbers and it makes your skin feel soft after using.  I normally only use this once a day at night and I see great results.  I've tried many other cleansers before and this is my #1 go to now.  Don't hesitate on this one, especially if you have acne prone or sensitive skin - its perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Feels so good on the skin and it has a nice cucumber smell to it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really great product and I wish I had gotten the full size. It really cleanses your skin without making it feel stripped. I have sensitive skin and was overcoming a reaction I had to another brand and this didn’t irritate my skin at all. It does have a scent to it like cucumbers but I don’t mind it. I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This face wash is great! I don't generally wear a ton of makeup day-to-day so it does do a great job of taking most of my makeup off. It would be 5 star if it completely took off my mascara as well. I would say it doesn't quite do the trick there, it requires a lot of scrubbing and even then it still leaves some mascara behind. Otherwise, I have sensitive, combination skin and it never dries out my skin (and I use it twice daily). It also leaves my skin super soft. I use it in combination with the Sephora Precision Pore Cleansing Pad and only need to use a pea sized amount (a little goes a long way)!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Weekend treat.  I use this cleanser with the lotus rescue mask and rose face cream.  It has made my acne scars less visible even with no makeup on.  Wow.  Must have in your beauty routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love !!! I was using a cleanser by Kate Somerville meant for acne because I have acne prone skin but I felt like it was too harsh and I haven’t gotten many breakouts since I’ve been using this it’s very gentle but cleans your face really well and it smells super nice

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face wash. It has always made my skin feel soft and helped to clear up my complexion. It is very gentle and does not have any strong smells. Definitely a go to face wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Doesn’t dry out the skin and it isn’t harsh. Helps balance combination skin. Didn’t cause acne. Satisfactory in those regards.   The smell I found rather offensive. I prefer to use my facial cleanser in the shower and this horrible smell really brought down the overall shower experience. Glad I received a mini bottle of this gratis and I didn’t spend money on it. Would never purchase due to the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like.... a bag of uncooked rice  Like so gross,  I couldn’t wait to get it off my face  For a high-end $40 cleanser, I would not pay for this No lather, just gel Didn’t feel clean either

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite cleanser. I’ve purchased this twice already. It doesn’t lather (which is fine!), the smell isn’t empowering yet fresh and clean, and it leaves my skin feeling dewy and clean without being stripped clean. I’ve bought this twice already, will buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a jelly cleanser and that’s pretty well known at this point so it’s not going to suds up like a gel cleanser. That’s what makes it so great for sensitive skin or when you need a light wash in the morning for instance. I used to use special cleansing gel from another brand and never really loved it and I absolutely love this face wash. It’s not harsh. My skin never feels tight, but it feels clean. I double cleanse with an oil cleanser then this at night but use this by itself in the morning. Been using it consistently for 2 years and still love it. Face wash is hard to get right since everyone’s skin is different. Tried countless brands over the years and will use this for years to come. I always buy the biggest bottle when Sephora sales happen.

reviews.review_title: worked for my slightly dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Little costly but Helped reduce dryness on face. Smells a little bit like cucumber.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Does a great job of cleansing without striping. Helps keep my combination skin from getting either too dry or too oily. I’m very sensitive to scent and this has a lovely light scent that dissipates almost at once and doesn’t cause me headaches which is a huge plus. You don’t need much product to get good results so bottle lasts a long time. Over all worked really fantastic for my hyper sensitive skin. One of the few cleansers I’ve tried that doesn’t cause breakouts or over drying. Recommend to anyone with sensitive skin.

reviews.review_title: broke me out in bumps and pimples
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really really wanted to like this product bc of all the good reviews but it’s just not for me.. it broke me out in pimples and these little cluster bumps with no white heads. it also made my face kind of sting and itch in my mouth area and made it really really dry. i did use the whole bottle to see if i just needed to get used to it but i just can’t use it. i also have sensitive combo skin so maybe something in it just wasn’t for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this cleanser with an order so thankfully I didn’t waste any money on it. For one, the smell is disgusting and very strong. I had no idea it was supposed to smell like cucumber because I got rancid watermelon from it. Also, it doesn’t lather... at all. I understand that cleansers that lather tend to be more stripping. However, this cleanser is mediocre at best and doesn’t cleanse particularly well or leave my skin feeling better than before I cleansed. I don’t find that it’s hydrating and the experience of using it is unpleasant so I would not invest in a full size. I don’t understand the hype.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it makes my skin feel so good and refreshing doesn’t make it dry at all it’s smells AMAZING as well. It also made my skin look good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser has been my go-to for so many years. I love how gentle it is on my sensitive skin and around the eyes. I never had a bad reaction from it. It does have a strong cucumber smell that I’m not a fan of but it did its job. It doesn’t fully remove makeup well, but I didn’t wear makeup often anyway. I stopped using this when I received the Drunk Elephant Jelly Beste 9 birthday sample and I felt a difference. I felt a bit of residue and oily pores remaining after using the Soy Fresh Cleanser but Drunk Elephant left my face feeling more cleansed, nicely tighter, not oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The scent was nice but way to strong for me and my face. Not a winner

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This has easily become one of my favourite cleansers! Working in a retirement home I wear a mask and face shield a lot, this has truly helped keep my skin much more clear than any other face wash has.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite face wash! The scent is clean, it removes every bit of makeup, leaves my skin feeling supple and clean. Love everything about this face wash!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this face cleanser for a while at the recommendation of a friend. I did not find it to be super amazing outside of removing make-up. I prefer a cleanser that really cleans my face, and I always felt like there was something leftover when washing it off. It is absolutely a gentle cleanser, and if it wasn't for my personal preference, this cleanser would be great for people who are looking for a gently and hydrating option.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's not the worst, but I don't feel like it's a particularly good cleanser, it's not a product I would purchase. It has a really strong smell and I don't feel like my face is the cleanest it has even been after I used it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample and will definitely purchase a full size. It left my skin feeling clean and soft, not dry or tight. I have sensitive/combo skin prone to rosacea and had no reactions. (I used a micellar water first to remove sunscreen). I disliked the strong scent, but I’m sure typical Fresh users would love the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this face wash. I have sensitive skin and this was gentle, yet effective in removing makeup. I also like the slight cucumber scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this face wash for over a year. This really didn’t help with my acne or blemishes unfortunately. so If you’re looking for a face wash that helps with acne I wouldn’t recommend this product, especially for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The only face wash I use.  It’s gentle and wonderful. Gets my face clean without over drying it. I’ve been using this stuff for years now. Though it says it can be for eyes too if I’ve been wear darker eye makeup I do need to use an eye makeup remover product. But for my regular no makeup makeup days this stuff is perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Please never stop making this. I have combination skin. This cleanser feels so soft on the face yet hydrating. I am a repeat customer. An absolute must!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this for quite a while now, and it is the best face wash for my skin type. I generally use it in the shower, or after removing my eye make-up. It does a great job, without being drying, or leaving residue. I like that there is minimal scent, which is sorta cucumber-y and how gentle it is. I have tried many drugstore and high-end brands, and after my favourite Marcelle Aquarelle was discontinued, this the best replacement I have been able to find.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute favourite! I have been using this for years! Brilliant for sensitive skin and always leaves my skin soft. I can’t be without this cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a sensitive skin, and a bit of combination skin(slightly oily around nose and forehead but it doesn’t start melting my foundation for few hours). On my cheeks and around mask area, I have a quite sensitive eczema prone dry skin. This soy cleanser is the only cleanser I can use to gently but powerfully remove makeup when I have eczema breakout. I even use this in the morning and I feel like my skin gets brighter a little bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is not for sensitive skin. My skin is really sensitive, I always have a hard time finding products that work for me. This felt like it was burning my flesh when I used it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin. It has been quite a challenge finding a cleaner with dry and oily skin. Unfortunately, this is not the cleanser for those like me. I double cleanse by using an oil base cleanser first and then this product. I broke my Indie Lee Brightening face wash for the second time, and decided to try this one by Fresh. My skin felt dry after each time I used it. I never had this issue with Indie Lee or Tatcha rice wash. If you have combination skin and double cleanse, I would not recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive skin, have cystic acne n this is just so good.  It’s gentle and doesn’t dry my skin out.  Beware this doesn’t lather much so it takes getting used to but it does clean your face really well.  It has a light cucumber scent but it doesn’t linger. So if you have problematic skin please give this a try you won’t be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Its a great for removing a full face of makeup! it won't take everything off in one go but I don't expect anything to get EVERYTHING off in one face wash. The scent didn't bother me at all and it even removed my mascara as well. My face felt truly clean and makeup free! The only downside for me with this cleanser is that it's in a tube, I would prefer if this was in a pump as they're more hygienic, but overall I will rebuy this again when I use it all up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is gentle and does the job but it has the strangest texture and smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cleansing for 3+ years now and it has not failed me. I have very dehydrated skin that can be very sensitive to new products. This product has been my ride or die cleanser ever since I first put it on my face. It thoroughly cleanses my skin without stripping it of its moisture. Please try it for yourself if you are looking for a new, gentle cleanser. I highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My mom recommended this cleanser to me because she loves it. However, I didn’t like it a lot. It’s okay, it does the job, but the fragrance is so strong that i could enjoy the cleanser. The fragrance may irritate the skin and cause tiny bumps which I don’t like at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Every year I switch up my cleansers and try something new and every single time, i end up coming back to this. I’m addicted to the scent and refreshed feeling I get from using this. Whenever I don’t have this in my skincare routine, i feel incomplete. Finally went and got the extra large 13.5 oz size because I don’t think I can live without it. I think it’s worth the $ and i’m guessing this will last me more than 6 months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m so happy I purchased this face cleanser. I bought this to use as a face wash not as a makeup remover and I’m so far loving it. I only needed a tiny amount and it lathered so well. Made me face feel very clean and smooth. I was previously using an average face wash for a while now and I noticed the quality of this one instantly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite cleanser I’ve ever used! It’s gentle enough for my sensitive/reactive skin everyday morning and night. I always double cleanse so I don’t rely on this to take my make up and sunscreen off at the end of the day. My favorite thing about this is that there is no soap in this!! I can use this to wash over my eyes which is very important to me since I have major allergies. You need the SMALLEST amount so yes this is pricy but a normal sized bottle can last me months!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it!!! The smell is so good. Fresh. Light. Skin feels clean after every single use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because I wanted a light cleanser (sans AHAs) to use at night before retinol. The soy cleanser feels light and clean going on leaves you feeling ~fresh~ with low risk for irritation from other products (in my experience). A little goes a long way, so although it's on the pricier side, one bottle lasts for a few months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great, gentle cleanser. I only used it in the mornings Or on days I wore little to no makeup... but never to remove heavy makeup at the end of the day.   Wasn’t memorable enough to buy again for the price though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser does a great job with removing makeup, even hard to remove waterproof mascaras like “They’re Real” from Benefit. Skin is soft and supple after cleansing without any hint of dryness. The scent is the only reason for the 4 star rating...sort of a melony floral, which isn’t a favorite. Overall, can’t go wrong with this cleanser.

love this cleanser it removes all makeup easily (except waterproof mascara which requires a lil more scrubbing)  feels good on my skin makes my skin feel soft and smooth smells like cucumbers so its very relaxing and you only need one pump love at first use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many cleansers, but none are as gentle and lovely as this one. It is pricy, but it is so worth it

reviews.review_title: Do not get this if you want a clean face
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Went into Sephora looking for youth to the people but they were sold out so this was recommended. I hate that I even waisted money on this. I’m even more upset that the sales lady recommended this. It’s horrible. Just slides across your face like snot. Does not clean skin. I’m livid

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this was a very pleasant cleanser for dry skin. Very hydrating and smelt very nicely of cucumbers. I originally bought the mini size then the bigger one. I would give five stars but the price is just a tad too much for a cleanser in my opinion. I bought another cleanser that does the exact same thing and is just as good for a fraction of the price. The Leave beauty one btw.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the few face washes I have used that I have not had some sort of reaction to. Perfect for uber sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a very sensitive skin and have tried a lot of face washes before. This one is the best facewash I have ever used, the smell is amazing refreshing and exactly what you would want when washing your face. This is a really good face wash for people with sensitive skin, easily breakout skin. My skin has become so much better after using this and I am sticking with it now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Couldn’t wait to try the soy makeup removing face wash, & that turned out to be a huge letdown! I never came around to the cucumber scent & was never able to achieve a lather no matter how little or how much product that I used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my face feels so clean and removes any makeup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just love this product! I first purchased a trial size and loved it since the beginning. Now I buy this larger size. It’s super soft, but it manages to leave my face super clean and hydrated.

reviews.review_title: Soft on skin, tough on acne
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this cleanser on recommendation from a Sephora employee via chat along with the Fresh rose toner, their vitamin C serum and the deep rose moisturizer and what an incredible difference already!! I am fair skinned, suffer from acne, some dryness and recently some irritation from wearing a mask every day and these products have helped to reduce all of those problems. My skin feels soothed and soft. This cleanser does not lather a whole lot but because of this, a little definitely goes a long way. It leaves my skin feeling clean and hydrated without feeling stripped of any natural moisture. It also mildly smells like fresh cut cucumber which is a wonderful treat as I now feel like I'm getting a little spa treatment morning and night!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm constantly struggling to find products that work for my skin, while still cleansing well and removing eye makeup. This product is gentle enough to clean your eyes with, and is wonderful for sensitive skin. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best face washes in my arsenal. hydrating, cleans the skin thoroughly and very gentle on the skin

reviews.review_title: Good for sensitive skin, not great for makeup
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very nice, gentle cleanser. It doesn’t strip my face nor irritate my skin or make me break out. I will say that the makeup removing claim is a bit unfounded. This cleanser works well enough when I’ve only worn powder. But I’ve never been able to adequately remove liquid foundation or eye makeup with this product alone. If you’re sensitive to scents, be aware that this is moderately cucumber scented.   For reference, I have very dry, sensitive skin and rosacea.

reviews.review_title: Great for Sensitive Skin — even Eczema!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this cleanser!! I’m not quick to rave about products but I thought this deserved a good review. I have extremely sensitive skin combined with eczema so I usually stick to the tried and true products that I know I don’t react to. I received this as a sample and gave it a try, it worked amazing and did NOT irritate my fragile skin! I love how it removed my eye makeup without leaving any stains on my face, it basically dissolved all of my makeup. It has a non dying affect and my face feels clean. After finishing the sample, I’ve already gone to buy a full size! Very impressed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really don’t understand the good reviews of this cleanser, it cleans nothing. Lol this did not remove my makeup, it felt like I was just moving the product around my face but it wasn’t actually getting in there & cleaning anything. It’s a veryy slippery texture

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the soy face cleanser when it originally launched. I recently repurchased, however, it feels different and left a film on my face that became itchy after a couple of minutes. Also, it has a strong scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my go-to for 5 years, I have an acne prone / sensitive skin and this has been excellent for it. I never feel stripped after rinsing my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this face wash, very gentle, removes makeup, doesn't dry the face, has a good smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The absolute best! I’ve tried other cleansers (this one isn’t easy on the wallet) but I always come back to this one. It’s gentle and the larger size lasts a long time!

reviews.review_title: Stripped my skin of moisture and oils
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Did not work with my skin type! My face felt squeaky clean after using this which in this case was a bad thing because it stripped my face of all it's natural oils. Felt stretchy and dry even after layering on serum and moisturizer. Had to return!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to cleanser. It’s super gentle on the skin, does not make your skin feel stripped. Keeps your skin feeling strong and healthy. Will repurchase till the end of time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this cleanser for several years, and it’s great. I wouldn’t say that it’s good for removing makeup, but it’s perfect as the 2nd step in a double cleanse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect formula for use on the sensitive eye area without any irritation or stinging sensation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After one use this dramatically reduced my redness and bumps!! So refreshing and melts makeup away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's a very good cleanser, one of the best I've tried.  almost a must have, I am going to repurchase once I finish all the products I have.

reviews.review_title: The Most Incredible Facial Cleanser Ever
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Now listen, I’ve never been the type of person to use *expensive* cleanser. Since I did a round of accutane 3 years ago I haven’t even HAD to cleanse my face as I no longer experienced breakouts. This stuff warmed my cold dead skincare heart. It made my skin look so naturally beautiful and healthy. I got it in a sample size and was so moved by its god-like skin effects that I bought the jumbo size. You will not for one second regret this purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for everyday! Price point is excellent as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it as a cleanser! Though it barely removes any makeup, not even my foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: For my oily skin, this was definitely not a good primary cleanser (felt like I was washing my face with lotion), but an okay secondary one. I would use it whenever my skin was too dehydrated from treatments to accept my regular niacinamide or SA based cleansers. I don’t recommend it enthusiastically because while my skin was in the process of purging after I started a retinoid, this cleanser stung (has fragrance and other things in there) and it does the exact same thing as dermatologist recommended drugstore cleansers. Also, if I have to spend $40, I’d go with other similarly priced gentle cleansers that have more antioxidants in them tbh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Its hard to find products for myself because I have extremely sensitive and acne prone skin and and this is what I use everyday, even after a microneedling session!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Where do I start?! First of all, the texture is amazing. It's a liquid-y gel that effortlessly glides on your skin, so keep in mind that a little goes a long way - which is a HUGE plus given the steep price. It also feels amazing, and makes your skin feel squeaky clean without feeling dry at all, considering this is coming from a girl with dry skin. This is absolutely worth every penny. I'll be purchasing the big bottle next!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser removes all of my makeup and leaves my skin feeling soft. It’s gentle, doesn’t leave my skin tight or have a fragrance. I’ve got my mom hooked on it too. Will use forever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it’s an expensive cleanser but I like to use it in the moorning. This stuff let my skin soft without tightness. It’s very mild with a light scent of cucumber.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For me this is a very good cleanser, smell so well and does it job too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great cleanser: leaves my skin feeling clean without stripping it of moisture. No breakouts. Totally worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not a fan of this face wash. It broke me out and did not fully remove my makeup. Also, the smell is not pleasant in my opinion. I am glad I bought the mini to try it. I will not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great cleanser!  cleans even eye makeup and no burning eyes. Leaves my skin feeling amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this face wash. Doesn't leave my cheeks feeling dry like most washes but does not leave my t zone feeling oily. The smell reminds me of cucumbers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I misplaced my face wash and decided to branch out and try this one since it gets so many great reviews. I went ahead and bit the bullet and purchased it, my normal face wash is half the price and has all the same benefits as this one and is all-natural. I should have looked at the size because when I received it and my normal face wash was delivered they were the same size. I probably won't be purchasing this again since I can get the same thing the same size for half the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Picked this up on a whim, it smells great and feels refreshing. But, after a week of using it made my skin break out :(. I don't think the 1.7 oz bottle is worth $15.00 either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used this at night with my Clarisonic brush and it’s helped so much! Working in a restaurant makes my oily sensitive skin really hard to deal with but this wash helps cleanse without irritation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this cleanser as a birthday gift and enjoy it! It’s super gentle and dissolves my makeup quickly. I also love the cucumber smell. It cleanses thoroughly without stripping my oily combination skin. No breakout issues, either!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A true staple!! Melts away makeup with ease and absolutely no irritation ever. I have eczema on my face and this is the most gentle wash I have ever used. I use it everyday twice a day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this cleanser religiously when I was on accutane, it was perfect! It didn't aggravate my skin or cause it to dry out, and when I dried my skin off it still felt moisturized. It's perfect for sensitive skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this cleanser! it doesn’t leave my skin tight and stripped which i enjoy. i would give this five stars but the smell just gags me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t wear makeup often, but after being recommended this wash by an aesthetician I gave it a shot and it is very soothing. You don’t feel tight or dry afterwards, and it’s super pleasant smelling. Yes it’s expensive, but it’s a luxury skincare brand and the bottle is very large for what you pay for. Would purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this cleanser as there were so many positive reviews on it. After going through 2 bottles, I wasn't sure what the hype was about. It did nothing for my skin, and after a while, my skin started breaking out and becoming dry. My final straw was when my friends and family commented that my skin looked more dull than usual. Wouldn't buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I first tried this cleanser I thought it worked really well.. clean simple ingredients.. but after a while this product broke me out? It made my skin hot as I was washing with it. Can’t really explain the sensation but maybe it just happened with me because I have combination sensitive skin. It’s worth a try for someone with less sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Nice smelling cleanser (reminds me of cucumbers), doesn’t leave my face dry or red. I can’t speak to how well it removes makeup since I don’t wear much these days. In all it’s fine but maybe a tad expensive. I’ll use the whole tube but probably won’t purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to face wash. I’ve finished two tubs now. I love the smell. It makes the skin feel tight but not dry. I noticed that my face has less breakouts since I switched to this face wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have gone through multiple tubes of this so I just bought the biggest size with the pump dispenser. It’s the only thing from Sephora that I buy consistently. It’s soft, a gel-like consistency, and gentle with a slight foam. People often describe the scent as cucumber when they come to my house and try it. I have dry skin and I never feel stripped afterward. I also don’t have any weird reactions, sensitivity, or break outs from this. Couldn’t recommend it enough. I use this as my second cleanse because it’s not strong enough for a first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle, smells delightful, and leaves my oily skin feeling clean but still soft. The cleanser doesn't foam, which might be an issue for some people but it washes off easily and a little goes a long way. This is my go-to morning cleanser when I don't need to remove makeup. I always double cleanse in the evening to wash off makeup, so I have no idea if this would work for that purpose by itself. I have tried a bunch of other gentle cleansers trying to find a replacement, since this is so expensive for a product that you wash off, but none of them are quite as nice. (The closest dupe was probably Glossier's milky jelly cleanser.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the fact that this cleanser is very gentle on my skin.. But the fragrance is a bit awful.. anyways would not purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this in between my salicylic acid cleanser to remove makeup. its gentle, has a nice smell that isnt overpowering, but I dont like that it doesnt remove mascara or some of my tinted sunscreen all the way. it's great for gentle cleansing though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical about this cause i have combo skin. TOTALLY DESTROYED MY EXPECTATIONS. It cleanses and tones and i feel clean but not stripped. It has a slight foam. Its so soft and perfect. Will be repurchasing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really love this product! i have combination skin. Within a couple weeks i could see a difference and my face became clear and love that there is almost no scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a great wash! I had received a few small tubes in my subs and it really took me a bit to get used to the feel. It doesn't really foam up, but it so thoroughly cleans off every bit of makeup and daily grime without stripping my skin moistureless! Just amazing stuff, really! I've been through a couple full sized tubes and will purchase again when I get low. It has a nice, fresh smell, really no other way to describe it, it's fresh. its brand name is well suited!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my all time favorite facial cleanser. It has cucumber smell, that was pretty strong at first. I have been using it almost exclusively for well over a year and it didn't take me long to get use to the smell. It is a fresh clean smell though,  so it never bothered me. It leaves your face feeling fresh and really cleansed. I always use an oil cleanser or coconut oil to break down eye make up first,  then follow with any cleanser that I'm using (almost always this Fresh cleanser). Then finish up with wiping my face with toner on a cotton pad for my face cleaning routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely sensitive skin. I struggle to find a cleaner that doesn’t burn. This one is gentle and effective. Highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is simply the best face wash I have ever used. I have struggled with acne my entire life and have sensitive skin too, so it has been challenging to find a cleanser that actually cleans my skin without irritating it or drying it out.  Previously I used Purity Made Simple or Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser. Both are good, but didn't clean my oily pores enough, especially during the summer months.  The only downfall of this product is that if can be drying if you  don't moisturize properly. In the winter months, for example, I had to switch from a lighter moisturizer like Caudalie's Sorbet moisturizer to Biossance's Omega Repair. I also incorporated nightly face oil into my skin regimen.   Additionally, this product doesn't always effectively remove stubborn eye makeup and rubbing it vigorously along the lash line can irritate the skin. So, what I do is remove eye makeup with Drunk Elephant's Slaai Cleansing Bomb, then wash my entire face with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Nice, gentle cleanser. Smells of a cucumber, fruity seed extract. Leaves my face feeling cleansed without it being stripped of the essential oils.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Does not remove makeup. At the most-mascara. Foundation and concealer stay on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I broke out like crazy after using it for 2-3 weeks. It felt like the cleanser wasn't cleaning deep enough, resulting in breakouts. It didn't leave my skin feeling stripped, which was nice, but might be because it's not cleaning deep enough... Did not work for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using it for 2-3 weeks, I noticed my skin was breaking out like crazy. It felt like it wasn't cleansing deep enough into my pores, causing me to breakout. It didn't leave my skin feeling stripped, which was nice, but maybe the cause of not being efficient enough... Did not work for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My go-to! It’s simply amazing and I’m getting the big bottle next! I have very sensitive skin and it works magic. Plus, the PH of this cleanser is perfect (it’s around 5). Most def you need this in your routine if you have dry and sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that I don't have to worry about avoiding the eye area, good for sensitive skin and love the mild clean scent, for me the ultimate facial cleanser.

reviews.review_title: Great soothing wash- excellent at makeup removal
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this face wash! I was introduced to it by a friend and I’m so happy I found out about it. It does the best job of removing my makeup easily and leaves my skin feeling soft and soothed with no redness or irritation. It is so good I bought two of the big bottles because I don’t want to run out. If you want a wash that is calming, removes makeup easily and doesn’t strip your skin, this is what you’re looking for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I have been using Noxzema for years but lately it’s been leaving my face dry, patchy, raised bumpls and just not fully clean. Which is the opposite of what this product is!! I LOVE IT! I have sensitive skin so I was scared to use it at first and I had tiny bumps on my cheeks from bacteria but this completely fixed those things it’s amazing! It’s hydrating, it smoothed my skin complexion, and it feels amazing. The smell is nice but may be  a little much for me. I’m not a huge fan of fragrance.  But I will be purchasing the larger one once it runs out!

reviews.review_title: Gentle Cleanser, No Match For IT Cosmetics CC+
reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the gentlest cleansers you can buy, hands-down. Unfortunately, it's so gentle that it barely budges face makeup! While it handles eye makeup alright (and doesn't irritate eyes at all), micellar water on a cotton pad picks up ALL the foundation it missed after a cleanse on me. It's not a negligible amount left behind! This is probably ideal for someone who doesn't wear a foundation, or wears a very light tinted moisturizer. If you're a makeup every day type of girl, complete with setting powder and spray, there are MUCH better cleansers out there that will lift away more foundation at the end of the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Does this product need another 5 star review?? It’s the OG, the HG, the best. Gets my skin super clean, feels luscious, and leaves skin like it’s name- fresh. No need to try other face washes, this is the only one you’ll ever need.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This fresh product is in a gel form that smells like fresh cucumbers. Does a great job at taking away make up and sunscreen. Did not strip my skin of natural oils, did not leave my skin feeling dry and made my skin feel refreshed and clean. Gentle on my sensitive skin. Definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell takes some getting used to but overall love this. It cleans my skin nicely and doesn’t strip my face. I got a sample of it and couldn’t stop using it so eventually ended up buying the biggest bottle so I would not run out. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a sensitive-skinned gal, I appreciate that this cleanser is gentle and, unlike some users, I don't mind the cucumber smell, but if you start noticing tiny red bumps on your skin, you're not insane—it might be this cleanser. I'd used it for years figuring that the bumps were just my natural skin texture...until I ran out of this cleanser and the bumps went away. Bought a new bottle, tiny red bumps returned. Not sure what ingredient is causing them, but I definitely won't be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser works alright, feeling more like a foaming lotion than a soap, but good gracious the smell. I thought maybe I’d just gotten a weird batch, so I went back and got a sample and it was the same. It smells like old cucumbers, and not in a good way. I just couldn’t stand to put it on my face. For the price point, there are much nicer (and more pleasant smelling) cleaners out there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this face wash. It is incredibly gentle yet washes away all my makeup with ease, including mascara. I love the feel which has this cooling factor. My skin always feelings great afterward. Not drying at all. I’ve used this for years now. The price is super worth it because a little goes such a long way.

reviews.review_title: Drying, did not remove much makeup.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After 2 days of use this cleanser dried out my skin, and gave me a major breakout. I've used a non-waterproof mascara that normally comes off very easily, yet this cleanser did not manage to remove the mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is the only one that I will use to cleans my face!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Use this to remove eye makeup. So incredibly gentle on the eyes and breakthrough my mascara leaving my skin so clean but not stripped of oils. I’m almost through my second bottle and have repurchased a third. Next purchase will be the bottle with pump but a little does go a very long way

reviews.review_title: Best face wash for dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry and sensitive skin, most face wash's dry out my skin. This is the best face wash i ever used, it will not dry out my skin at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works good enough but very pricey and there are other cleaners that are as good and far less cost. I don’t love the smell but it isn’t horrible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This used to be my go to cleanser. I took a break to try some new stuff and when things went wrong, like breakouts from new face washes, this was always my savior. I could always pick this up and within a day or two my skin would drastically clear up. I typically have sensitive skin so when trying new things, this gentle wash really calms down any sensitivity flare ups and really is genuinely my holy grail.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample and I was happy to finally try this (bc all the good reviews). My skin was left with a dry feeling and dry patches on my chin and around the nose. Clearly not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this product based on the reviews. I loved everything about it - scent, texture etc. Sadly, it caused me to breakout all over my face and I had to stop using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great face wash. The face wash is very gentle and doesn’t dry out the skin. I got this like 8-10 years back and when the tube got over, I just got the cerave from local drug store. But since then, I have been wanting to get this one back. It’s a bit expensive but is worth the money and will last you long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I have normal-dry skin in the summer (thanks humidity).This sounds weird but I have noticed if this is on too long (2+ min) it gets a little stingy. It doesn't burn and I don't think there are any actives in the ingredients but either way my skin tone looks more glowy after a shower with this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My all time favorite. I keep trying new things and always come back to this. Gets off makeup without stripping skin. My face is super sensitive and the slight fragrance doesn’t bother me. I’ve been in love with this face wash for years.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. Soy works well on my skin, but I like that I can use this to take my makeup off. I can take off my eye makeup without burning my eyes. This is a must have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use a mineral based sunscreen everyday and this is the best cleanser I've used to date.  I do need to take my time and massage properly but once I'm done,  my face is clean but not stripped.  The cleanser has a mild cucumber fragrance that grew on me.  Overall,  very happy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the larger version of this face wash over a year ago and still have some left! My absolute favorite face wash and is the only one I will use. Non drying, removes makeup decently, and doesn’t break me out! Everything I could want in a cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Carolanne du Sephora Pointe-Claire m'a conseillé ce produit et je suis charmée. Excellent qualité-prix. J'ai découvert les produits Fresh avec plaisir. Merci Carolanne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! This face cleanser cleans the skin very well and leaves it feeling fresh, without over drying the skin. It also does not irritate my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cleanses my dry skin without making it feel like the desert

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This face wash removes makeup so well! It does not irritate my sensitive skin or acne and leaves no mascara or eye makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can't use it because of soy, but my mom uses it and loves it.  She has oily skin, but sensitive skin, and it is the only cleanser she's ever really liked.  She has noticed a more balanced oil production, great job on removing makeup and daily grime.  Also improvement in skin texture.  Overall seems like a great product that has never irritated her skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I find this cleanser very mediocre and not worth it. Didn’t ever see a difference in my skin or any benefits for using it. Other fresh products are wonderful, but was definitely disappointed with this one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My holy grail cleanser. I have been using this for about 5 years and love it. My only note would be that as far as removing makeup, I still double cleanse with an oil cleanser first and go in with this one as a second cleanse. I’ve found it does remove some makeup, but not everything.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Although it did take of my daily makeup and dirt on my face, I did find that it stripped my skin a little bit and my face felt a tad tight after washing. The texture is luxurious and the smell is nice too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product. I’ve tried numerous face wash products in hopes it would remove my makeup; and this was the first one that actually did the job! I’m always left astounded at the amount of makeup it’ll remove, including water-proof mascara. It’s also extremely gentle on my combination skin. Try it, you won’t be disappointed!

reviews.review_title: I really wanted to like this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
