reviews.review_text: Given all the positive reviews I thought I would totally love this, but I broke out all over my jawline, neck and the sides of my face. I haven't even been wearing much makeup these days (if any), so I don't think residual makeup was the issue, but instead it was the product itself isn't for me. If you have allergies, acne prone, sensitive skin- this might not be right for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: if i could rate this 100/5 stars i would. i've been getting this as a free gift/ mini sample/ or one year as a free b-day gift. i've tried countless other make up remover cleansers yet i still come back to this one. leaves me skin feeling soft, CLEAN, non-irritated and healthy. fresh uses quality ingredients and i love how they have a natural approach and formulate products without harsh, heavy toxic ingredients. i love this brand and i will be purchasing many more products! i struggle with occassional breakouts, dry patches, old acne spots and this covers a lot of skin care concerns. if you're looking to play it safe and you're sensitive to lots of products like me, this is a great place to start. I LOVE YOU FRESH!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loveeeeee this always. Been using it for years. It’s very gentle yet it removes all makeup, the oil base makeup removers doesn’t work for me, so this is perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My fave everyday face wash! It’s super gentle but still gets all my makeup off without any harsh scrubbing. It leaves my face clean and bright without over drying. I also love the gentle cucumber scent, which is super subtle and natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very gentle face wash thats nice to have on with sensitive skin. After washing my face felt very clean, soft and gentle. Other than that it didn't do anything to my skin. Did not feel like it washed away any oil or grime on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t think this does much of anything. I will not be repurchasing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an essential for a loving skin care moment. I love it's texture and how smells. it cleans my face beautifully, but I still need a double cleanse with a oil based product to remove all makeup!

reviews.review_title: Good cleanser, scent leaves much to be desired
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A really good and gentle cleanser safe for everyday use and even on dry skin. Gets 4 stars because the smell is not great... it’s not awful either

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a really good cleanser, but I wouldn’t use it to remove makeup, especially not eye makeup. Definitely love it as a second cleanse though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s alright. But nothing a good drugstore cleaner won’t do.

reviews.review_title: Spa-like cleanser that's gentle on sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found this to be really gentle on my sensitive skin. Most cleansers cause a tight feeling or irritation/redness on my skin, but this cleanser cleans thoroughly while not being too stripping or foaming too much.  Whenever I wear makeup, I make sure to double cleanse. I use an oil and then follow with this. I can put this cleanser near my eye area without worry. It will get rid of any makeup residue missed by the cleansing oil.  I do love the smell (a strong rose scent with cucumber) as it reminds me of a luxurious spa experience, but it could be toned down a bit.   Overall, I really like this cleanser and it has been a staple in my regimen for a while. It's one of the more expensive products I use but I haven't been able to find a dupe that really compared! For me, it's definitely worth splurging on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this as a makeup remover, just keep it in my shower and use it In the night when removing my makeup and it does what you’d hope, it removes makeup very well including waterproof. The smell is nice it has a kind of cucumber smell. I haven’t noticed any increase in breakouts or dryness, etc. Seems to work fine, will probably purchase full size

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: An amazing cleanser. I would give this 5 stars if it wasn’t for the price tag. I used this religiously when my skin was being problematic but now that it’s settled I just can’t justify the price tag. There are cleaners that work just as well as this one in terms of taking off makeup - but the clean, fresh and balanced way my skin felt after using this cleanser is missed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Sent trop fort le concombre. Je ne sens pas que ça nettoie très bien.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like vomit.  Difficult to use.  No benefits.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this face wash! I have been using it for a little under a year now. I have dry, sensitive, breakout-prone skin. This face wash is gentle and effective. It makes my face feel clean and not overly dry like some others I have tried. I don't love the scent - it smells like cucumbers, but it isn't terribly strong. I don't really wear makeup so I can't speak to its ability to remove makeup, but as a daily cleanser, this has really worked for me! I'm going to continue to purchase it.

reviews.review_title: Best Cleanser. Amazing for Sensitive Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser I have ever tried. I have been using it for years and it's so good I never even have a desire to try another product! I used to have severe cystic acne and took Accutane. While the cleanser did not help reduce acne, it is incredibly hydrating and doesn't dry out/tighten my skin like other cleansers (so it was wonderful to use with Accutane which causes dry skin). Four years later and completely acne free, I still use the product and love how soothing and gentle it feels.

reviews.review_title: Love this cleanser. Used it through my pregnancy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favourite goto products. I used this product throughout my pregnancy. It was recommended by one of the Sephora lady in Ottawa, ON. My skin was moisturized, no acnes, and my skin super soft. I love their travel size cleanser is super convenient, I just pack that in my toiletry bag and I am good to go. I highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first got and sample of this. Then I got the 5.1 oz of this. Next I'm going to get the pump bottle of this. It doesn't dry out  or strip my combo skin and smells like cucumbers. I would take off a half star because the smell doesn't last for the whole bottle. Hopefully that will change with the pump.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell, the texture and the feeling it leaves behind is unparalleled. It has an extremely pleasant scent that automatically relaxes me, seriously. It is extremely gentle, yet effective at getting my skin ready for the rest of my routine. I usually prefer to use this in the morning when I don't have a ton of stuff to wash off my face. An absolutely wonderful cleanser that I highly recommend to all skin types with all skin concerns.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was actually hesitant to buy this because I’m just always suspicious of influencers etc raving reviews but OMG. I have super. extremely. oily skin. This hits the nail on the head. I usually use pretty strong cleansers because of the grease and oils but this takes all that away but I don’t feel “squeaky” like I feel that nice hydration. Also I avoid full foundation at almost all cost because of my oiliness so I usually just spot treat with light coverage foundation. But I do put on water based moisturizer, eye cream, and facial sunscreen during the day and this gets that all off and it feels amazing. I’m very picky with cleansers and I love this. Also it has this nice very subtle fresh cucumber smell and it does add to the nice cleansing experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a staple in my skincare routine, I’ve been using it for years now. I love how gentle it is, even on post-treatment/procedure skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best cleanser! Removes all of my makeup and leaves my skin smooth and clean. It does not cause any breakouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I would use this allover my entire body if it weren't so prohibitively expensive. It's gentle, effective, and smells great. It removes waterproof eyeliner but never strips my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! One wash everything is off your face. Smells great as well. For heavy makeup day I still do the double cleanse method. This product is hands down. So far one of my favourite cleansers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! I had a really bad heat rash and I used this and it cleared up so fast!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the cleanser that I have been using for the past half a decade or so despite the price tag. I have sensitive skin and this cleanser doesn’t break me out or irritate my skin, because it is so gentle. So why mess with a good thing. The cleanser lasts me awhile, but each time I run out and have to buy it, I cringe. If you don’t have super sensitive skin like me, it is not worth it to spend this much money on cleanser. However, if you do have sensitive skin like me, just bite the bullet and get this.

reviews.review_title: Removes make up without drying; cucumber scented
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This does a great job of removing makeup without drying out my skin. I also really like pump products for ease of use. However, they really should put cucumber in the name of this make up somewhere because the smell of cucumber is overwhelming. If you don't like that smell, you won't like this face wash. Otherwise, it's a great product, just think they could improve the name to better reflect the strong scent.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for light make up but expensive
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is literally the best face wash I’ve ever had. I have sensitive and dry skin with oily T zone. Most cleansing products dry my skin, so I have to apply moisturizer right after washing my face. But Fresh Soy Cleanser only removes excess oil of my T zone, dirt, and make up and leaves my skin soft and hydrated. I don’t use any heavy or waterproof make up (only CC cream, tinted blush, and sometimes eyeliner), so this product is ideal for me. However, if you use waterproof make up, I saw some people complaining about its make up removing properties. You may want to consider that before buying it. Also it’s quite pricey for a face wash. 50mL size is definitely not worth the pay.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle on the skin, while removing all of your makeup. Nice scent too. This is definitely a staple in my skin care regimen.

reviews.review_title: Good but doesn't remove all makeup
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like the fact that it is very gentle and does not irritate my sensitive skin. This may remove some makeup but does not remove certain eyeliner and mascara.

reviews.review_title: Tough on makeup, gentle on skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Cuts through makeup, yet gentle. Doesn’t leave skin stripped of natural oils and doesn’t irritate eyes. It’s an all in one face wash!

reviews.review_title: Gentle, effective cleanser- even on makeup
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser!  I have used this cleanser religiously for years and have had consistent results.  I have very, very sensitive acne-prone skin and this cleanser does not irritate my skin at all.  I love that it removes all traces of makeup effectively, including mascara.  I am typically especially sensitive to fragrances, but I find the smell of this pleasant- it smells spring-like, sort of like fresh cut grass on a spring day.  It is not overwhelming at all.  The cleanser is gentle, non-stripping.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this cleanser for a couple of years. Like it because it cleans wonderfully and doesn't dry out skin like some I have used, while leaving skin feeling smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: honestly thought the 13.5oz would be bigger idk why, but it’s still really good and clears my skin up / moisturizes it well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite face cleaner.  I have very sensitive skin.  I strongly recommend for sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great cleanser for normal/ dry. Takes off all makeup and leaves skin comfortable. I will try others but I always go back!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. Removes all makeup including mascara and skin is left soft and smooth. Also glad to hear a larger size bottle is coming!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The consistency is silky smooth! Smells natural and lovely! I've been using it for a week and no new breakouts!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this mini originally to try it and see if it would work well for my skin. I end up loving it, it’s light yet cleanses my skin without overdrying or irritating it. Now, I don’t feel that it does remove my make up well, so I decided to first use makeup eraser to remove make up then follow up with this cleanser and been doing it for a few weeks now and so far it is a great combo! My skin feels amazing afterwards! Ive bought the 6 oz one and lasted us (my husband and I use this each twice a day- so four uses a day total) for about two months. I just ordered the big bottle with the pump and going to see if it lasts even longer as we won’t accidentally pour too much as I occasionally do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love! Everything about this face wash is amazing. The smell, texture are amazing plus it’s very moisturizing and cleansing. Mini is a perfect size since you don’t need that much and it lasts a long time still using it everyday!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love! Smell, texture, cleansing, just everything. Very gentle yet very cleansing. The only thing is you only have to use a tiny amount so this size lasts an aggressively long time, I have started to buy the travel size which still lasts enough for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favourite face wash. It doesn’t leave my skin feeling dry. My skin feels hydrated after using this. I love the scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing. Tried the Youth to the People cleanser and did not get the hype, it totally dried my face out every single time no matter how little I left it on for. Love this. FYI I have very sensitive oily/combo skin with dry patches. This is the only thing that neutralizes my whole face. Absolutely no stinging, great texture, definitely gonna be my go-to cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used to this mask for about 3 weeks and I did not enjoy it at much as other people. My face started breaking out more everyday and it felt more oily. I will stick with my other face wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands-down the best cleanser I have ever used. This cleanser removes every drop of my makeup including my waterproof mascara. It's gentle does not strip my face of its natural oils and keeps my skin glowing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser spreads really well, so you don't need to apply a lot of product. It feels really refreshing and is also the only cleanser I feel comfortable using around my eyes because it's gentle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice, lightweight and after washing doesn’t feel dry

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have eczema which makes me have very dry skin. It’s very soothing and smooth when I’m using it. I didn’t breakout whatsoever. My friends don’t seem to like this product because they feel it doesn’t get any of the dirt off their face, but they have oily skin. I would definitely recommend for people with dry skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the smaller size of this just to test it out and I don't think I can ever use a different facial cleanser now! The rose scent is slightly off-putting at first, but I came to love it. It makes my face feel insanely soft and it feels super gentle when using. I can use it on my eyes and not feel any burning. My face feels clean and it does the job well done. Did I mention how SOFT my face is after using this!?

reviews.review_title: a staple in my beauty routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have bottles and bottles of this - in all sizes. love that they just released a pump version. that will be my next purchase. there's nothing from Fresh that I haven't fallen in love with yet. buy immediately

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I originally got the trial size from a Christmas gift set that Sephora sells during the Christmas season. After trying it out, I noticed several things. First, it doesn’t lather, which is weird as a face soap; so I ended using more than usual and it still didn’t cleanse my face or remove any makeup off. It also clogged my ores and made me break out. I got fed up and threw it away within a week. It had a weird sticky, tacky, gel-liquid texture that I was not happy about. After looking at the ingredients, I realized that it has glycerin (which doesn’t clog pores and is a humectant to add moisture, is good for sensitive and dry skin, but also gives products that tacky texture), several (too many in my opinion) different oils (sunflower oil, castor oil, & soybean oil), and silica (which is essentially silicone-it can get into your pores and clog them and cause break-outs).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many different cleansers and this one is probably my favorite. I love that it is very gentle, very mildly lathering, skin feels clean but nourished and not overly stripped. The smell is nice of cucumbers and very mild. I usually use a cleansing oil before to get rid of makeup, but I think this cleanser is effective and gentle. I would definitely purchase this again, it's also great that it has the clean seal. Price is a bit on the upper side for just a cleanser, but it is a large bottle and will still last a while. I would totally recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lasts quite a bit, have tried others but always come back to this. Leaves your skin feeling clean and takes off mascara very breezy. I’m in love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I use it as my morning cleanser and I love it! Although I do wish it foamed up a bit more, but that is just my preference! A bit pricey for what it is (I received it in my boxy charm subscription)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just the best, deep clean feeling without being drying. And you literally only need a tiny little drop of it for your face and neck so it goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product but HATE the way it smells! I think it’s the rose water that I don’t like the smell of. But with the smell aside, I like the actual face wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this face wash religiously for 2.5 years. I was on Accutane and needed something to keep my skin from drying out & getting worse. This definitely helped during that time I saw a change in a literal week. Smaller breakouts, softer skin, less irritation/redness. I started breaking out again (nothing severe just really bothered me) so I have recently switched to origins checks & balances frothy face wash and have seen a significant change in clearing my breakouts. They are now rare but still hormonally noticeable at times. But, the soy face wash wasn’t helping anymore so, maybe if you have dry skin this is the way to go but if not it simply isn’t effective for you. I love Fresh products all in all, the lemon lip balm, strawberry exfoliator and more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lightweight cleanser has tamed periodic breakouts and leaves skin feeling clean and refreshed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've received samples of this facewash for years and have always used points to get the small tubes as well. I finally bit the bullet and purchased the value size. It's a super gentle facewash with a light scent that works well for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice and gentle daily cleanser. However, it doesn't remove the make up properly. I tried it to remove the lipstick on my hand and it cannot clean it well. It doesn't meet my expectation of removing sunscreen, primer and blush in one step. The Philosophy 3 in 1 does much better job

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Made my balanced skin feel clean, but tight and dry. Not a huge fan of the strong cucumber scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best face wash I have ever used. If I try something else I always end up going back to this one.

reviews.review_title: Didn't like the texture, but worth trying
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the mini cleanser in the mini favorites kit from Fresh. I don't wear makeup a lot, so I mostly wanted to try it for the dirt and grit I get on my skin. I wasn't super impressed when I compare it to other cleansers I use. It did what it was meant to do, but personally I didn't like the texture. I'm used to creamy (Saturday Skin) and foamy (Neogen) cleansers, and some oil ones (like Purito and Boscia). This was neither an oil or foam. It felt more like slick snot on your face for lack of a better description. It didn't foam up. It just was. I did like that there was no residue and it rinsed off very nicely I am a fan of Fresh's other products I've tried, but this cleanser isn't for me. I dropped a star only for my personal distaste of the texture. I'll continue to use up my mini, but won't repurchase. It did do a wonderful job removing impurities from my skin without drying it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best face cleanser ever!! It’s great for taking of makeup and any excess dirt and oil, but doesn’t leave my skin stripped at all. Super soft and gentle as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this cleanser as a double cleanser after I take my make up off with my drugstore make up remover wipes for the last 2+ years.  I had read somewhere that your skin is actually too sensitive to take the “abuse” of make up remover wipes long term and that we should find solutions that are more gentle. That’s when I went onto the Sephora app and looked up cleansers and came across this one (again I have been using it at this point already every day anyways) and started reading the reviews and a few ppl said they used it to “melt” away their makeup so I gave it a try and let me tell you cliniques balm and all the other “hyped” make up removing things don’t do this baby justice like not even remotely! Now I use one product and it’s one I’ve already had in my routine for a while!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After receiving this as a sample, I decided I had to have it for every day use. It is the best face wash I have ever used! I will continue to purchase this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin, dry patches but oily in the t-zone.. I also have issues with those stubborn little bumps and I found that this cleanser didn’t do much for me. It does. A good job to freshen your face and doesn’t dry it out to much, but I’m convinced you could find a way better cleanser for cheaper too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells nice. Removes make up from face and eyes. Only wish it was a little hydrating since my skin feels dry after using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Bought the mini to try out instead of investing in the full size, and I was pleased with this Cleanser! It does what it’s suppose to do and it doesn’t dry out my skin! I would give the mini a chance to try out and see if you would like it! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The only reason it didn’t get 5 stars is because it wasn’t deep enough of a cleanser for me. I think this is good for drier skin. It definitely works good as a pre cleanse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So light and a great daily cleanser. I tend to dry out super easily with face wash, but this never dries my face out. I've been using it for about 4 years and still love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This face wash is amazing! My skin is clean and soft! When I run out or get close to running out I’ll be repurchasing and if the bigger size is still available I’ll definitely be buying that!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have no idea why it took me so long to give this a try but this product is amazing. It leaves my skin feeling so clean. It removes makeup and cleanses so well. It been such a good addition to my skin care routine and I have oily skin. I am highly impressed and I will be buying the bigger size very soon

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face wash. It feels great on my skin, and it works wonderfully for taking off makeup. It cleans the skin thoroughly while leaving it feeling fresh and moisturized. It smells like cucumbers which I love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is awesome. I have  combination and it is go to face wash for me and my husband with normal skin. this is very gentle but cleans properly. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: smells really nice, like cucumbers. it also removes eye makeup well & softly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've always loved this cleanser. I use a daily sunblock and don't wear makeup often aside from non-waterproof mascara so I don't double cleanse and truthfully I'm too lazy for eye makeup remover. this makes my face feel very clean and gets the mascara off more or less. I have somewhat dry skin so gentler washes don't seem to get my face totally clean, and this might not be great for those with very dry skin. but it is non-irritating and I love the cucumber smell. no frills, clean ingredients and cleans effectively. it's exactly what I want from a utilitarian face wash - let masks do the fun stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product was a miss for me. It was far too gentle for my oily/acne prone skin, and still left my skin feeling congested everytime I used it particularly around my nose. I also believe that it was the cause of breakouts I was experiencing as well. Sadly had to return, but I think it would be great for sensitive skin or people who dont struggle with oil or pores.

reviews.review_title: Gentle Fresh Cleanser Perfect for Double-Cleansing
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been really liking this product. It’s gentle and smells very nice (like cucumbers). I use this product along with a balm to double-cleanse my face. This product doesn’t leave my skin feeling dry which it’s great because I find most cleansers do. 4 starts because it’s a little expensive. Overall, great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this cleanser! No complaints. Really nice rose smell, feels clean and hydrating after washing. It’s not amazing at removing makeup, for that you should use an oil cleanser or balm before using this. Good for a gentle cleanse, wouldn’t rec if you need deep clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product for a couple of years, and love it.  While I haven’t used it to take off my makeup, I use it daily to cleanse my face.  With sensitive, oily leaning skin, I need something gentle yet effective.  This product is just that.  I’m never left feeling dry, and have had no negative reactions to it.  Highly recommend this for sensitive skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite face wash and I'm so glad they decided to do it in a bigger size (6.7 oz).  I love that it's gentle, doesn't dry out my skin, but still cleans very well.  I keep trying out new cleansers just to be disappointed and come back to this one.  It's definitely my HG!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I highly recommend this cleanser! I started using it about 5 months ago and it has become a staple product for my combination skin. It has a slight scent of cucumber which is super refreshing, and it’s very gently on the skin. I love that you can use it gently over your eyes to get off any eye makeup. I can get dry, flaky skin especially around my nose, but I’ve never had a problem with this product drying out my skin! I also wrap up my skin care with the Fresh Lotus Youth Preserve Face Cream (which I also highly recommend) and the combo has helped brighten my complexion and reduce redness.   I knocked off one star only because when I use a toner afterwards, I sometimes still see leftover dirt/oil, but this normally happens after wearing a full face of makeup so it can be hard to get it all off with one cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face wash! I have been using it for years on my combination skin. I was having significant issues with redness and flaking skin around my nose and had tried everything, including steroid cream. This face wash was the magic trick. It is light, has a faint smell of cucumbers, and doesn’t leave my skin dry. I will say this doesn’t touch my waterproof eye make-up, but I am still not sure I will ever switch face wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a lifesaver! If you have a lot of acne I would go for something stronger but for sensitive skin that just needs to be maintained this is phenomenal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely oily skin and use this as my morning cleanser! I absolutely love it! It cleanses my face without leaving it too dry. I love how it feels light and gently gets rid of impurities. I highly recommend this cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this cleanser and often use it as my morning cleanser. It’s very light and has a jelly-like texture. It’s not a foaming product so my face doesn’t feel tight or dry after using it. This product should be suitable for those who has normal, sensitive skin or someone who just want a basic gentle cleanser to wash their face. For those who has oily, combi or acne skin, it’s better to just use this cleanser in the morning to have a balance PH and another cleanser at night to treat other skin problems.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really great for taking off waterproof makeup, super gentle, gotten it in my eyes and its fine! Not sure it does anything to actually deep clean your face though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My go to face wash. Have always and will always love this face wash.

reviews.review_title: not great for removing makeup, great for mornings
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the scent it smells like vegetables. It doesn’t feel harsh like chemicals but natural and gentle on my skin. Unfortunately I can’t give it 5 stars because it can’t wash off makeup very well. It’s no match for eyeliner or mascara. I have felt a difference on a trouble area on my forehead it feels softer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Although it smells like Tamarind the smell is way too strong. I felt it was rough on my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin

One use dried my cheeks out terribly, they're rough/patchy almost like fine sandpaper, even with using my again oil.  I have two large cysts forming on my upper cheek toward the outside of my face, as well as several smaller bumps/whiteheads.  One use of this cleanser completely undid all the work into getting my skin into shape.  I am so frustrated and angry right now.  I thought this was supposed to be gentle but it dried my face out worse than any foaming cleanser I've ever used.

reviews.review_title: A great gentle cleanser (but there’s a big
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After a few nights of using this cleanser, I’m really pleased by how nourishing the product is. And while I’m often skeptical about whether you get substantial results from ingredients like soy and aloe (in a wash-off form especially), this product offers a sufficiently thorough, gentle cleanse that leaves my skin feeling hydrated and supple. I like this cleanser--quite a lot, in fact. But: nearly $40 for 150 ml is easily more than double its worth. And I think Fresh has attempted to justify this product’s high price point by advertising the cleanser as this 3-in-1 cleansing makeup remover with toning effects. It’s a cleanser, and a really lovely one. But be wary of this makeup removing face wash advertising: it is not as effective a makeup remover as a balm, cream, or oil, and so I find this product best used as the second part of a two-step cleansing routine. And as for its effects as a toner--I would assume that the product’s inclusion of rose and cucumber is for the sake of its (divisive) fragrance more any reliable outcomes in balanced skin. If this product were $15, then we’d be talking; but I won’t be spending $38 on a cleanser when I can find excellent alternatives for less than $10.

For a cleanser to be that strong/effective yet so gentle that you can literally get it in your eye without discomfort is miraculous.  Overall though skin appears advisably cleaner after use, it leaves skin looking so fresh and glowy.   I would strongly recommend trying this product.
