reviews.review_text: This product has helped clear my face, I’ve been using it nearly a year now based on a friend’s recommendation. I find it to be gentle and cleansing and had previously had issues with small pimples all over and dry skin. I also find that it lasts a long time and is quite cost effective in the jumbo size. It’s always removed my eye makeup, so I’m not sure what other reviews are referring to, but I don’t wear anything waterproof. Additionally, it does have a strong cucumber scent but since it’s not on your face long it doesn’t bother me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: just received this product and have used it only about 5 times. I do feel like its helping to clear up my blemishes slightly and it is soft/fresh on my face, my issue with this product is the smell!!!!! its smells like cucumbers, which sounds fine and I normally don't have annny issues with scents...but I just CANNOT get past it with this product. it also isn't that great at removing eye makeup but that's fine, I was warned of that in the reviews I read beforehand. I personally wouldn't re-purchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my fourth purchase! Feels very natural and soft on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cleanser now for about 10 years and it is amazing. It has a lovely smell and cleans while being super gentle on your skin. It will not remove heavy eye makeup (that’s what makeup remover is for) but it easily removes face powders and other basic makeup at the end of the day as well as gives you a refreshed feel for AM use. I also love that it is a clean product. I have never broken out since using this cleanser. I am dabbling in other cleansers right now to see what’s new and out there but this staple is still my trusty sidekick go to. It really works for all ages.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for a year and I love it! It cleared my back and chest acne and I haven't gotten any since I started using it, and I had this problem for over 5 years. It isn't very drying but it has been great to regulate the oil in my face, chest and back. As much as I love it, my best friend completely hates it (she broke out more once she started using it) so I totally recommend getting a sample before you get the full sized product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is literally my favorite face wash of all time. I have normal but sensitive skin, and this face wash has never done me dirty, and it always clears up any blemish I have. Every so often I stray just to see what else is out there in terms of slightly cheaper face washes and am immediately reminded of how good this one is. Holy grail.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite cleanser, a little goes a long way and it's so gentle but powerful! I would recommend this to literally anybody! This is a short review but this product is just really really good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This used to be my holy grail cleanser and I am finally going back to it. After trying out a few others, I noticed nothing else ever left my dry skin feeling non-stripped like this cleanser. I had to repurchase it. I’m really excited to have it back in my routine! I only gave it 4 stars because there is a bit of fragrance in it which I prefer to not have  in my skincare, BUT this is not a leave on product so it isn’t as bad! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: New favorite face wash... I love how gentle it is and that it doesn’t foam, feels so much more natural & light. My face has been so smooth since using along with ordinary products !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an okay product. I did not find it great. It removes some make up but not entirely. I don’t even apply heavy makeup. It’s usually low and medium coverage makeup. I bought the jumbo size... ugh! I am not going to buy it again!

reviews.review_title: Would repurchase if it had a pump
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Good everyday gentle cleanser for normal/dry skin. Does not irritate or cause breakouts. Smells nice. Just wish it had a pump.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: its nice but its chalked full of fragrance and there are many other cleansers that work better, are cheaper and have no fragrance. Would not recommend because of the price point and its pretty much average, didn't clear my skin but I didn't break out either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this face cleanser for years and I absolutely love using it!   I recently decided to switch to the Youth to the People Superfood Cleanser simply because it comes in a glass bottle instead of non-recyclable plastic packaging.   Sustainability is important to me, and as soon as fresh switches to glass packaging, I'll start buying this cleanser again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This size lasts me a couple months. And the cleanser itself was a godsend as I had been struggling to find something that didn't completely dry out my skin or lead me to break out when I moved to a drier area with hard water. It's gentle and non-drying for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Feels slimey on my face and doesn’t lather well at all, so I have to use a larger amount. It really didn’t seem to have any better effect on my skin than any drugstore brand, although it does remove makeup well—if you’re willing to use a lot of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves my face soft but doesn’t make my face feel clean and didn’t see any improvement with my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this in my double cleansing routine with my Then I met you cleansing my balm. It’s so gentle, cleans and doesn’t leave your face feeling dry. I’m not sure how it would be as a stand-alone product BUT works well with others

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Soft and gentle! The best face wash ever! Has made the texture of my skin so much better and it’s so gentle in the eye areas as well... it is not foamy it’s more like a gel no strong scent... I love fresh products even tho they are pricey compared to others but so worth the money I use the night blue cream for hydration and it leaves my skin baby soft. I recommend it if you have sensitive skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was recommended for sensitive skin and I'm loving it! It has a fresh cucumber scent, and is super lightweight. It doesn't make my skin feel dry after using, and the best part is that you can use it on your eyes as well. It didn't take off all my mascara, but worked well enough for a cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product on and off for about 6 years, and consistently for 2 years. Every time I came back to it, I remembered why I loved it and wondered why I stopped using it at all. If you’re like me and you double cleanse, this cleanser is a wonderful step after removing your makeup or after a harsh mask. My skin is really sensitive and it’s usually pretty clear, so this is perfect for me. I love the soft consistency and clean smell, and really have yet to find anything like it. I’m also sometimes prone to facial dermatitis, and on those days the soy immediately calms it down and makes me feel refreshed. I have the jumbo bottle (almost out) and repurchased the mini for travel after I ran out. Fresh has so much money from me over the years lol.  If you’re looking for a deep clean or something stronger for troubled skin, skip this or only use it when your skin is feeling irritated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Très doux pour les peaux sensibles. Il n’assèche pas la peau. Odeur très agréable et délicate. Enlève le maquillage et le mascara. Très bon produit ! C’est un incontournable dans ma routine de soin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first skincare product I think I have ever gone to repurchase because I like it so much.  The sample size I previously purchased lasted me a good amount of time.  While I did find a decent drugstore dupe of this, it had added fragrance and not nearly as good a texture.  I use this as a second step cleanser and I love how it feels on my skin.  It is great at removing any makeup I have left on my eyes. Makes my drier skin feel good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this!! It smells so good and makes my skin feel softer. I have sensitive skin and this doesn’t bug it I’d recommend to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin breaks out from literally anything and everything. I highly recommend this. So easy on my skin and barely any adjustment period for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wasn’t anything that stands out - much prefer SkinFx, Boscia or FAB as they tackle my skin concerns whereas unfortunately this did not.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I REALLY wanted to like this face wash. I have oily acne prone skin and judging by reviews, I decided to give it a shot. I used it for a week and a bunch of new acne started appearing on my face. When I stopped using it, new acne stopped appearing but the acne that had already showed up would NOT go away. It took weeks and left me with horrible acne scarring. What saved my skin was the Murad Clarifying Cleanser. I don’t think this product is ideal for oily acne prone skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face wash! I have sensitive, redness-prone skin, and this cleanser doesn’t irritate me or leave my face feeling zapped of moisture. The fact that it also effortlessly removes my makeup is a bonus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Listen. I've heard countless beauty gurus rave about this cleanser in their favorites videos and skincare routines. I've even checked out countless reviews on this very website. So I took advantage and bought a skincare kit Sephora was selling around the holidays (Hydration Ever After Gift Set). People love this cleanser...but I don't get it?  It's not a BAD cleanser. It doesn't leave me feeling dry or tight after washing my face, but I'm now wowed by it. It feels fairly clean but I will say that it's not the best at getting any remnants of makeup off like most cleansers do in a double cleanse. Also, the smell is not something I'm a big fan of. I almost gag when I first squeeze the product out of the tube and quickly wash my face because of the scent.  I know many say that this cleanser is great for all skin types, all the time but this was no good for my combo skin in the winter. I had to switch to a much creamier cleanser based on my aesthetician's suggestion. For the price of it, I think you can find a better cleanser elsewhere.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is VERY sensitive.. even Cetaphil & CeraVe cause extreme irritation. I hate the price but this is the only face wash that cleans my skin well without bumps or burning. Worth a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: smooth and refreshing formula! smells like cucumbers, and leaves my face glowing. feels like a cool gel when lathering on face. does not dry out skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was really hoping to like this product but it made my skin breakout and I rarely get breakouts so I was very disappointed as I had heard so many good things  Many people said they like the smell but I found it had an odd smell not terrible just not appealing and would overlook that but not the breakouts

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If your face is sensitive don’t buy this product made me break out, also using scented products on your face is not good for your skin which this one is scented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A friend recommended this to me since it is a top selling product at Sephora and safe for eyes. I love it!! The gel consistency is very calming to my dry skin and it definitely gets your makeup off! Very happy with this product and glad I bought the value size!! I even choose this as my samples now, when available, so that I have a little packet for on the go.

reviews.review_title: Broke out my skin very badly
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This gave me chronic, cystic acne with each use. I am very knowledgeable with skin care, so I thought that this cleanser would work very well for me. It’s made of natural ingredients and nearly every single one being good for skin! The only thing that it contains that aggravates skin is Rosa Damascena Flower Oil. I’ve had a moisturizer containing this ingredients break me out in the past (I suspected), so I guess this is the proof that I cannot use anything with that ingredient. I used this cleanser for 8 days and by the last day I was so desperate for the acne to stop that I decided to use one of my other cleansers (my Burt’s bees argan and coconut oil cleanser) and the acne started to heal IMMEDIATELY. My skin literally did a 180. So I decided to stop using this for good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This face wash is super gentle and leaves my oily skin feels refreshed and clean. I also love the smell!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! My skin is pretty sensitive, so I’m really happy that it doesn’t burn or tingle when washing my face with this. It smells so yummy and is not overpowering(for me). My skin felt super clean and moisturized after, too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is a little strong but it is so good so I can overlook it. I use it to take my makeup off and to wash my beauty sponges.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice gentle cleanser. Great for sensible skin and smells like cucumbers!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product changed my life! My skin was so dull before. It’s gentle, which is great for my sensitive skin. It really does a great job of removing EVERYTHING while revitalizing my skin. I’ll never stop using this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS!!! it has changed my life ... FOR BETTER!!! it’s so light and gentle. it’s perfect for someone that has dry and sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It’s become a favorite of mine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So sad this product made me breakout. I started to notice small bumps on my forehead after using for about three days and then after six some showed up on my cheek as well. I waited to see if it was this product or something else, but turns out it was this. Lots of other recent reviews are saying the same thing. Will be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for several years and I will not use anything else. I have very sensitive skin and this face wash is super gentle but it also takes off ALL of my makeup always.

reviews.review_title: Great cleanser for dry, sensitive skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin: olive tone, dry and sensitive   To be honest I have never used a cleanser as all the ones I’ve tried left my skin super dry. I used to remove my makeup with Vaseline and then simply rinse with water. I got a sample of this and loved it. My skin feels refreshed and not dry. Also this soothes my sensitive skin, which is a first. Mind you it didn’t remove all my mascara or liner but it did a pretty decent job. I already bought a full size and this is now part of my routine. I have also tried face washes from Drunk Elephant and Kiehls (which is my go to brand) and like this one the most. Worth the money!

reviews.review_title: I Got More Blackheads While Using Than Before
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Skin felt clean after washing but I got a lot more blackheads while using this than normal. This means it isn't cleaning very deep into my pores. Will not get it again,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay I absolutely love ths face cream I tried so many. With acne and problem skin.. this has been noticeably making my skin way clearer. I cannot wait to keep using this. I do not like the feel of it works so idc!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and I was looking for a cleanser that would be gentle and effectively clean my skin at the same time. This product ended up working perfectly for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sometimes my skin breaks out from products, and this happened to be one of them. After using this several days in a row, I began to get tiny red bumps under my eyes that turned to pimples. Also happened on my cheeks too. I prefer using the Murad Exfoliating Cleanser over this one, does not break me out after daily use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have pretty dry skin but this gentle cleanser removes dirt, grime and makeup without killing my skin. It can make my face feel tight but followed by a moisturizer it makes my skin feel supple and clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great staple gentle cleanser! I would not use this to remove makeup but I do use it after oil cleansing and it doesn't strip the skin! I always have it in my travel makeup bag!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this product broke me out all over my face in small red bumps which later turn into pimples. i was using this along side their youth moisturizer and strawberry exfoliator and my skin is literally on brail mode. i have combo /sensitive skin. i believe due to the amount of excessive fragrance Fresh uses,  made my skin break out terribly. there are better options for a cleanser.   (ps. if anyone has any suggestions to get rid of these bumps pls lmk. it’s been about 5 days and they haven’t gone anywhere)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this product, and the youth preserve moisturizer is a great follow up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product!! I did buy the sample to try it out!! My face feels soft and smooth, I also love the smell! Definitely buy the full size product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this face wash! Not only does it get all of my stubborn makeup off, it smells refreshing and my skin is so soft after using it. I have repurchased this twice now and it’s my go to face wash. I have pretty sensitive skin and it never reacts when using this. I would recommend for anyone who wants a refreshed feeling after washing their face!

reviews.review_title: Everyone needs to be using this!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best cleanser ever. I kept seeing it on Instagram and thinking that it would be the same as other cleansers but it’s not. I literally look forward to using this. Removes all of my makeup even when I have a heavy amount of eye makeup on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorite gentle cleansers. I typically don't like fragrance in my skincare products, but this one isn't too bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this product for years and I don’t think I will ever buy another face cleanser again! It’s very gentle, smells amazing and I’m honestly convinced it helps reduce/minimize my acne when I have breakouts!

reviews.review_title: great gentle cleanser but made me break out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell of this! Smells like cucumber. I do feel like it does a great job cleansing and left my skin feeling more soft than any other cleanser I’ve probably ever used. Reason for three stars is because every time  I use it I break out — so I use it when my skin is feeling rough maybe once or twice a week because it does do a great job.  I personally wouldn’t rebuy it as I feel like I can find something similar for less of a price

reviews.review_title: Amazing cleanser that removes makeup & cleans well
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING cleanser. I've been using this product for at least 5 years now. I just hate how expensive it is.  As someone who has very dry and sensitive skin and was looking for something that would take ALL my make-up off, even the stubbornest of mascaras and clean my face without making it feel really dry and stripped after, this product definitely met my expectation.  DISCLAIMER: Please don't expect this product to remove ALL your make up with one use. This is an excellent product to use as your 2nd cleanse but it would be very unreal to expect this product to remove all your make-up as a standalone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Truly the greatest cleanser ever. My skin has magically transformed in just days of using this. Will never use anything else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The only cleanser I’ve ever repurchased ❤️ My skin was so unbelievably sensitive my first couple weeks of tretinoin and this was the only cleanser that didn’t irritate it. It is so gentle and effective on taking off sunscreen & makeup on the days I don’t feel like double cleansing. It has a nice light/natural cucumber scent, never leaves that annoying filmy-ness that some other cleansers do, and honestly just feels so nice on my face. I feel like it’s probably one of the rare products that would be perfect for almost anyone (my skin is dry/sensitive and my best friend is oily/acne-prone and it works great for both of us)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this cleanser because of all of the wonderful ratings.  I’ve been using for two weeks and have noticed that my face has been breaking out everywhere. I am prone to a blemish once every so often and do not have an acne problem, but my face is currently a disaster. This is the only new product that I’ve been using lately, so I’m assuming it’s this product that is wreaking havoc on my face.

reviews.review_title: Very gentle and even breaks down my mascara
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very gentle cleanser, it even breaks down the rest of my mascara and eyeliner after I’ve double cleansed, which is something I haven’t experienced with any other cleanser. My skin (combination) doesn’t feel stripped or right after I’ve cleansed with this face wash. The consistency is gel-like, which feels amazing when you rub it into your skin.   My only con is the scent. It’s not unpleasant, but it’s still a little strong. It’s not enough to make me stop using it, but keep this in mind if you are picky about scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this cleanser quite a bit, but probably not enough to repurchase. It felt really nice on the skin and had a light, pleasant scent. This by itself is not strong enough to remove the makeup I wear, but I used it following an oil cleanse anyways. This product would be perfect for people with dry, sensitive and even normal skin, but I personally have combo-leaning oily skin and it just doesn’t clean quite enough for me. Thoroughly enjoyed it as a gentle morning cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don't even know where to start with this cleanser. I've been using it for years on and off but always come back to it. For reference my skin is fairly normal (occasional pimple here or there but with an oily t-zone)  This cleanser is SUPER gentle on skin but works well enough to remove all of my mascara and eyeliner which is like magic and has me amazed every time I use it.  The scent is very light but slightly medicinal and also fresh (kind of cucumbery)  I don't ever write reviews but had to for this since I just placed an order for more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser so much! I have beyond sensitive skin that reacts to everything and this did not break me out at all! Love how natural it smells too! Smells like cucumbers to me lol!!! It’s not to bad for taking off makeup, but I usually use micellar water first, so not to sure how it is for taking makeup by it’s self, I don’t find it’s drying either, my face feels nice and clean without the super dry feeling!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve finished at least four tubes of this face wash. I use this after a oil based make up remover. My favourite thing about this is the smell!!! Just refreshing:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly did not like this cleanser at all. From the smell to its ability to take off makeup, it’s a no go from me.. I only got the mini which I’m really glad about. I don’t even think I’ll finish this size let alone a big one!

reviews.review_title: A MUST FOR YOUR SKIN CARE ROUTINE
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING!! This is my favorite facial wash especially for makeup days. This product cleanings your face and I’m pretty sure your sins too without leaving you with skin dry Highly Recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best cleansers I have used. Super gentle. You can even use it to remove eye make up. When I put it on, I feel like I'm at a spa because of the lovely cucumber scent.  I was so happy to see the value size and make sure to snag one during one of the recent sales.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m sad to say that this has become my holy grail makeup-removing cleanser. I use it as a second cleanse after removing makeup with a makeup eraser. It’s so gentle, no nonsense, and everything I need.  I buy the jumbo size every year when they come out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This face cleanser is so gentle and leave my face feeling soo soft! My mom is super super picky about skincare and took Accutane because of how bad her cystic acne got and had skin cancer on her face. Even to this day she uses this cleanser, mainly mine. We both loovvee it!  Pros- -Super light, almost no, fragrance -Does a good job at cleaning your face -Makes your face super soft -Doesn't break me out -Helps with oil control  Cons- -Pricey but worth it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like this face wash because I feel like it’s gentle and effective for my normal/combination skin. I feel like it cleans my skin without stripping it and leaving it dry. Sometimes it makes my skin tingle, not sure if other have had the same experience which I’m not a fan of.

reviews.review_title: works great for my oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample and I’m so glad I did! It’s so fresh and soothing to my face. I have really oily skin and I’m prone to acne. I’ve been using an exfoliant face wash I picked up at Whole Foods that I thought was great for my oily skin until I used this. I can feel such a difference in my skin when I use this compared to the one I’ve been using.

reviews.review_title: great for sensitive skin with rosacea
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for my sensitive skin with rosacea. Have been using the Fresh cleanser for years along with Purity. Tube lasts a long time because you only need a little bit to remove make up and cleanse. It’s gentle and effective. Glad I discovered it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Cleanses skin really well and leaves it very soft and moisturized. Great for days you don’t wear make up and just need a nice gentle wash. It does remove my make up but you have to work the cleanser for a bit. Waterproof eye make up doesn’t wash off completely though. Overall I do like it as a gentle non-drying cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t get acne often (just tiny bumps here and there and some redness is like to even out) and I used it for about 4-5 days. And now my face is completely broken out everywhere :/

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to use foaming cleansers in the past and always felt they dried out my skin way more than I liked, this cleanser is my everyday goto for night cleansing. It’s gentle and can be used as a 2nd step cleanser if you double cleanse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the texture. Does not strip away my oils for that 'squeaky' clean. My skin feels so nice afterwards.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am giving a four star because its prices augments without quality improvements, not even the packaging. It is a nice face wash, pleasant smell, cleanses well when I dont have makeup on, doesn't dry out, and doesn't break the natural balance of your skin. I dont think it removes make up as advertised, because it does not even remove eyeliner residuals. But I have been using for years for the said qualities.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: At first it was great and I loved the smell but I have really dry skin and this dried me out overtime. I also noticed I started breaking out but once I stopped using it, my skin went back to normal. I barely get breakouts so I knew it was the product. I give it two stars because it wasn't the worst thing in the world and felt clean at first (for like the first week or so) but it just wasn't for my skin in the long run.

reviews.review_title: Gentle cleanser but I was allergic
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very basic gentle cleanser. It does a good job at cleansing the skin without stripping or drying it out. I had a mild allergy to this cleanser, which caused itchiness. Due to this, I will not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been an avid Philosophy Purity cleanser user for years. I’ve recently switched to this cleanser, because I got it in a Boxycharm. This cleanser is bomb!  My skin feels so good after using this, I love how my skin feels and looks now. So glad Boxycharm sent this my way!

reviews.review_title: leaves your face soft & supple, not dry & tight
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My face is really dry and sensitive to cleansers. Ive tried a couple pricier ones and they always made my face feel so tight after so I went back to the Neutrogena one for sensitive skin. I Got this cleanser in the mini size using my reward points and fell in LOVE with this cleanser. My feels so smooth and supple and its so gentle I can use it to gently take my mascara off and does not sting my eyes at all. I had to buy the larger bottle. I cringe at the price but really like. Have been loving all of my fresh products I have boughten. Very good line. Every mini I have gotten from this line I have purchased the full size.

reviews.review_title: LOVE as a second cleanser for dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I will start off by saying, I do not use this product to remove makeup, so I can't say much for it's makeup-removing properties. I go in first with a cleansing oil/micellar water and use this cleanser as my 2nd cleanse. As a second cleanse, I love it! It is super gentle, and has this gel-like texture so you don't have to rub your face intensely to get the product spread around. It has a really lovely rose-cucumber scent as well, not too in your face but just enough for a nice experience. It does not leave my dry skin feeling stripped in any way after use. I loved the mini version so much I just purchased the full size. I'd recommend for anyone with dry skin looking for a gentle 2nd cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know why Sephora calls this product 'makeup removing face wash' when the bottle itself just says 'soy face cleanser'. The packaging description claims an extra-gentle gel cleanser that instantly whisks away everyday impurities and makeup... without stripping the skin of essential moisture.' It'll take off makeup as any cleanser would, but it's not especially targeted as a ~makeup remover~ would be. As a face cleanser, it does the trick beautifully, which I always expect from Fresh. It spreads well without foaming and skin feels refreshed afterward. It's a pleasant experience and a little goes a long way. However, when it comes to cleansers, I think you have to do a lot to justify this price -- and while it's a good product, I don't think it's worth paying extra from drugstore cleansers unless you have especially sensitive or acne-prone skin that responds well to it. So! 3-stars for delivering on the goods but not quite being worth the cost.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser, its removes my extra makeup and make my skin so soft. I am non stop buying and I love purchasing over and over again. ❤ highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I live for this face wash, any time I can get it in a jumbo size, I always go for it and never regret it. It takes off all of my makeup, even the stubborn ones, but doesn’t strip away the moisture from my face but at the same time cleans it. Very gentle on skin but tough on makeup and impurities. It has a light, almost cucumber scent. I used to suffer from eczema on my face, but this was able to calm my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: NO BS!!!!!!! SKINTYPE: DRY ACNE PRONE AGE: EARLY 20  Honestly at first I was so confused because it was just not lathering! But I kept using it cause it just smelled so good, and good thing I did because the more I used this cleanser the more I fell in love with it. This takes all my makeup off and leaves my face clean and refreshed. Absolute recommend it to ppl who have dry skin like mine. This is what a cleanser is supposed to be! Can be used both morning and night! (Ik this is a lil to hard on our wallet, YTTP cleanser is also as good as this cleanser and is a lot cheaper if you are looking for a cheaper option)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m trying very hard to like this product. The gentleness is great but it’s too gentle for my liking. I am not a heavy makeup wearer and I struggle to remove my makeup with this product, even my non-waterproof mascara. This might work better for someone who doesn’t mind having 2 different cleansing products in their routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My ultimate favorite cleanser to date. This cleanser really cleans the skin in the most gentle way. Skin is left feeling clean but not stripped with the perfect amount of moisture.  This cleanser really lives up to the brand name with such a fresh scent that I really love. On my 3rd bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot say enough good things about this cleanser! It is so gentle yet effective and great for sensitive skin- its the only one I use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this cleaner. I use to Valmont Fluid Falls, and ran out so needed a quick replacement, this product has been a saving find. It’s soft and cleans and does not irritate my skin, I LOVE it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I know this cleanser has a cult following but it was super drying on my skin. Just for reference I have oily skin and my favorite cleanser of all time is Kate Somerville goat milk cleanser.  I decided to give this a try because every influencer on YouTube was singing its praise and the thousands of positive comments here. I used this as a second cleanse in my double cleanse system.  It left my skin feeling dry and tight. After a few days of use my skin started to get itchy.  At first I thought the use of Retinol was causing the dryness so I took that out of my routine entirely and the dryness and itchiness continued.  I read thru the ingredients of this cleanser and I dont see anything I would be allergic to. I removed the cleanser out of my routine and my skin is back to normal.  This is just not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a higher end clean face wash when this was recommended to me as I was using Cetaphils face wash before this one. I just finished the bottle and I found nothing special about it, It is very gentle and did not cause any breakouts or irritation which is a great thing but when I wouldn’t use my oil based makeup remover first and I would go straight to this, it wouldn’t even remove HALF of my makeup. I always double cleanse but sometimes I would jump in the shower forgetting I was wearing a full face of makeup and this didn’t help remove it even the drug store brand removed makeup better than this one. Even on the days when I wore no makeup and only my sunscreen this wouldn’t clean my face as well I would’ve liked it to for the price. I’m not going back to cetaphil but I am not repurchasing this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser I have used hands down! It is so gentle on my face but really gets the makeup off too! It doesn’t strip my face of my natural oil but it does leave me with a clean feeling. The cleanser doesn’t make my skin feel dehydrated like some cleansers do. The smell is subtle and not overwhelming at all. Honestly I’m obsessed with the whole line!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite face wash ever (and I've tried many) it is very gentle, calming, but very effective in leaving the skin clean, fresh, and hydrated. It removes 90% of my make up after one wash. It is lightly scented, but I don't mind the smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I swear by this cleanser, already on bottle idk what!!!!! This cleared my acne and takes off my makeup so well! even mascara!!! definitely recommend this to anyone who wants a nice cleanse yet isn’t stripping your natural oils!! Best purchase ever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love that it’s gentle, it doesn’t smell horrible,it cleans my oily t zone skin bus it doesn’t leave my skin dry. My skin doesn’t feel overly stripped. I think it’s a very good product because it’s hard to find the balance that this cleanser provides. Most cleansers make my skin feel dry or not cleaned but this makes my skin feel hydrated clean and smooth

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this face wash for quite a few years. I have tried going off of and trying others but none truly compare. I have combination skin but mainly can be very oily. I also suffer from a hyperpigmentation that leave me with dark spots ALWAYS (sigh). This is the only face wash I have used that has made my skin be so healthy and heal the dark spots from acne decently fast. I use this with the lotus preserve face cream and let me tell you my skin never looks so good. I’ve struggled with dark spots for over 10 years and for the first time in a long time I feel normal again! I’ve tried everything even prescribed topical gels, washes from my dermatologist and they do not do a thing. Try it you might like it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great and I have noticed my skin getting smoother and clearer since using it! However, I have super sensitive skin and I find that this cleanser can sometimes irritate the skin around my eyes (I think because of the makeup remover aspect of it). Planning to switch to the soy milk cleanser to see if that one is slightly more gentle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: BEST CLEANSER FOR SENSITIVE SKIN!!! My face is extremely picky to whatever cleanser or moisturizer I put on it. I have tried everything from really cheap to pricy, and this one is the ONLY ONE that doesn’t break me out. Love this so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser effectively washes dirt and makeup from my face and I love how it glides on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Does what it is supposed to. Does not irritate my sensitive and acne prone skin. Not the most exciting or fun product I’ve ever used but also doesn’t cause me any problems!

reviews.review_title: overhyped, doesnt work on all skin types
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin type: dry+combo This is a beloved product for a lot people, but it didn't do anything for me. Felt skin was dry after using this but not in a good way and still felt not everything was washed off. Drug store brand cetaphil in comparison was way better than this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Probably one of the BEST face washes I’ve ever used, I have very dry and sensitive skin, I breakout really easily if something irritates my skin but after trying the Soy Face Cleanser, my skin literally glows, it doesn’t strip my skin of its natural moistures so it doesn’t dry it out. I seriously recommend this product. (I always wait for the limited edition versions to come out because they last the longest)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I work in healthcare and my face has been so extremely dry and irritated from wearing a face mask my entire shifts. I finally caved and bought this face wash in the jumbo size after trying a few samples of this and LET ME TELL YOU THE HYPE IS REAL! This face wash is one of the very few face washes that doesn’t strip my skin and actually removes all my makeup! I usually use an eye makeup remover for my mascara and then go in with this for the rest of my face and it works beautifully! I’m so glad they rereleased the jumbo size, they should keep it around! I’ve already bought a backup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loveeeeee this face wash !! It removes alllll my make up including mascara without burning my eyes. It does not have a scent and It doesn’t leave my face dry after. Girls get yourself this face wash!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A+ left my confused skin soothed and clean hands down a beauty mvp no cleanser out there compared to this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great cleanser, it is gentle to the skin and helps remove your makeup easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my FAVOURITE cleanser of all time. I take it everywhere with me because it does it all- take off makeup, clean your pores, smells lovely, and doesn't irritate my skin. 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great if you need something to take off your makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser removes my makeup even better than miceller waters. To remove my makeup I used to clean my face with cleansing oils and then wash my face with a face wash. still used to have some traces of my black eyeliner under my eyes. for eyes I had to use a separate makeup remover or micellar water. This cleanser has combined all these steps in one. After washing my face just with this cleanser, my face is squeaky clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a God send! I love how gentle and non drying it is. It cleans off makeup no problem while also leaving that nice clean feeling. It’s very balancing to the skin and I have zero complaints!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A MUST TRY!! I started using this product April of 2018. And now my whole family is using it. It doesn't give you a dry feeling after washing your face and doesn't irritate my eyes even if I scrub it on my eyelashes. I always buy 10pcs of this everytime there's 20% off. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I find my skin to be usually quite sensitive to a lot of cleansers, but I've had no issues with this one. Leaves my skin feeling fresh and bright.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the texture of the product. Unlike certain face wash, it keeps the skin hydrated but firm. I have a sensitive skin and this product doesn’t burn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is amazing. I have cystic acne and very sensitive skin. Sometimes it’s oily, sometimes it’s so dry. This takes care of my unpredictable skin and calms every irritation I may have. It gives me an amazing clean and the smell is amazing. It’s a cucumber smell. It’s very light and fresh. Love this cleanser so much. It’ll stay in my beauty routine as long as I can get my hands on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hate the smell of this cleanser. skin feels sooo sticky even after multiple washes. hate everything about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this face wash! Removes all of my makeup and leaves my skin feeling super clean! Highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this face wash but doesn’t form up the way I like my face washes to do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have acne prone sensitive skin and I crave this when I feel like a pimple or breakout is coming.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t say enough good things about this face wash... so so gentle, removes all makeup, and does not dry out your skin! I always find when I don’t use this face wash that’s when my skin does break out.. I’ll never switch it up again!

reviews.review_title: Pleasant and Gentle on the Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I truly love this facial cleanser. It has a very light, pleasant fresh sweet scent of apricot or some sort of fresh fruit. It cleans the skin without dryness, tightness or leaving it completely stripped. I received a generous sample and came back to purchase a full size today after a week of use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive dry skin this does not dry me out nor make me brake out. Removes makeup and yet so gentle cleanse well and don’t strip out my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This leaves my face feeling clean and does not dry it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very satisfied, this formula works for my skin type as does the seaweed youth preserve mask. I use in conjunction with the rose hydration mask when my skin is feeling a little on the dry side.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best face wash ever! So gentle and refreshing. Takes off some makeup and doesn’t dry my skin out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the ONLY cleanser I will use. I have extremely sensitive skin and until now have never found a cleanser that did not either strip my skin and cause excess oiliness or break me out. This is super gentle and a little goes a long way. Not sure about using this to remove makeup, as I usually just use my makeup eraser first, but just as a cleanser this is great! Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my holy grail cleanser, I love it so much. It cleans my  skin, without stripping it of moisture, is fragrance free, and is the perfect ph balance of 5.5. This cleanser has a gel like formula and is super gentle. I would definitely recommend it, especially if you have dry, sensitive skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this once and it was fine. I decided to try it again and this is how it went... Initially, this was fine but after a couple of weeks I started noticing that my skin was drying and breaking out. Now, I get the occasional pimple right before my period, but acne has never really been a problem for me. So I was a bit alarmed. For a little bit of background info, I was only using this cleanser, a moisturizer and eye cream. When I changed cleansers, my skin started going back to normal. It could be that since I stopped wearing makeup, the cleanser was harsher on my skin, but who knows. I just won’t be repurchasing since I have used other cleansers that agree with my skin regardless of makeup use. It sucks this did not work for me! I can see it has worked for a lot others, womp.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was super excited to get this cleanser as I’ve heard amazing things about it, but sad to say it didn’t work for me. Noticed a warming sensation while cleansing and and my skin was quite red and irritated for a few minutes after rinsing away. Wouldn’t even say I have sensitive skin so it took me by surprise considering this is recommended for sensitive skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I gave this face wash 4 stars only because it doesn’t completely remove mascara (not waterproof, just regular).  I love the fresh-cut cucumber smell and the feel that’s left on my face after rinsing...smooth, not tight or pulling. I just have to go behind this cleanser with my Burt’s Bees Micellar facial towelette and clean the mascara off, not a big deal really.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is not exciting per se, but it seriously gets the job done. It leaves my skin feeling super clean and fresh, without any drying. It also removes makeup gently and thoroughly. I seriously love it. My sole criticism would be that the cucumber scent is pretty strong, but that won’t prevent me from repurchasing again and again. It’s the best cleanser I’ve ever used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was first introduced to this product in a sample size.  But I continue to purchase it because it really is a great cleanser and smells so refreshing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great on my skin. I have a little bit of oily skin, and this works really good. I am not sure I can say it is the best. It doesn't take off the make up remains after a make up remover, but definitely does not break out my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can hear my face screaming “THANK YOU!”  After cleaning with this face was my skin feels fresh and smooth and brand new!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: delicious facial cleanser, easy to handle and remove!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: favourite cleanser! never overdries. feels so good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I switched to the Fresh Soy Cleanser about 22 months ago and have never looked back. Combined with retinol and glycolic acid treatments, this gentle face wash has helped turn around my chronic adult acne. It leaves my skin feeling clean and balanced and not at all dry, and I love that it is safe to use on eye makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely loved the face wash. It does not dry my skin after the wash. It is very soft and supple on my skin and has a very faint rose fragrance. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am on my second bottle- I love this stuff. My skin is very communicative in which, if it doesn’t like something, it’ll either break out, become irritated, or very dry. This product maintains the natural oils of my skin after washing and still is very effective at cleaning my skin.  You don’t need a lot for it to be effective, I literally squeeze out as much product that will cover the size of a nickel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best cleanser for my sensitive acne-prone skin. Isn’t harsh but feels clean afterwards.

reviews.review_title: Best for everyday use on combo skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this gentle cleanser (even my husband uses it and he has oily skin) A little goes a long way, all you need is a pea size amount and lather with water. I love how my skin feels immediately after I use it. I hate it when I use face wash and my skin gets flakey/dry.

reviews.review_title: Good but looked for other options!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a sample and was amazed by the softness of my skin after the first use but once I bought the full sized bottle I realized I didn’t love it as much long term.  It didn’t cause any issues for my skin but didn’t have many benefits either.  I know cleanser doesn’t typically offer too many benefits compared to other skin care steps! It required a double cleanse for me to feel that clean feeling even starting with a micellar water to remove makeup.  It’s good but quite pricey and a $50 face cleanser should be great! Although I wasn’t disappointed I looked for another option once my bottle was empty! I gave it 4 stars because it was good but not a holy grail product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely sensitive skin and most cleansers do not work for me (I have tried so many!). This one is my mainstay; I have been using it for probably 3 years and it is gentle, not too drying, and never causes breakouts. Highly recommend if you have super sensitive skin!

reviews.review_title: buy mini size if you want but not worth the hype
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used to love fresh products but personally not a fan of this one. I bought a big bottle and now have the whole over half wasted sitting in my bathroom. I think it’s important to point out the 6 month use by date. So if you have a big bottle you better be prepared to use it as your main cleanser multiple times a day. However I just don’t think it works as a primary cleanser especially for anyone with problematic skin. It really does the bare minimum, the skin never feels very clean after using this product, it has the same feeling as just washing with plain water well. Wish it was better honestly but def not worth the hype it is getting at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin

This is also a great cleanser for those with rosacea, based on a few that I know that have used this product. Don't forget to combine this with another cleanser for a double cleanse system #skincarebyhyram

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an EXCELLENT cleanser if you have sensitive skin. I’m surprised that is doesn’t have the “clean beauty” seal because most non “clean” cleansers burn my skin, and dry it out faster than I can apply toner. HOWEVER I think their description is a bit misleading... this will NOT remove a full face of makeup (at least not without rinsing and repeating a few times) especially waterproof makeup. But come on it’s 2020 let’s get some makeup remover and do the double cleanse! Also this will NOT sufficiently tone your skin (depending on your skin type). This cleanser is not drying by any means, but if you’re a little on the drier side, and you just skip your toner thinking that this is really a 3-in-1 product, your face will be uncomfortable. Again, this is an excellent CLEANSER, I’m just taking off one star because the majority of complaints come from people whose expectations were a little off due to the “3-in-1” description.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got a bottle of this in my boxycharm and have been hooked since. I suffer from cystic hormonal acne  and very oily skin. This maintains it in conjunction with other products. I recommend this cleanser if you use other harsher products like aha, bha,  and retinol. This is cleanser is mild, yet effective. You have to maintain a balance for your skin and this is perfect if you use other acne and aging products. My skin has never looked better. I would highly recommend is you want a clean face without all of the harsh abrasives.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Going on my 3rd purchase, it has become a staple in my skin care routine . This cleanser has made my skin balanced, and more supple. It smalls amazing!!! The packaging is visually appealing and easy to use, my skin feels so clean and good after using this. I have oily to combo skin with texture and uneven skin, using this product has done my skin soo so good, it visibly looks way better than it did before I started using this product! I highly recommend to everyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample in a subscription box and was thrilled to find a gentle cleanser that did not dry my face out. It smells amazing also, like fresh slices of cucumber. A little goes a long way I can see this lasting a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this face wash  in my play box. I used it for almost 2 weeks and it broke me out. I have combination acne prone skin and it made it worse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For years I was an avid Kiehls customer until I received a sample of this and read that it’s safe to use on the eyes. After that it was all history, I have been using this cleanser religiously for the last 4/5 years and even got my step-dad into it! Once I made the switch my skin has consistently stayed clear aside from when stressed, but even that isn’t nearly as bad as it used to be! So happy the jumbo size is back, will most definitely be stocking up on it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect face wash- I’m probably on my 5th purchase. It is refreshing with a pleasant clean scent. I have sensitive skin and this wash fully cleanses my skin without irritating. Feel fresh without feeling dried out after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Will not remove make up, but its fantastic to use on a daily. So gentle but really does clean quite well. Not a deep cleanse but very good at maintaining clean skin. Also amazing at calming my skin when it's irritated or red, especially when I have breakouts. This calms them really well. Its my favorite cleanser I've ever tried because I can depend on it and it never ever messes my skin up. Highly recommend as a basis, daily cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this face wash. I received it as a trial and I have been wanting more even since. The smell is a cucumber fresh smell, perfect for the brand's name. It melts away makeup and doesn't feel like a regular face wash, it's much better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really does remove the makeup (i don't wear foundation tho) and the smell is soft and clean. Love it !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this, smells so good I have large pores and some blackheads and I had tried other brands clinique even natural cleansers but nothing,I got this as a sample on itsy and I was hooked.makes my face feel fresh . Also it makes my face very clean and fresh.

reviews.review_title: It's ok if you can get past the smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, I love Fresh Beauty. They have the best products. This one is up there with my faves until you get to the smell. I absolutely love how lightweight an moisturizing this face wash is. You can rub it right over your hard-to-remove eye makeup and stubborn liquid lipstick, and it comes right off. It doesn't leave your skin dry at all. I just can't give it 5 stars because I don't like the smell. I can't describe it. It's just weird and not so pleasant. Other than that, I like it. I don't love it.

reviews.review_title: Nice, gentle cleanser for sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my everyday cleanser for the past year now. It is on the pricier side, but I really like it so far. It has a very light and fresh smell. It is a very gentle but effective cleanser. I have EXTREMELY sensitive skin that is prone to rashes when trying new skincare products but I've had no issues with the Soy Face Cleanser.

reviews.review_title: This is not a makeup removing cleanser
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very very gentle cleanser, there are cheaper options that do the same thing. and this will not remove your makeup as the name claims

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: it is a great product. it is very gentle and works really well to remove makeup including mascara. it leaves your face feeling fresh and clean and doesn’t strip your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Doesn’t leave skin dry after washing. Great for removing makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Suuuch a great face cleanser!! Definitely my favorite. It leaves my face feeling so clean, soft, smooth and hydrated! I’m in love

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Have been using this cleanser for over a year now. A great cleanser that cleanse and doesn't strip my skin of its natural moisture. Great for all skin types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve never tried anything like this before. I typically have issues with finding cleansers that give my skin a happy medium. I find a lot of them for oily/ combination skin are too stripping and make my face feel super tight and dehydrated. I also want it to feel like it’s removing any cleansing oil or residue makeup. This product doesn’t irritate my acne-prone skin at all and does an amazing job at making your face feel clean but not stripped/tight. It has a slimy consistency (not as weird as it sounds) which turns into a gentle lather and a subtle fresh cucumber scent (not overwhelming). I know it’s a bit pricy but it’s worth it. A little goes a long way and I find I can get about 2 months worth out of the full size when washing twice daily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s okay, doesn’t remove makeup or mascara area at all, it’s so gentle it literally feels like nothing is in your hand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this face wash, it gets everything off of my face, the only downfall is that it dries my skin out, I moistures so it doesn't really matter to me but if I take too long to moisturize after use my skin starts to get a wee bit oily to makeup for it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVED this product. Made my face so smooth and it was very gentle on the skin. Most Fresh products are extremely gentle and amazing on the skin though ^_^

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A beauty blogger by the name of Amy Chang (IG: Bondenavant) recommended this product on one of her Tik Tok videos. As a clueless 39yr old entering new territory with aging skin, I get so overwhelmed with what's best for my skin and it's issues. I'm constantly faced with pretty packaging (like Tatcha products) and have fallen victim to over-hyped products. Amy educated me with this one. It cleans my face without stripping it. I suffer from dry skin and severe eczema. After washing with this cleanser, my skin didn't feel as tight as it usually does.   I'm also wondering if my skin issues were triggered by makeup and sunscreens not effectively washed off, leaving bits of residue BEFORE this product.   Very happy with this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My all time favorite cleanser! This is the holy grail of them all. I’ve tried high end, drug store cleansers and this is what takes the cake. I was gifted this cleanser for Christmas and it was the Travel size and I just ran out last week. I use it about 5 days a week because it does get hard using it 7 days due to laziness lol. Little does go a long way! I purchased one myself and just waiting for it to get here so I can start my routine again with this one. I’m using st Ives cleanser for one but doesn’t come close to this one.

reviews.review_title: It works well with my skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive skin, usually on the dry side (sans nose and forehead). I also tend to have eczema and dry patches on my face, so I always hesitate to try new products. I picked this cleanser up about 6 months ago, and I don’t think I can go back any other cleanser!! My favourite part of this cleanser is you can use it on your eyes - important to me because a facial cleanser should be used on your eyes too (are your eyes not part of your face??). If a face wash has chemicals that sting the eye, that concerns me, but this removes everything without making my skin uncomfortable! There is a light cucumber scent and the feeling after rinsing it off feels like my skin is already toned and prepped for moisturizer. I highly recommend this as it worked great for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: All in on this cleanser. It is gently and effective -period. Makeup.gone....  Skin moisture retained .done Comparison. None  It is expensive . Cry but buy anyway .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is very unique (at least to me) I had never tried anything like this until I got this. It smells weird but not in a bad way, Its like fresh cucumbers. It cool and relaxing on the skin. It glides on the skin, kind of like a liquid slime (I know it sounds funny but it feels amazing.) It cleans your skin and leaves it soft. You feel refreshed after using it. It affordable and lasts a long time. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Completely and totally fantastic product. I’ve been using this product since end of 2019 and have noticed a huge change in how soft and radiant my skin looks/feels. I also have extremely sensitive skin and I have never had any issues with this wash!  this product also never makes my skin feel dry as some face washes do It really does remove make up too,I no longer need to use “make up remover wipes”! I would highly recommend this product. It may seem a tad expensive but I believe it is worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive skin. This facial wash is gentle and hydrating and does not irritate or make my skin dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this face wash! I was previously using the Peekee bar from Drunk Elephant and I found it was leaving my skin super soft, but suuuper dry. This wash was a game changer as a second cleanse and hasn’t made my sensitive skin angry.  Only downside is that it can’t remove my non-water resistant mascara, but thats what an oil cleanse is for!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this in the morning and at night, and it keeps my skin clean and beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this is one of the best gentle cleansers that i’ve ever used on my skin. leaves it feeling so soft without stripping my face of its natural oils.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The best cleanser ive ever used!  Super gentle and refreshing.

reviews.review_title: The BEST gentle cleanser out there!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser, I used to use the glossier milky jelly cleanser and decided to switch to this one. It was the best decision ever, super gentle and great at removing minimal makeup (if you use a full face of makeup, it may not be the best at removing it all). It has kind of a cucumber smell, but its very minimal. Would recommend for anyone looking for a simple basic cleanser, that won't irritate or strip your face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think I found my forever product. My sensitive/PCOS skin loves this stuff - very gentle, yet it cleanses thoroughly.

reviews.review_title: Decent but don’t like the smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser does what it says: cleans my face without irritating my skin. It’s gentle but still foams up very well so my face feels clean after use.   However, I couldn’t stand the smell at all. I don’t know where the scent comes from but it was absolutely horrible. If you’re sensitive to smells as I am I would not recommend this at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First time trying it and it definitely gave me a cleaner complexion after the first use. Usually id purchase target exfoliators and they hardly ever gave me the result this product did. So glad I purchased!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I try a lot of cleansers since my skin is very picky and this one is one that went well in my condition. One thing that I love that is almost no fragrance and a little dot do the entire face and neck area and does not irritate. I love use it n the shower so I remove everything. Least a lot, I have the travel size and use it everyday and for over 2 months. Worth the hype.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
