reviews.review_text: Hands down best cleanser if you can reason with the price tag. Takes off makeup like a dream and leaves your skin feeling so soft, never dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t have enough good things to say about this cleanser. It feels amazing and soothing upon application, removes all of my makeup, and makes my skin feels so soft, supple, and refreshed after I wash it off. It feels like my skin can BREATHE! It has also definitely helped clear and keep away blackheads, which was a nice surprise, and has helped tone down the redness on my face, evening out my skin tone a bit more and helping me to feel more confident sans makeup. Plus, no breakouts!! If anything, it’s helped keep them more at bay. I let my fiancé try this, and he’s been starting to snag it in the mornings now! And he never does anything skincare wise! This is seriously sent from heaven, please don’t ever change <3

reviews.review_title: Please trust me it’s worth it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my first review of something EVER. If you are THINKING about getting this. JUST GET IT. try the mini version if you’re apprehensive. It is so worth it! TRUST ME.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty sure this is the first review I have ever written about anything. This cleanser is AMAZING. I had a full face on including false lashes. After I took my lashes off there was still lash residue. I wet my face like it said, over my makeup even though it felt weird and wrong, then took 2 pea sized amounts rubbed it together in my hand and then rubbed it on my face. It took almost all of my makeup off. I washed my face one more time with another 2 pea sized amounts, and it got all of my makeup off, including the lash glue residue and waterproof mascara I was wearing. My face feels smooth and fresh after washing my face. It's only been a week since I bought this and I don't regret it at all. Seriously best face cleanser ever! Highly recommend!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love it. Makeup and any imperfections is gone very quickly. I like it how my skin feels after wash - fresh and young.

reviews.review_title: Definitely one of the best cleansers out there!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: VERY Gentle Not to stripping for someone with dry skin, love the scent and really does remove all your make-up!  Great cleanser to use as my 2nd cleanse on the days I wear makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite face cleanser! It takes my makeup off super good & is good for dry skin. I have super dry skin and my face never feels tight or dehydrated after using this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell - one of my favorite face washes. The mini size is my favorite to keep in my bag for travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been sitting on this cleanser for a long time. And recently needed something to give my face a good clean, while being eyelash extension friendly. So I pulled it out and gave it shot. Absolutely love it. Went and bought a full-size bottle. It makes your skin so soft and feel so clean with out stripping it. My skin is super happy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am using my second mini and I own 2 full size as back up! One of my favorite cleansers! It has a faint smell, nothing too bothersome. I use this as a cleanser, not just as a makeup remover. Feels nice on the skin.

reviews.review_title: This got my boyfriend to start washing his face
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have loved this face wash for a long time, and I would highly recommend it. My boyfriend, who has struggled with acne a lot, tried it and immediately loved it too! It has made both of our skin so even and bright, and it feels/smells amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wish it would have worked for me, yes I does remove makeup without a problem. However, my skin  felt dry and stripped and is simply too sensitive to use this product in my regular routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yes! Love it! Smells lightly of cucumbers. Removes make up and makes skin feel clean without feeling stripped. I struggle with hormonal acne and I often get scars. But I find this has really improved my overall skin tone. It makes my skin feel happy :) Only cleanser I've ever repurchased (I'm on my 3rd bottle)... The 5.1oz lasts 3 months on average for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will never buy another makeup remover, this one is amazing! I still use another cleanser after, but this removes all traces of makeup, even stubborn eyeliner and mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To be honest, I didn’t like this product a few years ago because I was so used to using other facial cleansers to get that “squeaky clean” feel (not realizing how bad it was harsh on my skin). I started using Fresh’s face wash since it was gifted to me in a set and it changed my life! I love the smell and it is gentle and great for sensitive skin.. You won’t be disappointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is officially my holy grail face wash! I bought it because it was a trendy product and I thought it would be nice to try it and I was blown away. It clears my acne and makes my skin so soft. You can definitely tell the difference of when I’m using it and when I’m not. Even though it’s pretty expensive, I’ll never use another face wash again!

reviews.review_title: Not bad, not great, and sorta on the fence
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve bought this cleanser twice in my lifetime. First time I thought it was super nice because I was looking for a gentle cleanser with a low PH. Smells nice and it’s gentle for sure but sometimes I wondered if it really took my makeup off completely even if I used a makeup wipe prior. More than often, I ended up squeezing way to much product out and ran out in couple months. I eventually forgot about it and my concerns, bought the cleanser AGAIN thinking I’d give it a shot. To me it’s not the best because I don’t find it very effective in terms of makeup removal, bang for the buck, and consistency is a little too jelly like for me. I still think it’s a descent cleanser tho with quality ingredients and would recommend you give it a shot.

reviews.review_title: I will never wash my face with anything else!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this face wash since early November 2019 and it’s been 3ish months and I’m absolutely in love with this! I was at Sephora for a facial skin care session, and when I told the aesthetician at the end of our visit that I was using a neutrogena face wash she cringed lol. I told her I tried first aid’s face wash but didn’t get a lather and was disappointed she went and grabbed a tube of this and but a dab on my hand with water. I couldn’t believe how soft it made my skin.   Fast forward to the present: I keep a tube in the shower and one by the sink. My husband who suffered from terrible cystic acne as a teen and occasionally as an adult has been using this and last month I noticed his acne scars didn’t look as pronounced as they used to and that his skin was so soft and clear! He loves it, I love it and I hate that I didn’t find this sooner!   It has a light cucumber smell, comes out clear and isn’t a very sudsy lather but I definitely can tell it’s getting my face clean and as soon as I rinse my skin is super soft!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in Boxycharm and it’s a nice daily cleanser. I do feel like the formula is gentle but it is pricey for what it is. You do get a lot of product which could explain the price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite cleanser of all time. It’s everything a cleanser should be - highly effective at removing makeup (you might need to wash twice if you’re wearing a lot of makeup, but that’s a best practice with any cleanser), scentless, and gentle (you can open your eyes in the middle of washing your face with this and it won’t sting). It leaves skin brighter and makes a noticeable difference if I have any breakouts. I’ve tried many, many, many high end cleansers, and this takes the cake. Recommended to many friends who love it now too.

reviews.review_title: Not bad but its definitely not the best either
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 1-I don’t think it’s bad, it actually does a pretty good job at cleansing but I feel that it leaves my face feeling a little tight. Also if you happen to currently have irritated skin or super dry skin with flakiness, This is NOT for you.    - Also..my skin it’s not dry nor super sensitive and when using this for some reason it makes my face feel super hot it was super strange but I didn’t pay much attention to that and kept using it also didn’t break me out so...I guess It does a pretty good job at cleansing I’ll gave them that. It been almost a month since using btw. -Aside from that currently my skin is a little irritated because I got too excited with some products and over exfoliating and when I wash my face  with this IT BURNS SO BAD I cannot spend more than 15 seconds with it on, it also made my skin super dry and and it just made my skin feel worse..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the face wash! It’s very pleasant and soothing. Loses one star because it doesn’t remove make up well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I did not experience any added hydration to my skin and I did not notice any improvement in my skin texture. I did use this before I read the ingredients. I just do not think a quality brand needs to add PEGS or EDTA etc. to their skin care.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been struggling to find a face wash that doesn’t strip my skin and leave me with pimples everywhere. I’ve tried anything and everything and most recently used Dermalogica products that left me with a rash from contact dermatitis. This is the first face wash I’ve found that when used with my pre cleansing balm, actually cleans my face and keeps acne away. I am so impressed by Fresh. I have only been using it for a couple weeks but I love the results I'm seeing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Why is this so expensive? it's an okay face wash in that it has no smell and it leaves my skin feeling semi clean. however, it definitely does not live up to it's own claims and is in no way justified to be the price that it is. as far as claiming to take off makeup LOL no, it doesnt do this. every time I wash my face I still get a ton of product and dirt left behind that my toner is able to finally fully remove. sometimes my pores look clean after using this and sometimes they dont, so not a consistent performer by any means. it definitely did zero for my combination skin-my skin was still just as dry and just as oily in the same respective areas after using an entire full size bottle of this product day and night as they were before I used it at all. not impressed overall. I'm glad I didnt pay for the full size I used (thanks boxycharm) save your cash, this isnt worth the hype or price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive combination skin that’s acne prone and problematic. I’ve had such a hard time finding a face wash that it liked and then I received this one from Boxy Charm. I have to say it’s a huge game changer. My skin doesn’t feel stripped and dry at all. My face is left feeling moisturized, clean and soft. It keeps my acne at bay and I’ve noticed that a lot of the inflammation in my cheeks has calmed. Some people don’t like the scent but honestly to me it smells like fresh cucumbers so I find it refreshing. I’ll never use another face wash ever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: gel like with nice cucumber smell, gentle on the skin and wash off with minimal residue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I haven’t had much success with this removing my make up. It’s really gentle though for regular use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not too pleased with how this product reacted with my sensitive skin. I gave it a few chances as not to place the blame of the redness and irritation too hastily. However for each use the reaction because even more painful so I ditched it immediately after this realization.
This is good if you like really gentle cleansers. I prefer something that I can feel on my skin more. But it’s good if you need gentle and light

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face wash, it makes me feel fresh, morning of afternon, recommend to anybdy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the gentlest facial cleanser that seriously works. I wash my face STRICTLY with this make up removing wash and every bit of my makeup comes off. It also doesn’t strip my skin of moisture, and you only need a small amount. The smell is fresh and pleasant, and after trying many cleansers and makeup removers, I’ve just committed to this one as my holy grail

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite cleanser that I’ve repurchased over and over. I’ve tried others but always come back to this one! I have dry sensitive skin and this cleanses so well without leaving my face feeling tight and dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a cleanser, this product does what it's supposed to, however I'm not fond of the scent. The consistency is a lot like shampoo, and I don't really like that either. It did not affect my sensitive skin, which is a win.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample, and my face broke out along the jawline after two days, which never happens. It cleared up after I stopped using it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and this is amazing! Leaves my skin feeling clean and not dry

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and this is amazing! Leaves my skin feeling clean and not dry

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My boyfriend and I love this face wash. He has sensitive/combination skin and pretty much anything can either break him out or dehydrate his skin. This does such a great job for him that he buys it at sephora without me. On my end, does a great job cleansing (I double cleanse though, esp when waterproof mascara is MOTD) and rehydrating my skin. It’s very gentle and the pH is compatible with your eye’s pH so it’s not as irritating when a bit gets in it. This was a big plus for me because my eyes got really sensitive after my eye surgery. Overall, love this face wash. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is just 'alright'. It does not take off all of my makeup no matter how many times I use it on my face. I wear regular mascara (Benefit Rollerlash) and Estee Lauder Double-wear Foundation. Neither is fully removed and my towels are consistently getting wrecked because of it. Not impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Don’t get it. This feels slimy and doesn’t get my face anywhere near clean. It is my least favorite cleanser and I have purchased many from Sephora. It goes unused.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser. If you want a cleanser that deep cleans but doesn’t leave your skin feeling tight and dry, this is the one! And I kid you not, it’s so gently that it doesn’t even burn my eyes; I literally stood there after I accidentally got it in my eyes because I was so shocked I didn’t feel anything (Ofcourse, you should still flush your eyes of this does happen but I just had to gush about it)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this. I use a balm or oil cleanser first, them follow with this. It smells clean almost like cucumbers and leaves my skin glowing- squeaky clean but not tight. Only 4 stars because without the balm step, it would not completely take all of my makeup off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used and repurchased this product since 2016 and as it claims - I did find this product to be an amazing gentle cleanser that (slightly but barely) toned my skin and left it feeling hydrated and plump. I mainly continued to use this product because I found that it didn't cause any breakouts - BUT it never controlled any breakouts either. It simply just helped to clean the surface of my skin without any irritation. It's so gentle that it was even the perfect cleanser for my eyelash extensions without interfering with the retention of the glue.   Moving forward from today, I will no longer be using this product in my everyday skin care regime. I've had skin concerns like acne scarring and hyperpigmentation for a long time and have FINALLY decided to move on from this product as it no longer fits my skin care needs (or my college student budget).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you can get past the smell you’ll be alright. I have really dry sensitive skin, and this cleanser broke me out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. It smells sooooo good. Reminds me of cucumbers and melons. Cleans off my Estée Lauder long wear mascara and everything else too. It is expensive, but it’s one of the only cleansers that can clean but not leave oily residue in my eye balls, which drives me nuts when that happens. This is my HG cleanser for life.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite face wash. Every time I switch I regret it and always come back to it. My favorite brand of products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the smell is eh but it cleans off my skin pretty well. my face is still hydrated after using it too which is a plus

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great mild cleanser for any type of skin! I just recently started using this cleanser as my daily go to. So far, it does what it says. I’m a swim instructor, so the pool can be drying on my skin, but this makes my face feels clean and soft after use. I’m giving it four stars as I find that there is a bit of mascara left on my lashes and a bit smudges down onto my under-eyes. Overall, a good product that I’ll invest in again! I would recommend it to my friends who’s looking for a new cleanser to try out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really just an okay face wash that smells really gross.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 100% my favourite cleanser. My combination skin just loves this cleanser.  It smells like cucumbers and is my go to face wash. I am a big fan of double cleansing but you can use this on dry skin to gry rid of more makeup. I like it best on damp skin. It is very gentle and I highly recommend it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect cleanser when your skin is feeling dry. It smells like watermelon to me. And it leaves you feeling so refreshed. I don’t use it to remove a full face of makeup. Use your regular makeup remover for that. But this will take off anything your remover didn’t. Even great on days you weren’t wearing makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A nice, gentle cleaner but absolutely DOES NOT remove makeup

reviews.review_title: Very Hydrating and smells like cucumber
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this as a sample and I love everything about it! The texture is similar to aloe burn gel. The scent is just like freshly cut cucumbers! It feels very hydrating and soothed my skin after it was dried out from the wrong foundation. I used it after I had taken off my makeup with the makeup eraser and wanted to hydrate my skin and clean it at the same time. The sample I had was probably enough for 2 or 3 uses. I have a swollen face at the moment after having my wisdom teeth pulled so when I say it soothes it truly does! and I only needed about a blueberry size worth. I'm excited to recieve the full size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: really nice cleanser. doesnt dry out my skin and makes it feel so good. great prep for all my other Fresh products! got in my play subscription box

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is great for sensitive skin, helped have less breakout and leaves face feeling smooth and clean. This also remove makeup and you get a lot of product for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing scent and it makes your skin so soft and clean. I just love how my skin feels afterwards and how it gets rid of my makeup residue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product honestly dried my skin out to the point where it was peeling and flaking. My skin felt rough to the touch. I broke down my whole skin care routine to figure out the reason for the dryness that just wouldn’t quit. I never even thought to look at the “gentle” “mild” “hydrating” cleanser! I even blamed the cold weather. As a last resort I switched to Kate Somerville cleanser ... in a day my skin felt back to life ! My skin is hydrated and soft to the touch!! Never ever again ! I’m done with the entire FRESH line !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a free sample because I’ve been wanting to try it. I’ve only used it twice now but my face feels very clean and not dried out after using. I would prefer if it was really foaming but it gets the job done. The only reason I’m not giving it 5 stars is because I really don’t enjoy the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It made me break out. I was so excited to use this because of the good reviews it has. It made my face feel cleaner but I wish it didn't break me out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product! Removed all of my make up and left my skin clean!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don't like this product at call. My face doesn't feel clean and the smell is artificial. Don't be tricked by advertisements...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm obsessed with this cleanser! I got the mini size for traveling without makeup remover and it's perfect. The only cleaner gentle enough to use on my eyes but still washes off even the most difficult of waterproof eyeliner and masacara. Leaves my skin feeling soft and clean but never dried out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is eh. I can’t explain it. It doesn’t smell great but it doesn’t smell bad. Like a weird candy almost. The cleanser does what it needs to, but it’s nothing magical.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed using this, it was gentle, but it does have a cucumber smell which could bother some people. It says it removes makeup which I never do with a cleanser (I wipe my makeup off with makeup wipes then use micellar water  before using a cleanser) so I can’t comment about how effective it is with removing makeup but I probably wouldn’t trust this cleaner to remove your makeup.  It does froth up a bit which I enjoy and it doesn’t irritate my skin at all. I would buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s my first review and I normally don’t write reviews. But! This product was recommended to me by a beauty advisor at Sephora. Recently, I started using retinol and wanted to try a new face cleanser because my was drying my skin even more after using retinol. I don’t understand how this product can have such a high rating. Before using it, I decided to read the list of the ingredients and several of them are carcinogenic or may be carcinogenic (Phenoxyethanol, Polysorbate 20, Disodium EDTA, ...). I don’t how good of a skin product it is as I haven’t even used it, but based on the list of the ingredients it is not a safe beauty product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought it due to the reviews and because my shiseido ibuki facewash was too stripping. It is indeed gentle but slips around and doesn't take off eye makeup. Even with double cleansing, it failed to remove the oil from my oil cleanser. So it's completely useless for me... would be as effective washing with warm water alone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this cleanser but it really did nothing for me. I noticed it dried me out in some areas of my face and my skin would peel. The texture is nice and it smells clean but this was a no go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Originally got a sample size, then ordered the mini. I use it as my first cleanse at night (also have the strawberry exfoliating wash for the mornings) and find that 2 pea sized squeezes lather up really well. Any makeup traces left from wipes are definitely gone with this product. Just the right setup for my 2nd cleanse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best cleanser I have ever used. I love that I can use it to remove my eye makeup as well. Every other cleanser has irritated my eyes and made them water up. But I have no problems with this one. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of I have normal skin and where I live is cold . This is my second time I bought the mini one to use. Every time I use it, it dries out my skin and i believe it doesn’t clean my skin as well as my usual cleanser , which is Murad Essential C cleanser . I really wanted to love it but I can’t

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser, I originally  got it as a sample and loved it so  much I decided to get the full size. It is absolutely  amazing. It fees so good your face and is well worth the price.I've been using it for years and ask for it every Christmas  and birthday, but this year I thought I'd just buy my own. Fresh is such a good brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a super gentle cleanser. It leaves my skin super soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best cleanser I have found. It is so gentle on the skin but cleans makeup off- even waterproof- flawlessly. I have hypersensitive skin and this product does not cause me any irritation. I never leave home without this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and frequently have red, inflamed cheeks. This face wash is amazing for removing oil without over dying skin. I've also noticed a significant decrease in redness. It's definitely pricier than I'm used to paying for a face wash, but a little does go a long way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this face wash! It’s so gentle yet so effective , was having breakouts and it has helped tremendously!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I use this every other day and my face feels so good after

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face wash.  So light and fresh. I would recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to and absolute favorite face wash. It’s gentle and keeps my skin clear, smooth, and soft. I think it’s the soy that my skin loves so much. It’s a must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this alcohol-free product!  It doesn’t recommend use near eyes, but I love using it to wash off my eye makeup.  No burning and it doesn’t dry out my skin after either. A good dupe for this (without the rose scent) is the YesTo Cucumbers milk cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this so much, it smells really good and I do not have a big issue with acne so for me, it does clean my face off good. i use it rather in the morning or at night and i would recommend this to anyone. i tried it as a mini and i really liked it so now ima start buying the bigger size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant in buying this because of the reviews, but i am SO glad I bought it. I have always had little annoying forehead bumps that popped through my foundation, but this amazing miracle cleanser cleared my entire face up. I have never had smooth skin except for now because of this product. The smelll is also nice !!!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I switched to this cleanser a year ago and I love it! Its very gentle, has a very light but pleasant scent and doesn't leave my skin dry or tight. I double cleanse and this is my second step after using dove bar soap on my face. I use this with my PMD clean cleansing brush and overall I experience far fewer breakouts, my face feels clean and my complexion is more even. My skin has done a complete 180. One of my favourite things about this cleanser is that even though it is very gentle, it gives my face thorough clean. I apply this directly onto my eyes to remove eyeshadow, liner and mascara and it gets everything off and never burns my eyes. Plus, I use this cleanser twice daily and I find the 150 ml tube lasts me about ~5 months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is amazing to me! I’ve bought many cleansers that aren’t supposed to irritate your skin, but they did anyways. This never leaves my skin irritated, it doesn’t leave any sticky or filmy residue. It’s very light weight, moisturizing, and is easy to use. A little goes a long way, and it smells amazing. I recently bought a whole bunch of products to save my dry, flaky, oily skin. This is definitely one of the products that has made a huge impact! My skin is now always hydrated, baby smooth, and never flaky. I have also already noticed it not only doesn’t irritate my acne, but actually helps it in combination with other products (like the fresh rose toner and boscia gel peel)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually liked this a lot. Didn’t strip my skin or irritated it either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very soft, doesn't strip the skin of oils and make it feel dry. Great for sensitive skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to try this cleanser for so long and when I finally purchased it I was so glad I did! When I first started using it, I did get a few major breakouts but they went down in 2 weeks. Besides that, this cleanser makes my skin feel sooo clean and fresh. It also does a good job of removing my makeup and a little bit goes a long way! I use this along with the Strawberry Exfoliator 1-2 times a week and the combo is great together!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this face wash for a long time now and I still love it! Its basic. When it comes to a face wash that's exactly what I want.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great cleanser, you can rub this on top of all your makeup and wipe everything off with a makeup eraser. I never write reviews on cleanser bc usually they're all the same. I also have very sensitive skin and break out from a lot of cult favorites.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly can't say enough good things about this cleanser! I have combination skin and have always struggled with blackheads around my nose and chin, with dry patches around my cheeks. It took about a month, but all of a sudden I looked in the mirror and noticed my blackheads were GONE and my pores were so tiny. Just a pea-sized amount rubbed into my face with my hands, and it gets my skin clean without stripping everything. Saved my skin for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sensitive skin? Combination/normal? Or just new to skincare? This is the cleanser for you. I have been using this cleanser for 2-3 years and have found no other like it. I have extremely sensitive skin (I can't use most exfoliants) and this is the only cleanser I can use twice daily without completely drying out. It's an excellent makeup remover, super soothing, and has a pleasant but natural scent--it does smell like soy, fittingly. I would not recommend, however, for oily skin types and people who need a more heavy-duty cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m mostly just disappointed in myself for trusting the rating. I am, by no means, a person who gets hung up on how a product smells but, the fragrance in this is just way too strong. It smells like that drink you decide to give a try on vacation and then immediately regret it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great everyday cleanser that makes you feel refreshed. I use it everyday twice a day. It is a gentle cleanser that’s good for sentitive skin (witch I have). Why did I give a 4/5. It’s because in my opinion, I just needed a more powerful cleanser because I wasn’t seeing any big difference in my skin because it’s so gentle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: when I first purchased the mini size I was in love! It made my skin feel so clean and moisturized, and the product smelled nice - like cucumbers. But after purchasing two minis and one full size, I've noticed that the more I use it, the less thrilled with the product I am. It's still a good product, but I think I'm going to try different cleanser once I run out of the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for the perfect everyday cleanser, look no further! It takes off mascara quite well at night and feels so great when massaging on your skin. I like it feels more gel like than a cleanser. The smell is also great - fresh but not too in your face

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: One of the better face washes I've tried. Very nice light fragrance, effective, and does not strip skin at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I originally got this as a gift from fresh beauty since I went to intern there! It has a really good fragrance, smells kind of like rose water but really light. The texture is slimey but it feels really good on your skin, I usually lather it all over my face even on my eyelids it’s really soothing. It usually lasts you for a long time. Don’t squeeze a lot because a small amount can get it all over your face. It’s pretty pricey but I think it’s worth it if you use it on and off. I would definitely get it again. It makes my face feel really fresh and clean hence the company of the product. I don’t see much change of my acne until I use my acne products but overall it calms your skin down and doesn’t irritate it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like how this cleanser gets the job done. Clean your face. The best part is that it's very affordable. Maybe the most affordable cleanser at Sephora.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: TRASHHHHHH!  Second Time using it! Cause i believe in second chances but really disappointed me like the first time, it made me breakout like crazy,  the formula is so weird i know is gel but is like hard to spread around the face

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nice smell and clean feeling, doesn’t irritate my sensitive skin. Didn’t notice any visible improvement after using daily in my skin even after finishing the value size

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this after reading the reviews and after using it for a couple months I finally realized that this face wash was the reason for my suddenly horrible breakouts. For the longest tome I couldn’t figure out why my skin was getting worse and worse. I switched back to drunk elephant and my skin got a million times better. Also the texture of this face wash is really weird and it doesn’t foam how I like gel cleanses to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to LOVE this cleanser. I repurchased it about 5-6 times now however, I moved from Alaska to SC and maybe because of the different climate, or because I’m getting older but this which once used to be a cult favorite of mine now dried my skin out so bad to where one by one I was weeding out my skincare products trying to find the culprit of what completely depleted my skin’s moisture barrier and dried me out beyond belief and after switching literally everything besides this cleanser and even stopping exfoliating my skin was just as bad. If you have oily or normal skin: this is a wonderful cleanser but I just don’t think it’s a great cleanser to use long term.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser hands down. I am 26 years old for reference with normal/dry skin. I can clean my eyes with this product and it does not burn or hurt at all. Smells so good and helps with taking off my makeup. I use a makeup wipe first then follow up with this cleanser and I’ve seen less break outs because of it! Been using this stuff maybe 2 years and it is amazing and not that expensive. Bottle lasts a while. Do yourself a favor if you’re looking for a cleanser and buy this stuff!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I followed the good reviews and tried once. It’s a total waste of money!!! It can’t clean anything. The texture is so weird like mashed soybean. Every time I used it it can’t clean anything off my face. My skin type is combination. Err Just image having mashed soybean all over your face. Don’t waste your money!! Any product in a drug store would be much better than less but only cost 1/3 of the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Happy I only purchased the smaller bottle as a tester. The Sephora employee told me that this would be hydrating, but it did the complete opposite and dried out my skin!! It's a shame because it smells great and there are other products that Fresh makes so well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: makes my face feel so nice and clean, as well as visibly smoother and brighter!! smells amazing and it’s so so refreshing and lovely. doesn’t dry out my skin/strip it/ make it feel tight like some other cleansers do. my skin feels nice and supple. will be buying again and again!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this cleanser in December. So far it's been pretty good for my skin. It make me feel clean even though it doesn't make any foam. It smells a lot like cucumber and I love it. In general, I like the Fresh products but my only concern it's the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this so many times but it dries my dry skin out even more! Every time I use it my skin is stripped and flaky. It just didn’t work for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolute FAVORITE cleanser I’ve ever tried. It’s a gentle gel cleanser that smells of refreshing cucumbers. It is light and cool upon application and it makes my skin feel squeaky clean. I trust this cleanser to keep my easily clogged pores clean and I feel like it also soothes redness of my skin at the same time. I use it sparingly because you don’t need much of it to do a good job. Wish it wasn’t so expensive but it is one of those products I’ve definitely deemed worth the cost.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and am a 55 yo woman. after using it...I felt like I had an oil slick on my face. while this is a solid pass for me, my sister has dry skin and it really hydrates her skin while cleansing it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is all over the place, I got so many free samples, and I just never really used it enough to regularly like it. i finally got a full size in my Boxy and use it in the shower now. WHOA. This stuff is IT. My skin is finicky as heck and this is a really great product! My only complaint is that it does leave my skin a little bit on the dry/tight side, but it's winter so that's to be expected. Give this cleaner a try, it's worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Everyone loves this stuff, but it HTG feels like I'm rubbing snot all over my face. I haven't seen anything better about this over any other cleansers, but I haven't been able to stomach more than two applications.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am genuinely in love with this product!! This soy face cleanser removes all types of dirt from your face and even makeup! It does such a great job however after I clean my face it does become dry. My face is really smooth and clean after I use it but it does dry up a little too much. I have normal- oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: unbelievably lovely product, it smells like liquid cucumbers, but not a fake smell, like its just a tube of blended up cucumbers haha. its SO soft and nice on the skin and ive never tried anything like it. makes me really look forward to cleansing my face and i love that its safe for the eyes as well. i hate the price tag, but its worth it because its so silky and smooth that a little bit goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Started this product when I was pregnant and never stopped since. Its been 8 years...my mom can use, sister,brother and daughter....I love it. Smells like the spa for a moment

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product. I have been using it for about 6 or 7 months, and every time I use it, I fall in love, again. It cleanses your skin, while not stripping it of its natural oils, and leaves your face extremely soft. However, a little goes a long way, and it does not foam so I would recommend not using a whole lot on each wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser, I have been using it for some years. It let my skin clean and soft, has a nice subtle fragrance. I have tried other products but this is by far the best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I buy this product regularly.  Love the feel of it on my skin;  it is very effective at removing all traces of my make-up...except mascara which I use something up for.  Great value.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice- light, thin and a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite cleanser, smells great and all natural

I tried this out wanting to love it, due to the RAVING reviews from other customers and influencers, this is how you know certain brands are propped up on a pedestal for MONEY. I started using this cleanser on the first of January and I haven’t used any new products on my face, which is why I know it’s this cleanser. My skin has dried out even more to the point that it is FLAKING. It’s looks even worse once done taking a shower. I have dry skin and never had flakes coming off of it until I tried this product. IT CLAIMS TO BE FOR ALL SKIN TYPES BUT IT IS NOT! I WILL NEVER USE ANOTHER FRESH PRODUCT EVER AGAIN!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love this product because of the great reviews but it broke me out horribly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I remember getting this as a birthday sample a few years ago and I've been repurchasing ever since. I don't get very much acne, but when I do this product helps soooo much! Literally makes it go away within 2 days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wow wow wow! I have very sensitive skin so I have to be very selective of the skincare and makeup I use. My aunt gifted this to me and I have to say, this is by far the best cleanser I have used. I was hesitant because it’s so light feeling in your hand, but surprisingly a little bit goes a long way. This cleaner isn’t drying, and leaves your skin so soft and clean! J also see a difference in even skin tone. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was introduced to this face wash my a friend who has just glowing almost perfect skin while on vacation. She said this was a game changer for her skin, and let me use it at night for 3 days straight. The first day after using it the night before, I woke up to soft, healthy and glowing skin! It was as if I had gotten a weekend full of 8+ hours of sleep, when in reality it was half that. As I continued to use it, I continued to see soft and supple skin. This was especially great because I use chemical exfoliators regularly and the weather here is super cold and drying to the skin. I can’t thank her enough for recommending this, and I can’t recommend it enough for everyone else. There’s a reason this has a huge following! I now use it nightly paired with a chemical exfoliating wash for the daytime and my skin looks better than it did in my 20s.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! It’s super lightweight and smells fresh, it leaves my skin feeling soft. I’ve been using it off and on for three years now and it’s definitely the best I’ve used!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had run out of face cleanser and was lucky enough to have received this in my December Boxyluxe, though at first, I would have rather gotten the Strawberry Exfoliating Face Wash. But now, I’m actually happy that I received this instead because since I’ve been using it for a month, my skin has been feeling so soft. My skin feels clean and fresh after I wash it, and I just started noticing how nice my skin has been. I’m strongly considering purchasing it when I run out, although the price tag hurts. I kind of want to try the strawberry one, but I don’t think it’s good to exfoliate every day so I might stick with this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this cleanser, nothing that knocks my socks off, but does the job and removes my makeup. The reason for the three stars? THE SCENT. It's so repulsive to me and smells of artificial cucumbers. If the scent is non bothersome to you, its worth a try. I find it to be gentle, though I've only used it for 2-3 nights at a time as I have a travel sized version and only use it while traveling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I luv luv luv this product!!  I received it in a beauty box I subscribe to and didn't know anything about it so i put off using it for about a month..But once I tried it  I was sold!! It is a nice creamy wash that leaves my face clean and soft. The redness has since left my cheeks. Highly recommend this product! I will be stocking up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought this was gonna be a life changing product. I saw every influencer using it and I really thought that this product would the best cleanser ever. Well it isn’t, I have combination to oily skin and my skin is really sensitive. My skin get irritated  very easily. I used it for a week in the morning and my face reacted and became red and I didn’t really like the sent of it. It didn’t break me out at least but my skin felt itchy and it was not really a nice feeling...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent cleanser for combination skin. Leaves skin feeling radiant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: For my skin this cleanser works! I find our very gentle on my skin and had a soft sent.  It minimizes my brake outs and redness.  If you are interested in this cleanser I would definitely recommend that you go and get a sample to try it out! I have purchased this a few times and I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is so light for application and your face feels so clean after. I used this product with a facial cleansing brush and it lathered well with only a small amount. After I rinsed my face with a wash cloth my face was brighter and felt very fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Knocking off a star because of how heavily fragranced this cleanser is. I could smell it through the ziploc I put it in when I was traveling. That being said, I really do enjoy using this. It’s very gentle on my skin, but doesn’t skimp on the cleansing. I do wish Fresh would consider using less fragrance but it doesn’t seem too harmful according to cosdna

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best cleanser ever !! Was very hesitant to buy because of the price but a little goes a long way ! It doesn’t lather up like traditional face washes do so be careful not to use to much as it is not necessary. Your skin will feel wonderful and look more radiant ! I can’t wait to wash my face with this face wash ! Oh and it smells soooo relaxing I make it a point to take in the smell while I’m cleansing !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It’s pretty expensive for a cleanser. This is more of a special purchase for most people, myself included. When I do buy it, my skin feels wonderful. The product smells INCREDIBLE and removes all of my makeup gently and effectively. It’s also eye-safe. If you have money to throw around I highly recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry skin that’s almost always pretty clear of acne but for the past two months I’ve had continuous breakouts on my forehead that wouldn’t go away no matter what I tried. I got this cleanser for Christmas and my acne is basically completely gone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I only wish it didn’t smell like cucumbers. I love it so much though, use morning and night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser I’ve used. Doesn’t feel too heavy and doesn’t leave the skin feeling stripped of its oils. I was very reluctant to try this because of the price but I’m sold!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not much to say about it, it's a great wash. Nice and light, doesn't dry my skin or leave it feeling unclean. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this product. I have combo skin (normal and oily on T zone) I bought it without first trying it  (big mistake) and after a week of using just the face wash w/o other skin products (to see how it will react on my face) I started seeing these little pimples all over my face. Even though I have oily skin, I never get pimples on my face. I returned it right away. I really liked the smell and texture tho. Like I said, just not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ever since I started using this product, my skin has cleared so much. I don’t have as many whiteheads/blackheads and it helped calm down my acne. My skin is also so smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: hands down the only cleanser that doesn't make me feel stripped away! I feel plump and well-cleansed, highly recommend for those who have dry skin like me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING!!!! i originally got this product because i am known to have many pimples and harsh acne, and this got rid of many pimples on my nose and around my lips!! would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Its hard to find face washes that cater to dry skin and remove make up at the same time. Found this one and loved it right away after the first use. Love the way how this removes my sunscreen too from the face, leaving my skin clean and hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. It always leaves my skin feeling super soft and does a great job removing makeup. I have sensitive skin and this has never caused irritation. A staple!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this product with an exfoliating brush and it leaves my skin feeling soft and clean but not dry. I have very sensitive skin and it is very gentle but effective.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry skin in the winter, and more oily in the summer; and this is my holy grail face cleanser because I don’t have to switch products. I can use this all year around and it doesn’t make my face more oily or more dry based off the seasons. If you’re skeptics, the $20 is worth the try out. A little product goes a LONG way. That’s coming from someone who always uses too much lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser.  I have never thought I would get any benefits from a cleanser, but I see a marked improvement in my skin when I use this one.  my skin feels smoother, and is not stripped of moisture.  this cleanser removes all of my makeup, and doesnt irritate my eyes.  no residue left behind.   I am 38 with dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I gave this product a shot after a recommendation that it really cleans your skin. I found this was not to be foamy at all , and it doesn’t leave your face feeling fresh. After using it my skin felt like it had a film on it from the wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! I like the consistency of the cleanser.  I also like how my skin looks and feels after use! It helps my skin look refreshed. It has become a new staple in my skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive skin and this gentle formula has saved my life!!! Literally the best cleanser I have had. And it takes off makeup very easily! Highly recommend :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m on my second bottle and I won’t stray away from this cleaner for a while. I have highly reactive skin and this has never given me an issue. I love the scent (smells like cucumber to me) and it feels gentle but is good enough to take off my light everyday makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cleanser for the last 4 years. I have also tried plenty of others due to the price and always end up coming back to this. a little goes a long way, I usually wash my face with a tiny amount(about quarter size) then rinse and repeat  if I have heavy make up on(on weekends mostly) lol. I have combination skin but not a lot of break outs and it works great for me. The large bottle last me about 5 months and I use it about 5 days out of the week. it does have a strong scent but I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not what I expected, not the best facial cleanser for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: All time favourite cleanser. Super gentle on the skin and one of the only products that don't break me out. I also use the strawberry sugar exfoliant with it a couple times a week for super smooth skin. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this skin cleanser.  The smell is nice, and clean, the texture is smooth on the face, and when I use toner after I am finished washing, there is not dirt or makeup left behind.  The only reason I rate it 4 out of 5 stars is that the product comes out so quickly out of the packaging, I end up using too much of it and I find I’m wasting it.  If the container had smaller hole or a sort of dispenser to keep it from pouring out this would be 5/5

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not happy with the cleanser since it didn't remove my makeup. It also irritated my skin too.

reviews.review_title: Great gentle cleanser for the mornings
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is the perfect gentle cleanser! I used it int he morning just to get rid of the oil and dirt from the night. I wouldn't recommend using this in the evenings though, as it is too gentle to clean off makeup, sunscreen, and other residual dirt and sweat from the day. It is a bit too pricey for the size and product, which is why I docked one star.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this cleanser! While in the shower, It takes off all my makeup and deep cleans my skin. Its pretty drying so I make sure to moisturize immediately after. It smells so good too. Make sure to use with a Clarisonic or other face brush to get a deeper clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My normal routine is to take off my makeup with Tatcha Cleansing Oil (Incredible Product) and then use Dermologica's Sensitive Skin cleanser to really get all of my makeup off. I just received this cleanser in my BoxyLuxe this month and decided to try it out and maybe switch up my routine since I'm running out of my other cleansers - and I've paid the price. My skin immediately started to sting when I used this after my oil cleanser, and although it states it will take off all of your makeup - even mascara - I used The Ordinary's glycolic acid toner afterwards and STILL found traces of my foundation on my face. It's been about 10 minutes since I used the cleanser and my face is red and blotchy and feels really tight as if its drying out like a prune. So glad I didn't pay full price for this product.. would not purchase on it's own. I'll give it a few more tries before I toss it out. Disappointed is an understatement since I've read such great reviews.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love fresh products my skin has been looking amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing cleanser. Removes all dirt and makeup with very little effort, I love the smell of cucumbers. Doesn’t dry my skin, specially in the Chicago winter time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this stuff!!!! Soooo it was my birthday and i got the drunk elephant set with the Beste No. 9 jelly cleanser and the protini polypeptide cream and that messed my face up so after i tried this one and it helped so much!!! its not drying and i smells kind of like cucumber. Have a great holiday season!

reviews.review_title: Could work for others, just not me.
reviews.review_buyer_description: mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Sister (dry skin/acne skin type) loves it and had no issues. I (oily/acne/sensitive) on the other hand always had random zits pop up after reintroducing it into my skincare. Maybe the soy ingredient could be the cause? Not sure. Not for me but could work for others possibly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down favorite cleanser. It's one of only a few splurge items for me because it's great. Suds up nicely, gentle and smells great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down favorite cleanser. It's one of only a few splurge items for me because it's great. Suds up nicely, gentle and smells great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: since moving to CO an esthetician friend told me i developed “altitude induced rosacea” which cause itchy bumps along the top of my cheeks. she suggested i only exfoliate once a week and get a soft gentle cleanser. i love angela on bare skin by lush bc it makes me feel like i’m ridding myself of skin impurities but it’s too harsh. this soy cleanser has worked wonders in reducing my redness and i am so so thankful. paired with the rose toner, pshhh my skin has never looked better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Used this cleanser for over 4 years.. doesnt agree with my skin anymore. I dont know if the formulation changed of my skin changed... now it dries me out to the point that i get oily afterwards!  my husband loves it and use it now. He has oily skin with dry patches that itches.. not anymore since he use this combo with the moisturizer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If your skin easily breaks out, this might not be for you. I had the worst breakout of my life where the side of my chin and cheeks were covered in cystic acne, swollen, bright red, super painful. I couldn't sleep on the side of my face and had to ice my face regularly. I couldn't figure out what was causing it. I switched cleansers and pared down my skincare routine to bare bones and the breakout went away. Then I switched back to this cleanser because it DOES leave a nice texture to dryer skin, and my breakouts started immediately again within 12 hours. I stopped using it after that one time and the breakouts have gone way down. I'm not typically someone who breaks out either. Please keep this in mind if you have sensitive skin. I love Fresh products but this cleanser was WAY off for me and was so painful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My granddaughter loves it! I'm assuming that is is more a product for those younger than I.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE IT!! I love how it feel on my skin. It is so gentle and hydrating. I would definitely purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fantastic cleanser. If you haven't tried it yet and don't want to splurge on the full size, then pick this one up. I use this about 3 times a week as part of my double cleanse on the days I wear makeup. It has lasted me almost 2 months. A little will go a long way. I use about a nickel size drop in my palm. I apply it to a moist face, not sopping wet, but just damp. Then I wet my hands and go to town. It has a strange smell, almost earthy but it leaves your face super clean without drying it out. It is one of the best non-oil cleansers I've used this year, for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love the gentle cleanser on my face. I have real sensitive skin so this soy based cleanser works for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I always loved this product! cleans good, leaves my face crispy clean,  and i personally love the smell of fresh cucumber

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product I use it with my Mia Clarisonic brush. I have been Soy Fresh Cleanser for many years. I get many compliments about my skin.  I love Fresh products

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleaner. Gentle enough and also cleans thoroughly.  It does not leave residue on my face nor does it dry out my skin too badly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So far my favorite facial cleanser!! I wouldn’t say it removes waterproof mascara completely. I can’t speak for regular mascara since I only use waterproof. I remove my eye makeup with micellar water anyways but just wanted to put that out there for anyone who wanted to remove “all” of their makeup with this. I use this cleanser with my Clarisonic and It is gentle enough but still gets my face super clean. If you like the smell of cucumbers you will love how this smells.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE THIS STUFF!!!  The strawberry scrub is luscious too!  Only thing I've found that removes the Bad Girl Bang mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many different face cleansers but this one changed my skin completely. I adore this face wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample size of this product and it made my skin feel super soft but couldn’t really get past the smell. Strong cucumber-ish smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For years I searched for a product that works for my skin as my face is so sensitive. This is the only cleanser that works for me. I’ve been using this for about 3 years now and I’m obsessed. It’s affordable, lasts for quite a while and leaves my skin feeling fresh and clean. It has a bit of a cucumber smell to it which is super refreshing. I love this product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Omg. I was seriously struggling with hormonal acne and at 30, my skin really wasn’t tolerating harsh cleansers the way it used to. I was dry and flaky in some areas, and greasy and broken out in others. So I decided to start from scratch with just a mild cleanser and a moisturizer. My skin hasn’t looked this good in almost 2 years. This cleanser strips off all of my makeup including mascara and leaves my face feeling clean  while still leaving my skin baby soft. Love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice cleanser for sensitive skin however for me personally it dries my skin out in the winter months, will go back to using this in the summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this cleanser  as it had great reviews! I got a sample from Sephora and after using it twice, my face broke out! This is not for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my go to cleanser for some time now. At first, the scent threw me off a bit. Not a huge fan of cucumbers, and it definitely has that cucumber fresh scent along with the floral tones. I use this product when I’m right out of the shower as an added cleanser just to make sure I’ve removed all of the excess makeup if I missed something beforehand. My face feels so nice and smooth after each use! I have sensitive and dry skin, so I’m pretty picky about my skincare routine. This is something I’ll repurchase again and again!

reviews.review_title: Recommend for sensitive or dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This face cleanser is so gentle and is made with great ingredients. It doesn't strip your skin and keeps it moisturize.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love! I have sensitive skin and this helps soothe my skin and prevent redness. The smell helps wake me up but is still very calming. The texture is very satisfying and hydrating. My skin is left clean but not stripped of my natural oils

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: omg this is my ride or die. My skin looks fresh and it feels amazing and its so gentle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This contains polymethyl methacrylate, which is used to produce plastic microbeads. Clean my skin and then pollute the Great Lakes? No thank you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have super sensitive skin and this works like a charm for me. It makes my skin feel fresh (no pun intended) and not dry at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love this cleanser so badly, but it broke me out everytime I used it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this. I used to have acne issues before I started to use this. My skin now is amazing I hardly have any breakouts and my skin is clear. This is the best my skin has been since high school.

reviews.review_title: The cleanser for people who hate cleansers
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry skin, and avoided using cleansers all together before trying this one in a sephora point perk. This cleanser is THE cleanser that I compare all others to. The way this product smells, lathers, and doesn’t strip the skin all contribute to why it is the only cleanser I have ever truly enjoyed using. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this cleanser. It gives an organic fresh clean feel unlike other cleansers. I don’t technically use it to remove makeup but usually use it after I remove my make up with the cleansing oil from Shiseido (which is AMAZING).

reviews.review_title: Using same bottle for over 4 months
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this bottle on July 26, 2019 and now in November 2019 I am STILL using the same bottle! This formula cleanses my skin so effectively with a full face of makeup or even without makeup. With makeup I suggest massaging the cleanser over your entire face and eyes (says on the bottle recommended to remove eye makeup

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve never even a big believer of spending a ton of money on high end skincare but this cleanser is literally THE BEST one I’ve ever used. I stopped using it for a month and instantly saw a difference in my skin. I had to immediately go repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
