reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. I started using this product about 2 months ago and it really helps with my oiliness and breakouts. My boyfriend uses it from time to time and he really likes it as well. It is really gentle on the skin and it gets ride of the dirt. I would not use this to take off my make up though. I usually have to take off my make up with a make up wipe or an oil cleanser, then use this after for my 2 part cleansing. My sister also tried it and it doesn't irritate her sensitive acne prone skin. I even bought a back up because the current one I am using is about to run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this. Instead of buying the coconut wipes (which I love) I tried this. Claims to get off all make up and mascara....NOPE. After washing my face my eyelashes were sticking together and to my skin. I will still with my wipes and this will be going back sadly
I love this cleanser! Great for any skin type! Very creamy and doesn't hurt eyes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The ONLY face cleanser i use. I’ve tried so many and they were too harsh for my skin. This one is so light and latter easily. Less messy, take all my makeup off and clean my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a personal favorite of mine. To say this cleanser is gentle is an understatement. It lathers well, removing makeup and oil, and leaves skin feeling clean and radiant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My face felt so fresh and clean after using this. It also left my skin feeling smooth and soft. The smell of this cleanser was calming.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my all time favorite cleanser -  it is great for gentle skin and removes light makeup. Smells amazing and cleans without stripping.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for years, and everytime I branch out to try something new, I always come back. It just really takes the makeup off; no mascara racoon circles in the morning. My husband loves the smell and texture, too, so I keep it on hand in the shower as he uses it to shave.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite cleansers so far. I have combo skin and this makes my skin feel fresh (no pun intended) and clean. It takes any leftover makeup residue off and leaves my face soft and hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So I've been using this cleanser for 1 year and a couple of months and I looove it!! My skin is so smooth and clean afterwards that almost nothing comes out when I use the toner afterwards. It spreads well, so there's no need to use a lot. I remember when I first started using it I felt like it was stinging a little specially near the nose area but it lasted only a couple of days. I've changed toners and moisturizers but my cleanser has been the same for a long while now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser wasn’t necessarily designed for super oily or acne prone skin. But it’s great for the winter if you want a good cleanse without stripping your face. Although I have used this on Summer days after I’ve been sweating heavily in Qatar’s heat. I generally use 3 different cleansers depending on my skin’s needs. I prefer using this in the morning. I use retinol regularly so this is great for days my skin is a bit dry from retinol and acids.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I take my makeup off with wipes then use this cleanser and it makes my skin so soft and takes all the dirt away! I recommend and smells good when you apply it on its like gel

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the cleanser but with the mini size I have trouble controlling the amount that comes out - the tiniest bit of pressure and a huge glob comes out. It’s the perfect size for travel, but doesn’t last long for me since I can’t control the amount.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very gentle on my dry skin but still removes my makeup-wish it wasn’t so expensive but I keep buying it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Not impressed with this face wash. I spent over $10 for a travel sized face wash that was a gentle cleanser, but not great for my skin type. The product feel like a good, sudsy type of face wash. The employee where I bought it said I would love it but I absolutely did not like it and ended up throwing half of it away. I was traveling so I did not have the opportunity to take it back. I would not recommend this product for normal to oily skin. It would be best suited for a dry skin type and not for someone who is looking for a soapy face wash

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! I've been using this face wash for almost a decade. It's gentle and non drying to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser for the first step to remove face and eye makeup in a double cleanse. It doesn’t burn or sting my eyes at all. It has a nice jelly-like consistency, and a nice light scent. Very gentle, and doesn’t strip my sensitive skin. Hasn’t broke me out, and I’m extremely acne prone. I’ll be purchasing the full size next time for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nice, gentle everyday cleanser. Works well with my dry skin and does a decent job of taking off my makeup as well. Doesn't leave my skin with that tight dry feeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It's light, non abrasive and does not leave my skin dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the very VERY few cleansers that doesn't break me out or overly dry out my sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a good product!!!! Not too harsh on my skin while still leaves it feeling clean. I had it as a trial a year ago and liked it so much so I finally committed to the full size! Super happy with it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product but expensive.   Feels good on my skin with no residue.   I’m sensitive and I don’t react at all.   It’s very pricey for a face wash tbh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes, from my sister's recommendation.  I forgot to check the scent before I bought it.  I really disliked the smell. It smelled like sadness. Wet,  musty sadness

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The best!!! Have gone back to this line every time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was using a Korres cleanser and wanted to give this one a shot. Haven’t had real skin issues in a little over a year. Started using this product and texture and small blemishes popped up within day 2 and a full on break out after day 5. Switched back to my old cleanser and I’m finally almost back to where my skin was before. Giving it 2 stars because it removes my makeup well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my go-to cleanser for a few years now. I typically use it daily because it leaves my skin feeling fresh and clean. It also has a pleasant smell. For makeup removal, I do not just use this product. By itself, it doesn't remove all the makeup; I feel like it does leave some residue. For my skin care routine, I use two different makeup removers and then I finish with this cleanser to leave my skin feeling refreshed and hydrated. I highly recommend it if you're looking for something to remove any daily buildup of dirt/oils/whatever, but not specifically for just makeup removal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very gentle and I love the scent. It really helped me when I had a dermatitis flare up on my face. Been using on and off for years and never had a break out. It doesn’t foam so if you’re looking for that, this isn’t where you’re going to get it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great for when you don’t use makeup. Otherwise, be generous with the product on days that you do. Very fresh smelling in a mild & relaxing way. Not too perfume-y. Feels as if it’s very ph-balanced, meaning that my skin was NOT taut/dry afterwards. It’s so good, you would be willing to do extra 10 loads of laundry if someone was willing to buy this for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this amazing product for nearly a decade now and love it so much. It truly does leave your face feeling fresh- a nice squeaky clean feel. I love the way it feels. Cleans all makeup off so nicely, even eye makeup! I don’t use any makeup removers since discovering this. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice cleanser it leaves my skin really clean. Have a nice smell to it. I would buy again for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: never spent a dime on expensive skincare products but this one really does seem like it does the trick... after a week and i can already notice the difference in quality. smells like cucumber and cleans my combination/oily skin gently and it doesn't irritate it

reviews.review_title: Great for Sensitive and Dry Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive dry skin and this cleaner is fantastic, I use it as the second step in my double cleanse after micellar water and takes away the rest of the impurities left on my skin. I also love how the cleaner smells I always feel so clean and fresh after using it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Where do I begin. One day I was cleaning out my room and came upon this product that I was sent as a free gift for my birthday. I (stupidly) thought it would be a great idea to switch up my facewash even though I have sensitive skin. I was very wrong. When I started to use this I thought it felt great on my skin and I didn’t think twice about it. Now, a week later of using it once a day I look like atrocious. That being said, I have NEVER had more then one blemish on my face at a time and it occurred very rarely. My face is now covered with small red dots that my makeup is even having trouble covering. I should have known better than to try something new, but my face has never looked this horrible in my life. No wonder it was free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's really light on my skin and has a cucumber-like scent to it. It is not heavily cloying, nor is it drying. I've had allergic reactions before to some chemicals in other face cleansers, but this has not given me any issues and I've had great success with keeping my face acne-free since using this as part of my skin routine.   The only con, I would say, is that because it is so light, it doesn't do a great job of stripping makeup, so be sure to use makeup wipes before this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I hate how much I love this cleanser. It's so expensive, but every time I try another brand, I miss this one. I have dry skin and find that this hits the perfect balance between being gentle and actually cleansing. My skin doesn't feel dry, but I have fewer blemishes. I've tried other cleansers that claim to be gentle, but they don't actually get my face clean, and others get foamy and strip all the oils from my face. This is a gel formula that doesn't foam up. It smells like cucumber and is just so pleasant to use. I will sadly continue to pay the price for it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I heard A lot of good reviews about this face wash and I thought I was using a good one I was using origins for about 2 years now but my face was feeling textured and breakouts were occurring a lot so I switched to this and I really am enjoying this . The smell is light and the actual gel is not heavy or leaves residue after washing my face . I am glad I switched my texture is going away and it does control my oil . I have combo oily and small breakouts / cystic acne . Happy  with this

reviews.review_title: OBSESSED, switched to my daily cleanser instantly!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think I got the mini as a sample and I used it here and there cause I was still using the Tatcha face wash. I actually stopped using the Tacha face wash all together because this cleanser is soo gentle and leaves my face extremely moisturized. I still use the Tatcha Water Cream because it’s super light, but this cleanser is my secret weapon. I’m excited to start trying other products from Fresh!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Such a classic cleanser.  I would recommend smelling it in store or buying a small size/sample before purchasing the full size because it does have a very specific scent that some people hate, that's why I took off one star.  Other than that this cleanser is everything you could ask for in a simple no frill every day cleanser.  I would definitely recommend trying it no matter what your skin type is

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to cleanser, it does everything it is supposed to without irritation. This plus Kiehls Ultra Facial cream is my combo sensitive basic routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved it, that’s until a few weeks in I noticed my skin got really dehydrated. I looked at all the face products I use, and this is the only one I realized had alcohol in it. It smells good, and I loved it until then.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle jelly-like cleanser that leaves my skin feeling clean, refreshed, and not at all dry.  I love this with my clarisonic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is amazing. I suffer from moderate acne due to stress and hormonal changes. I use this at night with cold water and wipe my face with Gly/syl 10-2 pads and a overnight sulfur treatment. I rinse with face in the morning with cold water and wipe with the pads. My skin has never looked better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product it makes my skin feel great and when I use it, it doesn’t make my skin burn or tight. The only problem had with it is that the cap easily broke from dropping it but other than that it’s great

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is actually not a good one, but I believe the lesser the fragrance the better it works!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin has really benefited from this cleanser. I have sensitive skin with rosacea on my cheeks. It has made the redness go down, it's gentle, smells like cucumbers, and takes all my makeup off! My new favourite cleanser hands down!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this stuff for a month now and it works like magic. So in love. Leaves your skin feeling amazing and makes all my make up disappear without a trace. Definitely would recommend buying :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this cleanser because it’s gentle on my skin, if I use it to remove remaining makeup (after having used wipe or another makeup remover) I still find traces of dirt on my skin so it doesn’t really work unless is used in the morning with anything in your skin. For the price and result I wouldn’t buy it again, there are cheaper ones just as gentle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Made me break out and my face felt like it lost all natural oils

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It didnt do anything to my face. Theres other cleansers i use that leaves your face feeling fresh and really clean while also removing makeup residue without stripping your face natural oils. With this i feel like my face still needs cleaning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very gentle on the face and it is a good everyday cleanser. Don't count on this to clear up cystic acne though. I think for moderate to severe acne-prone skin, you should look into medicated cleansers. I have moderate cystic acne on my cheeks and it always appears in the same mother effin area. This cleanser did help my acne to lessen in size, but it did not clear it. IMO, this cleanser beats the Sunday Riley's Ceramic Slip Cleanser for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing! I have a mixture of dry and oily skin, and the product is super gentle. It cleanses my skin perfectly. No irritation, no excess oils,no extra dryness!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face wash! very gentle but cleans well and moves my skin look and feel good!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: a friend who works in cosmetics at Nordstrom recommenced this face wash for me, my skin was extremely dry, textured with large pores, since Ive been using this my skin is hydrated and supple, and my texture has gone down significantly although I’ve been using the first aid radiance pads along with it. both holy grail products in my skincare routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great gentle cleanser. I first got it as a sample and then bought a full size the other day. I’ll be using it for days when I don’t wear makeup. Makes my face feel fresh and clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t feels it does much to my oily skin maybe it’s better for normal to dry skin but for me it’s not the best I tried it does feel hydrating but doesn’t foam much so if you have a dry skin I think you’ll love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect cleanser! It leaves your skin clean, without feeling stripped, and has never broke my skin out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! First product that I’ve used that does not dry out my skin from daily use. I wash my face 2-3 times a day with this, and my skin isn’t super dry after. I’ve been using this for 2 years now. Leave you feeling clean and fresh with soft supple skin. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a product junkie, so I love to buy new skin care and makeup even when I’m not done with something.  This however is the one cleanser I always use the entire bottle and always come back to.  It’s literally fresh and just removes all makeup on my face without having to go in after with a washcloth to get rid of any leftover eyeliner or mascara.  Definitely a fan and highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite cleanser. Squeaky clean without being rough on the skin.

reviews.review_title: Not as gentle as you think
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: FRESH Soy Face Cleanser is supposed to be a clean cleanser, but I did not at all feel comfortable putting this on my skin. It was a bit red after. I wouldn't suggest this to anyone who is going from a very mild cleanser to this because you will be able to tell a difference. Also, this includes parabens. Parabens can cause hormonal disruptions. In my opinion, this is not a very clean cleanser at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Unless I use a peel, or I exfoliate, this is and has been my go to face wash now for at least a couple of years. I would consider my skin to be sensitive, and this face wash is wonderful; it does not dry or leave any type of residue on my face at all. The scent is faintly of cucumbers, which for me is a nice and clean scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: SMELLS AND FEELS GOOD...WOULDN'T USE ANYTHING ELSE AFTER THIS

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! It’s super light and gentle on the skin. I like to use it when I’m breaking out, it really helps!! It’s my go to cleanser, I always go back to it no matter what. It’s also good when you’re traveling, especially the mini size. Whenever I’m traveling I always make sure I have it with me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I purchase the mini's for my carry-on luggage!! I love the entire Fresh line.

reviews.review_title: You’ll love how clean your face is!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: THIS IS SO GENTLE!  For those of you with sensitive skin, give this a try.  It leaves your skin and eyes moisturized and sneaky clean.  I use this as a alternate with another cleanser.  I love the smell of it.  Just a small amount does it too. I definitely recommend it.  For those of you on the wagon, give it a try.  Started with a sample and have been using ever since on this aging skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this cleanser for a month now and so far so good. I like the way lathers and little goes a long way. I am sensitive to smell and this cleanser has a faint, nice smell to it. Removes my face makeup and leaves it feeling fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Go grab one right away.doesnt strip your face so gentle.My holy grail.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser smells great and doesn't irritate my skin .. fresh is my fave!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought travel size before and I am very impressive of this product. I bought it this time and used it as makeup remover, love the convenience!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Strong scent and doesn’t completely remove tinted moisturizer or foundation. Super slimy texture which I liked. Wish it was better at makeup removal though. Already Have dry skin but my skin felt tight after using this. Returned. Got a sample of the Korres Greek yoghurt cream cleanser which I’m currently using and liking. Removes makeup too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was welcomed by the scent of cucumbers when I first opened this cleanser. Love the scent; I originally thought it only contained soy and was wondering if my nose was off, but nope! The cleanser itself is very gentle and great for sensitive skin. It removes all my makeup and also takes away any oiliness from my face without stripping it. This has become a staple item for me and I've recommended it to a couple of my male friends who want something fuss-free. Excited to re-stock on this one! I received this complimentary at a Fresh event I attended.

reviews.review_title: Where are all these pimples from?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser was no good for my skin. It created a lot more pimples than I'm used to and I was not in love with the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite face wash of all time. It is smooth and my face doesn’t feel stripped after. You don’t need too much of it...so it lasts pretty long. I wash my face 2-3 times a day. Its worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle, yes. But this smelled so bad I had to get it off my face. I gave it to someone else because the smell didn’t bother them as much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I use this if I don't want to double cleanse. I'll use a makeup wipe and then wash my face with this - leaves my skin feeling clean and soft and ready for bed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i bought this a while back and LOVED it but wanted to try finding something less expensive. after trying who knows how many other face cleansers, i have to go back to this one! my skin feels so amazing after i use it, my pores look better, and it takes off all my makeup- even my eye makeup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you have dry skin, stay FAR away from this... 1. It is SO perfumed which is not good for anybody’s skin 2. It leaves your skin feeling so tight and stripped... don’t fall for the YouTuber skincare videos

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Far superior than any other leading brand. This left my skin cleansed and refreshed like no other. Kiehls is far inferior and had no results. SOY is amazing I would recommend this to everyone.

reviews.review_text: I have oily acne prone skin. I learned about the double cleansing method from an esthetician friend.  This milk cleanser is super gentle and nourishing for a quick one min face wash in the morning. Additionally I like to use this as a moisturizing third 'cleanser' (really after a mud mask) so that my skin doesn't feel stripped after using a primary cleanser.   Only reason why I don't give her a full five stars: this baby is not cheap. I got this size as a gift (from said friend), and bought the bigger because I really liked it; but MAn that hurted!!!   My recommendation is to try it before splurging.

Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this cleanser for probably 9 months and through all seasons so far and it’s the best thing i’ve ever used. I have combo skin that can get very oily and I’m prone to breakouts and this cleanser takes everything off without drying out my dry areas. Seriously i’ve never used a cleanser that works so well. And my skin never feels tight after using it. If you’re going to use this as a makeup remover, you will need to cleanse twice to get everything off. I love the refreshing scent-it’s so subtle and not overpowering and has never bothered my sensitive skin. This is a holy grail product for me.

If that's not a deal breaker for you this stuff is great. Dont expect any slip or bubbles. It really is just a gel. You spread it on and wipe it around and rinse. It's not milky or foamy at all.

My skin doesn’t feel tight or dry at all after using and i also, due to the great ingredients (glycerin, aloe, cucumber, and rose water) like to leave it on after i’m done cleansing for a minute as a mini mask, i’ve noticed my skin is glowier and smoother when i do. :)))

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot rave about this cleanser enough. This is quite possibly the best skincare routine I have had. The minimal ingredients and quality of them makes this perfect for my extremely sensitive skin. When I use this in conjunction with the Fresh Black Tea Kombucha Essence my skin is radiant, clean, and moisturized. In the past I have struggled to find a cleanser that didn’t dry out my skin, cause irritation, or leave a nasty residue. This cleanser is it. From day one I have had fantastic results with it. It leaves my skin soft, supple, and clean. I would highly recommend this product to anyone looking to amp up their skincare.   I received this complimentary from Influenster for the purpose of review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best cleansers for sensitive skin that I have EVER used! It leaves my skin feeling clean and not dry or stripped of all oils like most other facial cleansers do. The smell is not my favorite, but it is very light so it’s not a big issue to me. I’ve been using this cleanser for a few months now and my skin has been so supple, soft, and feels hydrated even before I apply anything else.   I recommend using this and then a gentle scrub or exfoliant followed by the fresh Black Tea Kombucha Facial Treatment Essence before applying your serums, creams, and moisturizers. If you have sensitive, dry, or combination skin, you can’t go wrong with this as apart of your daily regimen.   Sidenote: I had already bought the mini size cleanser in a Fresh set from Sephora and was actively using it when I received a complimentary deluxe sample from Influenster, so thank you for the extra supply because I was already smitten and about to go purchase the full size tube!   *I received this complimentary for testing purposes.

It left my face feeling clean but not dry, clean like some other cleanser have. Also, I noticed that i experienced less breakouts in my forehead area which I had been struggling with. I have combination skin and I would say it really helped with balancing my skin out. I would definitely recommend this to all the girls out there that wear makeup to add to your double cleanse.

It’s appropriate to use any time of day but I usually use it at night as a second cleanse because it works really well to remove any remaining makeup product that the first cleanse didn’t catch and it won’t burn your eyes! If i could only use one cleanser for the rest of time, this would absolutely be my choice, hands down. In my opinion it’s for sure an amazing value for the price. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: this cleanser is absolutely incredible! i have very sensitive eyes and there are no cleansers that remove makeup that don't irritate them except for this one! highly recommend, the only reason i took off one star is because i hate the smell. it's very... organic smelling? like very pungent dirt maybe? but it's worth it if you can get past the smell.

reviews.review_title: Dont believe me?? try it out for yourself
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I sampled this product about a month and a half ago and instantly noticed my a difference from night to the morning. I used that little pouch for about a week and my acne got better my skin was soft and even once i ran out i knew i had to buy more. So now its been over a month and a half and my skin is hydrated and loving it. 100/10 would recommend!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in an Influenster VoxBox, and I was so excited to try it out! This cleaner smells like cucumbers; so fresh and so clean! The milky gel texture of this product glides over my face and leaves my skin feeling clean and supple. It is really moisturizing without feeling greasy! I have been using this product for a week and I feel like I have had less breakouts, too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this product. I tried it with the essence and it work great on it skin. I have combination skin and many times when I use face cleanser it feels like there is a residue left behind but not with this one. It helped control by patchy oil areas and made my face feel fresh at night. I didn’t break out with all the makeup I add I tip of it. I tried it with the essence and recommend both of them. I already went to the store and bought the large size lol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Completely average cleanser, didn't leave my face feeling dry or oily, took off makeup okay, didn't hate or love it. Wouldn't repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The products smell is too strong for my liking. Doesnt remove eye makeup properly, I always have to go over it with another type of makeup remover on face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This removes the dirty out and leaves me fresh. I love how it smells and i have sensitive skin and doesn’t irritate my face :) I don’t use my hands but when i do it works just fine too:0

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this product for testing and I'm not disappointed! it's incredible! my skin is oily and textured and it really started making the difference noticable within a week! including this bad boy in my daily routine for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how fresh this makes my face feel!! Gets literally all my makeup off. Good for dry skin . I received these products complimentary for testing purposes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s an ok cleanser but I couldn’t get past the unpleasant smell. I wish all companies would make their facial cleansers fragrance free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: By far the most gentle cleanser I’ve ever used. I love using this in the morning when I wake up because it cleanses my skin without stripping it of natural oils! Will continue to repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There is nothing special about this cleanser. Genuinely do not get the hype. I don't feel like it feel does much of anything.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product free as an Influenster box and I really enjoy it. The smell is great and I’d definitely purchase it for myself, great price for a product.

reviews.review_title: Not good for Dry, Combination Sensitive Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample and started using it on a Monday. It smells horrible. I can’t describe the smell but it’s weird. I had to use quite a bit to remove my makeup. It’s Friday and my skin feels weird. My skin feels tight around my mouth, and because some of the product got onto my lips, they got dry and tender. I’m currently sitting with a glob of Vaseline on my lips. This all didn’t happen within a day, it happened within a week of continuous use. Note that I have combination sensitive skin, only my nose gets oily.  Needless to say, after giving this product a weeks try, I do not recommend this product and will advise everyone to stay with regular facial cleansing and makeup removal products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i received this product for free through influenster for review purposes. it smells really nice, all of Fresh’s products do, but it didn’t do much for my skin. it just kinda sat there and didn’t brighten or tone much at all, nor did it help with any acne. i was a little bored with it to be honest.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This smells like a spa getaway. I love using it and it makes me feel refreshed and super clean- my favorite face cleanser for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleaser worked great at removing my makeup and even eye liner. It does leave a tingly feeling on my face but overall my face feels refreshed after using this product. I got this product free to sample and i would buy in the future. I paired this with the kombutcha facial treatment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells great and works perfectly for sensitive skin. It is gentle and leaves skin feeling clean and not dry and stiff like a lot of other skin care washes. Only reason I gave it 4 stars is due to only using it for a few days and I do not want to be overly supportive to the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love. Great scent. Not harsh. Perfect around the eyes. Little pricey though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! I’ve been trying to keep a consistent skin care routine and this has definitely shown an improvement. I notice a big different in the way my moisturizer and foundation wear after having a great base

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: didn't fully take my eye makeup off. i had to wash my face 3 times. too much fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: just squeeze the bottom and a bit would come out its a bit jelly and mushy feel rub it on your face and then rinse with water. loveeeee it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve only used it once and so far so good. I really like how light of a cleanser it is and it worked really good with my Clarisonic. Afterwards my face felt super clean and almost “squeaky” clean. Lol my skin felt soft. So far I can’t complain. I also have the worlds worst sensitivity to skin care products due to my sensitive skin. I received this product for free / complimentary for testing purposes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser that I have found for sensitive skin.

reviews.review_title: Moisture stripping effect on combination skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and it leaves my face extremely dry after each use... I would not recommend this face wash due to the moisture stripping effect

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Completely has changed my skincare routine. Tried the sample and have been glued to Fresh Beauty’s brand and this amazing cleanser. Makes my skin feel refreshed and clean. So worth it! - @yessibause

reviews.review_title: I love FRESH, but this wasn't the best
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, I love FRESH products so I wanted to love this, too. However, this was too drying. It does remove makeup effectively, but  I am trying to phase in more natural products so this isn't one I'll buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love Love Love this cleanser! First time I used it, it didn't lather which I am not used to but after using it a few times I have grown to love it! Definitely notice a change in my skin! Not as oily through out the day but still feel hydrated

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser isn’t amazing it’s just a basic cleanser. My skin saw minimal difference, nothing crazy. It’s super gentle if you need that but for me it didn’t wow me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this as much as the customer service rep who recommended it did but I don't.  I only wear mascara and lipstick which she said it would remove but it doesn't remove anything and my skin didn't feel amazing afterwards either.  I love the cucumber scent, it smells like a real cucumber not a sweet fake cucumber scent.... I'm sad I'm not in love with the actual product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: No lie, I have probably purchase close to 50 different tubes of this cleanser over the past 12 years since I first started using it. This is holy Grail, this does everything it says it will while being sensitive and never ever irritating the eyes. I will never be without this cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this so much.  I have combo/oily skin, more oily during the summer months, and this is the only face cleanser I will use.  I bought it on a whim one day in the smaller size.  I’ve tried several face washes since then and I keep going back to this.  It doesn’t strip my skin but it does clean away the oils and helps my skin stay balanced.  I highly recommend this.  The only down side is the price and the inability to purchase this on sale.  Oh well, it’s worth the price point in my opinion.  I also have very sensitive skin as well as redness flare ups, this does NOT irritate my skin.  Leaves my face feeling fresh and clean.  If you are hesitant.. just buy it.  The smell isn’t terrible at all, very light and clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a pretty good cleanser. Smells nice, does a good job getting my skin clean. My skin gets a lite dry but it's fine in the summer. I would use something else in the winter but its definitely gentle to my face. Does not feel harsh on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So gentle!! I love the gentle scent as it is very refreshing. I love the way my skin feels after I use this in the shower, soft and smooth with no bumpy texture. I have fully switched to using this in my daily routine and will continue to buy the full products from here on out. I received this Fresh for free for testing purposes and I am so happy I was chosen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this cleanser. I’ve been using it for years now in and off and I feel like it’s such a great go to cleanser. I especially like it because it makes my skin feel squeaky clean. I don’t love the smell but I look past that because I really do like this cleanser. I think for the quality of the product the amount you get for the price is amazing! I would totally recommend this to anyone looking for a standard or even an intro cleanser. I received this product for free from Influenster!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product helped remove my makeup and excess oils. Great for sensitive skin! Thanks Influenster for sending me this product complimentary.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff so much. I was looking for something that wouldn’t strip my skin, I have tried so many different cleansers. When I finally found this one it was love at first try. It is very mild and has a fresh cucumber scent, but nothing over powering. This doesn’t strip my dry skin at all. Even though the foaming is minimal, my skin still feels amazingly clean afterwards.

reviews.review_title: holy grail for oily skin types!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had received this cleanser as a reward from the bazaar a few months ago as a full sized bottle and used the first half as a second step cleanser for my night time routine and i enjoyed it for removing makeup. Recently i started using it during daytime cleanser and OMG what a game changer. Let me tell you I’m an oily skin type and this really has helped with keeping my oil production low. I like that it doesn’t strip of my natural oils which is a struggle for oily skin types as you want to find that balance of cleansing with something that will clean your skin but not feel drying which hence means more oil production. I’ve finally have found my holy grail!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great cleanser! Smells super fresh and awakening. I love using this in the morning. I do find my skin is a tad dry afterwards but nothing a bit of moisturizer can’t fix! I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great basic gentle cleanser on par with philosophy’s purity. It removes most makeup and is non irritating and non drying. Like the aforementioned cleanser it does not lather so it won’t strip your skin. I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff.  Eyemakeup dissolves so good. It smells lovely.  It is still a bit drying and i have to use a moisturizer right after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would give this product more stars cause it’s very nice and removes makeup including eye makeup well. The problem is my forehead broke out in a fine textured rash so I had to return it. Disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face wash. It gets all the makeup off my face. I do have to make sure that I lather my eye lashes more if I wear waterproof mascara but it still works like a charm. Leaves my skin refreshed. I still use a moisturizer with it as my skin tends to get dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this product!! It has been my holy grail I will never buy another cleanser again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow!! Holy grail product here. Amazing smell, amazing cleanser. So gentle, does not make the face tight at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: THIS IS AMAZING!! As one of my first products from Fresh, I have to say that this did not disappoint. My favorite thing is the fact that not only is it a jelly based cleanser but it seriously does not leave my face feeling dry or anything like that! My face feels sooooo incredibly hydrated and fresh (no pun intended)! I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the delicate scent and liquid texture of this cleanser and highly recommend it! (especially for long travels since it’s a mini and airport safe)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorites!! I love the cucumber smell and cleans very well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really never want to use any other face cleanser. Fresh is so gentle and mild, it doesn't sting my eyes if I open them either. I know it isnt a product for acne but I ditched the  acne stuff and started using Fresh and my face cleared up. I think i was over drying my face in turn, making it more oily, causing acne. I am sold on this cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great mild cleanser. i alternate between using this and the kiehls ultra cleanser. i prefer the lather from kiehls, but i do feel that Fresh cleanses slightly better. i don't think this is super miraculous or anything. but i do enjoy using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been having issues with my favourite cleanser as it dries out my skin. And just in time... I received this one from Influenster for free to test. I must say I use it everyday and love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: With the first use you can notice a freshness in the skin, it feels clean and calm the skin; Removes makeup but certain eyeliners don't remove them completely. It helps to control the fat on the skin (something vital for me), with washing the face in the morning and at night is enough to see its effectiveness. It's predominant smell is that of cucumber, although it has rose water the smell of cucumber is the highlight, and certainly helps to have a relaxing facial cleansing experience. It is a good product, I like the reaction that my skin had, so I would buy it many times, I like to vary from cleaning every so often and this is on the list of pending purchases.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i received a sample of this from another company and i loved it and loved the cucumber smell that i knew i had to purchase it! i bought the full sized product and i think it is worth it.  a little goes a long way.  i love using it in the summer time.  it is a really gentle face wash and it does a good job of removing eye makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a sentless face wash that did not burn and would clean the oils and grime.  This is an excellent product and I suggest usuing it.  Men would like it as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how fresh products make you feel after you've used them. This cleanser is light and refreshing and makes your skin feel like you've just left the spa! It smells pretty strongly like cucumbers which is the only aspect that I'm not completely in love with.

reviews.review_title: It’s not for me, but still 4 stars....
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Because other than this product breaking me out (2 pimples) after using it twice (yes, I know my skin well, and it was the only product I added to my skincare routine at the time), there’s nothing wrong with it. It had a distinct smell to me that I couldn’t wrap my head around what it was, but it was neither pleasant or unpleasant; just very distinct. It’s a gentle cleanser at a great price! Btw I have combo skin with a bit sensitivity on my cheeks because of Rosacea.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This made my face break out horribly and I don’t know if it was the fragrance or something else. My face felt burned and it was completely red for about 3 days. If you have super sensitive skin, don’t go for it. I used it once before exchanging it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary to review from Influenster. I am giving 4/5 stars for how gentle it is on my sensitive skin. I like the nice light scent and gel like texture. It has a faint fresh cut cucumber smell. It doesn’t leave a residue on my face or strip away too much oils leaving me dry. I would give it 5 but I did find that it doesn’t easily wash away all makeup and usually need to use an oil cleanser or makeup remover for the more stubborn makeup.

reviews.review_title: The best face wash I have ever used
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best facial washes I have ever used. I I have adult acne oily and very sensitive skin. Whenever I try to get rid of my acne the products are so harsh they irritate my sensitive skin they turn my skin blood red and sensitive to the touch. Whenever I use something that's usually sensitive for my skin it never works for my acne and sometimes it makes my acne worse. This product did none of that. It washed my face intensely without drying my skin out or irritating my sensitive skin and it almost completely eliminated my acne. You should give it a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like the texture. Smell is meh. Doesn’t sting the eye area, so you can safely use it to remove the eye makeup. I have oily skin and I didn’t feel it cleansed very well, I could feel the oiliness even after washing my face. PS: I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I know this product is super popular but to be honest I don’t get all the hype.  It was ok. My skin felt super dry afterwards though and It definitely didn’t remove my makeup.   I received this product free for testing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle cleanser yet very effective. Love using this with the strawberry scrub or alternating between the two. Doesn’t dry out my skin. Received this from Influenster in their voxbox.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a trial. The smell is not great, but it does get your skin super clean without leaving it dry and gross. It's very gentle on the skin and it doesnt take a lot to feel clean

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice, clean and simple cleanser.  It's very gentle on your face,  which is why i would often use it if i was going to use a mask or something harsh after washing my face. I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this as a daily cleanser. I have super sensitive and combination skin so this cleanser works great to make sure I thoroughly cleaned my skin without irritating it. Feels super natural and I love the cucumber scent - only a small amount of product is needed as it lathers up nicely. Will definitely be repurchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Deep clean. Gets make up off. Doesn’t feel harsh; leaves skin super soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a VERY gentle face wash! Doesn’t lather, has kind of a weird smell but it isn’t horrible and it isn’t  overpowering! It didn’t take my makeup very well but maybe using it with a Clarisonic would work better? It did cause me to break out slightly on my cheeks but I think it’s because it doesn’t remove makeup as well as I need. Still recommend especially if you don’t have acne prone skin! I received this products complimentary for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this fresh cucumber fragrance gentle face wash. I use it every night in my before bed skin routine. Just leaves my skin feeling baby soft. It’s a perfect fun for any skin types. I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best truly gentle liquid cleanser still available. Cleansers that leave skin feeling squeaky clean and tight used to be all the rage, but those of us with a few more miles on our skin are smart to look for something that removes the day without stripping the face.  This is it. It's one of my favs (along with Origins and DE solid cleansers).  The only reason it doesn't get 5 stars is because it still doesn't leave my skin as refreshed looking as SR's Ceramic Slip formula (before the horrible change) and that's the standard by which I now measure all cleansers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best cleanser for sensitive and dry skin! I’ve been using this for over a year and I still love it. It’s so gentle but also very cleansing at the same time. I like the texture and that it has no smell. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a decent cleanser, made my face feel fresh and clean. Makes a decent lather and has a nice neutral smell. It has rose water in it which I am a huge fan of!! Although I like the formula I do feel like it is fairly expensive compared to other brands. Pairs perfectly with other fresh products, especially the fresh sugar strawberry exfoliating cleanser. I received this item complimentary from Influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING! I honestly did not want to enjoy this product due to the price... however it’s the best face wash I’ve ever used. I’ve forgotten to use makeup wipes prior to taking my makeup twice while trying this. It still removed all makeup, including mascara! It is gentle on the skin while getting rid of any impurities. I wish the price was a bit lower, but that is the only downfall. I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely obsessed with this product! I've been on the hunt to find a great cleanser for my dry and sensitive skin - after years of looking, I finally found my holy grail product!! This makes my skin so smooth, takes off all of my makeup, and doesn't make me break out. I recommend to anyone!! I love this so much

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: With my oily skin, I need a cleanser that is deep cleaning that can get the dirt out of my pores. This cleanser was fine, just didn’t meet my desired standards. It was too gentle, but if you have sensitive skin, this cleanser is perfect for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how it feels like cetaphil but actually takes my makeup off! I use a micellar toner after my face wash and there is no leftover makeup which is impressive for how gentle it feels. It smells natural, a bit like grass which I like. I received it free for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: BEST CLEANSER EVER. This is so worth your money. It doesn’t dry your skin out. I have sensitive skin and I am in my teen years and this works wonders for my skin. I recommend it to all the teens out there and adults.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite cleanser. I always thought high end expensive cleansers were bs and work just like my drugstore ones but I was wrong. This not only easily removes all my makeup (especially eye makeup without irritation) but it leaves my skin feeling fresh and a little moisturized unlike other cleansers that leave me feeling stripped. It also doesn’t irritate or leave my sensitive skin red.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is life! It is so good for my sensitive skin. The only thing I dont love is the amount of product for that price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this product! It has a slight fragrance of cucumber and it is gentle on my skin. I like that it cleanses without drying my skin. Overall, it is a good product!  I received this product for free in exchange for an unbiased review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fresh's Soy Face Cleanser has a cult following and has also been a longtime favorite cleanser of mine. It is truly a great gentle, every day cleanser that hydrates, nourishes, soothes, and protects the skin, and is appropriate for all skin types! The gel texture is extremely gentle, especially in the delicate eye area. The soy cleanser provides a deep cleanse and is tough on makeup, without the after effects of drying out or stripping the skin. The cleanser effectively removes all traces of mascara, eye makeup, dirt and debris. Skin is left looking and feeling hydrated and refreshed. It is fragrance free, however has natural scent of cucumber and rosewater extract. While the price of may be a bit of a sticker shock for some, little product is required per use. 150 mL tube is generously sized and lasts a long time. Def will continue to purchase. I received this product complimentary for review from Influenster.

I can see it being a staple to my skincare routine but because of the price I probably wouldn’t purchase it regularly. As for ingredients, they are relatively safe. Some reviews claim that the soy cleanser has parabens - not sure if this is true? I’ve tried to look into this and don’t recognize any ingredients as parabens but then again I’m not an ingredient expert nor did I take the time to look up every single ingredient.
