reviews.review_text: I have used this for at least two years.  It cleans off all makeup and grime including mascara with just one wash.  All eye makeup removers I tried burned my eyes.  This cleanser does the job without irritating my eyes. I apply it to dry skin before adding water.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i received this product as a free sample and complimentary for testing purposed. I love this face wash. It really takes off my makeup well and seems to leave my face soft and dewy!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the texture of this gel cleanser.  It definitely left my face feeling smooth and clean.  It has a smell of soy which I'm indifferent about. I highly recommend this product to everyone!! I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Used in combination with the Fresh strawberry scrub, I’ve been very happy with how clear my face has been and how much more toned my skin seems. However, the strong cucumber smell is a little bit of a turn off for me, but it’s not bad enough to make me not continue to use it, as long as I continue to see results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I think this product would be a good cleanser for people who already have great skin that they would like to maintain. For me, with oily skin and a tendency for breakouts, it did nothing helpful. Just a fine cleanser no real strengths or weaknesses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Classic! You can’t go wrong. I use this as my second cleanser in my routine since I find it needs an oil or balm to melt the make up off first then it will take off the rest!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like this wash cleanser. I use everyday at morning and night and I like how leaves my skin so clean and fresh  but I think for that price you can find a similar cheaper product because this is too expensive . The smell is ok, not disgusting. I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a mixed review for this product. It’s nice and cleans my skin well but I don’t really like the smell (it smells like cucumbers which is not an offensive smell but I just don’t like it in a face wash) at first my skin HATED this face wash and I broke out but I kept using it and my skin eventually cleared up but I’m not obsessed with this product. I’ll finish what I have but probably won’t repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing!! I’ve been eying this product for quite some time and it’s so worth the hype!! It truly a good one step cleanser. Removes all trace of makeup, doesn’t over strip the face and I even believe it’s changed the texture of my skin I will be repurchasing this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this cleanser. It helps with my oily skin. I don’t care much for the scent though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Light cucumber scent. Left with a clean feeling and doesn’t irritate my sensitive skin. Don’t feel like it strips my skin of what it needs, but takes the unwanted make up and day off my face! Will continue to use in my daytime skin routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favourite face cleansers of all time. It is gentle on the skin and leaves my skin feeling super soft. It does not irritate my skin nor cause breakouts. I've used this with various facial tools such as the clarisonic, foreo, and boscia sponges, and never had a problem with any of them. I hope they never discontinue this cleanser! I received this free to try for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m very impressed by this product. Having super sensitive skin makes finding a gentle face cleanser that is effective a bit of a challenge, but this product fits that for me. My skin doesn’t feel dried out after using it and feels soft. This is my go-to for makeup removing. I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product along with the strawberry sugar scrub for the last few weeks and I like that they are gentle cleansers and have ingredients that are good for the skin. It also smells like cucumber and is very refreshing. However, I notice after I get out of the shower that I still have some foundation residue, mainly in my dry areas. So this face wash may be a bit too gentle for me and it has a high price point which is why I gave it 3 stars. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed is an understatement!  The soy face cleanser removed my makeup almost effortlessly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Cult classic. Effortlessly removes makeup, you barely have to scrub. Face never feels tight after using either. Love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this cleanser. It removes dirt and any makeup left over from the day. I like that I can use it over my eyes, mascara can be stubborn. I also suffer from red/blotchy skin, which I feel this has helped even out my skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I get really nervous trying new cleansers because of a past with acne, but so far I haven’t had any problems. This was gentle on my face and didn’t dry out my skin. I wasn’t super pumped about the smell...it was kind of a mix between cucumber and chemicals (but not in an overpowering, sickening way - I just prefer unscented). I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I first delved into crafting a skincare routine, I began with this gentle but mighty cleanser. I saw results right away. My skin always feels fantastic after I use it! I recommend this wash to everybody I know.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great basic cleanser that has been in my skincare routine for years. I switch up products all the time but I always keep this cleanser handy. It won't remove makeup well, so be sure to use a makeup remover first. This is non-drying and gentle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a mini of this cleanser as one of my rewards.  I would definitely recommend it for anyone with sensitive skin, as it’s very gentle and didn’t irritate my skin at all.  It’s effective when it comes to cleansing the face without leaving your skin feeling completely stripped.  And it has a fresh, cucumber scent.  I wasn’t blown away though by this cleanser, so I don’t see myself buying a full size bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was selected to try the Fresh Soy Face Cleanser for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest opinion and I now know why this is a cult favourite for so many people! This cleanser is incredibly gentle, yet effective, and leaves my skin so soft and healthy looking. I’ve been using this product after removing my makeup at bedtime and it does an incredible job of removing any remaining impurities without irritating or stripping my sensitive skin. The gel cleanser is easily and evenly spread onto the skin and a little bit goes a long way. After using this for the last few weeks I have not experienced any breakouts on my sensitive skin. The only issues with the cleanser for me are the price and the smell. I find it to be extremely pricey and it smells terrible. Other than that, it’s an incredible cleanser and I will continue to use it but am unsure if I would purchase it again based on price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! It leave my skin very soft and it smells very good. It’s a very gentle cleanser so not to harsh on my skin. I gave a 4 because when I put a full coverage makeup I need to cleanse twice because once is not enough. Beside that, I really recommend it. It’s also a good combination with their new exfoliate cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser, I use it with my Clarisonic and it leaves my skin soft and smooth. It is also not over drying to the skin like some cleansers are. It also smells amazing. Love Fresh products so much would definitely recommend! I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is gentle and smells nice! It foams up a tiny bit making it easy to cleanse the whole face with only a small amount. It leaves my skin really nice and soft and gives me a good boost of moisture, especially in the winter! It’s a little pricey but it’s definitely worth it! I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had never heard of this brand before I got a box from Influenster to try out two of their face washes. I'm happy I did because I really liked both products. I already reviewed the Sugar Strawberry Exfoliating Face Wash, which I personally favored of the two, but this is still a great face wash and one I can see many loving. It is a simple tube with a snap cap and comes in a clear, gel form. The fragrance gives me cucumber and soy, which I found refreshing and not very strong, but if you're sensitive to either of those, just be mindful. This was extremely  gentle on my skin which is on the sensitive side. It didn't lather much, but it did leave my skin clean and not stripped of moisture. I had my boyfriend try it after he got sunburned to wash his face, and it was extremely gentle for him as well, while still cleaning his skin. Overall, I think this is a great option for those who have sensitive skin, or simply prefer a gentler but still effective facial cleanser.

reviews.review_title: I WILL NEVER GO BACK TO ANOTHER FACE WASH
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This face wash actually makes my face feel clean! I can’t believe I am just trying this face wash now.. I struggle with sensitive and dry skin and this wash has worked wonders for my face! Ever since using it my face has become softer and brighter.. I’m not the best face washer every night so even when I skip a night, my face is still well hydrated and fresh. I would highly recommend this product! Thank you influenster for sending me this to try! I will never be without it now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is so gentle and effective! No perfumes, no gunk. Leaves my skin feeling refreshed, clear and clean! I received this complimentary for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the Soy exfoliator but there was nothing special to me about this face wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have repurchased this item 2 times. I used to live by it. My skin is just so terrible for the time that I did not take care of my face that I need a miracle to fix it. I love this face wash so much the price point is worth it but sometimes I just can’t afford it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn’t a big fan of this product. I didn’t like the smell which is a negative for me. I also didn’t feel like my skin was clean afterwards, I went back and used my normal face wash afterwards. I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this cleaner! Very light and gentle on the skin. Smells great and leaves my face feeling refreshed! I received this as a complimentary sample

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This face cleanser made my skin feel amazing! The packaging is so sleek and easy to store. I love using this to get my makeup off and it doesn’t a really good job of it! I would recommend it to all of my friends!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product worked really well for me. Not only did it leave my face feeling fresh and clean, it also got all my makeup off without any harsh rubbing. It also had a very refreshing smell which was really nice. I got this product free for testing purposes, and I don’t think I’ll be able to use any old face wash from this point on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great, gentle everyday facial cleanser that can be used both AM and PM. I liken it to the glossier jelly cleanser, but I think fresh‘s soy cleanser is a little better. It leaves my skin hydrated while also feeling clean. And it removes my makeup as well! I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

I have sensitive skin and this feels very gentle on my skin. I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this produce complimentary from influenster and I love it! It smells so refreshing and is gentle enough for my acne prone skin. I have not found it to irritate my skin at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item comolimentarty form Influesnter. Very nice simple and gentle cleanser. No harsh dyes or fragrances and doesn't severely dry your skin out at all. Good to use both morning and night but i don't think I suggest to use as a makeup remover since its so gentle. Does make you feel very clean but if you do decide to use as a makeup remover wash your face twice just to be safe

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product was really good for me! It’s  lightly formulated but gets all of the dirt and oil off of my face! I had never heard of this product until I received it for free from influenster! I have been using it daily and nightly! It has improved the oil control on my face! This will be a repeat product for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for years now and it has always given me an immediate brightening effect. It melts my makeup away (even my tattoo Kay von d trooper liner) in one easy swipe. And when I do have a breakout, after said pimple is open, I wash my face with this over my open wound and it pretty much heals it over night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive skin and love this cleanser, the cucumber scent is soft enough that it doesn't bother my skin, and I can use it to wash my eye Makeup off. Overall this cleanser does everything I want A cleanser to do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell of this like light cucumber, it’s a light cleanser that’s very gentle. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to cleanser! I wouldn’t normally spend this much on a cleanser, but I think it’s worth the money. I have very sensitive and dry skin that likes to  randomly freak out, but it never reacts to this cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin

I felt the need to use something else to have my face feel ‘fresh’ and clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing face wash. It smells great, doesn't make me break out, and does a great job of removing makeup. It's more than I would ideally spend on a face cleaner this size, but it's good enough to be worth it.  I'm trying to move to cruelty free products, so I'm hoping I'll find out that it is or I'll be very sad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Nice great cleanser. First time using it, I felt like it did nothing as it was super gentle!!! This did not strip my face as making it super dry at all, it felt nice and smooth. Second and third use, I finally had some makeup on, and oh lord, this is my new makeup cleanser! This remove all of my makeup and mascara! I’m shock as this is super gentle! It has a scent of cucumber smell to it, which doesn’t bother me. So far, I love it! With this I don’t have to go in with my face wipe and cleansing oil, I can just dive into this cleanser to do all the work! Amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using the cleanser for 4 years now and it’s the most gentle cleaner ever. It doesn’t leave my face feeling dry or oily, I just feel very refreshed after using it Day and night. I’ve never had a reaction from it and I will continue to keep using this until they run out!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smooth and gentle. Doesnt give much foam but works well. Easy to rinse off as well. Works great on my sensitive face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought a travel size to try out and it works well but I noticed that my skin feels dry and I have to moisturize as soon as I wash my face or I get dry patches and agitated skin. I most definitely recommend and prefer the tarte deep dive cleansing gel. My skin did amazing with that and the hyaluronic acid locks in moisture and leaves my skin hydrated and clean. This fresh one really just strips my skin. I took of one star because it works well but for myself personally, it is just too drying.

reviews.review_title: Hard pass because of the scent.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did not like how this cleanser smelled. I disliked it so much that I didn't even give it a fair chance and only used it two times. I was out of cleanser which is the reason I even used it twice, but as soon as I could I went to buy a different one. I've been trying cleansers for the last few months and from the ones I've tried (Drunk Elephant, Indie Lee, Youth to the People) this is my least favorite because of the weird scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Standard cleanser. I would like this a lot more if it didn’t smell like pickles to me. My sister loves it though and it is a cult product so I think pickle issue is more of a me thing than an indicator of the product. I got this for free from Influenster. I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really do like this product and how it feels and you know it is natural

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm OBSESSED with this stuff!!  It leaves my face feeling clean and soft and the smell is amazing!  I have sensitive skin and I have to be careful what I put on my face but this stuff doesn't bother my skin at all!  I ordered the small bottle( I'm on a budget)  but it will last me a while.  I only need a little bit of it to wash my whole face and neck. Like a drop that's smaller than a dime...  And that's it!  Idk maybe I'm not using enough but it works for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how gentle this cleanser feels on my skin. I have combination skin and  I'm really happy that I can use this on my eyelids as well to remove all the makeup I could have. I wish the product was more affordable as I will probably not repurchase because to me $33-38 for a cleanser is a bit much. I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really good gentle cleanser. Doesn’t lather a lot but really gives a nice clean feeling. Also works great w/ Clarisonic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First off I love this cleanser. I use it to remove makeup including eyes/ mascara and it cleans off easily. It does not irritate the eyes whatsoever like other cleansers. A little goes a long way. It has a very slight scent of cucumber nothing over powering not really fragrant, which I love. It’s a slippery/soft texture when applied on wet face , very easy to apply! I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face cleanser! It makes my face feel so clean and fresh and I love the scent! It reminds me of fresh cucumbers. There are so many face cleansers out there and I have tried several. This is my favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for probably 5 years now and I love it. I actually use it for makeup remover, mostly on eyes because it’s so gentle. Will keep buying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This face wash is great if you have dry skin. It is extremely moisturizing. The scent was really nice; not overbearing but also not nonexistent. I personally was not a huge fan of the face wash due to the fact that it made my skin more oily than usual. My skin becomes oily very easily so because of how moisturizing the face wash was my skin became oily very quickly. I think that this would be a great face wash to use in the colder months when my skin could use the moisture. I am giving it four stars because of the price. While I did receive this product free if I had really enjoyed it the price would have definitely hindered me from buying it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is awesome. It's mildy fragrenced and smells really good. Makes skin feel clean and refreshed after each use. I use this as my morning cleanser. I will definitely be repurchasing. (this was sent to me by influenster.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have super dry skin and the cleanser i was using was seriously drying it out, which in turn made all of my base products look dry and cakey. After switching to this Fresh cleanser my skin is gorgeous and the dryness is pretty much gone! I will always have this on hand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s really fresh lol and smells so good , I love that it’s really light on your face and smooth

reviews.review_buyer_description: fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

It calms my temperamental skin and and get compliments from family on how my skin glows.   It also lasts a long time, you don't need very much to wash your face. I love this stuff and can't say it more plainly. Buy it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the holy grails of products. It is great for everyday use. I have sensitive skin and this does not irritate my skin at all. Good for getting makeup off. I received this product for free to test.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It was okay. I didn’t think the product was amazing or anything. The first couple days I used it, I had a break out of acne, but it eventually went away. The consisting was weird as well, and the smell was not that pleasant. It got the job done and cleaned my face, but I would not go out and by the product myself.   I received this product for free or complimentary for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great everyday face cleanser. This cleanser does not feel overly stripping or harsh on the skin but still leaves the skin feeling well-cleansed and doesn't leave any oily film or residue behind. There's no scent and I it does not irritate my skin. I love using it in the morning to refresh my skin for the day! I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is now one of my favorites! It’s so gentle on my skin, it helped removes makeup like it claims! Love the fact that there is very little scent on this product, definitely met my standards! And I can’t wait to purchase! I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new daily facial cleanser! This is an amazing, gentle cleanser. I get flair ups of cystic acne, but I've been using a heavy duty cleanser to combat this. However, I've recently been fairly clear skinned and this helps me stay cleared and calmed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin has been acting so crazy lately. I'm generally pretty dry year round but I also have large pores on my nose & chin, and I also get acne flair ups on the regular. I didn't really notice anything special about this cleanser. It did remove most of the makeup that my makeup remover wipe left behind, but it didn't remove the mascara so I had to go in with an eye makeup remover pad. It didn't seem to dry me out more than any of the other washes I use regularly, but it also didn't leave me feeling very hydrated either. I recieved this complimentary for testing purposes & I do not think I will repurchase when it's gone, but I will use it up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my second purchase of this face wash and I love it! I have combo skin and this face wash cleanses my skin leaving it smooth and soft without any oiliness. While it is not acne specific, using this wash at night and in the morning has improved the blemishes on my face. The formula is gentle, yet it still packs a punch. I do enjoy the cucumber fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is the first kind of facial cleanser that i’ve ever used and it’s helped my skin and helped removing makeup well. i enjoy this product a lot. i received this product for free or complimentary for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin has felt so hydrated using this product. My face never feels dry or tight when I’ve used it. the smell is pleasant and simple. It has done lots for my skin in the week and a half that I’ve been using it. I recommend this product to everyone! Especially if you have sensitive skin.

reviews.review_title: This is a nope for me...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly I thought it was a great (and easy) idea to try this when we went out of town. Boy was I wrong! I used it the morning of the wedding to wash my face and within 5 hours I had pimples forming on my cheeks (which is an area I never break out in). Besides that the consistency isn’t what I expected, it didn’t lather or feel like it cleaned my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is so light and moisturizing, but powerful. I use this cleanser after removing my makeup with a wipe and it gets everything I left behind. My second favorite thing about it is that it is gentle enough to be used on the eyes. I have never once felt my eyes being burned or irritated by this product. My first favorite thing about this is the smell. It smells so fresh and fruity, but doesn't linger enough to irritate. I use this every day and it makes my skin so soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Now this one I loved. The cucumber smell is just enough and I really love how it’s a gel. It feels great and leaves my skin soft and feeling clean!! I would actually buy this product again, happily! 10/10 for me. I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought for sure that this product had to be overhyped with all the rave reviews, but I was wrong! This stuff is fantastic! It takes off all my makeup (even mascara) so easily, it practically glides off. I massage it into my skin for a minute and it makes my skin softer and glowier. I have super sensitive, oily skin and this is gentle on my skin, it does not irritate it at all like many other products have. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes but opinions are all my own and unbiased. I will definitely be repurchasing this one when I run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Light and gentle cleanser. I like the texture and light smell- although I have super sensitive skin so probably wouldn’t use it EVERY day. But good choice for a delicate cleanser here and there!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is starting to replace my daily cleanser! The fresh Soy Face Cleanser has a sort of gel consistency and smells a bit like cucumbers. It is extremely gentle, and leaves my skin feeling very fresh (lol)! My skin tends to be dry, so my skin typically feels very tight after taking a shower, which urges me to apply moisturizer. This cleanser does not make my skin feel dry or tight at all after using it in the shower, and it almost made me forget to apply moisturizer! I would highly recommend this cleanser!! I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: OMG, this is probably my favorite daily cleanser at the moment. I received this product from Influenster and it became my daily holy grail. Every night I will use this cleanser to remove my makeup and it works really well (even with waterproof mascara on.) This soy cleanser feels very very soft on my face and definitely makes your skin glowy and radiant. I have tried different types of cleanser before will make my face very dry and harsh towards my skin, but not this one. The only cons about this product is very pricey. $40 for a cleanser I feel is a little too much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample, but wow!! This product leaves my skin feeling so smooth, clean and refreshed! 10/10 recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product from Influenster and  I really like how gentle the cleanser is on the face, it really cleans all the make up off leaving the skin smooth and I love using the exfoliator her right after!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was  so great on my sensitive skin and made my skin feel radiant smooth almost as if I had used a high-quality primer that’s how smooth it makes my skin. Easy on sensitive eyes too.  the cucumber send is so refreshing and not too overpowering. I will be incorporating this into your daily skincare routine both night and day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

I double cleanse my face so I use it as my second step.  The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars was that it didn’t remove my waterproof mascara.  I would still keep this in my routine even as a morning wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Not too strong, but perfect for a night routine!

The soy smell is strong yet makes me feel really relaxed before going to bed when washing my face at night!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It does remove ll your make up (I don;t use waterproof mascara though) but it it irritates your eyes. I tried a cheap cleanser I bought at Aldi and it didn't irritate my eyes.

reviews.review_text: Very gentle face wash. I like the feel of it and I love that it doesn’t strip my face of its natural oils. It feels really good on the skin. I have dry/normal skin and it doesn’t dry my skin out which is amazing. I totally recommend.

reviews.review_title: balancing, gentle, and worth the price

reviews.review_text: Does what it's meant to do. Helps refresh my skin and keep it balanced, while also being gentle and kind to my sensitive skin. In my opinion the product is worth it, because even though it's a big price, a little product goes a long way. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The soy cleanser earns its title as a best seller with its soft approach to scent and face care. I have oily skin and found that the cleanser is more adequate than most. Other than that, I would recommend this for anyone looking for a simple addition to their daily facial routine. Product received complimentary for testing purposes.

reviews.review_title: Gentle and good for daily use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! It’s very gentle and great for daily use. I have normal/sensitive skin and have had no problems using this cleanser daily.   The consistency is like a light gel and it has a fresh, cucumber scent. As much as I love the cleanser, the fragrance is a little too strong for my preference so i’m giving it 4 stars instead of 5.   Overall, it’s a great daily cleanser that I would recommend as long as you’re okay with fragranced products.   I received this product for free, but that does not affect my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff!!! The texture takes getting used to but it removes makeup so well.. especially mascara. I use it nightly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time using Fresh products and I am beyond pleased! This cleanser is gentle on my skin and now a staple in my routine. I received it free from Influenster but will purchase again when I run out. Would recommend to a friend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had tried multiple samples of the Fresh Soy Face Cleanser before receiving the full size product to review. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn’t a big fan of the scent because it reminded me of the fields outside my parents’ house. Although it did leave my skin clean and clear. Just bit the product for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! It also smells super natural! I like how this product cleanse my face and leaves it feeling super smooth and clean. I love the texture of the wash as well. definitely does it job and no irritation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this because it seems to be a cult fav with a lot of influencers. I see the hype and I don’t. It doesn’t really foam up so I feel like i need a lot to cover my face to make sure I get a good wash, especially after a work out. The scent is cucumbery and refreshing. It is very very gentle, especially around the eye area which is great when I need to wash off eye makeup. It is quite expensive for a cleanser for me, so I wouldn’t really see myself repurchasing since it didn’t do anything different than a drugstore cleanser. (I received this complimentary for testing purposes).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this cleanser on and off between a few other brands that are similar like origins and Kiehl. I believe that Fresh skincare is a very great line and this Gentle Soy Cleanser is one of my favorite products by far. I have combination skin and It leaves my face fresh and ready to prep for makeup or for bed! I highly recommend this brand. I did receive these products free to try but this does not effect my review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing and does a great job at removing my makeup and gently cleansing.    Packaging is nice and simple.   *I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used the Soy Face Cleanser after I had taken my surface makeup off with a wipe. I made a mistake the first time I used it though. I squeezed out the “normal” amount I use for face wash and started applying it on my skin. I quickly realized I used WAY too much! I learned my lesson and have only been using a pea size amount since. My blunder just goes to show you how effective this cleanser is.  The scent is also quite nice. It smells very fresh and clean, with a hint of cucumber, which I found to be very soothing. Although packaging doesn’t affect how effective the product is, I do appreciate the simple design, and easy to use squeeze bottle.  As a side note…I love the fonts Fresh uses on their packaging! I can’t be the only one who loves a good font.  Although it is a gel base, its super rich and a little does go a long way–so the value is great! After washing it off with water and patting my face dry with a towel, I noticed that not only did my skin feel clean, it felt soft. I have never used a cleanser that made my skin feel like I had already put my serums, moisturizers etc. on it. With other products I have found that my natural oils have been drawn out, which isn’t a huge deal breaker for me, as I put oils on my face anyway, but the Soy Face Cleanser preserved my skins structure, whilst cleaning out any impurities.  *Gifted Product*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very average cleanser. It’s extremely gentle, which I’m sure is fine for some, but doesn’t really cut it for me. I have combination skin, and I feel like it doesn’t really get rid of the oil in the way I’d like it to. I’m sure this is a great product for someone with super sensitive skin, but unfortunately, it doesn’t do much for me besides the bare minimum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Normal skin
Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly not impressed with this product at all. Strawberries are my favorite fruit, so I was super excited to try this. One whiff of this, and I couldn’t put my finger on what the scent was. It definitely didn’t smell great. I figure it has more of a scent of cucumber, which is my absolute least favorite scent. On top of that I would have not paid the $38 retail price, especially since it doesn’t seem like the cleanser really does anything for my skin.  I received this product free for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cleanser is GREAT and GENTLE for sensitive and acne prone skin. Deeply cleanses the skin without stripping it of its natural oils. Light and fresh cucumber scent. Creamy and gel-like substance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this. I was so excited to try it. Smells great, i feel like it cleans very well however, I have sensitive skin and although it says it’s for all skin types, mine did not like it at all. I know people who use this and swear by it. I personally liked it but my face doesn’t. I broke out even more and my face is very itchy and hot. I don’t know why it took over 2 weeks to have this reaction but it’s here. I thought maybe it was something I ate so I gave it a few days and I get the same reaction every time.  I recommend this for people who don’t have extra sensitive skin!!!!  On to the next I guess...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A great lightly scented gentle cleanser that also removes makeup!

Doesn’t leave skin feeling tight or dry. No irritating fragrance! It doesn’t foam or bubble much but it does have a slippery texture on wet skin. Skin feels refreshed and cleansed after. Highly recommend! I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_title: Excited to Cleanse my skin.. LOVE!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'll start with.. I don't typically use gel cleansers on my face any more.  I started using more milks or cream cleansers as my skin is dry.  BUT.  Let me just say I AM IN LOVE with this soy cleanser.  Firstly, it is an experience to my senses.. it smells amazing to me.  Like fresh cucumber in combo with other freshness... a little goes a long way and it is safe for Eyes to remove makeup.. thank you!   It takes very little to wash my face and eyes.  My skin feels very clean afterwards.    My skin always feels a little tight after gel cleansers and this one is no exception but I do adore it and will for sure use through the summer.. getting off all the makeup and sunscreen etc.. this is just fantastic.   My skin feels invigorated.   I've been using this along with the Sugar Strawberry exfoliating face wash which is also excellent.    They both make me excited to cleanse my skin which is a win.  LOVE!   I received this complimentary for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m giving this product three stars because it does what it’s supposed to. It’s an okay cleanser, I’ve definitely used better before, but it gets the job done. I would not spend the money on it when there are better options at lower price points.

The wash has a fairly strong cucumber scent which I have never been a fan of. It also does not foam or react in any way. Personally I like to stick to foaming or exfoliating washes! I did receive this product complimentary for testing so overall I can’t complain!

I’ve never been one to care to use the same cleanser over and over again but I’ll definitely keep using this and buy it!

I'm so in love with this item especially now that I discovered the limited edition versions with cute art on the bottle, they are such a treat!!!

I received this as a free sample and would definitely purchase it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The fresh soy face clenser is amazing, it works wonderfully.   Being using it twice a day daily,  my skin is nice and soft, it dosen't  irritate my skin and hasn't given me any pimples or  given me blemishes . reviews.review_title: Favorite cleanser of all the time
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is so far the best cleanser I used since the beginning. Of all the cleanser I tried this is the one that suits everyone one and every skin type. I used this in winter and it didn’t dry my skin. I used this during my travel in Asia and it didn’t make my skin oilier. It’s perfect if you are just look for a regular cleanser that cleanse your skin. This may not hydrate your skin or purify or anything else but I realize that the less I used the better my skin feel. This is one of the product I can’t get away from. I received this product complimentary for review purposes but I have purchased this product multiple times with my own money before.
I am still testing out this cleanser. It leaves your face feeling very clean. It has a refreshing smell. So far, I am enjoying it! I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i really like this product so far, it leaves my face feeling fresh and oil free. love the cucumber smell, very refreshing in the mornings.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample through Influenster. I’ve been searching for a gentle yet effective cleanser for a very long time and I think I’ve finally found the one! It leaves my face feeling fresh and clean without irritating my skin at all.

reviews.review_title: Glowy skin and a nice subtle scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nice refreshing scent and doesn’t leave my skin feeling dry like some cleansers do. Afterwards my skin looks a little glowier and feels amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my all time favorite gentle cleansers! It’s very sudsy and leaves my skin feeling super fresh and clean. I received this from from Influenster and I’m glad I did.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff smells just like how cucumber water tastes. It’s very mild and gentle. It took off all my makeup without drying out my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this cleanser. It has this AMAZING cucumber scent which some might find irritating, but I find it delicious! It’s very gentle, but my face actually feels clean after using it which is often a struggle I have with gentle cleansers. It can be a tad drying, so make sure to properly hydrate after!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Truth is, I develop a zit here and the next day I put on something on my face. Whether it's a new cleanser, toner, or moisturizer. I was actually expecting to see a few the next morning but I was surprised it wasn't the case. I thought, okay, maybe a bit later. Now, I've used it for 6 times now and haven't seen anything. Well, that's good! No irritation whatsoever.   Every after use, my skin really felt soft and smooth. It really left my skin fresh and not stripped of moisture. I've not put on mascara these past few days so I can't tell yet if it would be helpful in removing it, but I've put on CC cream, foundation, powder, blush, and they've been cleaned together with dirt.   I kinda was looking for the soapy, bubbly feel when I massage my face but this formula isn't. It just feels slippery when you massage it. It's also a plus because it doesn't have that strong scent. Instead, it gives the calming scent of of cucumber.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the consistency of this face wash, however, I always noticed my cheeks being super red and irritated after doing my skin routine. I stopped using this and now I don’t have reactions anymore. So unfortunately this didn’t work for my skin

reviews.review_title: Gentle but effective cleanser AND makeup remover!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I picked this up at a 100-point reward (which, by the way, compared to a lot of 100-point rewards is a lot of product - the 0.6 fl. oz tube has lasted me over two weeks now and is still going strong, which is also a testament to how little product I need to use every day to clean my face with this) and I will definitely be repurchasing when I finish it! It feels gentle and nourishing, but at the same time it really removes all my makeup and leaves my skin feeling really clean.  I have really oily skin, so that in itself makes me feel kinda gross sometimes, but this really does make me feel fresh (no pun intended), but I also use liquid liners quite often, which can be difficult to get off, especially the lash line, yet this removes my with little effort (and scrubbing) and it doesn't irritate my eyes or skin.   Definitely worth trying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

If you don't mind using a strong scent, this cleanser is great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: This cleanser has been my go to daily cleanser for over a year now.  It takes off mascara and makeup without barely any effort and at the same time makes my face feel so soft and moisturized.  It's worth the price for me, very little goes a long way.  I've looked for a cheaper alternative, tried many different products after looking online, but I have never found one that even comes close.  It has a silky texture, a light, fresh (almost cucumber) scent. If you haven't tried it, I would highly recommend it.  It has eliminated the need for several products I've used in the past, and completely changed my daily routine for the better.  My skin has never felt healthier.

reviews.review_title: love the product, not the price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the product, not a fan of the price. it leaves your face feeling hydrated & smooth. Smells good too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Worth every penny, I’ll never use anything else and I’ve tried! Leaves my skin feeling hydrated and not stripped and squeaky clean like others. Not only does it remove all my makeup easily but my eye makeup melts off without any irritation to my eyes. I saw they released a larger limited edition size so I’ll purchase that. My only grip is that I wish that a larger size was more available.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my long time go to face cleanser! I use this at night to remove face and eye makeup. It does just that without burning my eyes, drying out my skin, leaving behind a film or that stripped clean feeling. I love it. If you do have drier skin a moisturizer would be necessary post face wash. I use this year round with the lotus youth preserve night cream during the day and the ordinary rosehip oil at night.

reviews.review_title: Never looking for another make up remover!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only make remover I use. It gets everything off and leaves no oils behind. It also never dries out my skin or irritates it. This will always be a constant staple in my bathroom.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have pretty sensitive skin, and this is one of the few cleansers I've tried that doesn't make my skin look red or feel all tingly/burn-y when I'm using it. Smells great to boot!

reviews.review_title: Not for dry skin (at least my very dry skin)

reviews.review_text: Love the smell and the consistency, I wish it goes with my skin but unfortunately this is a no no for my very dry skin, o tried it few times but it over dried me,, so sad I can't use this cleanser .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: I’ll never buy a different cleanser

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the full size after receiving a sample size because I loved it so much. I had been using a scented soap to clean my face but always had a ton of tiny blemishes. Now my skin is so smooth and clear. My dr even exclaimed I had gorgeous skin and asked what I use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cleans my face of oil, dirt, makeup, and anything left from the day without that tight dry feeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t know if I will ever try another cleanser again. This is all I will ever need. Gentle on my skin but tough enough to sweep away dirt and mascara. my skin feels so clean! I love this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very good product, smells like cucumbers but not too overpowering, leaves skin clean but not stripped. I have combo/sensitive skin. Not a repurchase but love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: leaves a weird film after rinsing and makes me break out horribly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a fear of commitment when it comes to cleanser monogamy. By the time I finish the tube, I’m bored and I want to try the next new thing.   I’ve flipped back and forth for years, but this has always been on rotation. In the last year, I’ve developed an onset of cystic acne they seemingly cane without warning. I decided to simplify my routine and focus on gently ingredients with purpose. I’m proud to say that I am on my 3rd tube of this and my skin is happier for it. It’s very gentle and effective without stripping the skin.   I remove my makeup off beforehand, but this does help to get the excess bits off.   It also has a very pleasant scent, very reminiscent of cucumber water.   For reference, I am mid 20s with combo skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very good cleanser. It's gentle and does not dry out of my face, but strong enough to remove most of my makeup. I am still left with a bit of residue from my waterproof mascara, took off 1 point for that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Doesn’t remove my makeup and all I wear is mascara and concealer...

reviews.review_title: Average performance for a high price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am very surprised that this product is so highly rated. I was looking for a mild cleanser as I use two at the same time, one more exfoliating and one which is mild. I’m very disappointed in this product as it smells like a rotten cucumber. It’s a very strong scent and I immediately hate using it. Additionally, it gives an average performance as a cleanser- I don’t really feel clean after using it. There are drugstore products which do a much better job and with this price tag, this should be performing miracles. Instead you get a smelly, overpriced product that doesn’t even do the job right. I still give it 3 stars as there are definitely worse products out there but I wouldn’t recommend it, save your money!

reviews.review_text: Love this face cleanser. Makes my skin feel great after using it. Takes off my makeup and has made the redness and dry patches that started to appear on my face go away.

reviews.review_text: My absolute favorite cleanser! I’m now on my 2nd bottle after using 2 other cleansers one by Kate Somerville and First Aid Beauty and while those are good, nothing compares to this one. Love the cucumber scent!

Only complaint if sometimes I would have to wash my face more than once because it did not feel clean enough after the first wash (this was only when it was a hot day and I had been wearing make up all day)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice, light cleanser, definitely makes you feel fresh. Got a sample, loved it so I purchased, but after about 2 weeks of using it my whole fave broke out in little tiny bumps and I was completely red.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this ! I typically have eyes that get very irritated by cleansers but this is gentle and so good at taking my makeup off completely, and it’s never made me break out !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this cleanser intermittently with Peter Thomas Roth's Anti-Aging Cleansing Gel. I LOVE the latter but as my skin has started aging and winter weather feels more harsh than usual, I find that my skin needs something more gentle and moisturizing. I wear a full face of makeup almost everyday which, I've always loved PTR because it washes all the make off effortlessly, but I've found it can also leave me a bit extra dry when my skin is just tired and dehydrated. The Soy Face Cleanser is the perfect alternative for those days. It does take a bit more effort to take off mascara and liquid liner, I would suggest using maker remover or oil to help remove the makeup. Otherwise, I love the fresh scent, cooling and hydrating feel of this cleaner. Plus this tube will last me most of the year.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is so revitalizing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product for a very long time and loved it. I started using it when I was on Accutane and couldn’t find a single cleanser that didn’t hurt to use bc of how incredibly dry my skin was — I was immensely relieved when I found this cleanser, and for continued using it for years after finishing my course of Accutane. It removes makeup very well (it would make a great first step in any double wash regimen), helped even my skin tone, didn’t smell like chemicals, and was gentle. Unfortunately, several years later, my skin started breaking out again, so I switched to a different oil-free cleanser. Regardless, I highly recommend this cleanser if you have dry, sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle on your skin, smells like refreshing cucumber, and cleans off eye makeup in one go...no residue and gentle on the thin skin in the eye area...really love this product

reviews.review_text: Gentle, fairly effective. Works great with a double cleanse, or with a clarsonic. Low fragrance, rinses off well. Good for my sensitive skin but doesn't feel like it does a good enough job removing makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this for like 2 years now. Literally the best face cleanser I’ve ever used and I will neverrrr stop buying it

reviews.review_title: A bit drying, but gives a good clean feeling

reviews.review_text: I like how it removes all the make up after a long day, but I always have to follow up with a super moisturizing cream, because it dries my sensitive skin. Overall it's a good thorough face wash, but if you have dry and sensitive skin, as i do, be careful with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Got this face wash as a bridal gift before my wedding. Been using for about a month now. My skin is fresher and clearer than ever. My skin complexion is coming back to normal. Leaves your face feeling refreshed! Definitely buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite skin care brands! Light weight product that leaves you feeling fresh. I use this every day whether I’m removing make up or just cleaning my face.

reviews.review_text: This is okay, nothing spectacular. I have combination, acne-prone skin and throughout using this, I got little bumps on my chin that were never there before. I also didn’t love the scent of it. It is a foaming cleanser. A little does not go a long way with this! I went through a whole bottle, but I won’t buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The entire Fresh line of skincare products is amazing. I have yet to use a product I didn’t love. This cleanser is nice and light. It thoroughly cleanses your skill leaving your face feeling fresh and smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This face wash is amazing! It’s so gentle on the skin, and goes perfectly with my Clarisonic. It doesn’t feel like it’s completely stripping my face, but it feels so fresh and clean afterward. For the amount you get the price is right, so I will definitely be purchasing again! The only thing I would warn about is that it has a strong cucumber-like scent. If you don’t like that smell, you definitely won’t want to buy this.

reviews.review_title: A little harsh for Accutane, otherwise good!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm on Accutane, so I switched to this cleanser because I read it was really gentle. Good news, it is, my skin is just super sensitive. I was looking for something that didn't give me that squeeky clean feeling after washing. I definitely couldn't survive this alone without moisturizer after, but it does a great job of removing makeup and oil. If I wasn't so sensitive, it would most likely get 5 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cleans face well. Liked the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great cleanser. I have combination/sensitive/Asian-Indian skin and this does a great job taking off all my makeup. I have super sensitive eyes and a lot of cleansers irritate my eyes but this one doesn’t. It doesn’t make my skin feel super dry or stripped after cleansing. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: got this bad boy for Christmas, didn't really use it until today. when I used it I was shook to the core, I had a full face of makeup on and BOOM it was off. not only that but my skin is GLOWING I've never felt better about me skin before mate, buy it u won't be disappointed *drops mic*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product really helped my skin! I have acne and eczema. I used to try out many cleansers, as I needed one that would cleanse my skin but wouldn't dry it out. I couldn't find one that would cleanse my face without making my eczema irritated. I decided to try this cleanser out, and am glad I did. I am not saying that it worked a miracle, because I have experienced issues with my skin for a long time and do not expect one product to change that. However, the day after I started using this cleanser I saw a big difference! My pores felt clean, and my skin tone was even. I also noticed that while it worked well do help with the pimples on my face,  but it did not dry or irritate my skin! It does smell like cucumbers, but the scent isn't too strong. I also do not wear makeup, so I am unsure of how well it removes it. Bottom line is, I love that that this cleanser makes my face feel so clean without drying it out!

reviews.review_title: So fresh, so clean, soy unpredictable
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Hey guys, one day I went into Sephora looking for natural green products because I had decided that I only wanted to use green products on my skin. A sales representative recommended the Soy Fresh facial cleanser and although it isn’t a green product I didn’t mind trying it out because it doesn’t contain a lot of harsh chemicals. I tried it for about a month and some change and I just didn’t love it. It didn’t make me breakout or anything but I never felt like it really dug deep down into my pores and cleaned my skin. I always felt like this product sat on top of my face instead of actually cleaning my face. Not only that, it never gave me a glow. I only continued to use it because I loved the consistency and the smell didn’t bother me; however, once I ran out, I knew I had to try something else because this wasn’t it. I am currently using the Farmacy Clean Bee Ultra Facial cleanser and I can honestly say I love it and feel that it works great with my oily/combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had acne problems for years before finding this facewash. After using, my face feels clean and fresh--it takes off layers of sunscreen and makeup, and is gentle even on the eyes.   It's not a 'makeup remover' per se, so I usually need to use a separate makeup remover if I wore heavy makeup that day for a night out or fancy event, but otherwise it does a really great job of taking off street makeup that I wear to work and leaving my skin clean and residue free.  It doesn't lather, it's more like a gel, so know what you're walking into, and that you need to rinse thoroughly. I use it morning and night with none of the sensitivity issues or overdrying that I've had with other cleansers. Blackheads and oil is controlled well with this.  The Sephora write up also cites that this addresses fine lines and wrinkles and loss of firmness--I didn't notice an uplift on those, which is my only disappointment. That being said, since it's very gentle and not highly drying, it's probably not harming your skin, where some of the harsher cleansers would cause harm. This wasn't a high priority for me in my cleanser. I correct for this in serums and moisturizers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very hydrating! Non- foaming but great for all skin types. Only complaint is the price point. So it's a better deal to get it in a set.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! I have been using this for a while now and it is still my go-to. I have very sensitive skin and this does not irritate it at all. You will still need to use a make-up remover for the hard to get off make-up, but overall I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love using this product! I believe I have normal skin but I use this to help clean my make up off and it works really well and my skin feels great after.

reviews.review_text: I love this product. So fresh

reviews.review_text: Good cleanser for the end of the day to get off any remaining makeup that makeup wipes might leave behind. Really gentle on the skin and eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect cleanser, it’s a perfect water based cleanser and I love how it makes my skin feel. It’s very gentle and it smells like cucumbers!!! I love it. I will always repurchase!!! Never thanks your formula!

reviews.review_title: Maybe try something else for sensitive/dry skin

For someone who wears little makeup and has oilier skin it seems like a great buy, but for someone who wears more makeup and has sensitive skin, it wasn't the right fit.  Smells great though!!

reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser but the 5.1oz only lasts couple of month. I bought Jumbo limited edition ones and they were much better! Iam really wishing they will bring that back again atleast for limited time!

reviews.review_text: The texture is pretty nice, a bit more watery than most gel cleansers. It foams up just the tiniest bit and doesn't leave the skin dry at all. My only complaint would be that I haven't really gotten any results yet (my face felt nice but not spectacular) and the smell is a bit peculiar

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this cleanser! I have super sensitive skin and find many products dry me out too much or cause me to break out even more. But this cleanser has done wonders for my skin! Since using it, my skin has cleared up dramatically, stays hydrated, and looks super fresh and soft. For me it was totally worth to price to finally find something that works for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love this stuff! My skin started freaking out out of nowhere and I had a sample of this stuff so I started cleansing with it. In the span of a few days I could tell my skin was totally glowing and all of my break outs went away! It smells great and I love how it makes your skin feel and look after you wash your face! HIGHLY recommend for legit all types of skin :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my second one. I used up the first one. That should be enough of a review.

Okay guys, this product is in fact amazing. I have dry, sensitive skin so this product did wonders with the rest of my skincare routine.   My skincare routine was amazing but there was always one thing that bothered me, the dryness of my skin after cleansing. The previous cleanser I was using worked really well with acne but it completely dried out my skin. So, I decided to switch to this one and of course with the sample size first. It is so gentle and it cleans my skin without drying it out. It is worth the largest size and works for all skin types as it says but, works the best with dry and/or sensitive skin.   For advice, I really recommend cleansing in circular motions and really get in there. It helped get rid of the small bumps on my forehead and it allows the rest of my skincare products to work and sit really well on my skin.  This is my only daily cleanser that I use both morning and night, and after removing my makeup. I hope this really encourages you guys to buy this because it is totally worth the money. A little goes a long way so it doesn’t run out as fast.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love, Love, Love. My face loves this cleanser. This product is gentle on my sensitive skin and removes stubborn make up. One of the staff mentioned that without water, this works great as a make up remove and oh boy was she right. I use is try first to remove stubborn make up then add water and everything suds up and washes right off.

reviews.review_title: If you have imoossible skin this is for you
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have super sensitive and temperamental skin. This product is great. NO break outs and it's gentle enough to not anger my excema. Can't really go back to anything else after trying this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this!!  It leaves my face feeling so clean and soft.  I love the scent!

reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product for about two weeks and I absolutely love it! I went out of town for 4 days and forgot makeup remover so this is all I had to work with and let me tell you, it removed ALL of my makeup; mascara and everything. It clarifies without leaving your skin dry and leaves you feeling so fresh (no pun intended). I also use it along with my Foreo Luna at nighttime for an extra deep clean. Truly a great product, I will be getting more once I run out.

reviews.review_title: great cleanser if you don't mind the smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a free mini of this in a recent order and was surprised by how much I loved it. It really made my face feel clean without giving me the tight feeling most cleansers do. The only downsides are that it doesn't lather well and it smells a bit like salad. I still used the entire sample tube anyway.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far one of my favorite things in my beauty routine!! I was looking for a calming, all-natural, great cleanser that wouldn’t upset my super reactive sensitive oily acne prone combo skin and this has been the best find! Def HG status for cleansers for me, and I can’t say enough how much it has helped my skin. The smell is amazing (I can’t wait to wash my face in the am and pm!), the gel consistency feels like it really cleans out my pores as the second step in my double cleaning following my farmacy oil cleanser, and it has not caused me to break out or react at all. It’s really hard for me to find products that do all of these things, but I have found my dream cleanser indeed! I will repurchase this again and again and think this will always be my go to cleanser for irritated, dry, and red skin. Buy this-you will not regret it all!

reviews.review_title: Oily and sensitive skin effectiveness confirmed!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser so much, it does not irritate my skin even a little bit. The gel texture is light and refreshing, this is good for oily skin too because it will not dry out the face but keep a nice plumping feeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love it ! I have acne , after 1 month of using this product my face was much cleaner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Like most of the reviews on this Fresh Soy Face Cleanser, I have to say that this is a great cleanser. It's gentle, smells refreshing (like cucumbers), cleans my face well, and gets rid of any leftover makeup I have on. Although, I do use makeup remover wipes before washing my face if I'm wearing makeup.  It seems to get all the excess dirt and oil off my face. Unlike some other cleansers I've tried, the soy cleanser has never made me break out. The only downside, in my opinion, is that this face cleanser doesn't foam up at all, which I prefer because then I can see that I've cleaned all the parts of my face thoroughly, but oh well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like it since I got it for free but it made me break out. It smells good and feels good but my skin was so not having it! I would say my skin is more sensitive than average but not super sensitive so just be aware that it could cause breakouts! And I only break out when it's time for my period or I'm really stressed and this gave me such bad acne :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
