reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this cleanser for 4 years. Although I keep trying new cleansers to replace this one because of the price, I keep going back to it. It cleans my skin while keeping it hydrated.

I can even rub it on my eyes and it doesn't irritate them or anything. I removed one star because the price is kind of high but I do think it is worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my all time favorite fash wash. It always leaves my skin feeling fresh and clean without making it feel dry. I have noticed a difference in my skin since I started to use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for about 4 mths now. I got hooked off a sample and quickly bought the full size. My skin feels smoother, looks healthy and golden, and my red irritation problem has dimmed considerably.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

I would totally recommend trying this product out. You won't be disappointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

The ingredients are awesome: aloe, cucumber, ginseng, Rose extracts and soybean, sunflower and Borage oils. It is a light gel, low suds cleanser and doesn’t leave your skin feeling tight or dry. Try it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down my favorite cleanser ever. My holy grail! I have extremely sensitive combination skin so this works wonders!

reviews.review_title: Tried it, but did not like it much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I rarely give five stars to a product, but this one deserves it. The Fresh Soy Face Cleanser is gentle, has only a light scent, and leaves your skin feeling like a million bucks. I have very sensitive, acne prone skin, and this product makes my face feel clean, and has helped keep breakouts at bay. Two major things I love about this cleanser is that the ingredients are very natural and so is the scent, which helps if you’re sensitive to very fragrant things. I’ve gone through six bottles and will definitely keep buying. It’s worth every cent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely the best cleanser for my skin. Every other cleanser I’ve tried has dried my skin out, even if it’s supposed to be non-drying. This is one of those products I don’t want to run out of.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry/sensitive/acne prone skin, This drys me out every time I use it. It also is not gentle , I feel a tingling sensation after messaging it into my skin. it stings my skin a little. Does not remove makeup completely. I’m starting to get mini bumps on my forehead, this cleanser still leaves makeup on my skin so that is why I get bumps on my forehead. My skin does NOT feel soften or soothe or hydrating false claims this products makes. Not suitable for all skin types. I give it 3 stars because I sure it works great for other people but my skin type it does not work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very gentle cleanser and leaves a good moisture on the skin. I also really like the smell. I have normal to combination skin (a little bit sensitive) and this is perfect for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of the absolute best cleansers!!! every cleanser that i’ve used on a regular basis before this one has caused me to breakout, this one however is so gentle, leaves my skin feeling moisturized (and not stripped) and most importantly didn’t break me out! definitely would recommend trying this one out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I use this product every single day and it's the best for removing makeup and not harming my sensitive skin! A little goes a long way, also depends on how much makeup you wear daily, but one bottle should be able to last a while. I've repurchased this many times and will continue to do so!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have quite a few cleansers on rotation as my favorites and this is one of them. Feel satisfied everytime using it. Love the fresh smell, it cleanses well and never dries out my dry skin. The smaller size is great for travel. Will continue to repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: TL;DR Overpowering cucumber scent, didn't clean off my eyeliner or mascara, but acted as a great daily cleanser.  This is definitely one of those Could be better but could be WAY worse types of things. To start, the second you open the lid the scent of cucumber overpowers you. This might not be a problem for some people, but I personally don't like the smell of cucumber. It claims to be able to remove all of your makeup gently, and if by gently they mean not at all then its correct. I had fallen asleep with my makeup on so when I woke up my mascara had given me raccoon eyes, the cleanser couldn't even fully clean that up off of my cheeks.  Though it does to really well as a daily cleanser. I use it while I'm in the showers in the morning and it acts as a really nice pick me up for my skin to start the day. It also did help me clear up some of my acne. I just don't reccomend using it to take off your makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves my skin feeling amazing. Only need a little bit and all the makeup is gone. It’s taken me a long time to find a cleanser that didn’t cause breakouts and I’m so happy to have found this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very gentle and non-irritating, doesn’t sting eyes but doesn’t completely remove eye makeup. Is also a little drying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

This cleanser is very gentle but still gets the job done! My skin feels very refreshed and clean after I use this stuff, and the cucumber smell is really calming too. I use this with fresh’s rose deep hydration facial toner and it’s the perfect combination for anyone who has sensitive skin like mine! I definitely recommend this.

reviews.review_text: to be honest, I'm not sure I understand the hype around this cleanser. Sure it's nice, smells fresh, and gets the job done, but I don't think any of those things justifies the price. You could get a gentle face wash at the drugstore and it would do the same thing. There are plenty of other Fresh products that I enjoy, but this is only okay. To be fair, I've only had samples of this, so maybe the formulation is somewhat different, but I still think $38 is way too much for what amounts to just a basic cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Until now, I’ve gone back and forth between the Origins Frothy Face Wash (sudsy/soapy consistency) and the gentle cleaner from Neutrogena (more of a gel). I realized that I like more of a gel formula (way less messy!!! No water running down to my elbows) but the Origins one always made my skin feel more clean.  The Fresh Soy Cleanser is FANTASTIC! Definitely my new favorite and the one I will now consistently turn to. It’s a gel-like formula, not messy at all, smells wonderful (similar to Fresh Rose Face Mask just not as rosy), and my feels SO clean! I have combo skin and this works perfectly for me. I would HIGHLY recommend. You only need about a dime size amount per use so the price tag really isn’t that bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ever since i started using this, i haven't had a single breakout. my skin is always soft and i pair this with rosewater and my skin has never been better(:

If you're sensitive to fragrance I would recommend you not buy it .  If your skin is not sensitive this product shouldnt smellbad to you.  . reviews.review_text: Remove my makeup easily! Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing really gets all the makeup off but doesn’t leave your skin dry. I loveeee this cleanser it really cleared up my skin without drying it out way better than the other fresh cleanse (I think the rose foam one)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very oily skin and I always thought I needed a really tough cleanser to deal with it. I moved on from different brands constantly and the final straw was a laneige cleanser that gave me what I can only describe as a burn near my eye area that took weeks to heal. I bought this cleanser because I heard it was gentle, but I was scared it wouldn’t keep my oily t-zone at bay in the daytime. I wish I bought it sooner! I’m on my second bottle. My face isn’t dry but my skin isn’t oily in the day any more than other products I’ve used. I’ve read other reviews on here saying this wasn’t powerful enough for their oily skin, which deterred me at first, but I’m so glad I gave it a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For the longest time I jumped around from race cleaners. My face was definitely prone to breakouts but about 5 years ago I started using this and have never looked back. It has the perfect balance of force and gentleness. The smell is nice but not strong. Plus, when I see it next to my sink, I always imagine that it’s just introducing itself to me in Spanish “soy face cleaner” - and I smile at my friend.

reviews.review_title: A M A Z I N G
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair
reviews.review_text: i never write reviews but this cleanser is the best

reviews.review_title: Gentle, Fragrance-free, Works as makeup remover
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great for sensitive skin. It is extremely gentle while still being effective. Plus, doubles as a makeup remover for light to medium make-up days (doesn’t work as well for heavier layers). After the first use I was a little underwhelmed, it felt kinda boring and maybe too gentle and the consistency made it feel like I needed to use a lot of product. However, after continued use (twice a day for about a week now) my skin feels so fresh and soft after I wash my face. Once you get used to it, you realize that you don’t need as much as it seems. Doesn’t dry it out for winter months and not too oily for warmer weather. Would’ve given five stars if it made a better first impression!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff!!! Gentle cleanser while still cleansing. I have tried the milk cleanser as well from Fresh too and this is SOOOO MUCH BETTER! I have dry skin with large pores and this has calmed my redness and helped to reduce the size of my pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser I’m on my second tube. It’s very refreshing and does a great job cleaning without giving that squeaky clean feeling like it’s stripped your skin. I have to say I’d probably give it 4.5 stars if that were possible because I have very dry skin in the winter (flaky patches) and this doesn’t help that. If I use enough moisturizer after cleansing it’s okay, but it can be the tiniest bit drying if used straight. Overall it smells amazing, feels really good on the skin, and definitely cleans my skin without completely stripping it. The price is a little steep for the big one, but it last me a REALLY long time so worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome cleanser! I wish it wasn’t so drying though, gives my face that “almost too clean” feel. But nothing that can’t be fixed with a good moisturizer, a step which is a must anyway.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: this cleanser is amazing! i have oily and sensitive skin and this cleanser leaves my skin so soft and has not caused any breakouts!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my Absolute FAVORITE face wash. I use it every night with a konjac sponge. It’s removed most orb my acne!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect travel size and gentle wash

reviews.review_title: Perfect for dryer skin types with sensitive skin

reviews.review_text: Amazing cleanser, I have dry skin and I suffer in the winter time to find something that cleans my skin but doesn’t leave it dry. With this product I found it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

Had my doubts at first because it wasn’t lathering at all but even a little bit will cleanse greatly. My skin is insanely sensitive but this has helped me reduce redness and i haven’t had any breakouts since i first used it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this with a silicone brush and it eaves my skin nice and clean. Doesn't irritate my face at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin has NEVER been clearer than when I started to use this cleanser and the youth preserve face lotion. The cleanser is gently and leaves your skin feeling soft and clean, without the drying out that happens with a lot of other face washes. Can't recommend enough!

reviews.review_title: Only for extremely sensitive skin types .

Definitely not for acne prone skin becuase it's so gentle on the skin it doesnt really lather mucb. This is for people with super super sensitive skin and normal skin types .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

It actually dried out my skin so I returned it to Sephora and went back to the original.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Received as a Christmas gift. Fell in love with Fresh soy face cleanser!!! I was so impressed with this product, I talk about it all the time. It melts away makeup leaves my skin soft, dewy and fresh. I ordered more two days ago. It is a definite staple in my cleansing routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like how my skin does not feel stripped or dry after washing but I still have a hard time removing all my make up especially my eye make up.

reviews.review_title: My facial cleanser of choice for years!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As I aged and my somewhat sensitive skin became  drier, finding a gentle cleanser.  My choices were further restricted because I prefer to use products that are as close to organic as possible.  I was delighted when I tried a travel-size Soy Face Cleanser years ago.  I love its milkiness, and that my skin  never feels dry or tight after use.  Of course, I still need a moisturizer afterward (by Fresh, of course!).  It’s been my facial cleanser since I first discovered it years ago.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this product. smells nice, is gentle, doesn't irritate. just a classic staple to have. cleans makeup off easily, safe to use around the eyes is the my fave part, non drying. literally in the name you just feel fresh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a super gentle product and wonderful for removing eye make up. Always leaves my skin super soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been the only facial cleanser that has kept my skin consistently break out free. Would highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: listen here. I never leave reviews ever, I'm a lazy person lmao. but Sephora emailed me asking to review a list of products and this is the only one I was super inclined to review. I've been using the Soy Face Cleanser for over 2 years, and it's my favorite to use in the shower. My skin feels soft, my blemishes aren't as prominent, and it doesn't irritate my eyes. I L O V E it. so if you're thinking of buying, I recommend it highly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_text: Feels like it doesn't clean just because it doesn't foam/lather up but it is amazing!!

Not a big fan of the scent, but it does cleanse without leaving my skin right feeling. I really just can’t justify the price though for my acne prone skin. reviews.review_title: Clean skin without drying it out!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product for 5 days straight before going to bed. My skin felt amazing right after using it for the first time, I felt how clean my face was as it cleanses very well. I had to spot using it immediately, now my face is going back to normal after a week without using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin

Very gentle on my sensitive skin and removes my makeup (even mascara!) . Just a bit too expensive in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to cleanser. It cleanses very well and is not too drying. I have oily skin that is prone to breakouts and I have noticed less breakouts and better skin overall after using this for a few months. I would definitely recommend this cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_text: My skin is quite dry as it sometimes flakes lightly. This dries out my skin slightly and makes my skin feel a bit tight. However in the summer when my skin is more normal dry this is great! You only need a very small amount and it takes off all my makeup, even on heavy days!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Soy Face Cleanser removes my mascara and other eye makeup with such ease. No rubbing, no tugging, no more need to clean up around my eyes after washing my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product but this made my skin very dry. I have oily/combination skin and after the 1st use I could tell this was not my product sadly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle and silky. Totally dissolves makeup away after removing eye-makeup and wiping face with a makeup wipe. I have extremely sensitive skin (acne prone), this never dried me out nor broke me out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this cleanser for about a month now, and it’s been great for the winter months with skin a bit more on the dry side! It is so gentle on the skin, but it cleans the skin well and leaves it feeling soft—and happy! It’s great for daily use both morning and night, but I tend to use it more in the morning and use a slightly more heavy-duty cleanser at night after taking off my makeup. It’s also great for more sensitive skin, and its use can range from using on more dry days to more oily days. There’s not much scent which is also nice if fragrances aren’t your (or your skin’s) thing! Slightly pricier than other cleansers but fairly middle of the road at Sephora!Overall great cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry/dehydrated skin, so I’m usually very skeptical trying new face cleansers. This cleanser is so refreshing and really gets my face clean without any tightness after drying. I got this as a gift for Christmas, and I still look forward to using it every night. Definitely repurchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product!!! It does not feel like the product is drying out my skin. Actually feels like it is cleaning my skin and not just stripping my skin. Only thing I don't like is the cap on my bottle, it is hard to open.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! It leaves my skin feeling super soft and moist and doesn't leave my skin feeling dry like a lot of cleansers do. I use it everyday in the shower and its apart of my morning routine. The bottle is small but for someone who is heavy handed on product you surprisingly get a lot of product in it. It also works really well for taking off makeup in the evening.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product melts down your make up. Even waterproof mascara! Leaves your skin crash and smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not a good product, instead of washing my makeup off it just spread it more around my face.

reviews.review_title: holy grail, fixes your skin problems!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OMG. This is my holy grail face wash! Other than waterproof mascara this take EVERYTHING OFF. 3 years ago I was breaking out and had all these problems with my skin. Since weening off the clarisonic, Luna and other daily scrubs this has FIXED my skin. Now I get compliments on my skin all the time. This is something I never would have dreamed of. Thank you fresh! I am a loyal customer for life. This and the rose moisturizer from fresh are my 100% DO NOT CHANGE non negotiable parts of my skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is THE PERFECT skin cleanser....... I use a tone of different stuff. I know my skin pretty well and have a solid routine. this will ALWAYS be a part of my routine.  It smells like cucumbers and leaves me truly feeling fresh (no pun intended) if you’re unsure about this product, buy the smaller size and give it a try. You wont regret it!!!

reviews.review_title: I use this every night without fail!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! I would not consider this 'mini'... a bottle of this cleanser will last me for a few months - cleansing every night. I use this to remove my makeup and as a first step cleanser before exfoliating and moving on to my serums etc. Love this so much - holy grail!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have incredibly oily skin and I love this product! It’s incredibly gentle and feels super nice on the skin. My skin hasn’t been breaking out nearly as much since I stopped exfoliating and started using this as my main cleanser. I don’t see what the issue with the scent is, but maybe this size doesn’t have the same scent as the full size? Overall, I would highly recommend this (attached picture is my face without any foundation or concealer on after using this for about 2 months)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin

I have really sensitive skin and it didnt seem to react to my skin in a bad way which was a relief. It was slightly drying on my skin though, and when i saw the price of the full size tube i couldnt justify paying $47 knowing i would go through this fairly quickly and re-buy regularly. Great cleanser though!

reviews.review_title: gentle on skin   cleans very well
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hope they make this forever. I've been using it for about two years now. This cleanser cleans away day makeup with ease and it is incredibly gentle. The texture of the cleanser is light and it just feels clean. It does what it is supposed to do more effectively than anything else I have ever tried. I have sensitive skin and it is a wonderful product for daily use. A couple months ago I ran out and decided to try a couple other cleansers--sad days for my skin. Happy to have it back in my skin care routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: This cleanser is so gentle on my skin. Leaves it feeling silky and soft. I love the fact I can use cleanser on my eyes. Great for removing eye make-up!

I know I works for some people which is great but it really didn’t do much to my skin but lead to breakouts. :)

reviews.review_title: One of the best cleansers worth the $$!!

reviews.review_text: This stuff smells amazing & really cleans the skin! I love it for the morning to start off my day with a clean face without any harsh ingredients. It glides on like jelly and transforms my skin right away!
After using some harsh acne medicine my skin has been super sensitive. This is the only cleanser that is gentle enough to not irritate but also cleans very well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely dry sensitive skin (eczema) and this is my holy grail high end cleanser!! It’s nourishing but still cleans my skin without stripping it down. My skin feels hydrated and clean after washing with this and it never feels tight or itchy. I also love that alcohol isn’t one of the top ingredients used because alcohol dries skin out more and irritates it. But this is so amazing!! Worth the price. And a small pea size amount is enough - a little goes a long way!! Will always repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fresh scent. It smells like cucumber and lemon to me. My skin feels plump and cool after using it with my Clarisonic.

reviews.review_title: Sensitive Skin Will Love This Soft Cleanser

reviews.review_text: Really soothing cleanser. Great for sensitive skin. Beautiful texture. This is a spa treatment cleanser for me, giving me a ritual-like feeling and helping my skin stay soft for days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely loving this cleanser! It is so gentle but still gets the jobs done plus my skin feels great afterward. Before I was alternating between LaRoche Posay's Toleraine Purifying Foaming Cream and the Effaclar Medicated Gel Cleanser to handle breakouts and manage my combo dry/oily/sensitive skin. I bought a trial size of this first product first just to test how my skin would react and so far it has been great. I use it morning and night with the Fresh Rose Deep Hydration Facial Toner and I am very happy with it. I would give it 5 stars but I am not a big fan of smells and it has a strong cucumber scent. I have gotten used to it the more I've used it but I could see it being a turn off if you are accustomed to/prefer scent-free products for your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i love this product! it’s so gentle on your skin and contains no fragrance but still has an amazing scent that smells like freshly cut cucumbers. it foams just a little and leaves your skin feeling the perfect amount of clean without feeling stripped

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my holygrail! I’ve dealt with acne since I am 11 and this is the only cleanser that I swear by! I have combo, sensitive skin. I don’t have as much acne as I used to but I still break out if I don’t take care of my skin. I’ve tried a lot of cleansers that were made for skin with blemishes but they were too harsh. This is very gentle, it doesn’t have a strong fragrance, it cleans my skin but doesn’t leave it dry. The only bad thing about this cleanser is the price, but I think it is worth every penny

reviews.review_text: Love this stuff. It removes makeup well and my skin looks cleaner using than other cleansers. the toner-soaked cotton pad never has residual makeup and dirt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just bought this and im in loveeeeee!! I have acne, my face is combo and this works great for me. It’s really nourishing and my face loves it. Please give this product a try. I wasn’t going to until I finally decided why not and it was the best decision. It’s beat out alllllll the cleansers I’ve tried!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been loyal to this cleanser for over a year now, this product and my foreo have absolutely saved my skin. I have had acne in the past and have rosacea, and this cleanser is gentle and soothing to my sensitive red skin. Not to mention is absolutely melts every trace of makeup off my face. I trust this face cleanser with my life.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For years I’ve been trying to find a cleanser that left my face feeling cleaned and refreshed without over drying my face. This cleanser has not only cleared my skin but it has controlled my oily skin as well! Never will I purchase something different to cleanse my face. 10/10 recommend and the entire FRESH brand!  In love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: All I can say is, im a woman so I am allowed to change my opinion a lot! Lol   A few years ago, I received a deluxe sample of this cleanser as the Sephora birthday gift. I must've got a bad batch I told myself. The product didn't clean my skin well. I couldn’t understand why so many people loved this cleanser. The product was ...weird. That’s the only way I could describe it. Didn’t clean my skin and scent was overpowering.   Few months ago, on a whim I bought the full size product. Everyone raves about this product so I wanted to give it another try. And I'm glad I did!! I have completely changed my opinion. Holy grail! Gentle cleanser - soy proteins, rose water, cucumber extract - not foaming! Which I love. Ph level 5.3 - perfect!! Hydrating - does not strip the skin - a repurchase for sure. Not a good makeup remover thou. Use as a second cleanse. Every person should own this cleanser. I think a good price 38 for a 5 oz bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried other products after this and nothing really compares. Not only does it take off the waterproof mascara I wear everyday without any major scrubbing it also leaves my dry skin feeling refreshed instead of tight and irritated. I wouldn't change a thing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a gentle wash, doesn't hurt my eyes, and removes all makeup residue.  It smells amazing as well.  It has a gentle lather and washes off easily.  It's become my go-to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this product is great! it helped my skin so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such an amazing face cleanser. Removed all my makeup and also the acne! Flawless skin. Also, who doesn’t love natural products? Definitely the best and would recommend to anyone. Hoping they bring back the bigger size soon!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I decided to finally write a review for this. I’ve been using this cleanser for 1-2 years now and it’s the best thing I’ve done for my skincare. I used to buy the cheaper Neutrogena makeup wipes but always had issues with breaking out and my skin was SUPER dry (weird combo I know but it happened). Since I switched I’ve noticed my skin was less dry and I stopped having breakouts. It’s definitely not a cure for dry skin, as I still have issues, but it’s helped a lot. And of course it’s great for wiping any and all makeup away. As long as Fresh continues to make this as it is now, I will be a customer for life.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to hate this cleanser. It's way too expensive for me to like. Unfortunately, as soon as I tried a sample I knew that I was going to have to buy the full size. I have oily, acne-prone skin that is pretty dehydrated, and what I love about this cleanser is that it's not irritating at all and it doesn't leave me with that tight feeling after I rinse it off. It feels luxurious, smells like a spa, and I'll be purchasing it again begrudgingly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product does what it says, it’s a great cleanser for makeup, but is gentle on your skin. I hate when my face is dry from harsh cleansers. The only downside I have about this is that it smells kinda weird, like an herbal swamp. I would recommend, although I think you could find a better cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: very gentle, great morning cleanser. I have dry skin and it’s amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t really find anything special about this cleanser. It did an ok job of getting my make up off but I found the smell wasn’t great. Wouldn’t buy this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The holy grail! This is by far my favorite cleanser, I've been using it for years. The texture is just amazing- it's a soothing, creamy gel that removes all makeup and oil without over drying or irritating. I love that it's fragrance free, although it has a pleasant natural rose scent. A little goes a long way, and it's very easy to use. If you have super dry skin, I wouldn't say this cleanser is super moisturizing but I prefer to use something that feels clean and then using a moisturizer afterwards, because typically using a moisturizing cleanser breaks me out. I think this is the perfect in between!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have to give this product 5 stars , cuz it deserves this. I never used such cleanser before. It won’t make ur eye balls hurt when u rising it on ur eye areas. Anyway, it can remove makeup efficiently

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my FAVORITE face wash!  It is so gentle and cleans.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First got this as a sample. I loved it. When I found myself needing a new face wash I wanted/needed something to rejuvenate my face while cleaning my face and taking off my makeup.  This was just the item! The price point isn’t too bad either. Got my cleanser as a set for Christmas.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute favorite cleanser. If you’re looking to try something new and you have sensitive skin, this is the one! I’ve used bottles after bottles of this and I don’t intend to change this part of my routine. I find my skin feeling extremely soft and clean (not tight) when I take my time to massage this on my face. It’s perfect for both warmer and colder seasons without being too harsh on the skin. When it comes to washing off waterproof mascaras or eyeshadow, I could recommend using another product as your first step and follow it up with this cleanser.

reviews.review_title: Gentle yet takes off my mascara
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the top two facial cleansers that I’ve ever used, hands down. It takes off all of my makeup easily and without tugging, including mascara (not waterproof), doesn’t irritate my skin, and leaves my skin feeling soft and refreshed. I’d buy more often except it’s so expensive, but it really is a wonderful product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this for taking off make up! It keeps my skin hydrated too! It makes my face feel so clean!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser I’ve ever used. My clogged pores have shrunk and all the bumps are going away. I’m so I love with this! I remove my makeup first and then use this on my Clarisonic. I’ve had such good results with this in such little time. I’m buying a backup already!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: smells like cucumbers and free of all harsh chemicals. it also lathers so creamy and silky instead of frothy. love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cleanser.  I first used it in a point perk reward where it came with a deluxe sample of this along with several face mask minis.  I fell in love with it and have repurchased many times.  This is my second cleanse each evening.  Even though it is a gel consistency, it never strips my skin or make it feel tight.  My face feels nice and smooth after this and it's super gentle.  Will continue to repurchase.

reviews.review_title: Not recommended if you have oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried this product for about a week now after being recomended this product by an employee in store. It is a very nice smooth cleaner and smells like cucumbers. But if you have oily skin I would not reccomend this. I broke out on my nose chin and forehead which almost never happens to me! I’m sure if I had a different skin type this product would have been fine, but unfortunately I have to return this as it doesn’t suit my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this for years. Smells great, and leaves your skin feeling clean and soft. Lasts long too, a little goes a long way! My BFF loves this too.

reviews.review_title: How could you not try this!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first facial wash I ever purchased in Sephora! And Id say its worth it! It takes of your mascara and I love the smell after getting used to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My third bottle of this goodness, not stripping of your skins natural oils and still is effective and a clean canvas after using this! HG status!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product, after returning to using this after years of not using it. It works really well, the ingredients are great. I like to use it with my foreo and my skin loves it. It moisturizes my skin, after use does not stip my skin of moisture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is AMAZING! I feel like this cleanser can take the day off and leave my skin feeling smooth and supple without overdrying it. I LOVE the scent— it’s very clean smelling and it’s one of the reasons why I switched back to this cleanser after many years. Additionally, it leaves my skin glowing; that’s really not something a cleanser typically does but I love waking up to glowy skin! I wish they would bring back the bigger size because I WOULD INVEST.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a good product, easily takes off makeup while still cleansing your face. Leaves skin feeling fresh and moisturized. Best gentle face wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome cleanser, I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My face always feels so refreshed and cool after I use this! Will always rebuy whenever I run out. I recommend to anyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A great fresh clean, yet product feels like and soothing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell and how easily it takes off my eye makeup! Totally worth the price tag!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is really great! I have very sensitive skin and it was hard to find best product for me. I tried a lot of other stuffs but most of them didn't work. But this cleanser helped my skin a lot. It smells good, and it makes my skin's condition really good. Maybe its expensive compare to other stuffs in the market but worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolute favourite, been using this for two years and sticking with it,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I  love this. It's good for sensitive skin and it cleanses my face so good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best face wash. I have terrible cystic acne and it clears up after this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite cleansers.  It smells wonderful and isn't too harsh on my sensitive, acne prone skin.  I keep trying different cleansers but always end up back with this one.  It leaves my skin clean, soft and clear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best face wash hands down! I’ve been using it for a couple of years because I have sensitive skin and this is the only face wash that doesn’t irritate my skin! 10/10! Only downside is how pricey it is

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite cleanser. I have tried others and I come back to this one. A bit pricey but worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Discovered this in a sample first. Right away i noticed a difference in my skin after a week of using. It is now my go too face wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually bounced around between cleansers after I'd finish a bottle just to try other things, but I've now re-purchased this cleanser 4 times now. Even the small bottle lasts forever for me because a little goes a long way. I never feel like it makes my skin too dry but it gets enough off that my face feels clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this facial cleanser. It’s very gentle and doesn’t break out my sensitive skin. My skin gets very dry in the winter but also gets oily in the summer, and i have had no issues with this. The cucumber smell took me a little bit to get used to but after buying this product three times, it doesn’t bother me at all now. It’s pricey but worth it in my opinion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the way the product gently cleanses, and the smell is refreshing. Didn’t really clear up acne, but in conjunction with my regular life black soap wash it does wonders. I use it primarily at night now as a nice, easy clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have Sensitive skin and mild rosacea. I have been blessed by this face cleanser. I don’t wear makeup or foundation of any kind. This cleanser doesn’t dry out my sensitive- thin skinned face. There is no harsh fragrance and it is perfect for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot get over how AMAZING this product is. For starters it’s extremely gentle but effective and it smells like cucumbers which leaves my skin feeling so refreshed. I heard nothing but amazing reviews so I figured I would give it a try. I have struggled with acne prone skin for the last year or so and have tried more products than I can count. After less than one week using this my skin has cleared up tremendously and has even helped diminish my acne scarring. I have very dry skin and a lot of “gentle” moisturizers tend to dry me out even more. This has done the complete opposite! I can finally say I have found my holy grail cleanser!!  Side note I was skeptical at how small the travel size is (thinking it wouldn’t last long) but I bought it 1 week ago and use it night and day and still have over half the bottle left. I would suggest going for the smaller size as a starter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an incredible, holy grail product! I have used it for years now, and have completely clear skin (which I accredit to this product). It is so gentle on the skin, even so much that you can open your eyes while cleansing and feel absolutely no sting at all. I would recommend this to everyone looking for a new cleanser, as it provides very nice moisture and removes any grime you have from the day.

reviews.review_title: Amazing cleanser but buy the mini size
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: You only need a little of this product each time you wash your face. Since it has a 6-9month shelf life I use the mini one which lasts me a long time. One less star because I think the mini version is worth more of the value than the bigger one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have normal-dry skin and I was searching for the perfect cleanser for my skin. THIS IS IT! Most I tried before were either super drying, or too light that I didn't feel it cleaned my face properly. This is PERFECT it has a gel consistency which is perfect for my skin. I follow it up with a good toner and hydrating serum and moisturizer. I use a tiny pea sized amount and let me tell you - a little goes a LONG way.  Best of all it lasts forever! I buy the mini size and it lasts me MONTHS. The shelf life of this is 6-9 months I think so I dont find it worth it to buy the bigger size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a fine cleanser. I did not enjoy the smell but thought it did its job. I won’t be buying again just for the simple fact of the scent. I love fresh products and feel they all do great jobs just didn’t particularly Like the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Received this in one of my Play boxes and fell in love. It washes away even the toughest eye makeup without stripping your eyelashes and leaves your face feeling clean and soft not tight like some cleansers. I loved it so much I purchased the mini size. ( I only use it when I’ve got a lot of eye makeup on, I find it to be better than using makeup remover wipes especially for my eyes)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS FACIAL CLEANSER! It's so light weight and leaves your face glowing! What I love the most about this product is that you can use it on your eyes to get that mascara and eyeliner that makeup wipes/micellar water can't get. I had originally got it as a sample, but it was so good that I had to get a full bottle. I fell in love with it after the 1st use. I also bought the soy exfoliant, and using them together leaves your face so smooth and refreshed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this product, but after the first night I had redness in my cheeks and I usually wake up refreshed after my night routine. I also do not like the smell at all. I wish I loved this product as much as everyone else, but it is not for me.   On a positive note - the consistency was nice and my skin did feel good after I used it - but the following morning it was apparent my skin did not like it.

reviews.review_title: over hyped but not the worst
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used this for years because I just hadn’t found anything better. It’s gentle and it smells nice, but I prefer cleansers that don’t foam at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is gentle and effective on cleansing stubborn makeup. For those who like soapy products, this cleanser is a bit turned off. I use it more than recommended just because I have a feeling it will be more clean if it’s more soapy lol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Soothing, hydrating, and just bomb on my acne prone skin. Plus, it feels utterly luxurious washing my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best cleanser out there!! If you’re looking for one, this is it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like cucumber and feels light and smooth to the touch. This does a good job at removing makeup, although for mascara I use an eye makeup remover wipe first. This will take it off, but will require more work and more product. It doesn’t lather a ton but still does a good job. Leaves skin feeling clean and fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite cleanser in life. I use it morning and night, to take off makeup, for a refreshing wash, just because - whenever and for whatever! I have an issue with fragrances in my skincare products but Fresh products in particular have never failed me. I definitely recommend this to my friends and family all the time so I would recommend it to others as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great second step. First remove with their SeaBerry oil (some say it’s better if you have dry skin than Tatcha even)....  I like the consistency, the scent, and you don’t need a ton of it. Skin feels clean and soft after using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to favorite cleanser that I use every day! I have dry/break-out prone skin and it helps hydrate while also getting rid of my break-outs. My skin is also very sensitive and this cleanser and entire brand is amazing for that.  My skin sometimes feels dry after using, but a moisturizer helps that out. Has a great smell and is super refreshing. Love it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, this cleanser changed my life. It has completely rescued my dry, tight, winter-ravaged skin, making it smooth and calm again. The gel formulation took some getting used to as it doesn't really lather, so it feels hard to rinse. But it still cleanses great and doesn't leave a residue. I love the cucumber scent too.  Been using this morning and night and have seen my skin totally transformed -- it even helps reduce breakouts. I'm never using soap on my face again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this product considering I love a lot of Fresh items but I found this to be very disappointing. I don't usually get acne and I have dryer skin but immediately after using it I broke out all over my forehead. A friend of mine with oily skin also tried the product and said the same thing happened to her. Additionally, I didn't feel like it was really cleaning my face and I didn't feel fresh after using it more like I still had some remaining on my face. I really wanted to make this product work, but even after a couple weeks of using it the acne did not subside.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s good but not great! It has a very pleasant “clean” smell but it leaves my skin feeling tight and dry. I wouldn’t recommend for acne prone skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: By far the best cleaner i have experienced. For me the only thing i’ll spend a lot of money on is skincare. So the price point is great for me. I have combination skin and it does wonders, also it takes mascara off good. Doesn’t feel like my skin is striped away i have purchased many times. I once stopped and tried something new but it made me break out and wasn’t good for my skin i’m not back on this and it’s better.

reviews.review_title: A Little Goes A Long Way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loyal to this facial wash!  Someone insisted that using a gentler facial wash would work better with my combination skin, that is also prone to breakouts, than an acne-targeting one. And sure enough, my skin was clean (without feeling dry and tight), over-all pimple free (not including the monthly breakouts) and felt softer. I use spot treatments for the random pimples but I will never go back to the acne specific washes. I've tried many different types of acne targeting cleansers and treatment-steps ranging from all price ranges, but my skin has never looked and felt better after I started using this cleanser!

reviews.review_title: A great cleanser for sensitive skin!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It is a super gentle cleanser. I use it in my double cleanse process after my oil cleanser. It’s not strong enough to remove make up so I suggest use in double cleanse. But I have very sensitive skin and foaming cleansers over cleanse my skin of my skin barrier. I love scent of cucumber. I think this product is really good if you have sensitive combination/ oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells heavy of cucumbers, it's a very fresh smell but a little strong.  This product also irritated my skin but it doesn't seem like that happens to many other people.  It's very creamy and seems like it could take off make up with out being too tough on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I couldn't stop washing my face with this cleanser....literally kept washing it over and over just to inhale the amazing spa like herbal fragrance - it was a therapy in itself! Amazing! I am 37 and have oily skin and wash my face with soap to get that clean feeling but this took the oils off but did not leave my skin dry afterwards ...usually I would wash with soap and put on moisturizer immediately after to compensate for the dryness... this is MUCH more luxuries then any soap or cleanser I used!  Wow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a great simple cleanser. I don’t think it’s revolutionary by any means or worth the price tag but it does the job.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in a sample bag with my purchase and used it for about 3 weeks so there was quite a bit of product in it which surprised me, given it was the mini size (20 ml)! I followed the instructions and used it to remove my eye makeup first (removed with a wet cotton pad). Then I used it to    wash off the rest of my face with a silicone cleansing pad. I found that it cleaned my face but gave no oomph for my combination skin and blemishes. Would recommend this for someone with sensitive or normal skin as this is a very gentle cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried so many different facial cleansers and this is definitely my favorite. It's the only one that doesn't make me breakout or make my hormonal acne worse. I feel like this cleanser gets my face clean without any irritation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was a nice light cleanser. I like the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderful product, with a light cucumber scent that fades away immediately. Very gentle on my combination skin, non-stripping and leaves my skin hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best makeup remover ever. Removes even the toughest makeup and doesn’t dry out my skin at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser, I always end up repurchasing it. It doesnt leave my skin dry and it cleans well even with make up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Requires too much product to clean the face (and I double cleanses with a balm first). I used for 3 days and I now have four large pimples. It smell divine but unfortunately, I will be returning tomorrow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have fairly oily skin with quite a bit of acne. This product didn’t break me out at all and was super gentle and refreshing. However it didn’t help with breakouts, and in general I didn’t see a difference. Not a bad cleanser, but not the most effective either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really like this for my sensitive, combination skin. Does leather too much (which face cleansers are NOT supposed to!) and doesn’t leave my face Witt that tight, squeaky feeling that cheap cleansers do. Big fan!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very sticky and i never felt clean. It always left a residue on my face

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff! It's not drying, smells like cucumbers, and is the right consistency for a morning cleanser/second cleanser at night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice cleanser, my skin feels clean after but not at all stripped. It smells strongly of cucumber though which was refreshing but not for me. Overall I think this is a basic cleanser and not worth the price. For $38 I need it to do more than it does

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

So I tried this cleanser and LOVE the naturalness of the ingriedents, texture, cucumber scent, and how it has cleared my skin.

Its power is in its simplicity - it is gentle on skin but powerful enough to get any make-up off easily without scrubbing, and always leaves me feeling fresh after using it (hence the brand name!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have to say that this cleanser does wonders with my skin I used it all the time in my night routine to wash my face and it makes my face look super clean and glowy with out leaving my skin dry, the smell is so refreshing, love it I have been using it since a few years now and I'm gonna keep buying it

reviews.review_title: Smells like cucumber, goes on smoothly, not drying
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprised by this cleanser and I think I'm a fan. I will update again after several weeks if I change my mind.   Consistency: - Goes on smooth, really easily, glides on your face, almost like KY Jelly on a metal device for an ultrasound.  - It's not too thick, not too liquidy. - Doesn't foam or lather which is fine this allows you to control it and doesn't dribble into your eyes like some other cleansers. The formula glides and sticks to the face.  Smell: It was pleasant, like fresh cut cucumbers, it wasn't chemically it was nice, kinda organic. It didn't match the packaging and would picture this may sell better if it did have some mint green type of color or cucumbers on the package.  - The scent was only there when I was cleansing my face. As soon as I washed it it came off.  Feel: - It didn't burn my eyes. Some cleansers feel like chili when you rub your eyes to get the last mascara residue off this was nice. - It left my skin feeling balanced. Clean yet not dry.  - Did not leave a film or residue - Did not dry out my face - It did a great job of removing makeup much better than my Algenist.  Overall I really liked this cleanser and would continue to use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the mini size of this to try it out. I was using an acne cleanser prior but it was starting to get too drying. This doesn't combat textural irregularity like the acne cleanser did, but it also didn't make me break out at all and eventually got rid of all of those stubborn dry patches. I bought a different cleanser after this one ran out just to try it, and those dry patches were back within 2 days. I had to switch back to this, it's the only thing that works for my dry and acne prone skin. Plus it smells so good! I will be using a glycolic acid toner after this to combat any textural issues, but for everything else this beats a lot of other cleansers I've used. (it also lasts quite a while, so the price seems worth it to me, especially for the ingredients)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so great. It has taken me years to find the right face wash for my grumpy skin. Non-drying but leaves skin feeling clean. More expensive than I would want to spend for face wash, but it's the perfect travel size and I can't live without it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have really dry sensitive skin. This product helped clean my skin, take my makeup up without making my skin feel dry or broken.

reviews.review_text: This is an excellent facial cleanser that does not get bubbly/super sudsy. I've used this product for about two years now if not longer. I thought that because it didn't foam much that it was not getting my face clean but this was not true. The consistency was threw me off as well but now that's one of the things I appreciate about it. You don't need to use a lot to clean your face. My skin type is combination/oily and I like the way my face feels after using this product.

reviews.review_text: I'm not sure why people are saying this doesnt remove makeup or mascara well because I can tell you when you lather it up in your hands and really work it on your face it takes off allll the makeup and it's also so gentle. I'd 100% recommend this face wash, cleans well without leaving your skin dry and yet also helps your complexion with brightening and seems to calm any breakouts you have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s good for dry skin in winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This has been great for my combination and really sensitive skin! In Canada, my skin really suffers with makeup and skin cleansers once the temperatures drop. I have very oily skin on my t-zone and I wear a heavy makeup routine day-to-day (eyeliner, eyeshadow, mascara, foundation, etc) but my skin is easily irritated and dried-out by typical drugstore cleansers and makeup removers, even wipes. Because of this, one cleanser is usually never enough so this one didn't do the trick there, so I usually remove a lot with a cotton pad and baby oil, and then I rinse and massage this soy cleanser into my skin to remove the rest and it leaves my skin feeling fantastic. I follow up with moisturizer. For me the price is worth it because it's a perfect step 2 cleanser that doesn't irritate or break down my skin barrier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ok this face cleanser does EXACTLY what the description says, and I love it!! It is pricey imo but I will go ahead and make the splurge.  I'm loving this cleanser because it gently yet effectively removes all of my face makeup (moisturizer, primer, foundation, setting spray - the works), and it rinses away very easily and quickly (not like other cleansers that seem really 'soapy' and take awhile to rinse off).  I use it by squeezing some cleanser onto my palm, adding a little bit of water, then rubbing for a couple of seconds til it becomes a light lather. I then massage it onto my face for a minute or so, then rinse.  I do use a separate remover for my eye makeup, but accidentally got some of this cleanser in my eyes and it did not sting! OMG

reviews.review_text: I had received so many samples of this product that decided to give it a try.  It has a gel like texture that I like, it removes all the makeup that a makeup wipe could not get. The cleanser itself is pretty lightweight and doesn't foam much as you wash. Although I'm a minimalist when it comes to makeup, it did seem like this did a good job removing my concealer, lipstick, and even mascara. My only wish is that it left my face feeling a little more hydrated when I was done using it. It certainly didn't feel like it stripped my skin at all, but it just didn't seem as moisturizing as some other cleansers I've liked. I still enjoy this and will use every drop, but it might be better suited for people with oily or combination skin.

reviews.review_text: I've been using this cleanser for a couple of weeks and it's pretty good, not amazing. Pros: nice lather, a little goes a long way, doesn't seem to irritate my skin. Cons: pricey and no results that I can't seem to get with a drugstore brand product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Mon visage est très propre après le nettoyage, je suis confortable dans ma peau qui est sèche et me tiraille souvent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gently removes makeup, has a nice scent, and doesn't leave the face dry.

reviews.review_title: Very gentle cleanser, doesn’t work for blackheads
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and this product didn’t really work well as a cleanser. It cleans off surface oil but does a poor job of reaching the pores, and absolutely useless against blackheads. However, it’s a very gentle cleanser and doesn’t dry out my skin. Now I use it occasionally in the morning... until this tube runs out. Will not purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Found this cleanser drying and was not fond of the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is very easy on my sensitive skin, as opposed to some drug store products I’ve tried that make me go red! My doctor told me this is one of the only face washes she recommends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleaner . Love the light “fresh” (see what I did?) scent. My skin feels clean after using this .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product feels fantastic on my face

reviews.review_title: Might break you out if you have dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this cleanser because it took off my make up so well and really love fresh beauty products (I use the lotus youth preserve face cream every day). I bought this because of the popularity and trust in the brand, but for some reason I realized that this had been the new product I was using that was breaking my face out. From what I’ve read from other reviewers it seems like this was common if you have dry skin. I stopped using it and kept everything else that I normally use the same and my face isn’t breaking out anymore. Again it was a great cleanser to take off make up and really make my face feel clean, but obviously the breakouts weren’t ideal. I’d recommend getting a sample first if you’re considering or the smaller size (glad that’s what I usually get when trying a new skincare product). Anyways, I’m giving the rest to a friend who loves this and doesn’t break out from using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser, it's a great start to the morning, and takes it all off at night. It has a lovely refreshing smell and leaves skin glowing and feeling smooth.

reviews.review_title: Not a gentle cleanser! Very drying!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this cleanser! Based on all of the positive reviews I had really high hopes. I can get pretty oily skin, but this cleanser felt as though it completely stripped the skin of everything! My face felt dry and tight after using. I had hoped for something a little less harsh, especially considering the description made it seem so gentle. I’d be nervous about using this regularly as I’m concerned it would strip the skin of some essential oils too and possibly make acne worse. Overall, I think calling it a gentle cleanser is misleading and I wouldn’t recommend for any skin type really. Dry skin would be unbearably dry if my oily skin feels like this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It feels mild on the skin but it doesn’t make a huge difference to my skin. I am not a fan of smell too. I still prefer the kate sommerville cleanser over this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It has a nice light cucumber scent. I like to use this at night because it’s a gentle cleanser. The only complaint I have is that it doesn’t lather very well, but other than that it leaves your face smooth. It doesn’t fight breakouts however, so I don’t use it during my time of the month.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is above the perfection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for several years. I have strayed in unsuccessful attempts to find cheaper dupes for this product, but nothing has come close. I always end up coming back to this tried and true cleanser. I have acne-prone skin that is also sensitive, and this is perfect for me. thankfully only a little bit is necessary to properly cleanse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the way this made my face feel after, however it didn't really remove all of my makeup even with a Clarsonic. I feel like I had to use a lot of it, thus not really making it worth the money. Besides that, I didn't experience any negative side affects like acne, sensitivity, etc.

reviews.review_title: expensive for a simple mild cleanser
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For what it is, this cleanser is actually very pricey. It’s not the best at removing makeup, and works best as a second step to your cleansing routine or as an AM cleanser. It’s very gentle and very mild. The scent is delicate and actually quite lovely - I don’t understand the complaints about the scent. I didn’t really notice any difference in my skin after using for several weeks, so I did end up returning it. I feel that for the price, you could get a much better cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super gentle and doesn’t leave skin feeling dry. I have oily skin, so I can get away with not moisturizing immediately after washing. Other drug store or salicylic acid cleansers leave my face feeling tight and dry, but this one doesn’t do that. I also really like the smell. It literally smells fresh like a spa. The smell and feeling it gives is super refreshing when you wash your face in the morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lightly and naturally scented. Makes my skin silky soft and clean!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: 100% my favorite cleanser!  It smells amazing and it doesn’t dry me out! It is also great at taking off makeup

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works very well- I especially love how it gets all my mascara off. Before this I used makeup wipes that I couldn't get it all off without rubbing really hard and my eyelashes would sometimes come out because of it. I have sensitive skin too and this is a great way to get makeup off without irritation. (sometimes leaves slight residue of my concealer but I usually use a makeup wipe beforehand so it's never been an issue)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favourite face cleanser!! My boyfriend has even started to use it because of how gentile it is on skin acne prone skin.  You feel so refreshed after.  I know it is a bit pricier than other face cleansers however a little goes a long way and it lasts a while :)  Definitely recommend !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for about two weeks now and I absolutely love it. It's gentle on my skin and leaves my skin soft and fresh.
