I have fairly sensitive skin and prone to redness and this one does a very good job in reducing redness. Overall I love this cleanser and I have only positive things to say!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ride or die and the only face cleanser that I will use. I have sensitive skin and this works perfectly. I use to have acne and it was great and healing for my skin then. Now I’m just trying to keep my skin clear and away from any irritation while getting it nice and clean at the same time. This is so gentle and pleasant to use! On days when I wear a lot of makeup I need to remove the makeup first and then wash with this which is just something you learn overtime as you grow up. You can also wash a few times to remove all makeup if you want and not worry about the value because you get quite a bit of product that goes along way. I highly recommend and have been buying this wash for years now and will not use anything else!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it leaves my skin nice clean and soft..Would recommend it 100% removes all impurities and doesnt dry out my skin..A little goes a long way..so far best face cleanser ive purchase..After i recieved a sample, i went and got a full size..Really love Fresh products!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Fresh Soy Face Cleanser for a long time (and I buy the travel size for trips). In my opinion, t's one of the best cleansers I've tried. It has the most refreshing feeling along with a light, clean scent with a hint of cucumber (and I don't normally like fragrances in my facial or skin care products). It gently but effectively removes ALL makeup and is not drying at all. (just wish it was a little less expensive for a daily cleanser)

reviews.review_title: Redness down, no leftover residue after use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser. My skin loves soy for some reason. I have super oily slick skin. But I'm also really pale and and have a lot of redness on my cheeks, chin and around my nose. This makes it all so much better. I don't even have to double cleanse to get my makeup off. I use a toner after washing my face and there is barely any product left on the cotton round after I clean my face. This is the cleanser I've been waiting for my whole life. I used to work at Ulta and never had a cleanser quite like this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really cleanses the face without stripping it or drying it out. I do notice a positive difference in my skin when I use this, which is rare with cleansers. I only use mineral foundation so I don’t know how it works at removing heavy makeup, though it does remove my mascara. It’s pricey though and I need to use quite a bit to cleanse my entire face. I’m trying something new currently, but have repurchased this many times and would recommend this if you’re having a hard time finding a gentle, yet effective, cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. Does not irritate my skin which is very dry. It is a bit more drying than my cleansing milk but it is perfect for summer since i soend lots of time in the sun and i sweat a bit. In the winter i use it 2 days a week to not get dry and its a perfect balance. Be sure to massage your skin with the product to get a better cleaning.

reviews.review_title: Great for trying to get off Proactiv!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you have used Proactiv or any addicting skin care this is the perfect weaning off facewash. I have tried to find something that won’t break me out because of my Proactiv. This smells so good. I know foamy cleansers are supposed to strip your skin but this doesn’t foam like I’d want it to. It reminds me of like a skin juice. Love it and will always return to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolute favourite cleanser... and I have a lot! Dependable to keep my skin happy and balanced. Not stripping but still feels clean. And I personally love the scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My all time favorite cleaner. I have been using this for about a month and a half and my skin has never looked better. It’s super gentle on the skin but definitely does the job of cleansing my skin and wiping my makeup away. I love that this product is gentle enough to use on the eyes. When I try to use other cleansers I always go back to this one!! No other cleanser compares, hands down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this after reading all the good review. However, I was very disappointed. It didn't even remove my tinted sunblock after the bottle states that it can even remove make up. My skin didn't feel soft at all after using this cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best thing i love about this cleanser is the smell !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser for my dry skin. It’s hard to find a cleanser for us dry folks that suds up! Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really disliked this cleanser. I have very oily skin with the occasional dry spot near a big pimple. I got a deluxe size sample in a kit and tried it for about a month. It worked very well at taking my makeup off while cleansing, which i’m a big fan of, however it did nothing to help my acne. If anything I noticed that my acne got worse while using this cleanser. As soon as I went back to a tea tree cleanser, my skin started looking better within 2 days. I also really disliked the smell... I know this works wonders for most people, but my skin did not get along with it. I now use the first aid beauty cleanser and that helps with makeup removal, and keeps my acne at bay.

Déçue par la qualité de ce produit. Il est mentionné dans ses propriétés qu'elle aide à démaquiller, ce n'est nullement le cas pour moi. C'est juste un basique de nettoyant qu'on peut trouver en parapharmacie pour un coût moindre:/ Donc, pas plus d'une étoile!!

reviews.review_title: My forever choice of face cleanser
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I will never let this cleanser leave my side! I was always using harsh acne scrubs to try to clear my skin and after doing a lot of research on skin products, skin health and just working in the industry, I learned to use something that doesn’t strip the skin and this is the perfect product! It’s so calming with a subtle smell of cucumber and it really cleanses your skin! I always recommend this product to everyone in need of a new cleanser and they are just as in love with it as I am!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For a cleanser that's supposed to be gentle and free of harsh chemicals, it broke me out like no other. I barely get breakouts but this one gave me whiteheads and pimples all across my jaw, forehead, chin. First I thought maybe my skin is going through a purging phase, until I noticed the cleanser was just simply doing a poor job and that my pores continued feeling clogged

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite cleanser! You won’t regret buying it. Literally the fourth time I’ve gotten this. I just love it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t think I could fall in love with a cleanser but wow. This is so comfortable and gentle on the skin but super effective.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I owe the improvement of my skin to this cleanser. I had such bad acne for so long. If I could pick one product to keep in my routine it would be this cleanser. It's gentle, doesn't strip my skin, smells amazing, removes all extra makeup left on my skin, and has helped the tone, texture, and clarity of my skin so incredibly much! Fresh's cleansers and masks are the skincare to beat. They're my ride or die! Just buy it people!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had pretty nice skin. Hardly any pimples. However after I started using this I got little bumps all over my skin. I thought it was my brushes so I cleaned them. I stopped using this for a bit and my skin went back to normal, I then reincorporated it back into my routine and immediately got little pimples. The smell is nice and it was moisturizing but it’s a no for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product soft on skin recommand for sensitive skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: my HG cleanser. it’s gentle and effective. i love the scent and the way it feels on my skin. i also love how it makes my skin feel. i use this in the morning or as a second cleanser. have repurchased many times and will continue to do so.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really solid cleanser... cleans well, doesn’t irritate. I am just not a fan of the smell otherwise I’d probably keep buying it. The smell reminds me mildly of sweat. It’s not overpowering but just unpleasant enough to bother me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a gentle and high quality cleanser. Works well to remove non waterproof makeup and cleanses skin thoroughly.  My skin is visible softer and hydrated. After only using this for a couple weeks I noticed an overall positive difference to the texture of my skin. This cleanser has a very mild rose, cucumber scent that is quite pleasant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this cleanser! The fresh cucumber smell is to die for and is one of my favorite things about it. It also leaves my face feeling SO smooth and soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My all-time fave cleanser!! Love the added product volume for the special edition!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited for this purchase because of all the hype I'd heard about it. I have combo skin and I don't find this cleanser makes me feel any less/more clean than using a drugstore cleanser. It doesn't leave my skin feeling dry and tight, but I also don't feel moisturized. It left behind some of my mascara (not waterproof) even after using an eye makeup remover. The cucumber smell is VERY strong - so beware if you aren't a fan. I wouldn't recommend this, will be returning it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best face wash ever! Not too drying. Leaves my skin feeling soft and refreshed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this when I’m in the shower so I can rake off my makeup and I love it. It takes all of my makeup off and it makes my skin feel so soft . I would recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the cleanser I keep going back to. It is gentle, leaves skin soft, and smells soft and lovely. This is my daily cleanser, and I use an exfoliating cleanser about 3 times a week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I personally found this very drying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! The reason for 4 stars and not 5 is that it smells strongly of cucumbers which are not my favorite. It leaves your faces soft and really removes mascara, conditioning eyelashes too! I purchased the large size after receiving a sample size from Sephora.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best face wash I've found in years. I have relatively sensitive skin (prone to breakouts), so have struggled to find something gentle enough but that still removes all the unwanted buildup and makeup at night. This does the trick - gentle, effective, and has a refreshing cucumber smell.

reviews.review_title: Bland and a bit boring, but in a good way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is pretty good. It really does a great job at taking off your makeup and cleaning away the day's dust and grime. It never dries out my skin (which is rare in a face wash for me!), and I adore the cucumber scent!! However, it isn't amazing. I didn't really see any improvement in skin tone or texture, and my acne didn't clear up any better with this cleanser compared to my favorite Clean n Clear drugstore cleanser. I just bought my third bottle of this, so I do enjoy it as a makeup remover, but I definitely need to use other products to control my skin. My favorite use for this cleanser is when I travel (which I do a lot). This cleanser is so gentle and kind of bland that no matter what stress my skin goes through because of travel (dehydration, lack of sleep, lack of access to my entire skincare regime, etc) this Fresh cleanser won't make matters worse. So, I guess my final verdict is that this is a good cleanser, but don't expect it to be a miracle product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to face wash in the mornings! It has such a soft and gentle feel, but at the same time gives you a good cleanse. This has helped save my skin! I never thought I could love a gentle face wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love love this product!!! I have been using it for years on a consistent basis and I swear it is gentle on the face, smells really good and best of all it takes off all my make up including mascara without having to scrub and irritate my eyes. This face wash  is probably the one product that is consistent in my skin care routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been rotating this cleanser with other brands and I always come back to this. It literally melts on to my skin and it has a very light and relaxing scent to it. Of all the other cleansers I used, this one really does a great job of remove makeup and oil without drying up your skin. Occasionally i get their travel size version and love to bring them with me whenever I’m traveling. I have combination skin and this works all year round for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample in one of my Sephora orders. This is a great cleanser, especially if you have sensitive skin or are acne prone. I feel like this cleanser could work with most skin types because it's very gentle yet effective. I'm thinking about purchasing the full size because I love how it makes my skin feel and it doesn't break me out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have super sensitive skin and eyes. I have wasted TONS of money on other facial cleansers. Most left my skin unclean, dry, or with bloodshot eyes. This is my saving grace!!! Leaves my skin very clean, hydrated, & makeup free!!! I love this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a nice cleanser. Good smell. It wasnt anything to write home about though. Wouldn't repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my all time favorite products. I especially love it because it cleans my skin and can be used as a makeup remover.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is great for oily sensitive skin. It brightens dullness, reduces redness and actually cleanses skin without stripping it of it's natural oils. The cucumber scent is light and doesn't linger. It was my favorite cleanser for many years (yay, having a travel size), but I was disappointed when I went cruelty free that Fresh isn't a cruelty free brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face wash! The size is amazing I feel like ill never run out. it keeps my face so smooth and clean!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for over a year. It's great and I will continue to buy it forever. I have very sensitive skin and I LOVE how it makes my skin feel. It smells wonderful and leaves my face fresh and still moisturized after the wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Really cleans off makeup well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So good! Yes, it is pricey. Whenever Sephora had fresh products as samples or rewards I'd always choose the cleanser. It smells so good and my skin feels clean and soft. I have oily skin. I've only bought a full size one time, and I was so sad when it ran out. At the time I couldn't afford to buy the full size so whenever the samples were available I tried to make it last as long as I could. Always bummed when I ran out. I think I'm going to bite the bullet and get a bottle solely for my night time routine. It removes any left over makeup as well as stubborn mascara. I love fresh products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love it! smells like cucumbers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn't really sure about this cleanser at first — I didn't feel like it worked that well and the smell was very off-putting. After a while, I do really like it a lot! It's a light but powerful cleanser that just takes some getting used to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Simple wash, great for sensitive skin!  Have been using this for years and always come back to it after trying something new.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was unsure about this product since it’s pretty pricy, but I love it! It leaves my face feeling super clean and fresh. I like this product because it’s all very natural and you don’t have to worry about putting bad chemicals on to your face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is so nice and light. Rinsed off clean and easy . Leaves you skin soft to touch. Pleasent light cucumber smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is so gentle and does not dry out your skin. Doesn't make your skin have that tight feeling after drying your face, but throughly cleanses. It also does not foam up, which is nice for those with skin sensitive to bacteria from foaming cleaners.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really fresh and hydrating on the face. I have been using this for years and I haven’t found something to switch it for. I love how my face feels soft and looks luminous every time I use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it. Gentle enough that you can’t use it on your eyes, but dirt and makeup don’t stand a chance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love it so much......soft after clean

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best facial wash and make up remover. Don't burn my eyes, melts makeup, great for mu sensitive skin. I feel so clean after using.

reviews.review_title: Leave my skin feeling super clean
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off the smell is amazing in my opinion... smells like a fresh green juice. This is perfect for my oily/acne prone skin because it’s light enough that doesn’t feel like it’s over moisturizing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My holy grail facial cleanser. Removes eye makeup easily, doesn’t sting, isn’t oily, doesn’t leave a film. It’s perfect. I have tried other products and nothing compares to this one. It is an eye makeup and face makeup remover in one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this face wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using for over 1.5 years and my skin has never looked better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have hear this is a very good product, finally I try a sample pack, it't really gentle for the dry skin! very clean and not drying out your skin. Love this cleanser so I bought a big one 200ml.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this!! Will forever stay my number one cleanser!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best facewash ive ever used. Gentle, but works really well to get rid of junk in your pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My fave facial wash, our entire family uses it, so I purchase it often! It’s very gentle, and not fragrant or perfect for sensitive skin.

reviews.review_title: Will always be in my top!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Have repurchased again and again. Love this facewash. Only downside is I need a separate eye makeup remover. Little goes a long way, smells great, travels great! Many of my friends now use this and their lotus moisturizer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: By far my favorite cleanser. I will not use anything else. It’s so gentle and doesn’t dry out my skin. It makes my skin soooo soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product! Perfect size and made my face feel smooth after first use. I would mention that it doesn’t remove makeup very well, so it’s more of a morning cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite! always makes my skin feel fresh and clean! I always go back to this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very gentle, smell isn’t overpowering and doesn’t strip your skin. Does a good job removing foundation/shadow but my mascara doesn’t budge with this, I always have to use micellar water to get that off after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this face wash! I generally have issues with cleansers being too harsh and burn because of the acne medication I use, but I've never had any issues with this one! I've been using for about two years, in combination with many different types of creams

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I never thought I would be so addicted to a cleanser. This product, while expensive, is worth it. It removes makeup yet is gentle on the skin. My face is never dry or tight after I wash it. It's not a miracle, but it's made a difference in the softness and clarity of my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: amazing cleanser!! i picked it up impulsively and i didn't regret it. i use this a first step in my skincare routine. squeeze a pea size on your finger and that's all you need

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I buy the mini size of this product whenever I travel and it does the trick. Cleans my face and is gentle enough. I don’t love the smell and I don’t love the price. Usually, i use the boscia clear complexion cleanser, which I think is actually more gentle, has no smell and is about 10 dollars cheaper. They just don’t make a travel size ! would recommend trying if you’re looking for something a bit cheaper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love is an understatement. This is my go to everyday cleanser. I have been using it for about a month with my FOREO (which is also a amazing beauty tool, they go hand in hand) and I’m on my second bottle...since using it I have not once broke out and I have also seen my dark spots/acne scars fading. I have combination/sensitive skin, It is perfect for everyday use. The light cucumber scent smells wonderful and leaves a refreshing feel. I would highly recommend trying it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a new gentle cleanser, and this is definitely gentle -- so gentle I don't think it's actually doing anything. I washed my face twice with it and still had BB cream on my face that came off on the washcloth. Maybe a good morning cleanser? But doesn't do anything if you're trying to cleanse your face after a long day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: left my face clean and soft.

reviews.review_title: Can a product really be straight down the middle?
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the smaller size to give it a try. I have combo skin that leans toward oily and I tend to do a dual cleansing on days I wear makeup. In general, it wasn't good or bad. It just kind of was...My face didn't break out from it but it also didn't really make my skin any better. It wasn't the best at removing my makeup but it wasn't terrible at it either. I wanted to love it but in the end, it just wasn't worth the price to keep buying it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not the best.  I used it for a few days on my chin and then moved up to my cheeks because I have very sensitive skin. But the cleanser just dried out and irritated by sensitive skin. I do not recommend to people with really sensitive skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I could not get past the smell! The product itself is amazing but the scent is so overpowering. It seems like they have added an artificial scent to it which is super disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I want to love this product but my skin can't take it. :( I have sensitive skin and I thought this cleanser would be OK for me to use... But everytime I use it my face itches. I like how my face looks brighter the next morning after using this though... (Of course w/o that itchy feeling).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yay for me! I just scored the full size of this cleanser with my Beauty Insider points! I have had a few deluxe samples of this in the past and loved it, but have a lot of cleansers as they are often included in the wonderful kits Sephora offers. This is among the best. Cleans well without stripping the skin and you really only need a little - a dime size at the most.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Soy Face cleanser has been my holy grail for the past 3 years. Leaves my skin soft, clean, and is not irritating at all. I have very oily skin, and at the end of the day, even after removing my makeup, my skin still feels oily and gunky (gross, I know!) And Soy Face cleanser always does a great job of taking all the remaining dust, gunk and oil away. I rarely have a pimple showing up, and if it does, it's mostly because of other products/me touching my own skin with dirty fingers. If you're looking for a gentle, yet affective cleanser, there's no harm in trying this product out. It has a soothing and very subtle cucumber scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this cleanser because I was having an acne situation. That same night I applied it and the next morning my face was looking better and it is so soft. Right know it is my favorite cleansing product and I recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best face cleanser ever!!! It removes all your makeup without needing to use an excessive amount. Even eye makeup. It has a light cucumber smell that’s very refreshing. It’s gentle enough for everyday use and leaves my face feeling soothed and clean. I bought my first bottle in march and fell in love - it’s my new favourite cleanser and I will 100% be repurchasing when I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am so happy I tried this! I have dryer skin now that I’m in my early/mid 30’s and I found that many cleansers were were just to “soapy” lol! This one is very gentle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this product. It makes my skin so soft and smells really good. I also happen to have lash extensions and haven't had any issues with this cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just picked this cleanser up because I was on a trip and I forgot to bring one with me. BUT OH MY GOODNESS After a few uses my skin was the softest it had ever been. At first I wasn't sure if it was something in the water where I had been staying but when I ran out of the cleanser and my skin went back to normal, I knew it was the cleanser. I need to buy it again asap

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive oily skin and have been looking for a gentle cleanser as my second cleanser (first cleanse I use Clinique take the day off balm). This cleanser has a jelly consistency and a little goes a long way! It takes off all makeup and stubborn mascara and leaves skin feeling normal! No tightness or dryness. Will probably be re-purchasing for a long time!

reviews.review_title: my go-to makeup remover and cleanser
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to daily face cleanser and makeup remover. It does not dry out my skin and is not oily on the skin. It completely and easily removes my face makeup and mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily but sensitive skin. This cleanser gets everything clean without stripping or irritating the skin. I am also early 30s and still get the occasional small breakout and this has really helped with that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Got it first a sample and I loved it. I didn’t purchase full size at first because I thought it was too expensive for a cleanser but I finally caved not being satisfied with anything else and I don’t regret it. It really does a great job and feels amazingly fresh. On days I wear little or no makeup the cleanser alone is enough. For a full makeup I do cleanse with oil first and then this and it works wonders in getting rid of the oil and residual makeup. I can say with confidence I will repurchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The 5.1 OZ lasts you over a year ladies... plus I use it every day!! It’s so refreshing. The cucumber smell is a great way to start your morning. It really cleans your skin and doesn’t dry it out whatsoever. I loved this product so much that I bought the travel size version to take on trips with me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Removes makeup completely leaving my face feeling soft and hydrated!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive and acne prone skin that easily becomes red. This has not only calmed my skin down but improved the texture as well as my skin tone. Takes off all traces of makeup and leaves your skin feeling clean yet hydrated. I can’t say enough amazing this about this face wash !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing gentle cleanser. Great for all skin types and ages. I totally recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t know how many cleansers I have tried, from the super high end to the super low end, none of them actually worked for me. I got a sample of this using my sephora points & I’m so glad I did. I went out & bought the huge 200 ML bottle of it. This stuff does wonders for my face. My face feels so, so soft & glows. My mom & boyfriend both noticed. I love this stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this with my Clarisonic in the mornings, and it does a great job of cleansing without drying out my skin. It is very gentle but actually works. If some cleansers feel too harsh for you, this one may really help!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser leave my skin smooth and clean. Really enjoyed the product so far. I am using it with the moisturizer which really helps.   It cleans my make up, the eye make up is a bit harder to clean , need extra wash or eye make up removal. But really like the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a wonderful and gentle cleanser. My face feels clean, but not stripped of moisture after I use it. The fragrance reminds me of cucumber and is not overwhelming. I haven't tried to take off make up with it yet, so I can't speak to how well that works. I just love it for the of the day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely sensitive skin and so far this is the only cleanser/make up remover that doesn’t irritate my sling nor reddens my skin at all!! It’s just very gentle and natural. Absolute worth getting the biggest bottle if you wear make up everyday.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While Fresh has many items that I love (such as the nectar mask) this cleaner was not one of them. I honestly don’t enjoy any of the items in their soy line at all. The smell is quite awful, but the texture and cleaning power of this cleanser are non existent! I take off most of my makeup with the Clinique take the day off balm, and still have to wash my face twice with this (with residue still remaining on my cotton pad after using my toner) I only wear foundation (Fenty) with no primer and light contouring. Perhaps it would work better with a Clarisonic, but that is besides the point

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yay! This stuff is amazing. I love the light cucumber smell, not overpowering at all and feels so refreshing, I have acne prone skin and am currently on accutane so finding a cleanser that's effective but doesn't dry me out is important. I've tried using this with my clarisonic as well on days I wear more makeup or need a little exfoliation.  I've always been the girl that doesn't see the point in spending more money on a cleanser when I can buy something similar at the drug store. But, this one takes the cake. My new go to cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I know it says for all skin types but this just didn't work for me. I have dry, sensitive skin... I cleanse a.m and p.m, moisturize twice a day after washing my face and I still have dry patches.... it might be where I live but I feel this cleanser just doesn't work for everybody. Make sure to do your homework!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser doesn’t take off mascara. Thought I’d get that out the way.  I have combo skin so my skin didn’t react to it well it left it oily, didn’t feel that my skin received that  deep cleanse I was looking forward to. Followed it up with the moisture cream, my skin never felt more gross and oily. It felt like a heavy layer of gunk. I stopped using the entire Fresh line all together.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Fine for a light cleanse - would use in the morning - but my skin is oily and this did not do a good enough job at removing oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very simple cleanser. Nothing to rave or complain about. It smells light but good, it feels very nice and leaves your skin clean and hydrated. Not much to say beyond that. Not sure I'd buy again, but I'd recommend it for what it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser and been using it for a few years! Works really well for my skin type (combination) and very gentle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a free sample.  I was able to get two washes out of it and it did good to remove my makeup and any dirt.  I actually really liked it.  I am a little hesitant to buy it though because my skin is so sensitive when it comes to cleansers, they tend to dry my skin out after a week or two then ends up under my bathroom sink.  Will have to think on this one...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very gentle and soft cleanser. Amazing for sensitive skin and I love the scent! Very soothing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: F/27/combination skin. I have tried a lot of different cleansers over the years and this is hands down the best; tried it once about 2 years ago and have never used anything else since! It takes off all traces of makeup, doesn’t over dry or over moisturize, and leaves my face feeling clean and natural. And the price is very reasonable for the product. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like how I can use this at the end of the day to remove make up and clean impurities. But this face wash left my skin dull and dry. I tried this out after having it recommended by an employee and really wanted to like it but it didn’t work for my sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: All I want out of a cleanser is for it to swiftly remove the eldritch film of garbage I paint on my face without stripping my skin off or forcing me to use the whole bottle. Imagine my delight when this literally dissolved a black, waterproof paint pot eye base caked with glitter. AND my skin didn’t feel tight afterward. AND it works well with my Clarisonic. AND THEN it knocked me over when it later helped remove grease paint residue, with soft skin left behind. It’s expensive, but it’s the best cleanser I’ve ever used so the function negates the price for me.   Oh, and I love the cucumber smell that seems to be a problem here.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a gentle cleanser that hasn’t dried out my skin but keeps my oil balanced 24/7! I love more of the gel-like consistency and the very light smell. Will be my go to cleanser for the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Most people say that cleanser is something where you can save your money on but i find that my skin prefers this cleanser over all the cleansers that i have tried. It gently get rid of my dead skin cells and whiteheads and cleans my skin pretty well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think this works great but I personally hate how it smells. Makes me refrain from using it continuously. Otherwise yes it does cleanse really well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Truly my ride or die! This cleanser is lightweight and leaves my skin feeling fresh! It smells amazing and the scent isn't very overpowering. It is also a great makeup remover! I have combination skin and it always leaves my skin feeling refreshed and comfortable in all areas. It has also helped with eliminating and lessening the acne on my face, specifically blackheads! My mom uses it too and she has mature skin! It is great for all skin types. I would totally recommend to anyone looking for a simple go-to cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don't use it to remove makeup so unfortunately i cant give you that review- however i use this in the morning

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing face wash! It’s so gentle, smells just lovely, and leaves my face feeling properly cleaned & soft. This is the first face wash from Sephora that I’ve actually bought bc of a sampler. It takes all my makeup off with ease and is perfect for my sensitive skin as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my all-time favorite cleanser! Super gentle on the skin, easily removes eye make-up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite cleaner ever. I always end up coming back to it. It’s great for sensitive skin. Never leaves my skin feeling dry or irritated like some cleaners. Easily removes all of my makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face cleanser! A few years back, I received this and the fresh Rose Face Mask for my Beauty Insider birthday gift. Ever since, I have been loving both these products, but I'm here to talk about this face cleanser. At first, I didn't think my face was clean after this, since I am usually used to drugstore face washes that strip away all moisture. However, after washing this off and moisturizing, I felt like this face wash made my skin so soft even after I washed it at the end of the day as well! The ingredients are so soothing and create a cocktail perfect for healthy skin. I recommend this to anyone, but especially for people with sensitive, easily irritated skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started with a small size and I loved it. I now bought a full size and really like how it fully cleans my skin. I use micellar water after cleaning the face to make sure I really cleaned everything and my cotton pod is always clean after using this product. I takes seconds to clean even heavy makeup. I also like that it doesn't dry my skin and leaves it soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely sensitive skin that It’s such a huge pain to find products that would suit my skin. Until last Christmas, my boyfriend bought me this. It makes my skin super soft and cleanses it well without drying it. Love this product! A bit pricey but totes worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. I received a sample of it awhile back, and used it up. I had to buy more. It works well, makes my skin feel nice and clean, and it smells SO good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this facewash. I use it morning and night and as an addicted bonus It’s a life saver when I run out of makeup remover- I’ve used it to take off everything (even mascara) and it’s never irritated my skin or eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Cleans, softens, and leaves my skin feeling fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite thing in my gym shower bag. It is gentle and makes my skin feel smooth. Great refresher after a workout.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in LOVEEEE with this cleanser .... I have been suggesting it to everyone ! It’s so fantastic that I got my husband to start using it even though he is not a fan of the cucumber smell . I used to have really ugly break outs with the fresh line I am able to manage them . Best part is it works for all skin types !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser was recommended to me a little over a year ago by a Sephora employee and I have since fallen in love with it. It's gentle enough that I can use it thru the winter time without worry about being over-drying, but it is still great at removing excess oil during the summer months. It's even gentle enough that I can use it twice a day if I happen to get sweaty throughout the day after being outside or working out. This is definitely a favorite staple (one of my only!) in my skin care regiment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I saw this limited edition really big tube of Fresh Soy Face Cleanser, I was excited. This face cleanser works so well, and has a nice, delicate scent. I love it.

reviews.review_title: Effective makeup remover with clean scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Removes makeup easy and leaves skin soft. Plus it smells fresh too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is AMAZING! It removes most, if not all, of my makeup and it unclogs mt pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite cleanser! Even gets off eye makeup. Doesn’t feel too drying.

reviews.review_title: Best choice for sensitive, acne-prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser I’ve tried! It smells great, makes my skin feel clean and soft (without feeling dried out), and works perfectly for my sensitive and acne-prone skin. It’s admittedly expensive for the larger size, but you only really need a small amount, so it lasts what seems like forever. At one point, I figured out that it really only cost me about $4-5 a month for how much I got out of it, which is well worth it. I was so excited to see the new size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! It smells amazing and is really gentle on my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's a good cleaner but I would recommend trying the youth to the people cleanser over this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this face wash because it doesn't dry out my skin and it's gentle enough to use day and night! It helps remove any leftover makeup on my face too that my makeup removing wipes leave behind.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is everything it promises to be.  It does not strip the skin of essential oils yet cleanses throughly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle and does not strip or irritate the skin.  Totally addicted to this stuff. Similar after-wash feeling as the CosRX low pH cleanser.

reviews.review_title: leaves my skin so clean and soft
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i switched from the glossier cleanser to this and i'm so glad i did. it leaves my skin feeling so soft and smooth and you don't need much either. i also love the limited edition packaging. will definitely repurchase!

reviews.review_title: I buy 2 when I get the chance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It doesn't dry my skin. My skin gets flaky whenever I use a harsh cleanser, but not with this soap. I'd recommend you follow up with a toner.

reviews.review_title: Buy it. You won’t regret it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried so many times to stop buying this thinking I’m overdoing it a bit spending this much money on a daily face cleaner. I can’t fight it. Love this cleanser. My face feels clean, skin looks brighter & refreshed. I’m hooked.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser makes my face feel so fresh and light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser.  It leaves me skin feeling so soft.  The smell is very mild and pleasant.  It is very gently so I only use it once or twice a week in the evening almost like a treat for my face!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Picked this up in the mini size the day I was going on vacation and was pleasantly surprised at how much I liked it. have used it for six weeks and just picked up the full size! I needed something more convenient than the Avene dermo milk I have been ordering online for years and this does well. I have redness prone skin that can get dry in some areas but I also live in high humidity/100 degree area so finding a good cleanser that doesn't strip my face has been hard. My only complaint is that I hate the cucumber smell...but as I only have to endure it for 15 seconds I'll put up with it. I know it says it removes makeup but if I've got a full face on I ALWAYS use a wipe (ole henricksen) before washing my face to get most of it off and leave the soy cleanser to actually clean my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive skin, especially face cleanser I will have very fast reaction. I will get rash and pimples with in a week if the cleanser irritated me. I have been using FRESH products for more than 3 years. Soy Face Cleanser is the one I always use because it’s very soothing, mind and soft. Great for any skin types and all year around because of gel texture is good for cleaning and not make you skin dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not the best for acne prone skin because it doesn’t have salicylic acid or anything in it but it’s so gentle and perfect for washing your face in the morning. It’s also the BEST makeup remover ever!! It’s better than any makeup remover i’ve ever tried. It takes of mascara without any rubbing and doesn’t sting if it gets in your eyes. I will never use anything else to get my makeup off!

reviews.review_title: Impulse Turned Permanent Addition to my Collection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you ever want to test your willpower - walk through the aisle of minis in the Sephora checkout... I bought this as I was marching up to the register without much thought. I have very oily skin and textured skin - and I always thought the solution was to roughly slough away the skin. This has shown me a whole new world. It's so gentle but so effective. It's such calming and refreshing scent when I wake up and wash my face in the morning. So good. Will continue to buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot day enough great things about this. I keep buying the $15 little bottle. I love this stuff so so so so so much. I can’t going back to it. It cleans my face really well, takes the makeup off, and makes my skin feel amazing. It smells really good. I wish Fresh made more in the “soy” line! I would recommend this to anyone ever. My skin looks and feels amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the 1st products recommended by beauty gurus that is sooooo worth it. I don’t know how this cleanser works so well but it does. The pores to the sides of my nose have gotten clean and smaller. I paid a ton of money for Rodan and Fields and never noticed a difference in my pores. This stuff is amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this to take on vacation with me because my full size face wash is too big to fly with. But the Soy smell from this face wash is over powering. I also don’t think It washes well at all. I was excited because of how cheap it was. But I won’t buy It again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it and I recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to find a perfect cleanser for my face because I have a sensitive skin. This product is the best. It didn't irritate my skin. I would have given a 5 star but its smell is not that nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this after Clinique eye makeup remover, which I’ve used for near a decade, started giving me a bad reaction and still not getting my eye makeup off. I wanted something that was delicate, but still strong enough to get my face clean.   This stuff takes my makeup right off, and my face feels so clean and hydrated afterwards. No irritation, and works so much better than any makeup remover I’ve used before. I really recommend it, especially if you have dry, sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve spent years finding the perfect cleanser for me and I’m so glad that I came across this! This cleanser leaves my skin feeling clean and refreshed without the squeaky clean feeling (which I learned is not good after getting into skincare). The smell is refreshing and not strong which is good as I do not like products with fragrance. I found that it has helped calmed down my acne and made a huge difference in my skin. I love love love this product!

reviews.review_title: Smells like your at a spa
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought the smaller one to try and love it. After use your skin feels smooth and soft. Smells like cucumbers, like your at a spa. I don’t use it to help me fully take my make off.  But it helps to take off what’s left.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample and when I first opened it I didn’t like the smell, however, when I used it I absolutely loved it. My skin felt so soft and smooth, I can over look the smell(which  isn’t horrible, but not the best) I am definitely buying the full size!

reviews.review_title: Nice...for a minute. Acne sufferers beware!!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this and liked it enough to buy the 1.7oz  to start off. I love how radiant and hydrated my skin looks and feels. However, I am noticing my pores are very clogged and am also starting to see a lot of under the surface whiteheads. Being as I just got my skin under control after 3 yrs of constant outbreaks and a plethora of meds, this does not make me happy nor willing to spend more money on this product.

reviews.review_title: Great for sensitive/ acne prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Literally my holy grail cleanser. I have super sensitive skin therefore which causes my skin to be quite acne prone. But this cleanser truly does it all. Takes my makeup off with ease and doesn’t strip my skin. Anyone struggling to find an all around good cleanser, I would recommend this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'd read such rave reviews about this that I was looking forward to trying it but this did not work for me at all. The smell was nice and cucumber-y smelling but it never made my skin feel clean after washing morning or night. I felt like I needed to re-wash, even in the morning with no make up to wash off. I also broke out horribly the first month after using it, with this being the only skincare change I made (I know better by now thru trial and error).  Sorry but I would not recommend for oily/already blemish prone skin. Not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this cleanser!  I got it as a sample & am definitely buying the bigger size.  I’ve been looking for a new makeup remover that isn’t cloths (specifically for my eye make up) that is gentle & natural & this cleanser is the winner!  It’s very gentle, refreshing & makes taking off your eye makeup a breeze.  No more losing eye lashes with cloths.  Also, I LOVE the smell & especially the ingredients.  It smells like fresh cucumbers to me.  Will be trying more Fresh products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Unique scent. Leaves skin light and fresh. Not sticky gel that slightly lathers.
This product is a life saver for my skin! I bought this face wash 4 times. It's gentle on my skin. The only thing that I don't like is the price..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ever since I started using this product 4 years ago my skin appears healthy, soft, clear, and fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This dried my skin out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing so far for my dry and sensitive skin! I was recently using a different cleanser that made the texture of my skin quite rough but after using this once, my skin was much softer and less dull! I love it. Its gentle on my skin too!

reviews.review_title: Not great for removing make-up when washing face
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wear make-up and this does not remove foundation easily. I have to make sure my make-up remover has completely cleaned the make-up off, as this face wash doesn't remove any remnants without a lot of scrubbing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Didn’t work well to remove makeup or cleanse oily face.

reviews.review_title: No impact on my pores situation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did really want to like this but unfortunately, I'm not getting the desired result from my second cleanser. It has a cucumber smell which is neither a pro or con for me. I'll finish up my samples but won't purchase a full size. I'd rather invest in their Black Tea Essence which I LOVED!

reviews.review_title: Not worth it. Does not fully remove makeup.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is VERY gentle. Which is great but it leaves makeup residue behind. So what's the point of it then? I do like the cleanser and I wanted to love it but it has a hard time removing basic makeup. I had to scrub my eyes to get my eye liner off... and who wants to scrub soap into their eyes? no one. I have used other cheaper cleansers that have worked better.. like the FAB beauty cleanser. that one leaves the skin soft and clean. The Fresh cleanser leaves your face soft but doesn't do a good job of cleaning, so I can imagine pimple are soon to come if I keep using this. The texture is weird

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A cleanser that is gentle but still able to remove ALL my makeup. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product I would have to say is really a hyped facial cleanser! I heard so many good things on YouTube about it and I tried the mini size version to see if I would like it.  The scent is refreshing and wakes me up in the morning. Also feels like it really gets in there and washes any dirt,oil, and excess makeup off my face. The only negative thing I would say about this is that on my combination skin it makes my face dry. But thats why we have moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this for years - it never disappoints! This is the only product I've given a five star rating! Super gentle yet it does a thorough job to remove makeup. Smells great and I know the ingredients are natural and healthy for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this product when I bought it, but it definitely does not take off all my makeup, especially my non-waterproof eye makeup. I’m disappointed that for the price it doesn’t seem to cleanse very well. It’s not worth the $40 price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s gentle on the skin but but after washing, my face still didn’t feel cleansed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser just did not work out for me. Maybe I expected too much from it but it did not evenly remove my face makeup. When I finished using this cleanser I had to go in with another because my foundation had been smeared all over my face but it was still stuck on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the idea of using soy on my face however the smell is not so pleasant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is a godsend! I have keratosis pilaris on face, so my skin is very sensitive and dry. It is very important that I use a cleanser that is soap/fragrance free (which this is!) the ingredients are super calming. Since using this cleanser, my skin is noticeably less red and smoother. It’s super gentle but removes my makeup just fine. I am so happy with my skin since I have started using this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's pretty gentle and seems to clean well. I have sun allergy and have been looking for a cleanser that's gentle enough to not irritate my skin, and this one is perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very gentle cleanser that doesn't dry out my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It’s for my daughter and she liked it. She has very sensitive skin and she doesn’t like anything scented

reviews.review_title: The best cleanser for dry and sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love Fresh brand and this cleanser. I have dry and sensitive skin, but after washing my skin is not irritated, there is no dryness, only moisturizing and comfort. Once finished - I'll buy again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that it so gentle on my face nothing too sudsy just the right amount and feels clean

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 3 Stars. As for the clean factor, I felt that it DID cleanse my skin, just not as well as other cleansers in its category. 2 of my biggest gripes with this cleanser are it’s smell, which for me personally was potent and pungent, and the texture. It felt like a combination between jello/shower jelly combined with freshly harvested seaweed. I couldn’t be happier to get this off my face. I really wanted to like this cleanser as some of the FRESH products I do enjoy, but sadly this one is not for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore this cleanser. I’ve been using it for over a year now. The texture is soft and it cleanses very gently, great for sensitive skin. I will always repurchase!!

reviews.review_title: the freshest cleanser in the market
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin has a mind of its own. At times it's oily, other times it's dry, and mostly it's in between. I try to stay away from harsh products because recently my skin has become sensitive. This cleanser is sent by the gods. Its so gentle yet very effective. My skin always feels clean (removes makeup very well) and does not irritate it. The jelly consistency is fun and the light smell is lovely. The large size lasts forever, so the price is WORTH IT.  Overall, great year round cleanser for most skin types. It has made my skin look good. 10/10 would recommend to my friends, and even my enemies.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it. Makes your skin feel so good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It's refreshing and only have to use a minimal amount so it lasts a while

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cleanser! It melts away mascara and foundation, with no eye irritation. Have used it for years!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is not for me. I have gotten several deluxe sizes of the year and don’t understand why everyone loves it. I like a foaming cleanser, cleansing oil or balm so maybe that’s why I am not impressed by this. It’s just basic and doesn’t even smell good. I have started to use it as body wash so that it doesn’t go to waste.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is my holy grail to wash my face, gentle and powerful enough to clean the day off my face

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It did everything as promised and kept my skin clean, clear, hydrated but no oily feeling. It smells wonderful and is so light and fresh it makes you feel like you're at a spa! Super great for my sensitve and dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it. Makes your skin feel so good!
